TAFSEER-E-QURAN

Compiled by Shoeb Raza Abdi Nauganvi,  Bombay

(Daily Written & WhatsApp Posted.)

SURAH A’RAF
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

(Qur'an ki har Ayat ki Tafseer daily WhatsApp aur doosre Social Media par post ki jaati hai. Daily mukhtalif kitabon ke hawale se likha jata hai. Main source: Tafseer e Noorus Saqlain aur Tafseer e Namoona (Urdu).

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

          *28th Muharram 1441*

 *28th September 2019, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

            ♦ _*SURAH A'RAF*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1300)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*المص * كِتَابٌ أُنْزِلَ إِلَيْكَ فَلَا يَكُنْ فِي صَدْرِكَ حَرَجٌ مِنْهُ لِتُنْذِرَ بِهِ وَذِكْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ.*

_"Alif, Laam, Meem, Saad! *Ye ek Kitab hai jo tumhari taraf utari gayi hai.* Tumhare Dil mein isse koi jhijhak nahi honi chahiye. Iske utarne ki gharz ye hai ke tum iske zariye (Munkarin ko) darao aur Ahle Imaan ke liye Nasihat ho."_

(Surah A'raf: 1 - 2)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY....!!!!!!!!*_

📚📖 🔰

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jo har Mahine Surah A'raf padhe to woh un logon mein se hoga jin par koi khauf o huzn nahi hoga. Aur agar koi Juma ke Din ye Surah padhega to usse Qayamat ke Din Hisaab nahi liya jayega. Ye Surah Mohkamat par mushtamil hai, iska padhna na chhodo, ye apne padhne wale ke liye gawahi degi."_

(Kitab Sawabul Aamaal, Noorus Saqlain)

📚

Rasoole Khuda (saww):

_"Jo shakhs Surah A'raf padhe to Allah uske aur Iblees ke darmiyan ek parda hael kardega aur Qayamat ke Din Hazrat Adam (as) uske Shafee honge."_

(Misbah Kaf'ami, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*وَ نَعْتَرِفَ بِاَنَّهُمْ شُفَعَاۤءُ الْخَلَاۤئِقِ اِذَا نُصِبَتِ الْمَوَازِيْنُ فِيْ يَوْمِ الْاَعْرَافِ وَ الْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ وَ سَلَامٌ عَلٰى عِبَادِهِ الَّذِيْنَ اصْطَفٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِهِ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ۔*

(Dua e Izne Dukhool Haram e Mutahhar - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3
**********************************
     *21st Jamadi us Sani 1440*
*27th February 2019, Wednesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

  ♦ _*HUROOF E MUQATTA'AT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1167)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*المص* كِتَابٌ أُنْزِلَ إِلَيْكَ فَلَا يَكُنْ فِي صَدْرِكَ حَرَجٌ مِنْهُ لِتُنْذِرَ بِهِ وَذِكْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ. 

_"Alif, Laam, Meem, Saad! Ye ek Kitab hai jo tumhari taraf utari gayi hai. Tumhare Dil mein isse koi jhijhak nahi honi chahiye. Iske utarne ki gharz ye hai ke tum iske zariye (Munkarin ko) darao aur Ahle Imaan ke liye Nasihat ho."_
(Surah A'raf: 1 - 2)

*Note:*
Abhi tak 6 Surah ki Tafseer pesh ki jaa chuki hai. Jo log isse mehroom rah gaye woh hamari website par refer kar sakte hain, is link par click karen:
http://shiachannel.net78.net/tafseer-hinglish.html
Aaj se ham Surah A'raf ki Tafseer shuru kar rahe hain.

📚📖 🔰
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Huroof e Muqatta'at *المص* ka maani hain: *انا الله المقتدر الصادق*(" Mein hi Sachcha Sahibe Iqtedar Khuda hun.")"_
(Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🔰
Ek Bani Umayya se talluq rakhne wale shakhs ne Huroof e Muqatta'at ke bare mein sawal kiya ke iske kya maani hain aur inse kya fayda?
Imam (as) ne farmaya:
_"(Abjad ke mutabiq) *المص* ke Total Number hain 161, yani 161 Saal guzarne ke baad Bani Umayya ki hukumar khatm ho jayegi."_ Aur aisa hi hua.
(Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🔰
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"Bani Abbas mein 12 log hukmaran honge. 8 ke baad 4 hukmaran qatl honge... Yaad rakho Huroof e Muqatta'at mein bahut zyada Ilm hai. *الم* iske tehet Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Ailan e Nubuwwat kiya yahan tak ke unka Noor zahir hua aur unke Kalme ne qarar pakda aur Aap (saww) paida hue jis Din Aap (saww) ko paida hona tha to us waqt Saatven Alf (7000) mein se 103 Baras guzar chuke the._
_Iska mazeed bayan Mktab e Khuda ke Huroof e Muqatta'at mein maujood hain bashart ye ke tum un ke repeatation ko drop karke unhe count karo aur Huroof e Muqatta'at mein se jis Din bhi poore hote hain to uske ikhtetam par Bani Hashim mein se koi na koi qayam karta hai._
_Imam Husain (as) ke khurooj ki ibteda *الم* se hoti hai aur 161 Saal ki muddat mein tamam ho gayi jab Bani Abbas ne qayam kiya. Aur Qaim Ale Muhammad (atfs) *الر* ke waqt Zuhoor karenge. *الر* ke adad hote hain 271. Ise achhi tarah samajho aur zehen nasheen kar lo aur ise apne paas chhupa kar rakho."_
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Allah Ta'ala ne Apna Ism e Aazam 73 harfo'n mein qaraar diya hai jinme se 25 huroof Adam (as) ko, 8 huroof Ibrahim (as) ko, 4 huroof Musa (as) ko aur 2 huroof Isa (as) ko ataa huwe jo in 2 harfo'n ki madad se murdo'n ko zinda kiya karte the, nabina aur kodhi (blind and leper) ko shifa dete the. H. Muhammmad (saww) ko 72 huroof ataa huwe hain…"_
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v4, p916)
🤲🏻
*ياَ صَاحِبَ كُلِّ نَجْوَى*
_"Aye Harf e Raaz ke Saathi.. "_ hamari mushkil barla.
(A part of Joshan e Kabir, Dua 22)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
    *23rd Jamadi us Sani 1440*
      *1st March 2019, Friday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
 

        ♦ _*ITA'AT E WALI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1169)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*اتَّبِعُوا مَا أُنْزِلَ إِلَيْكُمْ مِنْ رَبِّكُمْ وَلَا تَتَّبِعُوا مِنْ دُونِهِ أَوْلِيَاءَ ۗ قَلِيلًا مَا تَذَكَّرُونَ*

_"Jo kuchh tumhare Parwardigar ki taraf se tum par utara gaya hai uski pairavi karo aur apne Rab ko chhod kar doosre Sarparaston ki pairavi na karo. Tum log bahut hi kam Nasihat maante ho."_
(Surah A'raf: 3)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Hazrat Ali (as) ne is Ayat ke zel mein farmaya:
_"Logon! Khudayi taleemat ki itteba mein azeem Kamyabi muzmir hai aur iska chhodna bahot badi khata hai."_
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
👉🏻
Guzishta Ayat mein jo Kitab wa Ahkam e Ilahi ke nazil hone ka zikr tha, is Ayat mein takeed ki gayi hai unki par hi amal karo. *أولياء* jama plural hai *ولی* ka. Wali means Master, Trustee. Ayat 5:55 mein 'Wali' istemal hua hai, yani hamara Wali Allah, Rasool aur jisne haalate Ruku mein Zakat di, yani Hazrat Ali (as). Is Ayat mein Allah wazeh taur par takeed kar raha hai ke in Waliyon ke alawa kisi ki itteba na karo. Yahan 'Auliya' istemal hua hai. Yani hamare in Sarparaston ke alawa kisi aur ko follow na karen.
🕌
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Wilayat e Ali (as) ka itteba (follow) karna aur unki Wilayat ko tasleem karna tumhare umoor (affairs) ko pareshan na hone dega, Adl o Insaaf ko tumse qayem rakhega aur aakhir tumko Jannat mein pahuncha dega."_
(Irshadat e Masumeen (as), p81)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Tuba unke liye hai jo mere Ahlebait (as) ke Qaim (atfs) ko payenge, unke qayaam se pehle unki pairavi karenge, unki ghaibat mein unpar aur jo unse pehle Aimma (as) guzar chuke hain unpar Imaan rakhenge aur Allah ke liye unke dushmano'n se bezaar rahenge. Aur wo log mere rafeeq aur meri Ummat ke sabse ba-izzat afraad honge."_
(Falsafa e Gaibat e Mahdi (atfs) , p153)
🤲🏻
*اَیْنَ مَعِزُّ الْاَوْلِیَاۤءِ وَ مُذِلُّ الْاَعْدَاءِ... اَیْنَ وَجْهُ اﷲِ الَّذِیْ اِلَیْهِ یَتَوَجَّهُ الْاَوْلِیَاۤءُ*
_"Kahan hai Doston ko izzat denewala aur Dushmanon ko zaleel karnewala."_
_"Kahan hai Wajhullah jiski taraf uske Dost mutawajjah hote hain."_
(Dua e Nudba)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *24th Jamadi us Sani 1440*
     *2nd March 2019, Saturday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
         ♦ _*AZAAB E ILAHI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1170)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَكَمْ مِنْ قَرْيَةٍ أَهْلَكْنَاهَا فَجَاءَهَا بَأْسُنَا بَيَاتًا أَوْ هُمْ قَائِلُونَ * فَمَا كَانَ دَعْوَاهُمْ إِذْ جَاءَهُمْ بَأْسُنَا إِلَّا أَنْ قَالُوا إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَالِمِينَ*

_"Kitni hi aisi Abaadiyan hain jinhe Hamne halak kiya hai. Un par Hamara Azaab Raat ke waqt achanak toot pada ya Din ke waqt, us waqt un par Hamara Azaab toota jab woh mahve araam the. Aur jab Hamara Azaab un par aa gaya to unki zaban par iske siwa aur koi sada na thi ke waqai ham hi Zalim the."_
(Surah A'raf: 4 - 5)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Isi tarah ki milti julti Ayaat Qur'an mein kai jagah payi jaati hain. Allah Ta'ala logon ko pichhli qaum ka tazkara karke Dunyavi Azaab ki taraf ishara kar raha hai. Ham aaj bhi dekhte hain ke achanak kabhi Selaab, to kabhi Sunami, Zalzala Duniya ke mukhtalif jagahon par aate rahte hain, jis mein hazaron lakhon log halaak hote hain, jaani wa maali. Ye sab Azaab e Ilahi hain. Yahan tak ke Jangen, Fasaad sab ek tarah ke Azaab hain. Ye Insaani Fitrat hai ke jab use Shock lagta tab sanbhalta hai. Allah is Zalimon o Kafiron ko Azaab de kar halaak karta jabke ye doosron ke liye Fitri sabaq hota hai.
Isliye Allah ne un waqeat ka ghadi ghadi zikr kiya hai jo ham dekhte rahte hain. Kyonki Insaan Gunah tab karta hai jab woh Khuda ko bhool jata hai. Pas Allah is soye hue Insaan ko jhatke deta hai. Agar ye jhatke us par effective hue to woh Tauba karte hue Allah ki taraf palatta hai warna halaak ho jata hai. Allah Azaab fardan fardan aur ba Jamat dono tarah se aata hai.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Ya Ali (as)! 3 aadatein lnsaan ki halakat ka baes hain: Hasad (jealousy), Hirs (laalach) aur Takabbur."_
(Hadiyat ush Shia, p172)
🌪🌊
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Yaqeenan, Balaa (musibat) Zaalim ke liye Azaab hai aur Momin ke liye Imtehaan hai."_
(Jaame'al Akhbaar p.113, Anecdotes of Reflection)
🤲🏻
*اِلٰهِىْ,اَجِرْنِىْ مِنْ اَلِيْمِ غَضَبِكَ وَ عَظِيْمِ سَخَطِكَ.*

_"Mere Ma'bood! Mujhe Dardnak Ghazab aur Sakht Naraazi se bacha."_
(Munajatul Khayefin, No. 3)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

     *25th Jamadi us Sani 1440*
       *3rd March 2019, Sunday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*QAYAMAT KE DIN BAZ PURS*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1171)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَلَنَسْأَلَنَّ الَّذِينَ أُرْسِلَ إِلَيْهِمْ وَلَنَسْأَلَنَّ الْمُرْسَلِينَ * فَلَنَقُصَّنَّ عَلَيْهِمْ بِعِلْمٍ ۖ وَمَا كُنَّا غَائِبِينَ*

_"Jin logon ki taraf Anbiya ko bheja gaya hai Ham un logon se zaroor baz purs (sawal) karenge aur Ham Paighambaron se bhi zaroor poochenge (ke unhone apna farz kahan tak ada kiya aur unhen kya jawab mila?)"_
(Surah A'raf: 6 - 7)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
_"Anbiya ko Arsa e Mahshar mein hazir kiya jayega aur unse unki Tableegh e Risaalat ke mutalliq sawal kiya jayega ke kya unhone apni Ummaton tak Khuda ka Paigham pahunchaya tha? Anbiya (as) jawab mein arz karenge ke hamne Tera Paigham pahunchaya tha. Iske baad Allah Ta'ala Ummaton se poochhega ke kya Anbiya ne tumhe Khuda ka Paigham pahunchaya tha? Ummaten us waqt Jhoot ka sahara le kar kahengi: "Hanare paas koi Basheer o Nazeer nahi aaya tha? (5:19)" Us waqt tamam Anbiya Hazrat Rasoole Akram (saww) ko apna gawah muqarrar karenge. Aap Anbiya ki tasdeeq karenge aur unka inkaar Ummaton ki Takzeeb (denial) karenge aur Aap us waqt har Ummat se ye farmayenge "Yaqeenan tumhare paas Basheer o Nazeer aaya tha. Allah har cheez par Qudrat rakhne wala hai (5:19)" yani Khuda ke paas ye ikhtiyar maujood hai ke tumhari zabano par Mohr laga de aur tumhare aaza o jawareh se Anbiya ki tashreef awri aur unki Tableegh ki gawahi dilaye."_
(Ehtejaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)
👉🏻
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Qayamat ke Din Momin ke Aaza (haath / paav) uske khilaaf gawahi nahi denge. Aaza sirf uske khilaaf gawahi denge jo Azaab ka haqdar hoga; jabke Momin ka Nama e Aamal uske dayen haath mein diya jayega aur wo khushi se use padhega aur uspar zarra barabar zulm nahi kiya jayega."_
(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v7, p196)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Agar Gunahgaron ki Shahadat (gawahi) qubool na ki jaye to phir Anbiya (as) aur Ausiya (as) ke alawa koi bhi shahadat (gawaahi) nahi de sakta hai. Jab tak kisi ko apni Aankhon se Gunah mein murtakib hote hue na dekh lo aur aur 2 shaahidon (gawahon) ne uske bare mein gawahi na di ho to jaan lo ke woh shakhs Aadil hai."_
(Almustashaar Abdul Haleem Jundi (Misri), p161)
🤲🏻
*اِلٰهِىْ وَكَمْ مِنْ ظَنٍّ حَسَنٍ حَقَّقْتَ وَمِنْ كَسْرِ اِمْلَاقٍ جَبَرْتَ وَمِنْ مَسْكَنَةٍ فَادِحَةٍ حَوَّلْتَ وَمِنْ صَرْعَةٍ مُهْلِكَةٍ نَعَشْتَ وَمِنْ مَشَقَّةٍ اَرَحْتَ لَاتُسْئَلُ عَمَّا تَفْعَلُ وَهُمْ يُسْئَلُوْنَ..*

_"Khudaya! Kitne hi Husn e Zan the jinhe Tu ne sach kar diya. Aur kitne hi Ghurbat ke tod the jinhe Tu ne jod diya hai. Khatarnak Ghurbat ko badal diya hai aur halakat khez khatron se bacha liya hai aur mushaqqaton se mutmain bana diya hai. *Tere Amal ke bare mein koi baz purs nahi ho sakti hai. Aur baqi sab se sawal kiya jayega*...."_
(A part of Joshan e Sagheer)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

     *26th Jamadi us Sani 1440*
      *4th March 2019, Monday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

        ♦ _*⚖ MIZAAN ⚖*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1172)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَالْوَزْنُ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْحَقُّ ۚ فَمَنْ ثَقُلَتْ مَوَازِينُهُ فَأُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الْمُفْلِحُونَ * وَمَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَازِينُهُ فَأُولَٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ خَسِرُوا أَنْفُسَهُمْ بِمَا كَانُوا بِآيَاتِنَا يَظْلِمُونَ*

_"Phir Ham poore Ilm ke saath saari sarguzisht (Account) unke aage pesh kar denge kyonki Ham Ghayeb to nahi thi."_
_"Aur Wazn us Roz Ain e Haq hoga. Jinka Palda bhari hoga woh Falah pane wale honge. Aur jinka Palde halke honge wohi apne aap ko khasare mein mubtila karne wale honge kyonki woh hamari Ayaat (Hadiyan o Rahbar) ke saath Zaalemana bartao karte rahe the."_
(Surah A'raf: 8 - 9)

📚📖 📖⚖♎
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as) se Mizaan ke bare mein sawal kiya to farmaya:
_"Aamaal Jism nahi hain ke unko tola jaye. Aamaal to Amal karne walon ki ek sifat hai aur waise bhi kisi cheez ke wazan ki zaroorat use hoti hai jise Asya ki tadad maloom na ho aur unke wazni aur halka hone se na-waqif ho jabke Allah se koi cheez Makhfi (hidden) nahi hai."_
_"Mizaan se Adl e Ilahi murad hai."_
(Ehtejaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 ⚖
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jab tu is baat ka khwahishmand ho ke apne aap ko pahchane ke kya tu sachcha hai ya jhoota hai to phir apni guftugu ke mafhoom aur apne dawe ko Dil ki gahraiyyon se naap aur ye tasawwur kar ke tu Khuda ke saamne khada hua hai. Phir Maidan par iska wazn karke dekh, agar tere alfaaz aur tere mafhoom mein yaksaniyat (similarity) payi jati ho to phir tu sachcha hai."_
(Misbahush Shariyah, Noorus Saqlain)
♎
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Panch Baaten Mizaan mein bahut wazni hain (Jin mein se 4 Kalemat hain aur wo ye hain):_
*سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ وَلاَ إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَ اللَّهُ أَكْبَر.*
_Aur Panchve Neki jo Mizaan mein bahut wazni hai, wo ye ke kisi Musalman ka Nek beta mar jaye aur woh uski Maut par Sabr kare aur uski Jaza Khuda se talab kare."_
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
⚖
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Neki jis qadr Mizaan mein saqeel (bhari) hogi usi qadr Ahle Duniya ke liye bhi bhari hogi aur Burayi Mizaan mein jis qadr halki hogi logon ki nazar mein bhi woh utni hi khafeef (halki) hogi."_
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*يَا مَنْ فِي الْمِيْزَانِ قَضَآؤُهُ*
_"Ay Woh! Mizaan e Adalat par Jiska Faisla hai."_
(A part of Joshan e Kabir No 42)
*اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا مِيْزَانَ يَوْمِ الْحِسَابِ*
_"Salam ho Aap (saww) par aye Roze Qayamat ke Mizaan"_
(A part of Ziyarat e Makhsoosa Roze Wiladat Rasoole Khuda (saww), Aapko is Dua mein Mizaan se pukara hai.)

👉🏻 *Guzishta Tafseer:*
http://shiachannel.net78.net/tafseer-hinglish.html
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *27th Jamadi us Sani 1440*
      *5th March 2019, Tuesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*INSAANON KA PAALANHAR*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1173)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَقَدْ مَكَّنَّاكُمْ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَجَعَلْنَا لَكُمْ فِيهَا مَعَايِشَ ۗ قَلِيلًا مَا تَشْكُرُونَ*

_"Hamne tumhe Zameen mein Ikhtiyarat ke saath basaya aur Hamne tumhare liye Zameen par samaane Ma'aesh (Rizq) faraham kiya magar tum log intehai kam hi shukr ada karte ho."_
(Surah A'raf: 10)

📚📖 👨‍👨‍👦‍👦
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Ye ek Ayat poore ek mazmoon ka khulasa hai. Mazmoon hai 'Insaan' jiski tashreeh ainda ayaat mein aayegi. Yahan to faqat itna ke is Hazrat e Insaan ko Allah ne wo saari Ne'maten se nawaza jo uske zinda rahne ke liye zaroori hain. *مَكَّنَّا* mein wasee matalib poshida hain. Jab kisi ko kahin thahraya jata hai uske liye saare wasail ka bhi intezam kiya jaata hai. Isi mein hai Khilqat o Maut ka Raaz. Allah ne saari cheezon ke saath saath use mahdood ikhtiyar bhi de diya. Lekin ye Insaan Allah ki in Ne'mato'n ka ehsaas nahi kar pata isliye na shukra ho jata hai.

Riwayat:
Jab Saalim Imam Sadiq (as) ki khidmat mein gaya aur baithha to suna ke bahut si chidiya (sparrows) jamaa ho kar chi chi, chi chi kar rahi hain.
Imam (as) ne farmaya:
_"Tu samajhta hai ke ye kya kehti hai?"_ Usne kaha, "Nahi." 
Imam (as) ne farmaya:
_"Ye keh rahi hain ke Khuda Wanda! Hum bhi Teri makhluqaat mein se hain aur Teri Rozi ke baghair zinda nahi reh sakte, to hamare daane aur paani ki khabar le."_
(Tehzeeb ul Islam, p366)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Ali (as):
_"Ne'mat ke chale jaane se pahle usse husn e sulook rakho kyunki Ne'maat chali jaati hain aur Saheb e Ne'mat ke liye baais e gawaahi banti hain."_
(Hadiyat ush Shia, p597)

Imam Reza (as):
_"Ne'mat milne par *الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ* (Al Hamdo Lillahe Rabbil Aalamin) kehna ye Uska Shukr adaa karna hai, aur Allah ki Hamd bajaa lana ye is Ne'mat se afzal hai."_
(Mishkaat ul Anwaar (Urdu), p63)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Aye Ma'bood! Mujhe Rozi mein izafa, watan mein Aman aur mere Maal aur meri Aulaad ke bare mein aa'nkho'n ki thhandak ataa farma aur Apni Ne'mato'n mein mujhe khusoosi hissa, badan mein sehat o tandurusti, badan mein tawanayi aur Deen mein salamati inayat farma aur mujhe aise amal ki taufeeq de de ke main Teri bandagi aur Tere Rasool H. Muhammad (saww) ki farmabardari mein rahun. Jab tak Tu mujhe zinda rakhe, mujhe Apne un bando'n mein qaraar de jinka hissa Tere yahan un bhalaiyon mein bahut zyada hai jo Tu ne naazil ki aur naazil karta hai..."_
(Dua e Abu Hamza Shimali)
👉🏻 *Guzishta Tafseer:*
http://shiachannel.net78.net/tafseer-hinglish.html
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3
**********************************
     *28th Jamadi us Sani 1440*
   *6th March 2019, Wednesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
              ♦ _*QIYAAS*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1172)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَاكُمْ ثُمَّ صَوَّرْنَاكُمْ ثُمَّ قُلْنَا لِلْمَلَائِكَةِ اسْجُدُوا لِآدَمَ فَسَجَدُوا إِلَّا إِبْلِيسَ لَمْ يَكُنْ مِنَ السَّاجِدِينَ*

_"Yaqeenan, Hamne tumhari takhleeq (create) ki, phir tumhari Surat banayi, phir Hamne Farishto'n se kaha ke tum Adam ko Sajdah karo. Iblees ke alawa baqi Farishto'n ne Sajdah kiya woh Sajdah karne walon mein shamil na hua."_
(Surah A'raf: 11)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Is Ayat se Hazrat Adam (as) ki Khilqat ke Zikr ki shuruat hoti hai. Aaj ham Qiyaas ka zikr karenge.
👤
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Ye *خَلَقْنَاكُمْ* ke marhale mein Nutfa, Alaqa, Muzgha, Haddiyan aur Gosht ke marahil shamil hain aur *صَوَّرْنَاكُمْ* mein Aankh, Nak, Kaan, Munh, Haath aur Paon shamil hain. Phir baaz afraad ko Allah ne khubsoorat banaya, baaz afraad ko badsoorat banaya. Baaz ko mota, baaz ko dubla patla, baaz ko lamba aur baaz ko chhota banaya."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
👹
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Khuda ke Ahkam mein Qiyaas karna durust nahi hai aur Khuda ke Ahkam mein jo bhi Qiyaas (Analogy) karega woh khud bhi halaak hoga aur doosron ko bhi halaak karega."_
_"Khuda ki pahli Nafarmani Iblees ne ki thi aur us ne bhi Nafarmani ke waqt Qiyaas kiya tha aur us ne Qiyaas karte hue kaha tha,"Mein isse behtar hun, Tu ne mujhe Aag se aur ise Mitti se paida kiya."_
_"Is Layeen ki is fikr ki wajah se Khuda ne use apne jaware Rahmat se nikal diya aur us par La'anat ki aur uska naam" Rajeem" rakha. Khuda ne Apni Izzat ki Qasam khaa kar kaha ke jo bhi Deen mein Qiyas karega use Iblees ke saath Dozakh ke nichle tabqe mein jagah dega."_
(Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)
🔰
Imam Sadiq (as) ne Abu Hanifa se farmaya:
_"Abu Hanifa! Suna hai ke tu Qiyaas karta hai?"_
Usne kaha: _"Ji haan! Mein Qiyaas karta hun."_
Aap (as) ne farmaya:
_"Qiyaas mat kiya karo kyonki sab se pahle Iblees ne Qiyas kiya tha."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
📚
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Qiyaas karne (guesswork / apne anumaan ke mutaabiq Ahadees ke natije nikalne) wale log Ilm ko Qiyaas mein talaash karte hain, lekin ye Qiyasaat (conjectures / atkal) unhe Haq se door hi hataate jate hain. Deen Qiyasaat (own guesswok) se haasil nahi hota."_
(Al Kaafi, v1, p117)
👹
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Malaika samajhte the ke Shaitan ka talluq unki no' نوع se hai jabke Allah ko maloom tha ke ye Sinfe Malaika ka fard nahi hai. Sajdah e Adam ke waqt uski haqiqat khul kar saamne aa gayi jab usne Sajdeh se inkaar karte hue kaha tha ke Tu ne mujhe Aag se aur Adam ko Mitti se paida kiya hai."_
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Ali (as):
_"Deen mein Qiyaas (own guess) na karo kyunki Deen ke masaael Qiyaas se hal nahi kiye jaa sakte. Kuchh Qaumen aisi paida hongi jo Qiyaas se kaam lenge; woh Deen ke dushman honge aur sabse pehle jisne Qiyaas kiya wo Iblees tha."_
(Hadiyat ush Shia, p594)
🤲🏻
*وَلَا تَجْعَلْ لِلشَّيْطَانِ فِيْهِ عَلَيَّ سَبِيْلًا،...*
_Bare Ilaha!.. Shaitan ko mera upar koi raasta na dena.."_
(Ramazan Daily Dua, 21st Day)

👉🏻 *Guzishta Tafseer:*
http://shiachannel.net78.net/tafseer-hinglish.html
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3
**********************************
     *29th Jamadi us Sani 1440*
     *7th March 2019, Thursday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
 ♦ _*TAKHLEEQ E ADAM (as)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1173)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَاكُمْ ثُمَّ صَوَّرْنَاكُمْ ثُمَّ قُلْنَا لِلْمَلَائِكَةِ اسْجُدُوا لِآدَمَ فَسَجَدُوا إِلَّا إِبْلِيسَ لَمْ يَكُنْ مِنَ السَّاجِدِينَ*
*قَالَ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَلَّا تَسْجُدَ إِذْ أَمَرْتُكَ ۖ قَالَ أَنَا خَيْرٌ مِنْهُ خَلَقْتَنِي مِنْ نَارٍ وَخَلَقْتَهُ مِنْ طِينٍ*

_"Yaqeenan, Hamne tumhari takhleeq (create) ki, phir tumhari Surat banayi, phir Hamne Farishto'n se kaha ke tum Adam ko Sajdah karo. Iblees ke alawa baqi Farishto'n ne Sajdah kiya woh Sajdah karne walon mein shamil na hua."_
_"Khuda ne kaha tujhe Sajdah karne se kis cheez ne roka jabke Meine tujhe Hukm diya tha. Usne mein isse behtar hun. Tu ne mujhe Aag se paida kiya hai aur ise Tu ne Mitti se paida kiya hai."_
(Surah A'raf: 11 - 12)

📚📖 🕌
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jab Allah Ta'ala ne Adam (as) ko paida karne ka iraada kiya to Juma ke Din ki pahli ghante mein Jibrael (as) ko rawana kiya. Woh Satwen Aasman se Aasmaan o Duniya tak pahunche aur usne har Aasmaan se kuchh na kuchh Khaak uthayi. Phir Satwen Zameen se le kar pahli Zameen tak kuchh na kuchh Khaak uthayi. Dahni haath mein Aasmaanon ki Khaak aur Bayen haath mein Zameen ki Khaak thi. Phir Allah ne Apne Kalme ko Hukm diya jisne dono haath ki Khaak ke li. Us Mitti ke do alag alag dher banaye. Jo Makhlooq Dayen Haath ki Mitti se paida hui thi Allah Ta'ala ne usse kaha: 'Tujh se Anbiya, Ausiya, Siddiqeen, Mo'meneen aur Nek bakht afraad paida karunga aur woh log paida honge jinki Izzat o Ehteram Mujhe matloob hogi.' Chunanche Allah ne jo chaha tha wohi kiya. Phir Allah ne Bayen Haath wali Mitti se farmaya: 'Mein tujh se Jabbar, Mushrik, Kafir, Taghoot paida karunga aur woh log tujh se paida honge jinki Mujhe tauheen matloob hogi. Chunanche Allah ne waisa hi kiya. Phir dono Khaakon ko aapas mein mila diya gaya. Yehi wajah hai ke Momin se Kafir paida hota hai aur Kafir se Momin paida hota hai."_
_"Adam ko isliye Adam kaha gaya hai ke inki takhleeq *اديم الارض* (Adeemul Arz - Zameen ka Bairooni hissa) se hui."_
(Usoole Kaafi, Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)
🌍
Rasoole Khuda (saww) se poochha gaya ke kis jagah ki Mitti thi? Aap (saww) ne farmaya:
_"Unke jism mein tamam aqsam ki Mitti shamil thi. Agar ek hi Mitti se hoti to log ek doosre ko pahchan nahi sakte kyonki sab ki ek hi shakl o surat hoti._
_Mitti mukhtalif rangon ki hoti hai. Kuchh jagah ki thandi, kahin ki Namkin to kahin ki narm, kahin ki sakht. Isliye Mitte se paida hone wala Insaan narm, sakht, safed, peele, surkh, siyah hote hain."_
(Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Jo koi Jumerat aur Shab e Juma ko Masjid mein safaai kare aur Masjid mein se Aankh mein padne wale tinke ke barabar dhool aur Mitti bahar nikale to Khuda uske gunah maaf farmayega."_
(Amaali - Shaikh Sadooq, p465)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Aye Ali (as)! Main aur Aap dono ek Teenat (mitti) se khalq kiye gaye hain. Aur jo Mitti us Mitti se bach gayi usse hamare Shiyo'n ko khalq kiya gaya hai aur jab Qayamat ka Din hoga to logo'n ko unki Maa ke Naam se pukara jayega siwae Aap ke Shiyo'n ke. Pus unko unke baap ke Naam se pukara jayega, kyunki unki wiladat Paak hai."_
(Amaali - Shaikh Toosi, v1, p208)
🕌
Imam Reza (as):
_"Tamam qism ki mitti Haraam hai jaise Murdar, Khoon aur wo zibah-shuda Halaal janwar jispar Allah ka naam na liya gaya ho haraam hain, siwae Hazrat Imam Husain (as) ki Qabr ki Mitti ke. Usko khana jayez hai kyunki usme har bimari ke liye shifa maujood hai."_
(Amaali – Shaikh Toosi, v2, p424)
👉🏻 *Guzishta Tafseer:*
http://shiachannel.net78.net/tafseer-hinglish.html
🤲🏻
*اَلسَّلَامُ عَلٰى مَنْ جَعَلَ اللهُ الشِّفَاءَ فِيْ تُرْبَتِهٖ،*
_"Salam ho us par jiski Qabr ki Mitti Khaak e Shifa hai."_
(Ziyarat e Nahiya)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi

https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3
**********************************
     *30th Jamadi us Sani 1440*
       *8th March 2019, Friday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
                 ♦ _*IBLEES*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1174)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قَالَ فَاهْبِطْ مِنْهَا فَمَا يَكُونُ لَكَ أَنْ تَتَكَبَّرَ فِيهَا فَاخْرُجْ إِنَّكَ مِنَ الصَّاغِرِينَ * قَالَ أَنْظِرْنِي إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ * قَالَ إِنَّكَ مِنَ الْمُنْظَرِينَ*

_"Khuda ne kaha ke Tu yahan se neeche utar ja. Tujhe yahan Takabbur karne ka koi haq nahi hai, nikal ja tu zaleel afraad mein se hai. Usne kaha ke mujhe us Din tak ki mohlat de jab ye sab dubara uthaye jayenge. Allah ne kaha: Beshak tujhe mohlat di ja rahi hai."_
(Surah A'raf: 13 - 15)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as): (Khulasa)
_"Kaynat mein sab se pahle Iblees ne Qiyaas kiya tha aur iske natije mein Takabbur kiya tha aur Takabbur ke zariye se Allah ki pahli Nafarmani amal mein layi gayi."_
"Iblees ne kaha: Khudaya! Mujhe Adam ke Sajdeh se ma'zoor rakh, mein Tujh se wada karta hun ke iske badle mein Teri itni Ibaadat karunga ke kisi ne itni zyada  Ibaadat na ki hogi."
"Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya:
_"Mujhe teri Ibaadat ki koi zaroorat nahi hai. Mein wo Ibaadat chahta hun jo Meri Marzi ke mutabiq ho, wo Ibaadat nahi chahta jo teri marzi ke mutabiq ho."_ Algharz Iblees ne Sajdah e Adam se inkaar kar diya."
Allah ne farmaya, "Tu yahan se nikal ja tu randeh Dargah hai aur Qayamat ke Din tak tujh par Meri La'anat barasti rahegi."
Iblees ne mana ke Allah Adil hai, kisi ki haq talfi nahi karta, usne apne Aamaal ka badla chaha. Allah ne kaha ke uske Aamaal ka badla isi Duniya mein milega. Usne Roze Qayamat tak ki baqa chahi, Aulade Adam par tasallut chaha, unke jism mein gardish karni chahi, jab Adam ki Nasl mein ek farzand paida ho to meri nasl mein do, mein unhe dekho lekin woh mujhe nahi dekh paye, Allah ne uski ye saari maangen qubool ki. Iblees ne kaha: _"Teri Izzat ki Qasam! Mein sab logon ko bahka kar rahunga, siwai Tere un bandon ke jinhe Tu ne khaalis kar liya hai."_ (Saad:82-83). Phir usne kaha: _"Phir mein unke aage, unke peechhe aur unke dayen bayen se unhe aisa gherunga ke Tu unki aksariyat ko shukr guzar nahi payega."_(7:71)"
"Jab Iblees ko Khuda ki taraf se itni quwwat mil gayi to Adam (as) ne Bargahe Khudawandi mein arz kiya: "Parwardigar! Tu ne Iblees ko meri Nasl par musallat kar diya aur Tu ne use unke andar Khoon ki tarah se gardish karne ki ijazat de di, Tu ne mujhe aur meri Aulad ko kiya diya?"
"Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya: _"Tujhe aur teri Aulad ko ye ata kiya ke woh ek burai karenge to woh ek likhi jayegi aur agar woh ek Neki karenge to woh kai das guna shumar ki jayegi. Teri Aulad ke liye Tauba ka Darwaze khula rahega aur mein use Bakhsh dunga."_
Iblees ne kaunsi aisi Neki ki jo usko itna bada sila mila:
"Iblees ne Aasmaan par do Rakat Namaz padhi thi jis mein use 4000 Saal lage the."
(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🤲🏻
*وَقُلْ رَبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ هَمَزَاتِ الشَّيَاطِينِ*
_"Aur Dua karo, "Parwardigar! mein Shaitano ke Waswason se Teri Panah maangta hun."_
(Mu'minun: 97)

👉🏻 *Guzishta Tafseer:*
http://shiachannel.net78.net/tafseer-hinglish.html
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

*SHIA CHANNEL CELEBRATES WILADAT OF IMAM BAQIR (as)*
https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3
🎊🎊🎊🎊🎊🎊🎊🎊🎊🎊
🌹 *WILADAT MUBARAK*🌹
_*Read on Lifehistory of Imam Baqir (as), Click:*_
https://www.al-islam.org/story-of-the-holy-kaaba-and-its-people-shabbar/fifth-imam-muhammad-ibn-ali-al-baqir
💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐
**********************************
       *1st Mahe Rajab 1440*
   *9th March 2019, Saturday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
      ♦ _*SHAITAN KA PLAN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1175)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قَالَ فَبِمَا أَغْوَيْتَنِي لَأَقْعُدَنَّ لَهُمْ صِرَاطَكَ الْمُسْتَقِيمَ * ثُمَّ لَآتِيَنَّهُمْ مِنْ بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ وَعَنْ أَيْمَانِهِمْ وَعَنْ شَمَائِلِهِمْ ۖ وَلَا تَجِدُ أَكْثَرَهُمْ شَاكِرِينَ * قَالَ اخْرُجْ مِنْهَا مَذْءُومًا مَدْحُورًا ۖ لَمَنْ تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنْكُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ*

_"Usne kaha ke jis tarah se Tu ne mujhe gumrah kiya hai mein bhi *Teri Seedhi Raah* par unki ghaat mein baith jaonga. Phir mein unke aage, unke peechhe aur unke dayen bayen unko gherunga aur to unki aksariyat ko shukr guzar nahi payega. Allah ne kaha ke Tu yahan se Zaleel aur Thukraya hua ban kar nikal jaa. Yaqeen rakh in mein se jo bhi teri pairavi karenge, tujh sameet un sab se Dozakh ko bhar dunga."_
(Surah A'raf: 16 - 18)

📚📖 👹
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Is Ayat (2:16) mein *'Seerat e Mustaqeem'* se murad Hazrat Ali (as) hain."_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Zurarah! Shaitan ka nishana tum aur tumhare saathi ho. Doosron se to woh farigh ho chuka hai."_
(Tafseer e Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
(Maqsad ye hai ke Iblees Hazrat Ali (as) ki Muhabbat o Muwaddat aur unki pairavi se rokta hai.)
👹
*Imam Mohammad Baqir (as) ne farmaya:*
_"Shaitan ne kaha tha ke mein unke aage se gherunga, iska mafhoom ye hai ke mein Amre Akherat ko unki nazar mein haqeer karke pesh karunga aur 'unke peechhe se' ka mafhoom ye hai ke mein unhe Duniya jama karne ki targheeb dunga aur unhe huqooq ki adam maujoodgi ka hukm dunga aur unse kahunga ke zyada se zyada daulat jama karo taake tumhari Naslen bhi kisi ki mohtaj na hon. 'Dayen janib se' ka mafhoom ye hai ke mein gumrahi aur shubhaat ko unki nazron mein muzayyan (attractive) karke pesh karunga aur is tarah unka Deen tabah karunga aur 'bayen taraf se' ka mafhoom ye hai ke mein unhe lazzat ke husool mein munhamik (indulge) karunga aur unke Dilon par Khwahishat ko ghalib karunga."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
👹
Hazrat Ali (as) ne Ziyad ko Khat likha:
_"Mujhe maloom hai ke Moaviya ne tumhari taraf khat likh kar tumhari Aql ko phuslana aur tumhari dhar ko kund karna chaha. Tum usse hoshyar raho kyonki woh Shaitan hai jo Momin ke aage peechhe aur dayen bayen janib se aata hai taake use ghafil paa kar us par toot pade aur uski Aql par chhapa mare."_
(Nahjul Balagha, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِهِ وَ لَا تَجْعَلْ لِّلشَّيْطَانِ عَلٰى عَقْلِيْ سَبِيْلًا*
_"Aur Shaitan ko meri Aql par koi raasta na dena."_
(Juma ke Din ki Dua, Mafatih)
*وَلَا تَجْعَلْ لِلشَّيْطَانِ فِيْهِ عَلَيَّ سَبِيْلًا*
_"Aur Shaitan ko mere upar koi raasta na dena."_
(Ramazan Daily Dua No. 21)

👉🏻 *Guzishta Tafseer:*
http://shiachannel.net78.net/tafseer-hinglish.html
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3
**********************************
         *2nd Mahe Rajab 1440*
    *10th March 2019, Sunday*
_(Wiladat Imam Ali Naqi (as) ba rivayat digar)_
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
        ♦ _*ISMAT-E-ANBIYA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1176)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَيَا آدَمُ اسْكُنْ أَنْتَ وَزَوْجُكَ الْجَنَّةَ فَكُلَا مِنْ حَيْثُ شِئْتُمَا وَلَا تَقْرَبَا هَٰذِهِ الشَّجَرَةَ فَتَكُونَا مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ*

_"(Irshad e Bari hua) Aur aye Adam tu aur teri Biwi Jannat mein raho aur jis cheez ko tumhara ji chahe khao magar is darakht ke paas na jaana warna Zalimon mein se ho jaoge."_
(Surah A'raf: 19)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Same Ayat Surah Baqarah mein guzar chuki hai aur Hazrat Adam (as) tazkara ho chuka hai.
🌳
Imam Reza (as) ne Mamon Rashid ke Ismat e Anbiye ke sawal ka jawab dete hue farmaya:
_"Allah Ta'ala ne Qur'an mein Ayat (2:35) mein ye zikr kiya._
_"Allah Ta'ala ne unse ye nahi kaha tha ke khabardar us darakht ka phal na khaana aur ye bhi nahi kaha tha ke is darakht ki jins (type) ke jitne bhi paude hain wo sab ke sab tumhare liye mamnoo (prohibited) hain. Chunanche Adam o Hawwa is ishara kardah darakht ke qareeb nahi gaye the albatta unhone usi paude ki jins ke ek aur paude ka phal chakha aur iski wajah ye thi jab Shaitan unke paas gaya to usne unse kaha tha: "Khuda ne tumhe is darakht se to mana nahi kiya tha."(7:20) iske bajae Khuda ne tumhe ek aur darakht ke qareeb jaane se mana kiya tha aur isne tumhe isse agar mana kiya hai to iski wajah dar asl ye hai. (7:21) Hazrat Adam (as) ne isse qabl Khuda ki Qasam kabhi suni hi na thi, inhe Qasam se pahli bar sabqa pada tha aur unhone isse qabl kisi ko Khuda ki jhooti Qasam khate hue nahi dekha tha. Isi liye unhone uski Qasam par bharosa kiya aur ye tamam waqea Nubuwwat se pahle ka hai aur Hazrat ka ye eqdam Gunah e Kabeera nahi tha ke iski wajah se woh mustaheqqe Dozakh bante. Aap (as) ke iqdam ka talluq un Sagheera Gunahon se tha jinka sudoor nuzool e Wahy se pahle Anbiya se mumkin hota hai. Phir jab Allah ne unka intekhab kiya aur unhe Nabi banaya to Aap (as) Masoom qarar paye, Aap (as) se Nubuwwat ke baad koi Sagheera o Kabeera o Khata sarzad nahi hui jaisa ke Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya: "Aur Adam ne apne Parwardigar ki Nafarmani ki to bhatak gaye. Iske baad unke Parwardigar ne unko barguzida (chuna) kiya, unki Tauba qubool ki aur unki Hidayat farmayi" (Taha:121-122)"_
_"Allah Ta'ala ne Irshad farmaya: "Beshak Khuda ne Adam, Nooh aur Khandane Ibrahim aur Khandane Imran ko tamam Jahanon par tarjeeh de kar (apni Risalat ke liye) muntakhab kiya."_ (3:33)
(Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
Hazrat Adam (as) ke is amal ko rivayaat mein Tark e Aula naam diya gaya hai.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Ali (as):
_"Teen cheezen halaak kar dene wali hai - Takabbur (Pride) - Jisne Iblees ko apne martabe se gira diya, Laalach (Greed) - Jisne Adam ko Jannat se nikalwa diya, aur Hasad (Jealousy) - Jisne Adam ke bete ko apne bhai ke qatl par aamaada kiya."_
(Tajalliyat e Hikmat)
🤲🏻
*اَللّٰهُمَّ اَنْتَ‏ الَّذِىْ اِسْتَجَبْتَ لِاٰدَمَ وَحَوَاۤءَ۔۔۔,*
_"Aye Woh Jisne Adam o Hawwa ki Dua ko qubool kiya... "_ hamare laghzishon ko bhi darguzar farma."
(Dua baad e Namaz e Imam Husain (as))

👉🏻 *Guzishta Tafseer:*
http://shiachannel.net78.net/tafseer-hinglish.html
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3

         *2nd Mahe Rajab 1440*
    *10th March 2019, Sunday*
_(Wiladat Imam Ali Naqi (as) ba rivayat digar)_
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
        ♦ _*ISMAT-E-ANBIYA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1176)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَيَا آدَمُ اسْكُنْ أَنْتَ وَزَوْجُكَ الْجَنَّةَ فَكُلَا مِنْ حَيْثُ شِئْتُمَا وَلَا تَقْرَبَا هَٰذِهِ الشَّجَرَةَ فَتَكُونَا مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ*

_"(Irshad e Bari hua) Aur aye Adam tu aur teri Biwi Jannat mein raho aur jis cheez ko tumhara ji chahe khao magar is darakht ke paas na jaana warna Zalimon mein se ho jaoge."_
(Surah A'raf: 19)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Same Ayat Surah Baqarah mein guzar chuki hai aur Hazrat Adam (as) tazkara ho chuka hai.
🌳
Imam Reza (as) ne Mamon Rashid ke Ismat e Anbiye ke sawal ka jawab dete hue farmaya:
_"Allah Ta'ala ne Qur'an mein Ayat (2:35) mein ye zikr kiya._
_"Allah Ta'ala ne unse ye nahi kaha tha ke khabardar us darakht ka phal na khaana aur ye bhi nahi kaha tha ke is darakht ki jins (type) ke jitne bhi paude hain wo sab ke sab tumhare liye mamnoo (prohibited) hain. Chunanche Adam o Hawwa is ishara kardah darakht ke qareeb nahi gaye the albatta unhone usi paude ki jins ke ek aur paude ka phal chakha aur iski wajah ye thi jab Shaitan unke paas gaya to usne unse kaha tha: "Khuda ne tumhe is darakht se to mana nahi kiya tha."(7:20) iske bajae Khuda ne tumhe ek aur darakht ke qareeb jaane se mana kiya tha aur isne tumhe isse agar mana kiya hai to iski wajah dar asl ye hai. (7:21) Hazrat Adam (as) ne isse qabl Khuda ki Qasam kabhi suni hi na thi, inhe Qasam se pahli bar sabqa pada tha aur unhone isse qabl kisi ko Khuda ki jhooti Qasam khate hue nahi dekha tha. Isi liye unhone uski Qasam par bharosa kiya aur ye tamam waqea Nubuwwat se pahle ka hai aur Hazrat ka ye eqdam Gunah e Kabeera nahi tha ke iski wajah se woh mustaheqqe Dozakh bante. Aap (as) ke iqdam ka talluq un Sagheera Gunahon se tha jinka sudoor nuzool e Wahy se pahle Anbiya se mumkin hota hai. Phir jab Allah ne unka intekhab kiya aur unhe Nabi banaya to Aap (as) Masoom qarar paye, Aap (as) se Nubuwwat ke baad koi Sagheera o Kabeera o Khata sarzad nahi hui jaisa ke Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya: "Aur Adam ne apne Parwardigar ki Nafarmani ki to bhatak gaye. Iske baad unke Parwardigar ne unko barguzida (chuna) kiya, unki Tauba qubool ki aur unki Hidayat farmayi" (Taha:121-122)"_
_"Allah Ta'ala ne Irshad farmaya: "Beshak Khuda ne Adam, Nooh aur Khandane Ibrahim aur Khandane Imran ko tamam Jahanon par tarjeeh de kar (apni Risalat ke liye) muntakhab kiya."_ (3:33)
(Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
Hazrat Adam (as) ke is amal ko rivayaat mein Tark e Aula naam diya gaya hai.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Ali (as):
_"Teen cheezen halaak kar dene wali hai - Takabbur (Pride) - Jisne Iblees ko apne martabe se gira diya, Laalach (Greed) - Jisne Adam ko Jannat se nikalwa diya, aur Hasad (Jealousy) - Jisne Adam ke bete ko apne bhai ke qatl par aamaada kiya."_
(Tajalliyat e Hikmat)
🤲🏻
*اَللّٰهُمَّ اَنْتَ‏ الَّذِىْ اِسْتَجَبْتَ لِاٰدَمَ وَحَوَاۤءَ۔۔۔,*
_"Aye Woh Jisne Adam o Hawwa ki Dua ko qubool kiya... "_ hamare laghzishon ko bhi darguzar farma."
(Dua baad e Namaz e Imam Husain (as))

👉🏻 *Guzishta Tafseer:*
http://shiachannel.net78.net/tafseer-hinglish.html

       *3rd Mahe Rajab 1440*
   *11th March 2019, Monday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
     ♦ _*WASWASE SHAITAN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1177)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَوَسْوَسَ لَهُمَا الشَّيْطَانُ لِيُبْدِيَ لَهُمَا مَا وُورِيَ عَنْهُمَا مِنْ سَوْآتِهِمَا وَقَالَ مَا نَهَاكُمَا رَبُّكُمَا عَنْ هَٰذِهِ الشَّجَرَةِ إِلَّا أَنْ تَكُونَا مَلَكَيْنِ أَوْ تَكُونَا مِنَ الْخَالِدِينَ * وَقَاسَمَهُمَا إِنِّي لَكُمَا لَمِنَ النَّاصِحِينَ * فَدَلَّاهُمَا بِغُرُورٍ ۚ فَلَمَّا ذَاقَا الشَّجَرَةَ بَدَتْ لَهُمَا سَوْآتُهُمَا وَطَفِقَا يَخْصِفَانِ عَلَيْهِمَا مِنْ وَرَقِ الْجَنَّةِ ۖ وَنَادَاهُمَا رَبُّهُمَا أَلَمْ أَنْهَكُمَا عَنْ تِلْكُمَا الشَّجَرَةِ وَأَقُلْ لَكُمَا إِنَّ الشَّيْطَانَ لَكُمَا عَدُوٌّ مُبِينٌ*

_"Phir Shaitan ne unke Dilon mein Waswasa dala taake unki Sharamgahen jo unse chhupayi gayi thi unke saamne khol de. Aur usne unse kaha ke tumhare Rab ne jo tumhe is darakht se roka hai uski wajah bas yehi hai ke kahin tum Farishte na ban jao ya tumhe hameshgi ki Zindagi hasil na ho jaye."_
_"Aur usne un dono se Qasam khaa kar kaha ke mein tumhare Khair khwahon mein se hun. Is tarah dono ko dhoka de kar rafta rafta apne maqsad par le aaya aur jab unhone darakht ka maza chakha to unke satr (Pardah) ek doosre ke saamne khul gaye aur woh apne jism ko Jannat ke patton se dhanpne lage tab unke Rab ne unhe sada de kar kaha ke Meine tum dono ko is darakht se nahi roka tha aur tum se ye na kaha tha ke Shaitan tum dono ka khullum khulla Dushman hai?_
(Surah A'raf: 20 - 22)

📚📖 🕌
👉 _*Tafseer:*_ (Cont'd..)
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jannat mein jaane ke baad Adam o Hawwa ne Muhammad (saww) aur unki Zurriyyat ke Aimma ki Manazil ka mushaheda kiya to dekha ke woh Jannat ke Aala tareen manazil par faez hain."_
_"Khuda ne farmaya: Sar buland karo aur saqe Arsh par nigah daudao. Adam o Hawwa ne aisa hi kiya aur Saqae Arsh par nigah ki to wahan *Panjetan* Paak aur Aimma ke Naam Noor e Ilahi se likhe hue the. Adam o Hawwa ne ye manzar dekh kar kaha: Parwardigar! Ye Makhlooq Tujhe kitni pyari hai aur Teri nazar mein unka maqam kitna buland hai?_
Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya:
_"Agar ye na hote to mein tum dono ko paida hi na karta. Ye mere Ilm ke Khazin hain aur Mere Razon ke Ameen hain. Khabardar! Meri is Makhlooq ko Nigah e Hasad se na dekhna aur inke maqam ki tamanna na karna warna Mere Nafarman qarar paoge aur tum dono Zalimon mein se ho jaoge."_
Adam o Hawwa ne kaha:
_"Parwardigar! "Zalim" kaun hai?_
Khuda ne farmaya:
_"Jo na jayez taur par inki Manzilat ka dawa kare."_
_"(7:20) Aur usne Adam o Hawwa ko targheeb di (instigated) ke Muhammad (sa) wa Aale Muhammad (as) ki Manzilat ki tamanna karen. Chunanche in dono ne Zawat e Tahera ko Chashme Hasad se dekha jiska natija ye nikla ke woh Khudayi hifazat se mehroom ho gaye yahan tak ke unhone Gandum ke paude ka phal khaa liya. Unhone jis paude ka phal khaya tha wo Jaw ke paude mein tabdeel ho gaya. Genhu ka pauda wohi hai jise unhone nahi khaya tha aur Jaw ka pauda wohi hai jise unhone khaya tha. Jab woh is paude ka phal khaa chuke to unke Badan par Jannat ka jo libaas aur zewar maujood tha wo sab unke Badan se ud gaya aur dono nange ho gaye._
Allah Ta'ala un dono se kaha:
_"Tum dono Mere qareeb se chale jao. Meri Nafarmani karnewala Meri Jannat mein nahi rah sakta."_
Iske baad dono Zameen par utre aur Khuda ne unko talab e ma'ash mein laga diya."
(Kitab Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🤲🏻
*اَعُوْذُ بِهٖ مِنْ شَرِّ الشَّيْطَانِ الَّذِىْ يَزِيْدُنِىْ ذَنْبًا اِلٰى ذَنْبِىْ وَ اَحْتَرِزُ بِهٖ مِنْ كُلِّ جَبَّارٍ فَاجِرٍ وَّ سُلْطَانٍ جَاۤئِرٍ وَّعَدُوٍّ قَاهِرٍ*

Bare Ilaha _"Mein us Shaitan ke Shar se panah chahta hun jo Gunahon mein izafe ka sabab banta."_
(Tuesday Dua)

👉🏻 *Guzishta Tafseer:*
http://shiachannel.net78.net/tafseer-hinglish.html
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

**********************************
         *4th Mahe Rajab 1440*
    *12th March 2019, Tuesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*DUA-E-HAZRAT ADAM (as)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1178)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قَالَا رَبَّنَا ظَلَمْنَا أَنْفُسَنَا وَإِنْ لَمْ تَغْفِرْ لَنَا وَتَرْحَمْنَا لَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ الْخَاسِرِينَ * قَالَ اهْبِطُوا بَعْضُكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ عَدُوٌّ ۖ وَلَكُمْ فِي الْأَرْضِ مُسْتَقَرٌّ وَمَتَاعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٍ * قَالَ فِيهَا تَحْيَوْنَ وَفِيهَا تَمُوتُونَ وَمِنْهَا تُخْرَجُونَ*

_"Un dono ne kaha: Aye hamare Parwardigar! hamne apne aap par Sitam kiya hai. Ab agar Tu ne ham se darguzar (forgive) na kiya aur rahem na farmaya to ham khasara uthane walon mein se ho jayenge."_
_"Irshad e Bari Ta'ala hua: Utar jao tum ek doosre ke Dushman ho aur tumhare liye khaas muddat tak Zameen hi mein jaye qarar (stay) aur Samaane zeest (provisions) hai."_
_"Irshaad farmaya: 'Isi Zameen mein tum ko jeena hai aur isi mein hi tumhe marna hai aur is mein se hi tumhe dobara nikala jayega."_
(Surah A'raf: 23 - 25)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_ (Cont'd..)
Imam Sadiq (as): Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya:
"Shabe Meraj jab mujh par Namazen farz hui to hazrat Musa (as) ne Khuda se darkhwast ki ke Woh unki Hazrat Adam se mulaqat karaye. Hazrat Adam (as) ki mulaqat hui aur unke bare mein wohi sawal kiye. Hazrat Adam (as) ne wohi jawab diye (pura waqea bayan kar chuke hain) yani Shaitan ne unke saath dokha kiya. Uski Qasam par eitbar kiya. Hazrat Adam (as) ne Hazrat Musa (as) se poochha kya ye waqea tumhari Kitab mein likha hai. Hazrat Musa (as) ne farmaya:
_"Tumhari Takhleeq (creation) se bahut arse pahle Kitab mein tumhari khata likh di gayi thi."_
Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya: 'Adam wa Musa (as) ne mil kar Hajj kiya. Aap (saww) ne ye jumla 3 bar dohraya."
'"Adam (as) ko apne Rab se haya mehsoos hui aur Parwardigar se ye Dua ki. Sharminda hue aur us darakht se door jaane lage. Darakht ki taheniyon ne unke Sar ko pakad kar apni janib khech kar kaha: 'Tum mera phal khane se pahle yahan se kyon na bhage?"
(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🤲🏻
Ahle Bait (as) ne bhi hame isi tarah Dua taleem di jis tarah Hazrat Adam (as) ne Dua maangi thi.
🤲🏻
Hazrat Ali (as):
*ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِي وَتَجَرَّأْتُ بِجَهْلِي وَسَكَنتُ إِلَي قَدِيمِ ذِكْرِكَ لِي وَمَنِّكَ عَلَيَّ اللَّهُمَّ مَوْلايَ كَم مِّن قَبِيحٍ سَتَرْتَهُ وَكَم مِّن فَاِدحٍ مِّنَ البَلاءِ أَقَلْتَهُ وَكَم مِّنْ عِثَارٍ وَّقَيْتَهُ وَكَم مِّن مَّكْرُوهٍ دَفَعْتَهُ وَكَم مِّن ثَنَاٍء جَمِيلٍ لَّسْتُ أَهْلاً لَّهُ نَشَرْتَهُ اللَّهُمَّ عَظُمَ بَلائِي وَأَفْرَطَ بِي سُوءُ حَاِلي وَقَصُرَتْ بِي أَعْمَاِلي وَقَعَدَتْ بِي أَغْلاَلِي وَحَبَسَنِي عَن نَّفْعِي بُعْدُ آمَاِلي وَخَدَعَتْنِي الدُّنْيَا بِغُرُورِهَا وَنَفْسِي بِجِنَايَتِهَا وَمِطَاِلي.*

_"Khudaya! Meine apne Nafs par Zulm kiya hai, apni Jihalat se jasarat ki hai aur is baat par mutmain baitha hun ke Tu ne mujhe hamesha yaad rakha hai aur hamesha ehsaan farmaya hai. Khudaya! Mere kitne aib hain jinhe Tu ne chhupa diya hai aur kitne hi azeem balayen hain jinse Tu ne bachaya hai. Kitni thokren hain jinse Tu ne sanbhala hai aur kitni buraiyyan hain jinhe Tu ne taala hai..... "_
_"Khudaya! Meri musibat azeem hai, meri badhaali had se aage badhi hui hai. Mere Aamaal mein kotahi hai...Duniya ne dhoke mein mubtila rakha hai aur Nafs ne khayanat aur tal matol mein mutila rakha hai....."_
(Dua-e-Kumail)

👉🏻 *Guzishta Tafseer:*
http://shiachannel.net78.net/tafseer-hinglish.html
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3


💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐
_*Read Life of Imam Ali Naqi (as), click:*_
https://www.al-islam.org/story-of-the-holy-kaaba-and-its-people-shabbar/tenth-imam-ali-ibn-muhammad-al-naqi-al-hadi


**********************************
         *5th Mahe Rajab 1440*
   *13th March 2019, Wednesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
              ♦ _*LIBAAS*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1179)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا بَنِي آدَمَ قَدْ أَنْزَلْنَا عَلَيْكُمْ لِبَاسًا يُوَارِي سَوْآتِكُمْ وَرِيشًا ۖ وَلِبَاسُ التَّقْوَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ مِنْ آيَاتِ اللَّهِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَذَّكَّرُونَ*

_"Aye Aulad e Adam! Hamne tumhare liye poshak nazil ki hai jo tumhare Satr (Sharamgah - Private Parts) ko chhupati hai aur tumhare liye Zeenat ka zariya bhi hai aur behtareen Libaas Taqwe ka Libaas hai. Ye Allah ki Nishaniyon mein se ek Nishani hai taake log Nasihat hasil karen."_
(Surah A'raf: 26)

📚📖 🥼
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"Libaas se murad tumhare wo Kapde hai jinhe tum pahente ho aur " *رِيشًا* Resh" se Maal o Daulat murad hai. Paak damani ka Libaas Taqwe ka Libaas hai kyonki agar Muttaqi mamooli Libaas mein bhi ho phir bhi wo dhaka hua hota hai aur badkar khwah kitni hi Kapde pahen rakhe hon woh phir bhi nanga hai. Allah Ta'ala ka farman hai: *وَلِبَاسُ التَّقْوَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ*  Taqwe ka Libaas behtareen Libaas hai."_
(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🥼
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
_"Logo! Sooti Kapde (cotton) pahna karo ye Rasoole Akram (saww) ka Libaas hai. Aap ne Oon aur Baalon ka Libaas kabhi istemal kiya tha to sirf bimari ki wajah se hi kiya tha warna aam halaat mein Aap hamesha Sooti Libaas hi pahente the aur Aap (saww) farmate the:_
_"Allah khud Jameel hai aur Woh Jamal se Muhabbat karta hai aur Use ye baat pasand hai ke Apni Ne'mat ka asar Apne Bande par dekhe."_
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
🍪🍲
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Ibne Adam! Tere liye itni Duniya kafi hai jisse teri bhook mit sake aur teri Sharamgah chhup sake. Agar tere paas Rihaais ke liye Ghar ho to aur behtar hai aur agar tere paas Sawari ka Jaanwar ho to tujhe Mubarak ho. Yehi to bhalai hai aur isse zyada ka Hisaab bhi hai aur iska Azaab bhi hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
👳‍♀
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Amama, Moze (socks) aur Chadar ke alawa Siyah (Black) Rang ka Kapda Makrooh hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
💐
*Imam Ali Naqi (as):*
_"Insaan ki izzat o shakhsiyat duniya mein amwaal (wealth / maal) se hai aur Akherat mein aamaal se hai."_
(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen, p227)
♟🎲
*Imam Ali Naqi (as):*
_" *Nard (paasa / dice), Shatranj aur 14 patto'n ka khel* sab ek hi cheez hain aur jis bhi cheez par shart lagayi jaaye wo Jua hai."_
(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v1, p413)
🤲🏻
_"Khudaya! Meine is mohkam rishte se tamassuk (attachment) karte hue Subah ki hai ke jisse mohkam tar koi rishta nahi hai taake mein...._
_Us Libaas e Afiyat ke tufail mein jo Tere Paighambar ke Ahle Bait ki Muhabbat hai."_
(Taqeebat e Namaz Subah)

👉🏻 *Guzishta Tafseer:*
http://shiachannel.net78.net/tafseer-hinglish.html
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3
**********************************
         *6th Mahe Rajab 1440*
    *14th March 2019, Thursday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
       ♦ _*FUHUSH - BEHAYAI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1180)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا بَنِي آدَمَ لَا يَفْتِنَنَّكُمُ الشَّيْطَانُ كَمَا أَخْرَجَ أَبَوَيْكُمْ مِنَ الْجَنَّةِ يَنْزِعُ عَنْهُمَا لِبَاسَهُمَا لِيُرِيَهُمَا سَوْآتِهِمَا ۗ إِنَّهُ يَرَاكُمْ هُوَ وَقَبِيلُهُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا تَرَوْنَهُمْ ۗ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا الشَّيَاطِينَ أَوْلِيَاءَ لِلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ*

_"Aye Aulad e Adam! Kahen aisa na ho ke Shaitan tumhe phir isi tarah se Fitne mein dal de jis tarah se us ne tumhare Waledain ko Jannat se nikalwaya tha, unke Libaas un se utrwa diye the taake unki Sharamgahen ek doosre ke saamne khole. Woh aur uske saathi tumhe aisi jagah se dekhte hain jahan se tum unhe nahi dekh sakte. In Shayateen ko Hamne un logo ka Sarparast bana diya hai jo Imaan nahi laate."_
(Surah A'raf: 27)

📚📖 🕺👯
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Guzishta Tafseer mein Iblees ne jo Khuda se apni maange rakhi thi jo Allah ne qubool bhi ki un mein se ek maang ye bhi thi ke agar Nasl e Adam mein ek fard ka izafa hoga to Iblees ki Nasl mein do afraad ka izafa hoga. Iblees unhe dekhe aur woh use na dekh saken aur Iblees jis surat mein unke paas jaana chahe ise ikhtiyar ho. Is baat ka is Ayat mein Zikr hai.
Doosri baat ye ke Shaitan ne unke Kapde utrwa diye. Yani Shaitan uryaniyat (Nudity) ko badhawa deta hai. Saare Fuhush baate Shaitan ki den hai. Aaj kal jo Sex wa Pornography jo aam ho rahi hai ye Shaitani targheebat ka natija hai, khaas kar kuwanre ladke ladkiyan uske phande mein phans jate hain. Social media bhi Shaitan ka ek hathiyar bana hua hai. Porn Video wa pics  ka adan pradan hota hai. Ye sab aaj kal bahut asaan ho gaya hai, isliye aise mein apne bachcho ko uske phande se bachana sakht aur ahm farz hai.
Doosri taraf dekhe to isko Dharmik Roop dekar bhi Sex  ki targheeb di jaati hai. Baba wa Sadhuon ki khabren sunte aur unhe Jail jaate bhi dekhte rahte hai. Kumbh mein Aurat Mard Nange jama hona bhi Dharmik astha hai.
Arab ki tarikh mein dekha jaye to Zamana Jahiliyyat mein Arabon ki Rasam thi ke Mard wa Aurat Ka'aba ke atraaf baraihna tawaf karte the. Unki daleel ye thi ke jin Kapdon se Khuda ka gunah kiya gaya ho use Ibaadat ke waqt utar phekna chahiye.
Isse ye bhi nateeja nikalta hai jab burai aam ho jaye to wo buri nahi samjhi jaati.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Main bahut ghairat wala hun aur Allah Ta'ala mujh se bhi zyada Ghairat wala hai. Apni Ghairat hi ki wajah se Usne fahash (vulgar / ashleel) baato'n ko Haraam qaraar diya hai, chaahe wo khuli hui ho'n ya chhupi hui."_
(Haraam Nigaah, p21)
😏
Imam Kazim (as):
_"Khuda ke bando'n mein sab se bura wo hai jiske saath nashist o barkhast (uthhne baithne) ko uske Fahashiyaat (obscenity / ashleelta / nirlajjata) ki wajah se makrooh samjha jaye."_
(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen, p177)
🤲🏻
_"Bare Ilaha! Fohosh Kalami ya Behoodgi, gali galoch, Jhooti gawahi, Momin ki Gheebat ya badzabani unhe Apni Hamd Sanai, shukre Ne'mat wa Ehsaan mein tabdeel kar de."_
(Sahifa Sajjadiya)

👉🏻 *Guzishta Tafseer:*
http://shiachannel.net78.net/tafseer-hinglish.html
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
       *7th Mahe Rajab 1440*
    *15th March 2019, Friday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
    ♦ _*AIMMA-E-FAHSHA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1181)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذَا فَعَلُوا فَاحِشَةً قَالُوا وَجَدْنَا عَلَيْهَا آبَاءَنَا وَاللَّهُ أَمَرَنَا بِهَا ۗ قُلْ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يَأْمُرُ بِالْفَحْشَاءِ ۖ أَتَقُولُونَ عَلَى اللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ*

_"Jab woh koi bura kaam (behayai) karte hain to kahte hain ke hamne apne aba' o ajdad ko isi paya tha aur Khuda ne hame iska hukm diya hai. Aap kah den ke Khuda hargiz bure kaam (behayai) ka Hukm nahi deta. Kya tum log Khuda par iftra karke (Jhoot ilzam) wo baaten kahte ho jo tum nahi jaante."_
(Surah A'raf: 28)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Kya koi guman bhi kar sakta hai ke Allah burayi ka Hukm de?_ Jawab diya 'nahi.'
_"Phir socho wo "Fahisha' aur burayi kaun si hai jiske mutalliq log ye kahte hain ke ham ne apne aba' o ajdad (Forefathers) ko is par paya hai aur Khuda ne bhi hame iska Hukm diya hai?"_
Aap (as) ne farmaya:
_"Isse Aimma e Jaur (Unjust Imams) ki wo ravish murad hai jo unhone doosre Zalimon ki apnai hui hai. Jab unse kaha jata hai ke tum is rabish ko chhod do to woh kahte hain ke hamare aba' o ajdad se yehi ravish chali aa rahi hai. Aur jin ki ham pairavi kar rahe hain Allah ne bhi hame unki pairavi ka Hukm diya hai."_
_"Allah ne in logon ki tardeed karte hue farmaya ke ye log jhoot bol rahe hain....."_
_"Al garz Khuda ne Zalim Imamon (Aimma e Jaur) ki pairavi ko lafz "Fahisha' se tabeer kiya hai."_ 
(Tarikh mein ek Fahisha guzri hai jo Imam e Haq ke muqile par aayi thi)
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
﻿Imam Ali (as):
_*"Bura saathi Iblees hai."*_
Hadiyat ush Shia, p45
🔰
Imam Ali (as):
_"Neki ka hukm do aur khud bhi uspar amal karo. Burai se roko aur khud bhi usse ruko. Kyun ki humen burai se rukne ke baad rokne ka hukm diya gaya hai."_
(Wasaail ush Shia, v11, p323)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as)
_"(Aye mere Sardar!) Teri saari makhluqat mein se jo mere liye bura irada rakhta hai use mere paaon tale daal de. Aur Shaitan aur Sultan ki buraiyo'n aur bure Aamal se bachne mein meri madad farma. Aur mujhe sab gunaho'n se paak saaf kar de."_
(Dua e Abu Hamza Shimali)

👉🏻 *Guzishta Tafseer:*
http://shiachannel.net78.net/tafseer-hinglish.html
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
       *8th Mahe Rajab 1440*
 *16th March 2019, Saturday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦🕋 _*QIBLAH - MASJID*_ 🕌♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1182)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قُلْ أَمَرَ رَبِّي بِالْقِسْطِ ۖ وَأَقِيمُوا وُجُوهَكُمْ عِنْدَ كُلِّ مَسْجِدٍ وَادْعُوهُ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ الدِّينَ ۚ كَمَا بَدَأَكُمْ تَعُودُونَ*

_"Aap kah den ke mere Parwardigar ne Insaaf ka Hukm diya hai aur farmaya ke har Namaz ke waqt apne (Qible ki taraf) seedhe kar liya karo aur apne Deen ko Uske liye khalis karke Use pukaro jis tarah se Usne tumhe paida kiya tha aur tum lautoge."_
(Surah A'raf: 29)

📚📖 🕋
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Ayat *وَأَقِيمُوا وُجُوهَكُمْ عِنْدَ كُلّ مَسْجِدٍ* ki ek Taveel ye hai ke jab Aimma ke paas jao to khuloose Dil ke saath jao."_
_"Isse murad ye hai ke Namaz ke waqt Qible ki taraf Munh kiya karo."_
_"Ye Hukm nayi tameer hone wali Masajid ke liye hai inhe Masjidul Haram ki taraf seedha banaya jaye."_
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Tehzeebul Ahkam, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Hazrat Rasoole Khuda (saww) ki Masjid ki Deewar chhat (roof) daalne se pehle Insaani qaamat (human height) ke barabar thi. Pus, jab uska saaya (shadow) ek haath ho jaata aur is qadar hota ke us mein (us saaye mein) ek bakri baithh sakti hai, to aap (saww) Namaz e Zuhar padhte the aur jab (saaya) 2 haath ho jaata, to phir Asr padhte the."_
(Wasailush Shia, v3, p105)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Marne wale ko ru-ba-Qibla (Qibla-rukh) karo (uska chehra aur dono qadmo'n ke talwe Qible ki taraf kiye jaayein). Jab aisa karoge to Malaika uski taraf mutawajjeh honge aur Khuda bhi uski taraf mutawajjeh hoga (uspar Rehmat naazil karega) aur jab tak uski Rooh qabz na ho jaye wo barabar usi haalat mein rahe (taaki Khuda aur Uske Malaika ki tawajjoh ka markaz bana rahe)_"
(Wasailush Shia, v2, p130)
🕌 🕯💡
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Jo shakhs Masjid mein chiraag jalata hai (light lagata hai) to Malaika aur Haamilaane Arsh us waqt tak uske liye Astagfaar karte hain jab tak uski roshni baaqi rehti hai."_
(Jaame ul Akhbar, p110)
🤲🏻
*وَ اَحَلَّ لَهٗ مِنْ مَسْجِدِهٖ مَا حَلَّ لَهٗ وَ سَدَّ الْاَبْوَابَ اِلَّا بَابَهٗ ثُمَّ اَوْدَعَهٗ عِلْمَهٗ وَ حِكْمَتَهٗ فَقَالَ اَنَا مَدِیْنَۃُ الْعِلْمِ وَ عَلِیٌّ بَابُھَا فَمَنْ اَرَادَ الْمَدِیْنَۃَ وَ الْحِكْمَۃَ فَلْیَاْتِھَا مِنْ بَابِھَا*
_"... Aur unke (Ali as) ke liye Masjid mein wo sab Halaal kar diya jo khud unke liye Halaal tha... "_
(Dua-e-Nudba)

👉🏻 *Guzishta Tafseer:*
http://shiachannel.net78.net/tafseer-hinglish.html


⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3
✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿
🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹
*WILADAT JANAB E ALI ASGHAR*
                    *MUBARAK*
💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐
✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿
        *9th Mahe Rajab 1440*
    *17th March 2019, Sunday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
              ♦ _*NASEEB*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1183)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَرِيقًا هَدَىٰ وَفَرِيقًا حَقَّ عَلَيْهِمُ الضَّلَالَةُ ۗ إِنَّهُمُ اتَّخَذُوا الشَّيَاطِينَ أَوْلِيَاءَ مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ وَيَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّهُمْ مُهْتَدُونَ*

_"Ek giroh ko Usne Seedha Raasta dikha diya hai aur doosre giroh par gumrahi sawar ho gayi hai. Un logon ne Khuda ko chhod kar Shaitanon ko apna Sarparst bana liya aur woh ye samajhte hain ke woh Raahe Raast par hain."_
(Surah A'raf: 30)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Baqir (as):
(Is Ayat ke zel mein farmaya)
_"Khuda ne kisi Momin ko bana kar paida kiya kisi ko Kafir bana kar paida kiya. Kisi ko Nek bakht aur kisi ko Bad Naseeb bana kar paida kiya jis tarah se Usne paida kiya tha usi tarah se mud kar Khuda ke huzoor Qayamat ke Din pesh honge. (7:30)"_
_"Isse "Qadariya - *قدريه*" firqa murad hai jo ye kahte hain ke Taqdeer ka koi amal dakhal nahi hai aur woh ye guman karte hain ke woh Hidayat o Gumrahi par qudrat rakhte hain aur ye un par munhasir hai chahen to Seedhi Raah ikhtiyar karen aur chahen to ghalat raah ikhtiyar karen. Woh log is Ummat ke Majoosi hain aur in Dushmanane Khuda ne jhoot kaha hai. Mashiyyat o Qudrat Khuda ke haath mein hai. Khuda ne jise Khush Naseeb bana kar paida kiya hai woh Khush Naseeb ban kar hi Khuda ke huzoor pesh hoga aur jisko Usne Bad Naseeb bana kar paida kiya hai to woh Bad Naseeb ban kar hi Khuda ke saamne hazir hoga. Kyonki Rasoole Khuda (saww) ka farman hai ke Bad Naseeb Shikam e Madar mein bhi Bad Naseeb hai aur Khush Naseeb Shikam e Madar mein hi Khush Naseeb hai."_
(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Ayat *إِنَّهُمُ اتَّخَذُوا الشَّيَاطِينَ أَوْلِيَاءَ مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ* se murad woh log hain jinhone Aimma e Haq ko chhod kar Aimma e Batil ka daman thama tha. *وَيَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّهُمْ مُهْتَدُونَ* is ke bawajood woh samajhte hain ke woh Hidayat yafta hain."_
(Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Ali (as):
_" Jab tak tumhare Naseeb achche hain, tumhare Aib dhake huwe hain."_
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v7)
🕌
Imam Ali (as):
_" Khush Naseeb wo hai ke jiske aibo'n par Allah ne abhi purdah dala huwa hai."_
(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p88)
🤲🏻
Imam Ali (as):
_"Pus, Aye Parwardigar! Is Subah ko mere liye Noor e Hidayat aur Deen o Duniya ki salaamati ki haamil bana kar nazil farma. Aur is Raat ko Dushmanon ki makkari se meri dhhaal aur halaak kar dene wali Hawas ki sipar bana de."_
(Dua e Sabaah)

👉🏻 *Guzishta Tafseer:*
http://shiachannel.net78.net/tafseer-hinglish.html
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿
🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹
*WILADAT IMAM MOHAMMED TAQI AL JAWAD (as) MUBARAK*
💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐
✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿
        *10th Mahe Rajab 1440*
    *18th March 2019, Monday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
       ♦ _*ZEENAT-E-LIBAAS*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1184)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا بَنِي آدَمَ خُذُوا زِينَتَكُمْ عِنْدَ كُلِّ مَسْجِدٍ وَكُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا وَلَا تُسْرِفُوا ۚ إِنَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ الْمُسْرِفِينَ * قُلْ مَنْ حَرَّمَ زِينَةَ اللَّهِ الَّتِي أَخْرَجَ لِعِبَادِهِ وَالطَّيِّبَاتِ مِنَ الرِّزْقِ ۚ قُلْ هِيَ لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا فِي الْحَيَاةِ الدُّنْيَا خَالِصَةً يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ ۗ كَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ الْآيَاتِ لِقَوْمٍ يَعْلَمُونَ*

_"Aye Bani Adam! Har Ibaadat ke mauqe par apni Zeenat se arasta raho aur khao piyo aur hadd se aage na badho, Allah hadd se aage badhne walon ko pasand bahi karta."_
_"Aap kah dijiye kisne Allah ki is Zeenat ko Haraam kiya hai jo Khuda ne apne Bando ke liye paida ki hai aur Pakeeza Rozi ko kis ne Haraam kiya hai? Aap kah den ke ye tamam pakeeza cheezen Qayamat ke Din un logon ke liye makhsoos hongi jo Duniya ki Zindagi mein Imaan laye the. Isi tarah se Hamne Ahle Ilm afraad ke liye apni Ayaat wazahat se bayan karte hain."_
(Surah A'raf: 31 - 32)

📚📖 🥼
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Ek Sahabi ne Imam Sadiq (as) ko itehai qeemti khoobsurat libaas zeb e tan dekha aur is bare mein sawal kiya.
Aap (as) ne farmaya:
_"Rasoole Khuda (saww) ka zamana intihai ghurbat o iflaas ka zamana tha. Isliye Aanhazrat (saww) ne bhi ghareebana libaas pahna tha. Aaj Khuda ne Musalmano ko farakhi (ampleness) wa ashais de di hai, Nek Bande Khuda ki Ne'mat ke zyada haqdar hain. Phir ye Ayat tilawat farmayi (7:31). Khuda ki Ne'maat se istefada (use) karne ke liye ham zyada haqdar hain. Albatta ye aur baat hai ke meine ye libaas logon ke dikhane ke liye pahna hai."_ Ye kah kar Aap (as) ne apni Qamees hatayi to andar mota jhoota kapda maujood tha. Aap (as) ne wo khurdara kapda dikha kar farmaya:
_"Maine apne jism ke liye khurdare kapde ka intekhab kiya hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🥼
Imam Ali Reza (as):
_"Imam Zainul Abideen (as) Resham aur Oon se sila hua Jubba aur Munaqqash (engraved) Chadar aur Topi ka Jubba pahna karte the. Phir munaqqash Chadar bech dete the aur uski raqam bataur Sadqa taqseem kar dete the."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🥼
Ek Sahabi ne dekha Imam Sadiq (as) Khiz (Fur) ka Jubba aur Khiz ki gol chadar pahne hue the, to is bare mein sawal kiya.
Aap (as) ne farmaya:
_"Iske pahenne mein koi harj nahi hai. Hazrat Imam Husain (as) shaheed hue the to unhone us waqt خز Fur ka jubba pahna hua tha."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
_"Bandagan e Khuda! Tumhe maloom hona chahiye ke Muttaqeen ne Duniya o Akhirat ki bhalaiyon se apne daman ko bhara hai. Woh Ahle Duniya ke saath unki Duniya mein sharik rahe lekin Ahle Duniya unki Akhirat mein unke sharik na ban paye. Allah ne Duniya mein unke liye itni cheezen Mubah ki hain jo unki zarooriyat ke liye kafi hain. (7:32)"_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ اٰلِهٖ*
*وَ حَلِّنِىْ بِحِلْيَةِ الصَّالِحِيْنَ وَ اَلْبِسْنِىْ زِيْنَةَ الْمُتَّقِيْنَ فِىْ......*

_"Bare Ilaha! Mujhe Nekokaron ke Zewar aur Parhezgaron ki saj dhaj se araasta kar... "_
(Sahifa Sajjadiya Dua No. 20)

👉🏻 *Guzishta Tafseer:*
http://shiachannel.net78.net/tafseer-hinglish.html
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3
✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿
        *11th Mahe Rajab 1440*
    *19th March 2019, Tuesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
          ♦ _*PAAK RIZQ*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1185)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا بَنِي آدَمَ خُذُوا زِينَتَكُمْ عِنْدَ كُلِّ مَسْجِدٍ وَكُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا وَلَا تُسْرِفُوا ۚ إِنَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ الْمُسْرِفِينَ * قُلْ مَنْ حَرَّمَ زِينَةَ اللَّهِ الَّتِي أَخْرَجَ لِعِبَادِهِ وَالطَّيِّبَاتِ مِنَ الرِّزْقِ ۚ قُلْ هِيَ لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا فِي الْحَيَاةِ الدُّنْيَا خَالِصَةً يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ ۗ كَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ الْآيَاتِ لِقَوْمٍ يَعْلَمُونَ*

_"Aye Bani Adam! Har Ibaadat ke mauqe par apni Zeenat se arasta raho aur khao piyo aur hadd se aage na badho, Allah hadd se aage badhne walon ko pasand bahi karta."_
_"Aap kah dijiye kisne Allah ki is Zeenat ko Haraam kiya hai jo Khuda ne apne Bando ke liye paida ki hai aur Pakeeza Rozi ko kis ne Haraam kiya hai? Aap kah den ke ye tamam pakeeza cheezen Qayamat ke Din un logon ke liye makhsoos hongi jo Duniya ki Zindagi mein Imaan laye the. Isi tarah se Hamne Ahle Ilm afraad ke liye apni Ayaat wazahat se bayan karte hain."_
(Surah A'raf: 31 - 32)

📚📖 🍪🍲
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as): (hadis cont'd)
_"(7:32) Ahle Taqwa ne Duniya mein rah kar achhi Sukoonat (Stay) ikhtiyar ki aur unhone behtareen khaane khaaye. Woh Ahle Duniya ki Duniya mein unke saath sharik rahe. Unhone unke saath Pakeeza Rizq khaaya aur Pakeeza Drinks istemal kin aur unhone behtareen Libaas pahne aur behtareen rihayish (Residence) rakhi. Aur behtareen Aurton se shaadiyan kin aur behtareen sawariyon par sawar hue. Ahle Duniya ke saath mil kar unhone Duniya ki lazzaat uthayin aur kal woh Allah ke hamsaye banenge. Woh Khuda se jo kuchh talab karenge Khuda unhe ata farmayega. Unki koi darkhwast mustard (reject) na ki jayegi aur unki lazzat ke hisse mein koi kami waqe nahi hogi."_
_"Aye Aql rakhne wale Bandagane Khuda! Uski ki taraf ishtiyaq paida karo."_
(Amaali Toosi, Noorus Saqlain)
🍪🍲
Hazrat Ali (as):
_"Jis shakhs ka Maqsad e Hayat Jinsi Khwahishaat (Sex) ki takmeel aur Sikam parvari (Pet pooja) ho to aisa shakhs Khuda ki Rehmat se bahut door hota hai."_
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🍪🍲
Imam Ali Reza (as): Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Allah ko bhare hue Pet se zyada koi cheez Na-pasand nahi hai."_
(Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🍪🍲
Hazrat Ali (as): Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Apne Dakar ko roko, jo log is Duniya mein apne Shikam ko bharne ke aadi hain woh Qayamat ke Din bhooke honge."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ اٰلِهٖ*
*وَ اَسْئَلُكَ فِىْ اَنْ تُسَهِّلَ اِلٰى رِزْقِىْ سَبِيْلًا....وَ سَهِّلْ عَلَىَّ رِزْقِىْ وَ اَنْ تُقَنِّعَنِىْ بِتَقْدِيْرِكَ لِىْ وَ اَنْ تُرْضِيَنِىْ بِحِصَّتِىْ فِيْمَا قَسَمْتَ لِىْ..*

_Aur Tujh se sawal karta hun ke meri Rozi ki asaan sabeel paida kar de."_
_"Aur meri Rozi ko sahel o aasaan kar de aur jo mere liye muqaddar kiya hai us par qana'at ki Taufeeq de aur jo hissa mere liye mo'ayyin kiya, us par mujhe raazi kar de aur jo jism kaam mein aa chuka hai aur umr guzar chuki hai use apni ita'at ki raah mein mehsoob farma. Bila Shubah Tu asbaab e Rizq muhayya karne walon mein sab se behtar hai."_
(Sahifa Sajjadiya Dua No 32)

👉🏻 *Guzishta Tafseer:*
http://shiachannel.net78.net/tafseer-hinglish.html
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL CELEBRATE WILADAT OF JANABE SAKINA (sa)*
🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹
https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3
**********************************
      *20th Mahe Rajab 1440*
  *28th March 2019, Thursday*
💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐
_*Read the Biography of Janabe Sakina (sa), click:*_
http://www.duas.org/sakina.htm
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*AASMAAN KE DARWAZE*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1192)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا وَاسْتَكْبَرُوا عَنْهَا لَا تُفَتَّحُ لَهُمْ أَبْوَابُ السَّمَاءِ وَلَا يَدْخُلُونَ الْجَنَّةَ حَتَّىٰ يَلِجَ الْجَمَلُ فِي سَمِّ الْخِيَاطِ ۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُجْرِمِينَ * لَهُمْ مِنْ جَهَنَّمَ مِهَادٌ وَمِنْ فَوْقِهِمْ غَوَاشٍ ۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الظَّالِمِينَ*

_"Yaqeenan woh log jinhone Hamari Ayat ko jhutlaya aur unke muqable mein Takabbur kiya to unke liye Aasmaan ke Darwaze nahi khole jayenge aur unka Jannat mein jana utna hi namumkin hai jitna Sui ke Naake se Oont ka guzarna aur Ham Mujrimon ko aisa hi Badla diya karte hain. Unke liye Jahannum ka Bichhauna hoga aur Jahannum ka hi Odhna hoga aur Ham Zalimon ko aisi hi Jaza diya karte hain."_
(Surah A'raf: 40 - 41)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Mohd Baqir (as) & Imam Sadiq (as) se Rivayat ke mutabiq "agarche ye Ayat tamam Mukazzebin ke liye hai magar Jang e Jamal ke muharrekin aur unka Oont khas taur par murad hai."
(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim, Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
📚
_"Jesus looked at him [now sad] and said, “How hard it is for those who have wealth to enter the kingdom of God!"_
_"For it is easier for a camel to pass through the eye of a needle than for a rich person to enter the kingdom of God.”_
(Gospel Luke, Chapter 18, No. 24-25)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🌨
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
_"Aasmaan ke Darwaze 5 mauqe par khulte hain:_
_(1) Barish ke waqt (2) Jihad ke waqt (3) Azaan ke waqt (4) Jab Zawal e Aftaab ke waqt Qur'an padha jaye. (5) Tulu' e Fajr ke waqt."_
_"Aasmaanon ka Taala (Lock) Allah ke saath Shirk karna hai aur Aasmaanon ki Chaabi (Key) " La Ilaha illallah" hai."_
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
🌫☁
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Ahle Imaan ke Aamaal aur unki Arwah ko Asmaan ki taraf le jaya jata hai. Aasmaan ke Darwaze unke liye khol diye jate hain aur Kafir ke Aamal aur uski Rooh ko Farishte jab Asmaan ke paas le jate hain to us waqt Munadi nida de kar kahta hai ke ise 'Sijjeen' le jao aur woh 'Hazarmaut' ke ilaaqe mein ek wadi hai, ise 'Barhoot' bhi kaha jata hai."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*وَالْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِىْ اَغْلَقَ عَنَّا بَابَ الْحَاجَةِ اِلَّا اِلَيْهِ فَكَيْفَ نُطِيْقُ حَمْدَهٗ*

_"Sari Taarifen Us Allah ke liye Jisne Apne siwa Talab o Haajat ka har Darwaza hamare liye band kar diya to ham (is haajat o Ihtiyaaj ke hote hue) kaise Uski Hamd se Uhda e bara ho sakte hain.."_
(Sahifa Sajjadiya Dua No. 1)

👉🏻 *Guzishta Tafseer:*
http://shiachannel.net78.net/tafseer-hinglish.html
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3
**********************************
       *17th Mahe Rajab 1440*
    *25th March 2019, Monday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
        ♦ _*KHATM-E-ANBIYA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1189)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا بَنِي آدَمَ إِمَّا يَأْتِيَنَّكُمْ رُسُلٌ مِنْكُمْ يَقُصُّونَ عَلَيْكُمْ آيَاتِي ۙ فَمَنِ اتَّقَىٰ وَأَصْلَحَ فَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ * وَالَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا وَاسْتَكْبَرُوا عَنْهَا أُولَٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ النَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَالِدُونَ*

_"Aye Bani Adam! Agar tumhare paas khud tum hi mein se aise Rasool aayen jo tumhe Meri Ayaat aa kar sunayen to us waqt jo koi na-farmani se bache aur apni Islah kar le to uske liye kisi khuaf aur ranj ka mauqa nahi hai. Aur jo log Hamari Ayaat ko jhutlayen aur unke muqable mein sarjashi ki ravish apnayen to wohi Dozakh jaane wale honge jahan woh hamesha rahenge."_
(Surah A'raf: 35 - 36)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Ayat No. 34 aur 35 ka, Ahmedi (Qadiyani) ya unke ham nazr afrad istemal karte hain Khatemiyyat e Anbiya Muhammad (saww) ke liye. Unka kahna hai ke is Ayat mein 'Ummat' se murad mazhab hai. Doosre ye ke doosri Ayat mein Arabic mein Muzare yani 'Future Tense' ke liye istemal hua hai, yani Nabi aa sakta hai.
Iska jawab ye hai 'Ummat' ka maani mazhab ke hai hi nahi. Ummat ek griroh, majma, ya group ko kahte hain. Quran mein 64 times ye word group ke maani mein istemal hua hai. Jaise (28:23),(3:104),(7:160) etc. Isliye *(وَلِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلٌ)* se murad Ummat yani logon ka khatma hai na ke Deen ka.
Doosri Ayat mein *يَا بَنِي آدَمَ إِمَّا يَأْتِيَنَّكُمْ رُسُلٌ مِنْكُمْ*
Yahan mukhatab Bani Adam yani sabhi Insaan hain na ke sirf Musalman. Yani ye msg Hazrat Adam (as) se le kar khatme Nubuwwat tak ka hai. Kyonki guzishta daur mein Rasool wa Nabi aate rahe. Is Ayat se aisa koi matlab nahi nikalta ke purana Deen khatm aur naya Deen ayega. Jabke Qur'an mein wazeh taur par bayan kar diya hai (33:40):
*مَا كَانَ مُحَمَّدٌ أَبَا أَحَدٍ مِنْ رِجَالِكُمْ وَلَٰكِنْ رَسُولَ اللَّهِ وَخَاتَمَ النَّبِيِّينَ ۗ*
*"Muhammad (saww) Khatamun Nabiyyin hain."* Ahadis wa Riwayat to kaafi tadad mein hain:
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Aye Ali! Tumhari nisbat mujh se wohi hai jo Haroon ki nisbat Musa (as) se thi siwai iske *mere baad koi Nabi nahi hai."*_
_"Meri aur deegar Anbiya ki misal us shakhs ki hai jisne bahut achcha aur umda makan banaya ho lekin us mein ek Eint na mukammal chhod di ho to log uske charon taraf phir kar dekhenge aur tajjub se kahenge ke ye Eint kyon na lagayi."_
Iske baad Hazrat (saww) ne farmaya:
_*"Wo Akheri Eint mein hun aur Nabiyon ka Akheri hun."*_
(Hadise Manzelat: Sahih Bukhari wa Muslim, deegar Shia Kutub....)
(Tafseer e Namoona)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Allah Azz wa Jall ne *1,24,000 Nabi* khalq kiye ke Allah ke nazdeek unme sabse zyada Saheb e Ikram main hu'n aur (mujhe) koi fakhr nahi aur Allah Azz wa Jall ne *1,24,000 Wasi* khalq kiye ke unme Allah ke nazdeek Ali (as) sab se zyada Saheb e Ikram hai aur sab se afzal bhi."_
(Khisaal, p427)
🤲🏻
*.. اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ خَاتَمِ النَّبِيِّيْنَ وَ سَيِّدِ الْمُرْسَلِيْنَ وَ عَلٰى اَهْلِ بَيْتِهٖ الطَّيِّبِيْنَ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ...*
(Sahifa Sajjadiya Dua No. 17)

👉🏻 *Guzishta Tafseer:*
http://shiachannel.net78.net/tafseer-hinglish.html
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
         *18th Mahe Rajab 1440*
    *26th March 2019, Tuesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*AYAATE ILAHI KE MUNKIR*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1190)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ افْتَرَىٰ عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَوْ كَذَّبَ بِآيَاتِهِ ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ يَنَالُهُمْ نَصِيبُهُمْ مِنَ الْكِتَابِ ۖ حَتَّىٰ إِذَا جَاءَتْهُمْ رُسُلُنَا يَتَوَفَّوْنَهُمْ قَالُوا أَيْنَ مَا كُنْتُمْ تَدْعُونَ مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ ۖ قَالُوا ضَلُّوا عَنَّا وَشَهِدُوا عَلَىٰ أَنْفُسِهِمْ أَنَّهُمْ كَانُوا كَافِرِينَ*

_"Bhala isse badh kar aur Zalim kaun ho sakta hai jo jhooti baaten bana kar Allah ki taraf mansoob kare ya Allah ki Sachchi Ayaat ko jhutlaye? Aise log apni likhi hui Taqdeer ke mutabiq apna hissa paate rahenge yahan tak ke woh ghadi aa jayegi jab hamare bheje hue Farishte un se poochhenge ke batao ab tumhare wo Ma'bood kahan hain jinko tum Khuda ke bajaye pukarte the? Woh kahenge: "Sab hamse gum ho gaye." Aur woh khud apne khilaf Gawahi denge ke ham waqae Haq ke munkir the."_
(Surah A'raf: 38)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Aisa hota chala aaya hai aur ab bhi ho raha hai yani Sach ko Juthlaya jata hai. Kafir to sire se Allah ka inkar karta hai lekin bahut se Deendar log apne matlab ki baaten Khuda se mansoob kar dete hain. Nayi nayi kahaniya ghadh li jaati hain. Jabke har fitri insaan kahta hai ke Ma'bood Ek hai, lekin Uske saath kitne Khudaon ko mansoob kar diya jata hai. Misal ke taur par Christianity mein Khuda Ek hai (God, Holy Spirit, Jesus), Hinduism mein Bhagwan Ek hai lekin Trimurty hai aur 365 Devi Devta hain etc. Musalmano mein Ek Allah ke Numayinde ko chhoda to 73 firqe ho gaye. Ab har ek ka Imam alag alag hain. Ye sab Haq ko jhutlane ka natija hai. Mushkil ye hai ke kisi ko Akherat ki fikr nahi hai. Agar Akherat ki woh sochta to Haq ki talaash mein lag jaata. Kahawat mashhoor hai dhoondne se to Khuda bhi mil jaata hai. Warna Akherat mein jab usse sawal hoga kahan hai tere Ma'bood, kahan hai tere Rahbar. Tab usko haqeeqat nazar aayegi to uske sab Ma'bood wa Rahbar gul nazar aayenge siwai Haq ke. Uske Duniya ke karnaame ki Kitab khol kar dikha di jayegi. Is Kitab mein likha hoga ke Allah ne kitni Ne'maten Bande ko ata ki aur Bande ne unka kis tarah shukr ada kiya. Agli Ayat mein in logon ka Faisla sunaya gaya hai ke Hukm hoga chalo Jahannum mein dakhil ho jao.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Ali (as):
_"Khush-haal hai wo shakhs jisne apni tamannao'n ko jhutla diya aur Akherat banaane ke liye apni Duniya kharaab kar li."_
(Tajalliyat e Hikmat)
🔰
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Khuda ne Ali (as) ko Apne aur Apni makhlooq ke darmiyan alaamat (Ayat - Nishani) banaya hai. Pus, jisne unki Ma'arefat hasil ki wo Momin hai aur jisne inkar kiya wo Kaafir hai aur jo unse jaahil raha wo gumrah hai aur jisne unke saath kisi shai ko qayem kiya wo Mushrik hai. Jisne unki Wilayat ka iqraar kiya wo daakhil e Jannat hua aur jisne unse adawat ki woh waasil e Jahannum hua."_
(Al Kaafi, v4, p360)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Aye mere Aaqa! Tere Ehsaan aur Bhalaai se mujhe jo guman hai usko na jhutlana kyunki Tu hi meri jaa e e'temaad hai aur mujhe Apni taraf ke Sawab se mehroom na farma ke Tu meri mohtaji se waaqif hai. Mere Allah!
