Agar meri maut qareeb aa gayi hai aur mere amal ne mujhe Tere nazdeek nahi kiya, to main apne gunaho'n ke iqraar ko Tere huzoor apne gunaho'n ka bahana qaraar deta hun."_
(Dua e Abu Hamza Shimali)

👉🏻 *Guzishta Tafseer:*
http://shiachannel.net78.net/tafseer-hinglish.html
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

          *19th Mahe Rajab 1440*

     *27th March 2019, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

     ♦ _*GHAASIB RAHNUMA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1191)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قَالَ ادْخُلُوا فِي أُمَمٍ قَدْ خَلَتْ مِنْ قَبْلِكُمْ مِنَ الْجِنِّ وَالْإِنْسِ فِي النَّارِ ۖ كُلَّمَا دَخَلَتْ أُمَّةٌ لَعَنَتْ أُخْتَهَا ۖ حَتَّىٰ إِذَا ادَّارَكُوا فِيهَا جَمِيعًا قَالَتْ أُخْرَاهُمْ لِأُولَاهُمْ رَبَّنَا هَٰؤُلَاءِ أَضَلُّونَا فَآتِهِمْ عَذَابًا ضِعْفًا مِنَ النَّارِ ۖ قَالَ لِكُلٍّ ضِعْفٌ وَلَٰكِنْ لَا تَعْلَمُونَ. وَقَالَتْ أُولَاهُمْ لِأُخْرَاهُمْ فَمَا كَانَ لَكُمْ عَلَيْنَا مِنْ فَضْلٍ فَذُوقُوا الْعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَكْسِبُونَ.*

_"Allah farmayega jao tum bhi usi Dozakh mein chale jao jis mein tum pahle guzre hue Jin o Ins ke giroh ja chuke hain. Har giroh jab Dozakh mein jayega to apne peshro giroh (earlier groups) par La'anat karta hua dakhil hoga aur jab sab ke sab wahan jama ho jayenge to har baad wala giroh pahle giroh ke mutalliq kahega ke: 'Aye hamare Parwardigar! In logon ne hame gumrah kiya tha, inhe Aag ka double Azaab de.' Khuda farmayega: 'Har ek ke liye double Azaab hai magar tum nahi jaante. Pahla giroh doosre se kahega ke tumhe ham par kaun se fazilat hasil thi. Ab apni kamai ke natije mein Azaab ka zayqa chakho."_

(Surah A'raf: 38 - 39)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadia (as):

_"Gumrah karne walon se murad Aimma e Jaur (Tyrant Imams) hain."_

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

Is Ayat mein saf zahir hai ke jinhone ne Rahbaran e Haq ko chhod kar Zalim o Ghasib Aimma ki pairavi ki unka Qayamat ke Din ye hashr hoga. Yehi zikr Ayat (2:166-167) mein bhi ho chuka hai. Khud unke pairokar unke Zalim o Ghasib Rahnumaon par La'anat o malamat karenge. (Tabarrah karenge, ek doosre ko bura bhala benge). Isliye woh log demand karenge ke inko double saza honi chahiye kyonki inhone unko gumrah kiya lekin us Din unki koi sunwayi nahi hogi balke dono ko double Azaab milega. Ek ko isliye ke unki pairavi kyonki. Unka unko support mila to woh leader bane. Allah abhi se hame agah kar raha hai ke khabardar ho jao us Din aisa hoga. Ahle Bait (as) ka Raasta chhod kar kisi pairavi hogi to Raja parja ka ye haal hoga ke dono jhagdenge.

Ziyarat e Waresa mein teeno par La'anat ki gayi hai, Qatil, Zalim aur jo unke amal par Raazi raha.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Jis ne Ilm ko is liye haasil kiya ke wo Ulama ki majalis mein fakhr karen ya Jaahilon se bahes karen ya is garaz se ke log uski taraf tawajjoh karen to aise shakhs ka thikana Jahannum hai. Riyasat (leadership / rehbari) ka sazawar / qaabil (worthy / deserving) nahi magar Ilm wala."_

(Al Kaafi, v1, p99)

🤲🏻

*فَلَعَنَ ٱللَّهُ امَّةً قَتَلَتْكَ وَلَعَنَ ٱللَّهُ امَّةً ظَلَمَتْكَ وَلَعَنَ ٱللَّهُ امَّةً سَمِعَتْ بِذٰلِكَ فَرَضِيَتْ بِهِ*

_"Allah ki La'anat ho us Ummat par jisne Aapko (Imam Husain as) qatl kiya, Zulm kiya aur sun kar bhi us par Raazi raha."_

(Ziyarat e Waresa)

👉🏻 *Guzishta Tafseer:*

http://shiachannel.net78.net/tafseer-hinglish.html

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL CELEBRATE WILADAT OF JANABE SAKINA (sa)*

🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹

**********************************

       *20th Mahe Rajab 1440*

   *28th March 2019, Thursday*

💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐

_*Read the Biography of Janabe Sakina (sa), click:*_

http://www.duas.org/sakina.htm

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

 ♦ _*AASMAAN KE DARWAZE*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1192)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا وَاسْتَكْبَرُوا عَنْهَا لَا تُفَتَّحُ لَهُمْ أَبْوَابُ السَّمَاءِ وَلَا يَدْخُلُونَ الْجَنَّةَ حَتَّىٰ يَلِجَ الْجَمَلُ فِي سَمِّ الْخِيَاطِ ۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُجْرِمِينَ * لَهُمْ مِنْ جَهَنَّمَ مِهَادٌ وَمِنْ فَوْقِهِمْ غَوَاشٍ ۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الظَّالِمِينَ*

_"Yaqeenan woh log jinhone Hamari Ayat ko jhutlaya aur unke muqable mein Takabbur kiya to unke liye Aasmaan ke Darwaze nahi khole jayenge aur unka Jannat mein jana utna hi namumkin hai jitna Sui ke Naake se Oont ka guzarna aur Ham Mujrimon ko aisa hi Badla diya karte hain. Unke liye Jahannum ka Bichhauna hoga aur Jahannum ka hi Odhna hoga aur Ham Zalimon ko aisi hi Jaza diya karte hain."_

(Surah A'raf: 40 - 41)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Mohd Baqir (as) & Imam Sadiq (as) se Rivayat ke mutabiq "agarche ye Ayat tamam Mukazzebin ke liye hai magar Jang e Jamal ke muharrekin aur unka Oont khas taur par murad hai."

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim, Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

📚

_"Jesus looked at him [now sad] and said, “How hard it is for those who have wealth to enter the kingdom of God!"_

_"For it is easier for a camel to pass through the eye of a needle than for a rich person to enter the kingdom of God.”_

(Gospel Luke, Chapter 18, No. 24-25)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 🌨

 Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):

_"Aasmaan ke Darwaze 5 mauqe par khulte hain:_

_(1) Barish ke waqt (2) Jihad ke waqt (3) Azaan ke waqt (4) Jab Zawal e Aftaab ke waqt Qur'an padha jaye. (5) Tulu' e Fajr ke waqt."_

_"Aasmaanon ka Taala (Lock) Allah ke saath Shirk karna hai aur Aasmaanon ki Chaabi (Key) " La Ilaha illallah" hai."_

(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)

🌫☁

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Ahle Imaan ke Aamaal aur unki Arwah ko Asmaan ki taraf le jaya jata hai. Aasmaan ke Darwaze unke liye khol diye jate hain aur Kafir ke Aamal aur uski Rooh ko Farishte jab Asmaan ke paas le jate hain to us waqt Munadi nida de kar kahta hai ke ise 'Sijjeen' le jao aur woh 'Hazarmaut' ke ilaaqe mein ek wadi hai, ise 'Barhoot' bhi kaha jata hai."_

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*وَالْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِىْ اَغْلَقَ عَنَّا بَابَ الْحَاجَةِ اِلَّا اِلَيْهِ فَكَيْفَ نُطِيْقُ حَمْدَهٗ*

_"Sari Taarifen Us Allah ke liye Jisne Apne siwa Talab o Haajat ka har Darwaza hamare liye band kar diya to ham (is haajat o Ihtiyaaj ke hote hue) kaise Uski Hamd se Uhda e bara ho sakte hain.."_

(Sahifa Sajjadiya Dua No. 1)

👉🏻 *Guzishta Tafseer:*

http://shiachannel.net78.net/tafseer-hinglish.html

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

         *21st Mahe Rajab 1440*

       *29th March 2019, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*RAAHE HIDAYAT O VILAYAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1193)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَا نُكَلِّفُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا أُولَٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ الْجَنَّةِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَالِدُونَ * وَنَزَعْنَا مَا فِي صُدُورِهِمْ مِنْ غِلٍّ تَجْرِي مِنْ تَحْتِهِمُ الْأَنْهَارُ ۖ وَقَالُوا الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي هَدَانَا لِهَٰذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لِنَهْتَدِيَ لَوْلَا أَنْ هَدَانَا اللَّهُ ۖ لَقَدْ جَاءَتْ رُسُلُ رَبِّنَا بِالْحَقِّ ۖ وَنُودُوا أَنْ تِلْكُمُ الْجَنَّةُ أُورِثْتُمُوهَا بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ*

_"Woh log jo Imaan laye aur Nek Amal kiye Ham har ek ko uski wus'at (capability) se zyada takleef nahi dete, woh Ahle Jannat hain jahan woh hamesha rahenge."_

_"Unke Seeno mein ek doosre ke khilaf jo kadurat hogi use Ham nikal denge. Unke neeche Nehren bahti hongi aur woh kahenge:" Tamam Tareefen Us Khuda ke liye hain Jisne hame ye Raasta dikhaya. Agar Khuda Rahnumayi na karta to ham khud Raasta nahi paa sakte the. Hamare Rab ke bheje hue Rasool Haq le kar hi aaye the. Us waqt unhe Nida di jayegi: "Ye Jannat hai jiske tum Waris banaye gaye ho aur ye tumhe un Aamaal ke badle mein mili hai jo tum kiya karte the."_

(Surah A'raf: 42 - 43)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Hazrat Imam Jafar e Sadiq (as):

_"Jab Qayamat ka Din hoga to Nabi e Akram (saww), Ali e Murtaza (as) aur Aimma e Huda (as) ko Maidan e Hashr mein bulaya jayega. Woh Noor ke Manabir par logon ke saamne jalwa figan honge. Jab unke Shia unhe dekhenge to woh Khuda ki Hamd baja late hue ye kahenge._

*الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي هَدَانَا لِهَٰذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لِنَهْتَدِيَ لَوْلَا أَنْ هَدَانَا اللَّهُ*

_Unka maqsad ye hoga ke Khuda ne hame Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) aur Aimma e Husa (as) ki Vilayat ka Raasta dikhaya hai isiliye Woh Layeq e Hamd hai aur agar Allah hame unki Vilayat ki Raah na dikhata to ham az khud Raahe Vilayat ko nahi dekh sakte the."_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

Jab Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Maqam e Ghadeer mein Hazrat Ali (as) ka baazu pakad kar dikhaya to uske baad  Aapne Sahaba se farmaya ke ye kaho:

*الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي هَدَانَا لِهَٰذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لِنَهْتَدِيَ لَوْلَا أَنْ هَدَانَا اللَّهُ ۖ*

(Ehtejaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)

Hazrat Ali (as):

_"Jab Ahle Imaan Jannat mein dakhil honge to Khuda ki taraf se unhe Azeemush Shaan Mahallat diye jayenge jo Motiyon se bane honge unke liye behtareen Bistar honge aur Hazaron Ne'maat honge jinhe dekh kar unki Aankhen kheera ho jayengi. Woh Takhto par baith kar apni Azwaaj se gale milenge to us waqt woh Khuda ki Hamd baja layenge aur kahenge.. الحمد للہ الذی"_

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Jo Ali (as) se mohabbat rakhega, uspar sakraat e maut aasaan hogi aur uski qabr Jannat ke baagho'n mein se ek baagh hogi."_

(Shiane Ahlebait (as), p17)

🤲🏻

*انْتَ غَداً عَلَىٰ الْحَوْضِ خَلِيفَتِي وَانْتَ تَقْضِي دَيْنِي وَتُنْجِزُ عِدَاتِي وَشِيعَتُكَ عَلَىٰ مَنَابِرَ مِنْ نُورمُبْيَضَّةً وُجُوهُهُمْ حَوْلِي فِي ٱلْجَنَّةِ وَهُمْ جِيرَانِي وَلَوْلاَ انْتَ يَا عَلِيُّ لَمْ يُعْرَفِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ بَعْدِي.*

Rasoole Khuda:

_"Aur tum (Ali as) Hauze Kausar par mere Janashin honge aur tum mere Qarz ko ada karoge. Aur mere wade ko poora karoge. Aur tumhare Shia Noor ke Mimber par honge, unke Chehre Taabnak honge, woh mere girohe Jannat mein mere hamsaya honge.  Aur Aye Ali! Tum na hote to mere baad Mo'meneen ki shinakht kabhi na ho sakti.. "_

(Dua-e-Nudba)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹

*MARG-E-MOAVIYA MUBARAK*

🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁

*NAZR-E-IMAM SADIQ (as) MUBARAK*

🍪🥣🍪🥣🍪🥣🍪🥣🍪🥣

***********************************

                 *22th Rajab 1440*

        *30th March 2019, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

 ♦ _*MO'AZZIN: HAZRAT ALI (as)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1194)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَنَادَىٰ أَصْحَابُ الْجَنَّةِ أَصْحَابَ النَّارِ أَنْ قَدْ وَجَدْنَا مَا وَعَدَنَا رَبُّنَا حَقًّا فَهَلْ وَجَدْتُمْ مَا وَعَدَ رَبُّكُمْ حَقًّا ۖ قَالُوا نَعَمْ ۚ فَأَذَّنَ مُؤَذِّنٌ بَيْنَهُمْ أَنْ لَعْنَةُ اللَّهِ عَلَى الظَّالِمِينَ * الَّذِينَ يَصُدُّونَ عَنْ سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ وَيَبْغُونَهَا عِوَجًا وَهُمْ بِالْآخِرَةِ كَافِرُونَ*

_"Jannat ke Rihaishi Dozakh ke makeeno ko pukar kar kahenge: "Hamne un tamam Wa'don ko sachcha paya jo hamare Rab ne hamse kiye the to kya tumne apne Rab ke Wa'don ko sachcha paya hai?" Woh kahenge 'Ji haan.' Tab ek Pukarne wala unke darmiyan pukar kar kahega: "In Zalimon par Khuda ki La'anat ho jo Allah ke Raaste se logon ko rokte the aur use tedha (crooked) karna chahte the aur Akherat ke Munkir the."_

(Surah Al-A'raf: 44 - 45)

📚📖 🕌

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Musa Kazim (as) se sawal kiya gaya ke Mo'azzin (Pukarne wala) kaun hoga?

Aap (as) ne farmaya:

_"Mo'azzin Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) honge."_

Hazrat Ali (as) ne farmaya ke woh Mo'azzin mein honga.

_"Agah raho Allah ne Qur'an mein mujhe kuchh Naamon se yaad kiya hai un Naamon par qabza na karna warna Deen mein gumrah ho jaoge. Duniya wa Akherat mein mein hi Mo'azzin hun. (7:44) Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya: *وَأَذَانٌ مِنَ اللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ إِلَى النَّاسِ* (Tauba: 3) wo Azaan bhi mein hi hun."_

(Usoole Kaafi, Majmaul Bayan, Kitab Ma'anil Akhbar, Sunni Book of Abul Qasim Haskani)

🕌

Imam Musa Kazim (as):

_"Mo'azzin Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) honge aur woh aisi Azaan denge jise saari Makhlooq sunegi."_

(Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Jis waqt Ahle Jannat Jannat ki Ne'mato'n se faizyaab ho rahe honge aur Ahle Jahannum Azaab e Jahannum mein mubtela honge to yakayak Ahle Jannat dekhenge ke ek taraf se ek Noor saate' hua. Us waqt ye log ek doosre se kahenge ke "Ye Noor kaisa hai? Shayad Allah ne hamari taraf nigah e Rehmat farmayi hai."  To Rizwan e Jannat jawab dega, "Nahin, ye baat nahi hai, balke Hazrat Ali (as) ne Janabe Fatima Zahra (sa) se mizahan koi baat kahi hai aur Aap muskurayi hain. Ye Noor Aap hi ke Mubarak daanto'n se saate (prakat/ manifest) hua hai."_

(Bihaar ul Anwaar, v3, p44)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلٰى اِبْنَتِهِ وَعَلٰى اِبْنَيْهَا وَاَسْئَلُكَ بِهِمْ اَنْ تُعِيْنَنِىْ عَلٰى طَاعَتِكَ وَرِضْوَانِكَ وَاَنْ تُبَلِّغَنِىْ بِهِمْ اَفْضَلَ مَا بَلَّغْتَ اَحَدًا مِنْ اَوْلِيَاۤئِكَ اِنَّكَ جَوَادٌ كَرِيْمٌ.*

_"Parwardigar Rehmat nazil farma Hazrat Muhammad (saww) aur unki Dukhtar aur unke dono Farzandon par. Mein unke waseele se Dua karta hun ke apni Ita'at aur apni Marzi ke husool mein meri madad farma aur mujhe azeem manzil tak pahuncha de jahan Tu ne Apni kisi Wali ko pahunchaya hai, isliye ka Tu hi Jawad bhi hai aur Kareem bhi hai."_

(Second Dua e Tawassul)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

       *23rd Mahe Rajab 1440*

    *31st March 2019, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

     ♦ _*MOMIN KI PAHCHAN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1195)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَبَيْنَهُمَا حِجَابٌ ۚ وَعَلَى الْأَعْرَافِ رِجَالٌ يَعْرِفُونَ كُلًّا بِسِيمَاهُمْ ۚ وَنَادَوْا أَصْحَابَ الْجَنَّةِ أَنْ سَلَامٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۚ لَمْ يَدْخُلُوهَا وَهُمْ يَطْمَعُونَ*

_"In do Groups ke darmiyan ek aadh (Partition) hogi aur A'raf (Bulandiyon) par kuchh aur log honge jo har ek ko uski Alamat (Sign) se pahchanenge aur Jannat walon se pukar kar kahenge : "Salamum Alaikum" (Tum par salamti ho). Ye log Jannat mein dakhil to nahi hue magar iske ummeedwar honge."_

(Surah A'raf: 46)

📚📖 🚩

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Har Ummat ka Hisaab uska Imam e Zamana karega aur Aimma apne Doston aur Dushmanon ko unke Alamaat se pahchanenge jaisake Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya hai: (7:46). Chunanche Aimma apne Doston ko unke Nama e Aamaal dayen Haath mein denge aur woh kisi Hisaab ke baghair Jannat mein chale jayenge aur Aimma apne Dushmanon ko unka Nama e Aamaal bayen Haath mein denge unhe bhi kisi Hisaab ke baghair Jahannum mein bhej diya jayega."_

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

🚩

Khutba Hazrat Ali (as):

_"A'raf wale ham hain, A'raf par mein, mere chacha Hamza, mere bhai Jafar Tayyar aur mere ibne Am (Cousin) Hazrat Rasool Khuda (saww) honge. Us Khuda ki Qasam! Jisne dane aur guthli ko shigafta kiya (splited) hai. Hamara koi Muhib Dozakh mein nahi jayega aur hamara koi Dushman Jannat mein nahi jayega kyonki Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya (7:46)"_

(Ma'anil Akhbar, Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🚩

Imam Mohd Baqir (as) ne is Ayat ke zel mein farmaya:

_"Kiya tum nahi jaante ke hukumat ne har Qabile ka ek "Areef - *عريف*" (Nambardar waghaira) muqarrar kiya hua hota hai aur woh Areef apne Qabile ke har Nek o Bad ko pahchanta hai?_

_Bas yehi samajh lo ke woh A'raf wale "Areef" ham hain aur ham har shakhs ki Alamat se unhe pahchanenge."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Imam Sadiq (as)

se Mufazzal ne sawaal kiya ke Akherat mein Najaat paane waalo'n ko kis tarah pahchana jaye? Yaani unki nishaniya'n kya hai? Imam (as) ne jawaab diya:

_"Jis shakhs ke Qaul aur Fe'l (kehne aur karne mein) yaksaaniyat (sameness / samaanta) dikhayi de to uski Najaat ki gawahi de do. Jis shakhs ka qaul (baatein) uske Amal ka mukhalif ho to mutazalzal (insecure / asurakshit) hai."_

(Adaab e Islami, v2, p64)

🔰

Imam Baqir (as):

_" Aye Jabir! Khuda ki qasam! Hazrat Zahra (sa) us din (Qayamat ke din) us chidiya ki tarah jo achche daano'n ko kharab daano'n se alag karti hai aur achche daano'n se chun leti hai, isi tarah apne Shiyo'n aur Dosto'n ko pahchanengi aur alag karengi…"_

(Maarefat e Zahra (sa), p70)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ...... وَ اَسْاَلُكَ الْاَمَانَ يَوْمَ يَعَضُّ الظَّالِمُ عَلٰى يَدَيْهِ يَقُوْلُ يَا لَيْتَنِيْ اتَّخَذْتُ مَعَ الرَّسُوْلِ سَبِيْلًا وَ اَسْاَلُكَ الْاَمَانَ يَوْمَ يُعْرَفُ الْمُجْرِمُوْنَ بِسِيْمَاهُمْ فَيُؤْخَذُ بِالنَّوَاصِيْ وَ الْاَقْدَامِ.*

_"Parwardigar! Mein is Roz Panah chahta hun jab Zalim apne hathon ko chabate hue kahega: Hay afsos ke mein ne Rasool (saww) ka Raasta ikhtiyar kya hota. Mein us Roz Teri panah chahta hun jab Gunahgar apne Cheharon se pehchane jayenge aur unko Sar aur Pairon ki taraf se pakda jayega.."_

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

       *24th Mahe Rajab 1440*

      *1st April 2019, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*ALI (as): QASEEMUL JANNAH WAN NAAR*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1196)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَبَيْنَهُمَا حِجَابٌ ۚ وَعَلَى الْأَعْرَافِ رِجَالٌ يَعْرِفُونَ كُلًّا بِسِيمَاهُمْ ۚ وَنَادَوْا أَصْحَابَ الْجَنَّةِ أَنْ سَلَامٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۚ لَمْ يَدْخُلُوهَا وَهُمْ يَطْمَعُونَ*

_"In do Groups ke darmiyan ek aadh (Partition) hogi aur A'raf (Bulandiyon) par kuchh aur log honge jo har ek ko uski Alamat (Sign) se pahchanenge aur Jannat walon se pukar kar kahenge : "Salamum Alaikum" (Tum par salamti ho). Ye log Jannat mein dakhil to nahi hue magar iske ummeedwar honge."_

(Surah A'raf: 46)

📚📖 🚩

👉 _*Tafseer:*_ (Cont'd....)

Rasoole Khuda (saww):

_"Aye Ali (as) tum aur tumhare baad wale Ausiya Jannat o Dozakh ke darmiyan A'raf ka Maqam rakhte, Jannat mein wohi jayega jo tumhe pahchanta hoga aur jise tum pahchante hoge aur Dozakh mein wohi jayega jo tumhara Na-waqif hoga aur tum usse Na-waqif hoge."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🚩

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"A'raf" Jannat o Dozakh ke darmiyan ek buland Teela hoga aur us par Aimma (as) apne Shiyo'n ke saath khade honge. Kuchh Momin unse pahle Jannat mein jaa chuke honge, us waqt Aimma (as) apne Gunahgar Shiyo'n se farmayenge:  "Apne bhaiyon ko dekho ye tum se pahle Jannat mein ja chuke hain aur isi baat ko Allah Ta'ala ne in Kalemat se bayan kiya hai:_

*وَنَادَوْا أَصْحَابَ الْجَنَّةِ أَنْ سَلَامٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۚ لَمْ يَدْخُلُوهَا وَهُمْ يَطْمَعُونَ*

_Yani woh Gunahgar Shiya Jannat mein jaane wale Mo'meneen se kahenge: "Salamum Alaikum" abhi woh Jannat mein dakhil nahi hue honge albatta Jannat ke mutamanni honge."_

_"Phir unse kaha jayega ke apne Dushmanon ko dekho jo Dozakh mein jal rahe hain (7:47)_

_Phir jab A'raf par khade hue Buzurg unko Dozakh mein dekhenge jinhe woh unki Alamat se pahchante honge to unse kahenge, (7:48)"_

_"Phir Aimma Huda (as) apne Jannati Shiyo'n ki taraf ishara karke Dozakh mein jakne wale apne Dushmanon se kahenge:_

_'Kiya ye wohi log nahi hain jinke mutalliq tum Qasmen kha kar kahte the ke Allah Apni Rehmat mein se unhe kuchh hissa na dega."_ (7:49)

 Iske baad Aimma (as) apne Shiyo'n se kahenge: "Tum Jannat mein chale jao tum par koi khauf aur ranj na hoga."_

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

🚩

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Ham woh A'raf hain jinki Ma'arefat ke baghair Khuda ki Ma'arefat namumkin hai aur ham woh A'raf hain ke Jannat mein janewala hamr pahchanta hoga aur ham use pahchante honge aur Dosakh mein janewala Nawaqif hoga aur ham usse Nawaqif honge. Agar Khuda chahta to logon ko apni Ma'arefat kara sakta tha lekin Usne hame apni Ma'arefat ka sabab banaya aur Usne hamen Apna Raasta banaya aur Usne hame Apne tak aane ka Darwaza banaya."_

(Noorus Saqlain

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 ⚖

 Imam Sadiq (as):

_" Gareeb Mo'meneen Maldaar Momeneen se 40 saal pehle Jannat mein daakhil hokar uska mazaa lete honge."_

(Bihaar ul Anwaar, v72, Rizq - Haji Naji)

🔰⚖

 Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Qayamat ke din Khuda Aalim aur Aabid (dono) ko uthayega. Jab dono Khuda ke saamne khade honge to Aabid se kaha jayega Tu Jannat mein jaa', aur Aalim se kaha jayega, 'Tum thehro. Logo'n ko behtareen adab sikhaane ki wajah se unki Shafa'at karo.'_

(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen, p161)

🤲🏻

*... فَقَبِلْتَھُمْ وَ قَرَّبْتَھُمْ وَ قَدَّمْتَ لَھُمُ الذِّكْرَ الْعَلِیَّ وَ الثَّنَاۤءَالْجَلِیَّ وَ اَھْبَطْتَ عَلَیْھِمْ مَلٰۤئِكَتِكَ وَ كَرَّمْتَھُمْ بِوَحْیِكَ وَ رَفَدْتَھُمْ بِعِلْمِكَ وَ جَعَلْتَھُمُ الذَّرِیْعَۃَ اِلَیْكَ وَالْوَسِیْلَۃَ اِلٰی رِضْوَانِكَ فَبَعْضٌ اَسْكَنْتَهٗ جَنَّتَكَ اِلٰیۤ اَنْ اَخْرَجْتَهٗ مِنْھَا وَ بَعْضٌ حَمَلْتَهٗ فِیْ فُلْكِكَ وَ نَجَّیْتَهٗ وَ مَنْ اٰمَنَ مَعَهٗ مِنَ الْھَلَكَۃِ بِرَحْمَتِكَ وَ بَعْضٌ اِتَّخَذْتَهٗ لِنَفْسِكَ خَلِیْلًا...*

(Dua-e-Nudba)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL COMMEORATE SHAHADAT OF IMAM KAZIM (as)*

✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿❀✿✿❀

**********************************

          *25th Mahe Rajab 1440*

        *2nd April 2019, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

             ♦ _*AHLE A'RAF*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1197)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذَا صُرِفَتْ أَبْصَارُهُمْ تِلْقَاءَ أَصْحَابِ النَّارِ قَالُوا رَبَّنَا لَا تَجْعَلْنَا مَعَ الْقَوْمِ الظَّالِمِينَ * وَنَادَىٰ أَصْحَابُ الْأَعْرَافِ رِجَالًا يَعْرِفُونَهُمْ بِسِيمَاهُمْ قَالُوا مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنْكُمْ جَمْعُكُمْ وَمَا كُنْتُمْ تَسْتَكْبِرُونَ*

_"Jab unki nigahen Ahle Dozakh ki janib phirengi to kahenge: "Aye hamare Parwardigar! Hamen Zalim logon ke saath shamil na karna. Phir A'raf wale un Ahle Dozakh se kahenge jinhe woh unki Alamaton se pahchanenge ke Aaj tumhare jatthe tumhare kisi kaam na aaye aur na hi woh saz o samaan tumhare kisi kaam aaya jinko tum badi cheez samajhte the."_

(Surah A'raf: 47 - 48)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Logon ko 6 groups hain aur agar unhe samet diya jaye to 3 groups bante hain aur firqe ye hain: (1) Ahle Imaan (2) Ahle Kufr (3) Ahle Zalalat. Allah ne Ahle Imaan se Jannat aur Ahle Kufr se Dozakh ka waada kiya hai iske alawa Teesra group Mustaz'afeen aur un logon ka hai jo Khuda ki Rehmat ke ummeedwar hain. Khuda chaahe to unhe Azaab de chaahe to unki Tauba Qubool kare aur ye woh log hain jinhone apne Nek Aamaal ke saath bure Aamaal ko makhkloot kiya hai aur yehi Ahle A'raf hain."_

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

🔰

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jab Qayamat ka Din hoga to Sabz o Safed Yaqoot ke Saat Noorani Qubbe nasb kiye jayenge. Har Qubbe mein Zamane ka Imam tashreef farma hoga. Saheb  e Qubba ki shaan o shaukat dekh kar Nek o Bad afraad kisi takhsees ke baghair uske gird jama ho jayenge yahan tak ke Jannat ke Darwaze par jaa kar ruk jayenge. Us waqt Qubbe mein baitha hua Imam us Qubbe se bahar ayega aur apne Doston, Dushmanon ko alag alag karega aur Dushmanon se kahega: "Zara dekho! Kya ye wohi log nahi hain jinke mutalliq tum Qasmen khaa kar kaha karte the ke Khuda un par Rehmat nahi karega."_

_"Phir Sahebe Qubba apne manne walon se kahega: "Jannat mein chale jao, aaj tum par koi Khauf aur Ranj nahi hoga." Jab Zalim ye manzar dekhenge to unke chehre kaale siyah ho jayenge. Jab doosra Qubba ke gird khade hue afraad dekhenge ke Jannat mein jaane walon ki tadad kam hai aur Dozakh jaane walon ki tadad zyada hai to woh ghabra jayenge ke kahin woh Jannat mein dakhil hone se mehroom na ho jayen jaisa ke Quran mein hai: "... Magar unhe Jannat ki tamanna hogi."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

_*Imam Musa Kazim (as):*_

_"Nek Aamaal ko kabhi bhi zyada na samjho aur kam Gunaho'n ko bhi kam na samjho kyunki kam Gunah bhi jama ho kar zyada ban jaate hain."_

(Amaali - Shaikh Mufeed)

🤲🏻

*يَا مَنْ فِي الْجَنَّةِ ثَوَابُهُ، يَا مَنْ فِي النَّارِ عِقَابُهُ*

_"Aye Woh Jiska Jannat mein Sawab hai aur Jahannum Azaab hai."_

(Dua e Joshan Kabir No. 42)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL COMMEORATE WAFAT OF JANABE ABU TALIB (as)*

**********************************

          *26th Mahe Rajab 1440*

     *3rd April 2019, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

         ♦ _*AHLE MEHSHAR*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1198)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*أَهَٰؤُلَاءِ الَّذِينَ أَقْسَمْتُمْ لَا يَنَالُهُمُ اللَّهُ بِرَحْمَةٍ ۚ ادْخُلُوا الْجَنَّةَ لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْكُمْ وَلَا أَنْتُمْ تَحْزَنُونَ * وَنَادَىٰ أَصْحَابُ النَّارِ أَصْحَابَ الْجَنَّةِ أَنْ أَفِيضُوا عَلَيْنَا مِنَ الْمَاءِ أَوْ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ اللَّهُ ۚ قَالُوا إِنَّ اللَّهَ حَرَّمَهُمَا عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ*

_"Kya ye Ahle Jannat wohi log nahi hain jinke mutalliq tum Qasmen khaa kar kahte the ke Khuda inhe Apni Rehmat mein se kuchh hissa na dega? Aaj unhi se kaha gaya hai ke tum Jannat mein chale jao tum par koi Khauf aur Ranj na hoga."_

_"Ahle Dozakh Ahle Jannat ko pukar kar kahenge ke ham par thoda sa Paani dal do ya jo Rizq Allah ne tumhe diya hai us mein se kuchh hamari taraf phenk do. Woh jawab mein kahenge ke Allah ne ye dono cheezen Kafiron par Haraam ki hain."_

(Surah A'raf: 49 - 50)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Khalifa Hisham ne apne Ghulam ke zariye sawal kiya ke Qayamat ke Din Faisla hone tak Ahle Mehshar kya khayen piyenge?

Imam Baqir (as) ne farmaya:

_"Qayamat ke Maidan Safed Maide ki Roti ki tarah se bilkul Safed hoga, wahan Nehren bah rahi hongi, Hisaab khatm hone tak log wahan khaate peete rahenge."_

Phir Khalifa ne Sawal kiya: 'Qayamat ke Din to bada sakht hoga, us Din logon ko khaane peene ka hosh hi kahan hoga?'

Imam (as) ne farmaya:

_"Roze Mahshar zyada sakht hoga ya Dozakh mein jalna zyada sakht hoga? Quran Majeed mein hai (7:50) Ahle Jahannum wale Ahle Jannat se maangenge.  Jab Jahannam mein ja kar bhi logon ko khaane peene ka hosh baqi rahta hai to Qayamat ke Din unhe Khana Peena kaise bhool sakta hai?"_

(Ehtejaj Tabarsi, Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Imam Sadiq (as):

_Hazrat Musa bin Imran (as) ne apne Rab se jo Munajaten ki un mein ye bhi kaha hai ke, “Parwardigar, kisi Mareez ki Ayadat (mulaqat) ka Ajr o Sawaab kis hadd tak hai?” To Allah Ta’ala ne irshad farmaya, “Main ek Farishte to uske liye muqarrar kar dunga jo Mahshar tak uski Ayadat karta rahega.” Hazrat Musa (as) ne arz kiya, “Parwardigar, aur jo shakhs Mayyat ko Ghusl de uske liye kya hai?” Allah Ta’ala ne farmaya, “Main usko Ghusl dekar uske gunahon se is tarah Paak karunga ke jis tarah wo apni Maa ke Pet se paida hone ke din Paak tha.”_

(Man La Yahzarahul Faqih, v1, p104)

🤲🏻

_"Khudaya! Mein un tamam Arwah o Ajsaam ko Tere hawale karta hun taake Tu unhe Roz e Tashnagi (Day of Thirst) e Mahshar Hauz e Kausar se seraab kar de.."_

(Ziyarat e Imam Husain (as) - Mafateehul Jinan)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

*AGHAZE SAFAR E KARBALA*

🐪🚩🐪🚩🐪🚩🐪🚩🐪🚩

**********************************

        *28th Mahe Rajab 1440*

         *5th April 2019, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

            ♦ _*YAZEED (LA)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1199)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*الَّذِينَ اتَّخَذُوا دِينَهُمْ لَهْوًا وَلَعِبًا وَغَرَّتْهُمُ الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا ۚ فَالْيَوْمَ نَنْسَاهُمْ كَمَا نَسُوا لِقَاءَ يَوْمِهِمْ هَٰذَا وَمَا كَانُوا بِآيَاتِنَا يَجْحَدُونَ)*

_"Jinhone apne Deen ko Khel o Tafreeh bana liya tha aur jinhe Duniyavi Zindagi ne fareb mein mubtela rakha tha. Allah farmayega ke Aaj Ham bhi inhe usi tarah se bhula denge jis tarah se woh us Din ki mulaqat ko bhoole hue the aur hamari Ayaat ka inkaar kiya karte the."_

(Surah A'raf: 51)

----------------------------------------------

_*EVENT OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚📖 👹

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Aaj ka Din wo hai jis Din Imam Husain (as) aur unke Aziz o Ashaab ne Safar e Karbala shuru kiya. Imam Husain (as) kaun! Nawasa e Rasool (saww). Aap (as) ne Yazid Paleed bin Moaviya ki mukhalifat ki aur ye Muqaddasat e Ismat o Taharat Yazeed e Najis ke muqable ke liye nikle.

Yazeed ne waqae Karbala ke baad Deen ka khule aam mazaq udaya aur Darbare e Shaam mein yehi kaha tha, _"Mohammad (saww) (Nauzobillah) ke paas na koi Deen tha, na koi Wahy nazil hui, ye to bas Bani Hashim ka khel tha."_

Yazeed ke ye jumle uske ajdad ki tarbiyat ka natija tha. Bachcha wohi kahta hai jo uske ghar mein bola jata hai. Isliye Yazeed ke ye jumle uske ajdaad ki akkasi karte hai.

"Yazid is Duniya mein poori tarah se garq tha. Us mein Duniya ki har burai bhari hui thi. Sharabi tha, Chikne chehre wale ladke uske khadim the, Music ka diwana tha, Kutton se khelta, bewda tha. Taarikus Salat tha, Darbar mein Singers maujood the, Shatranj ka khiladi tha."

(Tareekh al Kamil Vol 3 P-450 Ibn Atheer &

1. Tabaqath al Kabeera Volume 5 page 66 Dhikr Abdullah bin Hanzala and

Volume 4 page 283

2. Tareekh ul Khulafa page 209 Dhikr Yazeed

3. Sawqih al Muhriqa page 132 Dhikr Yazeed

4. Mustadrak al Hakim Volume page 522

5. Al Isaba Volume 3 page 469

6. Ya Nabi al Mawaddath page 326

7. Tareekh Ibn Asakir Vol 7 page 275

8. Fatawi Abdul Hai page 79

9. Tareekh al Islam Volume 2 page 356

10. Al Masalaik Sharh Muwatta Imam Malik page 435)

Phir bhi kuchh Musalman uske liye safaiyyan pesh karte hain, kahte hain usko bura na kaho ho sakta hai Allah Ma'af kar de.

Yehi Yazid is Ayat (7:51) ka misdaq hai. Kya aise shakhs ko Allah Ma'af kar sakta hai. Qayamat ke Din Allah usko chhod dega jaise usne Allah ke Deen ko chhoda.

🔰

Imam Ali Reza (as) wa Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) se Rivayaat hain ke is Ayaat mein 'Nisyaan - نسيان' se murad ye hai ke Allah unho chhod dega. Kyonki Bhoolna Allah ki Sifat nahi hai.

(Uyoonul Akhbar, Kitabut Tauheed, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*.. وَ سَوَّلَتْ لِيْ نَفْسِيْ، وَ غَلَبَنِيْ هَوَايَ، وَ اَعَانَنِيْ عَلَيْهَا شِقْوَتِيْ، وَ غَرَّنِيْ سِتْرُكَ الْمُرْخٰى عَلَيَّ، فَقَدْ عَصَيْتُكَ وَ خَالَفْتُكَ بِجُهْدِيْ،..*

_"Parwardigar! Meine jab bhi Gunah kiya, to mein Teri Khudayi ka Munkir nahi tha...... Balke surate haal ye thi ke Gunah saamne aaya aur Nafs ne use araasta kar diya, Khwaheshat ne ghalba paa liya aur bad bakhti ne saath de diya... "_

(Dua Abu Hamza Sumali)

*وَخَدَعَتْنِي الدُّنْيَا بِغُرُورِهَا وَنَفْسِي بِجِنَايَتِهَا وَمِطَاِلي*

_"..Duniya ne dhoke mein mubtila rakha hai aur Nafs ne khayanat aur tal matol mein mubtila rakha..."_

(Dua-e-Kumail)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

       *29th Mahe Rajab 1440*

     *6th April 2019, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*ANJAAM ZAHOOR E FARAJ MEIN HAI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1200)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَقَدْ جِئْنَاهُمْ بِكِتَابٍ فَصَّلْنَاهُ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍ هُدًى وَرَحْمَةً لِقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ * هَلْ يَنْظُرُونَ إِلَّا تَأْوِيلَهُ ۚ يَوْمَ يَأْتِي تَأْوِيلُهُ يَقُولُ الَّذِينَ نَسُوهُ مِنْ قَبْلُ قَدْ جَاءَتْ رُسُلُ رَبِّنَا بِالْحَقِّ فَهَلْ لَنَا مِنْ شُفَعَاءَ فَيَشْفَعُوا لَنَا أَوْ نُرَدُّ فَنَعْمَلَ غَيْرَ الَّذِي كُنَّا نَعْمَلُ ۚ قَدْ خَسِرُوا أَنْفُسَهُمْ وَضَلَّ عَنْهُمْ مَا كَانُوا يَفْتَرُونَ*

_"Ham in logon ke paas aisi Kitaben le aaye hain jisko Hamne Ilm ki bena par mufassal banaya hai aur jo Imaan laane walon ke liye Hidayat aur Rehmat hai."_

_" *Ab kya ye log sirf is baat ke Muntazir hain ke woh Anjaam saamne aa jaye jiski ye Kitab khabar de rahi hai?* Jis Din woh Anjaam saamne aa gaya to wohi log jinhone pahle use nazar andaz kiya hoga kahenge ke waqai hamare Rab ke Rasool Haq le kar aaye the. Phir kya ab hamen koi Shifarish milengi jo hamare haq mein Shifarish karen? Ya phir hamen dobara wapas hi bhej diya jaye taake jo kuchh ham pahle kiya karte the iske bajaye ab doosra tareeqe par kaam karke dikhayenge. Unhone apne aap ko khasare mein dal diya aur un se woh tamam jhoot gum ho jayenge jo unhone ikhtara (bana) kar rakhe the."_

(Surah A'raf: 52 - 53)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi mein mazkoor hai ke ye Ayat un Ayaat mein se hai jinki Tanzeel zahir ho chuki hai aur abhi tak inki Taveel aa Baqi hai. Iski Taveel Qaem e Aale Muhammad (atfs) ke Zahoor ke waqt manzar e aam par aayegi.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Ali (as):

_"Gazab (gusse) se parhez karo kyun ki iska aghaaz (shuru'at) Junoon hai aur iska anjaam sharmindagi hai."_

(Tajalliyat e Hikmat, Gazab)

👀

Imam Ali (as):

_"Jab Aankhein Nafs ki pasandida cheezein dekhne lagein to Dil Anjaam se Andha ho jaata hai." _

(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p193)

🤲🏻

_"... Aye Faryaad Ras, Aye Izzat o Zillat ke Malik, Aye Aghaaz o Anjaam ke Sahibe Ikhtiyar."_

(Due Joshan e Kabir No. 73)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL CELEBRATE WILADAT OF JANABE ZAINAB (sa)*

🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹

**********************************

          *1st Shaban 1440*

     *7th April 2019, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

      ♦ _*KHILQAT E AALAM*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1201)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِنَّ رَبَّكُمُ اللَّهُ الَّذِي خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ ثُمَّ اسْتَوَىٰ عَلَى الْعَرْشِ يُغْشِي اللَّيْلَ النَّهَارَ يَطْلُبُهُ حَثِيثًا وَالشَّمْسَ وَالْقَمَرَ وَالنُّجُومَ مُسَخَّرَاتٍ بِأَمْرِهِ ۗ أَلَا لَهُ الْخَلْقُ وَالْأَمْرُ ۗ تَبَارَكَ اللَّهُ رَبُّ الْعَالَمِينَ*

_"Is mein shak nahi ke tumhara Rab Allah hai jisne Aasmaan aur Zameen ko 6 Dino (Adwar) mein paida kiya. Iske ke Arsh par Apna Iqtedar qaem kiya. Woh Raat ko Din par dhanp deta hai. Raat tezi se iske peechhe dauda karti hai aur Aftaab o Mehtaab aur Sitaare sab Usike Hukm ke taabe' hain. Aagah raho Usi ke liye khalq bhi hai aur Amr bhi hai. Woh nihayat Sahibe Barkat Allah hai jo tamam Jahanon ka Palnewale hai."_

(Surah A'raf: 54)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Rasoole Khuda (saww):

_"Agar Khuda chahta to Aasmaan aur Zameen ko Palak jhapakne ki der mein bhi bana sakta tha lekin Usne achanak takhleeq ke bajaye Aasmaanon aur Zameen ko 6 Dinon (Stages) mein paida kiya. Usi tarah se agar Khuda chahta to apne Awamir o Nawahi (Divine Orders) ek martaba mein hi nazil kar sakta tha lekin Usne Apne Umana o Hujaj (Divine Representatives) ke Dilon ko mazboot karne ke liye marhale war Ahkam nazil kiye."_

(Ehtejaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)

Imam Baqir (as): (& Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Allah ne 12 Mahine paida kiye aur unke 360 Din muqarrar farmaye. Aasmaanon aur Zameen ki takhleeq ke 6 Din unse kaat liye gaye. Isi liye har Mahina 30 Din ka nahi hota."_

(Lunar Calendar: 29 or 30 Din)

(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):

_"Zameen ka Tool o Arz (Length & Breadth) 100 Saal ki masafat (Journey) ke barabar hai jis mein se Wiraan Zameen ka Tool o Arz 400 Saal ki masafat ki barabar aur Abaad Zameen ka Tool o Arz 100 Saal ki masafat ke barabar hai. Suraj ka Diameter (قطر) 60x60 Farsakh hai aur Chaand ka Diameter 40x40 Farsakh hai. Unka andarooni hissa Ahle Asmaan ko Roshni faraham karta hai aur unka bairooni hissa Ahle Zameen ko Roshni deta hai. Sitare, Zameen par qaem bade bade Pahad jaise hain. Allah ne Suraj ko Chaand se pahle banaya tha."_

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

(Note: The Farsakh comes from an ancient Persian unit, the parasang, in principle the distance a horse would walk in an hour, about 3 miles = 12,000 cubits. In mid 19th century, the Persian farsakh was approximately 6.23 kilometers; the Arab farsakh was shorter, approximately 5.76 kilometers. (Wikipedia)

(Tauzeeh ke mutabiq 8 Farsakh =44 Km)

Imam Baqir (as) se sawal hua ke Suraj Chaand se garam kyon hai?

Aap (as) ne farmaya:

_"Iski wajah ye hai ke Allah ne Suraj ko Aag ki Roshni aur saaf Paani se paida kiya. Ek hissa Aag ki Roshni ka rakha aur ek hissa Paani rakha aur jab 7 tabaqat mukammal ho gaye to use Aag ka Libaas pahnaya. Isi wajah se Suraj Chaand se zyada garam hai."_

_"Allah ne Chaand ko Aag ke Noor ki Roshni aur saaf Paani se banaya."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Shayad tum ye samajh rahe ho ke Allah Ta’ala ne sirf isi ek Aalam ko hi khalq kiya hai aur shayad ye samajhte ho ke usne tumhare alawa kisi aur ko bashar (humans) banaya hi nahi. Nahi, Khuda ki qasam! Allah Jalla Jalaalahu ne 10 Lakh Aalam paida kiya hain aur 10 laakh Adam. Tum un Aalamo’n ke aakhri Aalam mein ho aur un Adamo’n ke aakhri Aadmiyo’n mein se ho."_

(Meezan ul Hikmah, v3, p172)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Imam Ali (as):

_"Jis shakhs ko wiraane mein Raat basar karna pade to ye Ayat (7:54) padhe. Malaika uska pahra denge aur Shayateen usse door rahenge."_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدُ اَنْ خَلَقْتَ فَسَوَّيْ وَ قَدَّرْتَ وَ قَضَيْتَ وَ اَمَتَّ وَ اَحْيَيْتَ وَ اَمْرَضْتَ وَ شَفَيْتَ وَعَافَيْتَ وَ اَبْلَيْتَ وَ عَلَى الْعَرْشِ اسْتَوَيْتَ وَ عَلَى الْمُلْكِ احْتَوَيْتَ..*

_"...Tera Shukr hai Tu ne Sahih o Saalim paida kiya. Qaza o Qadar, Maut o Hayat, Marz o Sahet, Aafiyat o Bala sab Tere ikhtiyar mein hai. Tu Arsh ka  Sahibe Ikhtiyar aur Mulk e Aalam ka Hakim hai..._

(Budh ke Din (Wednesday) ki Dua)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

               *8th Shaban 1440*

       *14th April 2019, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

      ♦ _*HAZRAT NOOH (as)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1206)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*لَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِ فَقَالَ يَا قَوْمِ اعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ مَا لَكُمْ مِنْ إِلَٰهٍ غَيْرُهُ إِنِّي أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ * قَالَ الْمَلَأُ مِنْ قَوْمِهِ إِنَّا لَنَرَاكَ فِي ضَلَالٍ مُبِينٍ * قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ لَيْسَ بِي ضَلَالَةٌ وَلَٰكِنِّي رَسُولٌ مِنْ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ * أُبَلِّغُكُمْ رِسَالَاتِ رَبِّي وَأَنْصَحُ لَكُمْ وَأَعْلَمُ مِنَ اللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ * أَوَعَجِبْتُمْ أَنْ جَاءَكُمْ ذِكْرٌ مِنْ رَبِّكُمْ عَلَىٰ رَجُلٍ مِنْكُمْ لِيُنْذِرَكُمْ وَلِتَتَّقُوا وَلَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ * فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَنْجَيْنَاهُ وَالَّذِينَ مَعَهُ فِي الْفُلْكِ وَأَغْرَقْنَا الَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَوْمًا عَمِينَ*

_"Beshak Hamne Nooh ko uski Qaum ki taraf bheja to unhone kaha: Aye Bradarane Qaum! Allah ki Bandagi karo, Uske siwa tumhara koi Khuda nahi hai. Mein tumhare mutalliq Haulnak Azaab se darta hun. Uski Qaum ke Sardaron ne jawab diya: Hamko to ye dikhayi deta hai ke tum sareeh gumrahi mein mubtila ho. Nooh ne kaha: Aye Bradarane Qaum! Mein kisi gumrahi mein pada hua nahi hun. Mein to Rabbul Aalamin ki taraf se bheja hua numayinda hun. Mein tumhe apne Rab ke Paighamat pahunchata hun aur tumhari Khair khwahi karta hun aur Khuda ki taraf se mein wo kuchh jaanta hun jo tumhe nahi maloom nahi hai. Kya tumhe is baat par tajjub hua hai ke tumhare paas khud tumhari apni Qaum ke ek Aadmi ke zariye se tumhare Rab ki yaad dahani aayi taake woh tumhe khabardar kare taake tum ghalat ravish se bach jao aur tum par rahem kiya jaye? Phir un logon ne Nooh (as) ko jhutla diya to Hamne use aur uske un saathiyon ko jo Kishti mein sawar the, Najat de di aur Hamne un logon ko dubo diya jinhone Hamari Ayaat ko jhutlaya tha. Yaqeenan woh Andhe log the."_

(Surah A'raf: 59 - 64)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jab Allah Ta'ala ne Nooh (as) ko mab'oos farmaya to unhone apni Qaum ko ailaniya taur par Deen ki dawat di aur jab Sheesh Hibtullah ki Nasl ne suna ke Nooh (as) unke Ilm ki tasdeeq karte hain to unhe yaqeen ho gaya ke ye sachche hain. Chunanche woh un par Imaan laye aur unki tasdeeq ki jabke Qabeel ki Aulad ne unko jhutlaya aur unhone kaha: 'Agar Khuda ne Rasool bana kar kisi ko bheja hi tha to Woh kisi Farishte ko Rasool bana kar rawana karta."_

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jab Nooh (as) ki Wafat ka waqt aaya to unhone apne pairokaron ko bulakar unse kaha: "Mere baad kuchh arsa tak Ghaibat daur jaari rahega jis mein Taghoot ka ghalba hoga. Meri Aulad mein se Allah Hud (as) ko bhejega, woh qayam karega. Khuda use husn o waqar dega. Woh Khulqat aur Akhlaq mein mere mushabeh hoga."_

(Kamaluddin, Noorus Saqlain)

Yahan Khulasa bayan tha. Tafseeli waqeat Kitabon darj hain refer karen.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Ya Ali (as)! Tumhari aur tumhari Aulaad ki misaal Safeena e Nuh (as) ki hai ke jo us Safeene par sawaar ho gaya Najaat pa gaya aur jo us se alag rah gaya wo halaak ho gaya aur phir tumhari misaal Aasmaan ke sitaaro'n ki hai ke jab ek sitara gayab hota hai to doosra tulu (rise) ho jaata hai aur ye silsila Qayamat tak jaari rahega."_

(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p168)

🤲🏻

Ziyarat Hazrat Nooh (as):

*اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا نَبِيَّ اللّٰهِ اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا صَفِيَّ اللّٰهِ اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا وَلِيَّ اللّٰهِ اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا حَبِيْبَ اللّٰهِ اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا شَيْخَ الْمُرْسَلِيْنَ اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا اَمِيْنَ اللّٰهِ فِيْ اَرْضِهِ صَلَوَاتُ اللّٰهِ وَ سَلَامُهُ عَلَيْكَ وَ عَلٰى رُوْحِكَ وَ بَدَنِكَ وَ عَلَى الطَّاهِرِيْنَ مِنْ وُلْدِكَ وَ رَحْمَةُ اللّٰهِ وَ بَرَكَاتُهُ.*

(Mafateehul Janaan)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

             *9th Shaban 1440*

       *15th April 2019, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

       ♦ _*HAZRAT HUD (as)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1207)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِلَىٰ عَادٍ أَخَاهُمْ هُودًا ۗ قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ اعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ مَا لَكُمْ مِنْ إِلَٰهٍ غَيْرُهُ ۚ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ * قَالَ الْمَلَأُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ قَوْمِهِ إِنَّا لَنَرَاكَ فِي سَفَاهَةٍ وَإِنَّا لَنَظُنُّكَ مِنَ الْكَاذِبِينَ * قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ لَيْسَ بِي سَفَاهَةٌ وَلَٰكِنِّي رَسُولٌ مِنْ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ * أُبَلِّغُكُمْ رِسَالَاتِ رَبِّي وَأَنَا لَكُمْ نَاصِحٌ أَمِينٌ*

_"Aur Hamne Qaum e Aad ki taraf unke bhai Hud ko bheja to unhone kaha ke Aye Qaum walo! Allah ki Ibaadat karo. Uske siwa tumhara koi Ma'bood nahi hai. Kya tum apni ghalat ravish se parhez na karoge. Uski Qaum ke Sardaron ne jab uski baat manne se inkaar kar diya tha, jawab mein kaha: "Ham to tumhe be Aqli mein mubtila samajhte hain aur ham tumhe jhooton mein se samajhte hain. Unhone jawab diya ke mujh mein koi Himaqat nahi hai. Mein to Rabbul Aalamin ka Rasool hun. Mein tumko apne Rab ke Paighamat pahunchata hun aur mein tumhare liye ek Amanatdar Khairkhwah hun."_

(Surah A'raf: 65 - 68)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jab Allah ne Hazrat Hud (as) ko mab'oos kiya to Saam bin Nooh ki Aulad un par Imaan laayi. Unke alawa doosre logon ne apni taqat par ghamand kiya aur kaha ke ham se zyada taqatwar aur kaun hai? Jiska natija ye hua ke Khuda ne un par *ريح عقيم* (Be faiz hawa) ka Azaab nazil kiya aur woh tabah o barbad ho gaye."_

(Kamaluddin, Noorus Saqlain)

⛵

Imam Mohd Baqir (as):

_"Hazrar Nooh (as) ne apne farzand Saam ko Hud (as) ki Basharat di thi. Hazeat Nooh (as) aur Hud (as) ke darmiyan kafi Anbiya guzre hain magar Hazrat Nooh (as) ne khususiyat se unki Basharat di thi aur farmaya tha ke Allah ek Nabi bhejega jiska naam Hud hoga. Woh apni Qaum ko Khuda ki  dawat dega magar uski Qaum uski dawat ko qubool nahi karegi. Allah Ta'ala uske Munkareen par Tez Hawa ka Azaab nazil karega aur unhe isse halak kar dega. Mein tumhe Nasihat karta hun ke jo uska Zamana payega woh us par Imaan layega aur uski pairavi kare aur jo uski pairavi karega woh Hawa ke Azaab se bach jayega."_

_"Hazrat Nooh (as) ne apne bete Saam se farmaya ke tum Saal ka ek Din muqarrar karlo. Us Din ko Eid aur Taihwar ja darja do aur us Din Hud ke aane ka ailan karo. Aur logon ko batao ke Hud (as) ke paas Ilm o Imaan aur Ism e Akbar, Miras e Ilm aur Ilm e Nubuwwat ke asaar ka khazaana hoga. Phir jab Hazrat Hud (as) Duniya mein tashreef laye to Aulad e Saam ne kaha: 'Ye wohi Nabi hai jiski Nooh (as) ne hame Basharat di thi. Woh us par Imaan laye, uski pairavi ki aur uski tasdeeq ki aur woh Khuda ke Azaab se bach gaye."_

(Rauza e Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

Isi tarah hame bhi Imam Mahdi (as) ki zuhoor ki Basharat di gayi hain.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Baqir (as)'

_"Ambiya e Karaam (as) mein se kuchh aise the jinki Nabuwwat ka daayra aam tha aur zyada-tar aise hain jinki daawat ka daayra khaas tha. Chunaanche, Hazrat Nooh (as) ki Nabuwwat tamaam ahle zameen ke liye thi, jab ke Hazrat Hud (as) ki Nabuwwat qaum e Aad ke liye makhsoos thi…"_

(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v7, p93)

🤲🏻

*اَلسَّلَامُ عَلٰى اٰدَمَ صِفْوَةِ اللهِ مِنْ خَلِيْقَتِهٖ، اَلسَّلَامُ عَلٰى شَيْثٍ وَلِيِّ اللهِ وَ خِيَرَتِهٖ، اَلسَّلَامُ عَلٰى اِدْرِيْسَ الْقَآئِمِ لِلّٰهِ بِحُجَّتِهٖ، اَلسَّلَامُ عَلٰى نُوْحٍ الْمُجَابِ فِيْ دَعْوَتِهٖ، اَلسَّلَامُ عَلٰى هُوْدٍ الْمَمْدُوْدِ مِنَ اللهِ بِمَعُونَتِهٖ...*

_"Salam ho khalqe Khuda mein muntakhab Rozgar Nabi Adam (as) par. Salam ho Allah ke Vali aur Uske Nek Bande Sheesh par. Salam ho Khuda ki Daleelon ke Mazhar Idrees par. Salam ho Nooh par jinki Dua qubool ki. Salam ho Hud (as) par jinki murad Allah ne poori ki."_

(Ziyarat e Nahiya)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

             *10 Shaban 1440*

     *16th April 2019, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

       ♦ _*HAZRAT HUD (as)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1208)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*أَوَعَجِبْتُمْ أَنْ جَاءَكُمْ ذِكْرٌ مِنْ رَبِّكُمْ عَلَىٰ رَجُلٍ مِنْكُمْ لِيُنْذِرَكُمْ ۚ وَاذْكُرُوا إِذْ جَعَلَكُمْ خُلَفَاءَ مِنْ بَعْدِ قَوْمِ نُوحٍ وَزَادَكُمْ فِي الْخَلْقِ بَسْطَةً ۖ فَاذْكُرُوا آلَاءَ اللَّهِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ*

_"Kya tumhe is baat par tajjub hua ke tumhare paas khud tumhari Qaum ke ek Aadmi ke zariye se tumhare Rab ki yaad dahani aayi taake woh tumhe khabardar kare? Aur yaad rakho ke tumko Usne Qaum e Nooh ke baad Uska Janashin (Khalifa) banaya hai aur Usne tumhe khoob tanumand (Achhi qad o qamat) kiya. Allah ki Ne'mat ko yaad karo taake kamyabi hasil kar sako."_

(Surah A'raf: 69)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Qaum e Aad ke qad (height) bahut bade the, unke qad Khajoor jitne hote the aur itne taqatwar the ke Pahad ko hila kar usse ek tukda ukhad lete the."_

_"Khuda ne ek Ghar mein Hawa ko lock kar ke rakha hai. Agar uska Taala khol diya jaye to Zameen o Aasmaan ki tamam cheezen ko zer o zabar kar ke rakh den. Qaum e Aad ke liye ek Angoothi barabar use khola gaya tha."_

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

😌

Imam Sadiq (as) se sawal kiya gaya kya Insaan apni taarif kar sakta hai?

Imam (as) ne farmaya:

_"Majboor mein jaez hai, Hazrat Yusuf (as) ne kaha 'Mein hifazat karnewala aur Ilm rakhne wala hun. Hazrat Hud (as) ne farmaya, 'Mein tumhare liye qabile etemad khair khwah hun."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Ajkal bhaichargi ki duhai di jaati. Sab Musalman aapas mein bhai hai, balke *Nafso Jaan hain.* Ay. Sistani DZ ne yehi farmaya tha. Iska talluq Ekta wa Ittehad se hai lekin apne apne Aqaed o Aamal isse mukhtalif hain. Yahi sawal us waqt bhi uthaya gaya tha.

Jab Imam Zainul Abideen (as) ne Ashaab e Jamal, Siffin o Naherwan ko Khuda ke Azaab ka Haqdar bataya, Raavi ne kaha lekin Aapke Dada Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ne to apne. Mukhalifeen ke mutalliq farmaya:

*إخواننا بغوا علينا.*

_"Ye hamare bhai hai inhone hamare khilaf baghawat ki hai."_

Imam Sajjad (as) ne farmaya:

_*"Ji haan, inki Ikhwat (brotherhood) bhi wohi hai jiske mutalliq Allah ne farmaya: وَإِلَىٰ عَادٍ أَخَاهُمْ هُودًا jis tarah se Hazrat Hud (as) Qaum e Aad ke bhai the usi tarah mere Dada bhi unke bhai the. Lekin ye baat yaad rakho ke jab Azaab aaya to Hud (as) aur uske pairokaron ko Nijaat mili. Baqi tamam bhai band halak ho gaye the. Usi tarah se Qayamat ke Din Hazrat Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) aur unke Pairokar Nijaat payenge, unse Jang karne wale unke bhai band halaak ho jayenge."*_

(Ehtejaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى هَابِيْلَ وَ شَيْثٍ وَ اِدْرِيْسَ وَ نُوْحٍ وَ هُوْدٍ وَ صَالِحٍ وَ اِبْرَاهِيْمَ وَ اِسْمَاعِيْلَ وَ اِسْحَاقَ وَ يَعْقُوْبَ وَ يُوْسُفَ وَ الْاَسْبَاطِ وَ لُوْطٍ وَ شُعَيْبٍ وَ اَيُّوْبَ وَ مُوْسَىٰ وَ هَارُوْنَ وَ يُوْشَعَ وَ مِيْشَا وَ الْخِضْرِ وَ ذِي الْقَرْنَيْنِ وَ يُوْنُسَ وَ اِلْيَاسَ وَ الْيَسَعِ وَ ذِي الْكِفْلِ وَ طَالُوْتَ وَ دَاوُدَ وَ سُلَيْمَانَ وَ زَكَرِيَّا وَ شَعْيَا وَ يَحْيَىٰ وَ تُوْرَخَ وَ مَتَّى وَ اِرْمِيَا وَ حَيْقُوْقَ وَ دَانِيَالَ وَ عُزَيْرٍ وَ عِيْسَىٰ وَ شَمْعُوْنَ وَ جِرْجِيْسَ وَ الْحَوَارِيِّيْنَ وَ الْاَتْبَاعِ وَ خَالِدٍ وَ حَنْظَلَةَ وَ لُقْمَانَ اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ ارْحَمْ مُحَمَّدًا وَ آلَ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ بَارِكْ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ كَمَا صَلَّيْتَ وَ رَحِمْتَ [وَ تَرَحَّمْتَ‏] وَ بَارَكْتَ عَلٰى اِبْرَاهِيْمَ وَ اٰلِ اِبْرَاهِيْمَ اِنَّكَ حَمِيْدٌ مَجِيْدٌ*

(Dua e Umme Dawood, Mafatih)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

               *11th Shaban 1440*

     *17th April 2019, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*INTEZAAR E FARAJ (atfs)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1209)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

قَالُوا أَجِئْتَنَا لِنَعْبُدَ اللَّهَ وَحْدَهُ وَنَذَرَ مَا كَانَ يَعْبُدُ آبَاؤُنَا ۖ فَأْتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَا إِنْ كُنْتَ مِنَ الصَّادِقِينَ * قَالَ قَدْ وَقَعَ عَلَيْكُمْ مِنْ رَبِّكُمْ رِجْسٌ وَغَضَبٌ ۖ أَتُجَادِلُونَنِي فِي أَسْمَاءٍ سَمَّيْتُمُوهَا أَنْتُمْ وَآبَاؤُكُمْ مَا نَزَّلَ اللَّهُ بِهَا مِنْ سُلْطَانٍ ۚ *فَانْتَظِرُوا إِنِّي مَعَكُمْ مِنَ الْمُنْتَظِرِينَ* فَأَنْجَيْنَاهُ وَالَّذِينَ مَعَهُ بِرَحْمَةٍ مِنَّا وَقَطَعْنَا دَابِرَ الَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا ۖ وَمَا كَانُوا مُؤْمِنِينَ*

_"Qaum walon ne kaha kya Aap hamare paas ye paigham layen hain ke ham sirf ek Khuda ki Ibaadat karen aur in ma'boodon ko chhod den jinki Ibaadat hamare Aba' o Ajdaad (Forefathers) kiya karte the. Agar Aap sachche hain to ham par Azaab la aayen jiski hamen tum dhamki dete rahte ho. Usne kaha ke tum par Khuda ki phitkaar pad gayi aur Uska Ghazab toot pada. Kya tum mujh se un Naamon par jhagadte ho jo tumne tumhare Baap Dada ne rakh liye hain jinke liye Allah ne koi Sanad nazil nahi ki? *Achha ab tum Intezaar karo aur Mein bhi tumhare saath Intezaar karta hun."*_

_"Hamne Hud (as) aur uske sathiyon ko Apni Rehmat se bacha liya aur un logon ki jad kaat di jo Hamari Ayaat ko jhutla chuke the aur Imaan laane wale na the. "_

(Surah A'raf: 70 - 72)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Ab tak jo zikr Anbiya ka zikr hua woh ye ke unhone apne aane wale ki peshingoyi ki. Aaj bhi kisi aane wale Intezaar hai aur us Din ka Allah bhi Intezaar kar raha hai.

🚩

Imam Reza (as):

_"Sabr aur kushaish ka Intezaar bahut hi buland martaba cheez hai. Kya tum ne Khuda ke nek bande ka ye qaul nahi suna: *فَانْتَظِرُوا إِنِّي مَعَكُمْ مِنَ الْمُنْتَظِرِينَ.*"_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

🚩

Imam Ali (as):

_*"Behtareen Ibadat Khamoshi aur Intezaar e Faraj hai."*_

(Tajalliyat e Hikmat, Ibadat)

🚩

Imam Sadiq (as):

_*"Jo shakhs hum Ahlebait (as) ki mohabbat mein marta hai jab ke wo Muntazir e Faraj bhi ho to aisa hai jaise Hazrat Qaim (atfs) ke khaime mein ho."*_

(Aftab e Adalat, Ayatullah Ibrahim Amini, p326)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Imam Sadiq (as) ne Ayat *فَاذْكُرُوا آلَاءَ اللَّهِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ* (Allah ki Ne'mat ko yaad karo) ki tilawat karne ke baad farmaya:

_*"Waise to Allah ki Ne'maat be shumar hain, un mein Azeem Ne'mat hamari Vilayat hai."*_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

✍🏻

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Hazrat Hud (as), Hazrat Saleh (as), Hazrat Shuaib (as), Hazrat Ismael (as) aur hamare Nabi (saww) Arabic zaban bola karte the."_

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

(Zaban e Ahle Bait (as) Hazrat Ismael (as) ki Zaban e Arabi hai. Jabke baqi Jahil Arabon ki Zaban Hukumati thi aur hai. Shatir Dushman ka pahla kaam mukhalif ke culture par hamla. Unki Indentity khatm ki jaati hai. Dushmane Ahle Bait (as) ka ek karnama ye bhi raha ke usne Islami Adab (Ismaeli Arabi) ko khatm karne ki koshish ki.)

🤲🏻

شیخ طوسی نے فرمایا ہے کہ پنجشنبہ مستحب ہے ہزار مرتبہ محمدؐ و آل محمدؐ پر صلوات پڑھنا اور مستحب ہے کہ اس صلوات کو اس طرح پڑھا جائے۔

*اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ عَجِّلْ فَرَجَهُمْ وَ اَهْلِكْ عَدُوَّهُمْ مِنَ الْجِنِّ وَ الْاِنْسِ مِنَ الْاَوَّلِيْنَ وَ الْاٰخِرِيْنَ*

 (Mafateehul Jinaan)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *4th Shawwal 1440*

       *8th June 2019, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

            ♦ _*NAQATULLAH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1212)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

وَإِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمۡ صَـٰلِحࣰاۚ قَالَ یَـٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَـٰهٍ غَیۡرُهُۥۖ *قَدۡ جَاۤءَتۡكُم بَیِّنَةࣱ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡۖ هَـٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةُ ٱللَّهِ لَكُمۡ ءَایَةࣰۖ فَذَرُوهَا تَأۡكُلۡ فِیۤ أَرۡضِ ٱللَّهِۖ وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوۤءࣲ فَیَأۡخُذَكُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِیمࣱ*

_"Aur Qaum e Samood ki taraf Hamne unke bhai Saleh ko bheja. Usne kaha: 'Aye bradarane Qaum! Khuda ki Ibaadat karo aur Uske siwa tumhara koi Ma'bood nahi hai. *Tumhare paas tumhare Rab ki taraf se khuli Daleel (Mo'jiza) aa chuki hai. Ye Allah ki Oontni tumhare liye ek Nishani hai, use chhod do ke Khuda ki Zameen mein charti phire aur usko koi takleef na pahuchana warna ek Dardnak Azaab tumhe aa kar gher le ga."_

(Surah A'raf: 73)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Shabaan mein (17th April) jo ye silsila munqata hua tha uske aage se jaari: (Cont'd)

🐪🐫

Hazrat Ali (as) se ek Yahoodi ne sawal kiya ke Hazrat Saleh ki Oontni Qaum e Samood ke liye Nishani thi, kya is tarah ka Mojeza Rasool e Akram (saww) ke paas bhi tha?

Aap (as) ne jawab diya ke Hazrat Saleh (as) ki Oontni ne na koi kalam kiya aur na Nabuwwat ki gawahi di. Lekin ek waqea aisa hai ke ek Oont ka malik use zibah karna chahta tha to woh Oont Rasool (saww) ki khidmat mein aaya aur is baat ki ittela di aur guzarish ki ke mein Aapki panah mein aaya hun. Aanhazrat (saww) ne us Oont ko kharid kar use azad kar diya.

Doosra waqea ye hai ke Rasool (saww) ki khidmat mein ek Oont ke chor ko laya gaya. Isse pahle ke chor ke haath kaat diye jaate, us Oont ne gawahi di ke ye chor nahi hai, balki asl chor doosra shakhs hai.

(Kitab Ehtejaaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)

🐪🐫

Imam Sadiq (as)

Imam Baqir (as) ne farmaya, _"Jab mere Pidar e Buzurgwar Imam Zainul Abideen (as) ka waqt e wafat aaya to Aap ne farmaya, "Aye Farzand! Ye wo shab hai jis shab mera wada e wafat hai. Mere Naaqe (Oontni) ko uski jagah baandh do aur kuchh chaara uske aage daal do". Jab Imam Sajjad (as) ko dafn kiya gaya to Naaqa apni rassi tod ke bhaaga aur Qabr ke nazdeek jaa kar apna Munh unki Qabr ke upar rakhta aur faryaad aur naala karta tha, Aankhon se aansu jaari the. Jab ye khabar Imam Baqir (as) ko pahunchi to wo us Naaqe ke paas aaye aur farmaya, "Chup reh aur phir jaa. Khuda tujhe Barkat de". Ye sun kar Naaqa apni jagah chala gaya. Phir thode arsey ke baad doosri martaba Qabr e Shareef ke paas aa kar naala o iztiraab karta aur rota tha. Is martaba jo uska haal logon ne Imam se bayaan kiya to unhone farmaya, "Usko uske haal par chhor do, wo bahut betaab hai". Phir 3 din baad wo Naaqa shaheed ho gaya. Imam Sajjad (as) ne us Naaqe par 22 Hajj kiye the aur Taaziyana (whip / koda) bhi nahi maara tha."_

(Jila ul Uyoon - Allamah Majlisi, v2, p368; 14 Sitaarey, p307; Tehzeeb ul Islam, p377)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Ali (as) ka haath pakad kar farmaya:

_"Aye giroh e Ansaar, Aye girohe Bani Hashim, Aye Aulad e Abdul Muttalib: Suno! Mein Muhammad Allah ka Rasool hun, Allah ne mere saath mere khaandan ke 3 afraad ko qabile ehteram Teenat se paida kiya. Mein, Ali, Hamza aur Jafar ek hi mohtaram Teenat se paida hue."_

_"Qayamat ke Din 4 afraad sawar honge. Mein, Ali, meri beti Fatema Zehra aur Saleh Nabi sawar honge. Mein Buraaq par, meri beti Fatema (sa) Naqa e Uzba (عضباء) par, Saleh Nabi apne Naqe par, aur Ali (as) Noor ke Naqe par sawar honge jiski Mehar Yaqoot ki hogi, us par do hari khil'aten hongi."_

(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى هَابِيْلَ وَ شَيْثٍ وَ اِدْرِيْسَ وَ نُوْحٍ وَ هُوْدٍ وَ صَالِحٍ وَ.....*

(Mafateeh)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

           *5th Shawwal 1440*

       *9th June 2019, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*KHILAFA AZ JANIB E KHUDA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1213)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَٱذۡكُرُوۤا۟ إِذۡ جَعَلَكُمۡ خُلَفَاۤءَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ عَادࣲ وَبَوَّأَكُمۡ فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ تَتَّخِذُونَ مِن سُهُولِهَا قُصُورࣰا وَتَنۡحِتُونَ ٱلۡجِبَالَ بُیُوتࣰاۖ فَٱذۡكُرُوۤا۟ ءَالَاۤءَ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا تَعۡثَوۡا۟ فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُفۡسِدِینَ ۝  قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِینَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوا۟ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦ لِلَّذِینَ ٱسۡتُضۡعِفُوا۟ لِمَنۡ ءَامَنَ مِنۡهُمۡ أَتَعۡلَمُونَ أَنَّ صَـٰلِحࣰا مُّرۡسَلࣱ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦۚ قَالُوۤا۟ إِنَّا بِمَاۤ أُرۡسِلَ بِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنُونَ ۝* 

_"Wo waqt yaad karo jab Khuda ne Qaum e Aad ke baad tumhe Janashin (Khalifa) banaya aur tumhe Zameen mein is shaan se basaya ke tum hamwar Maidano par aali shaan mahel banate ho aur iske pahadon ko makanat ki shakl mein tarashte ho. Allah ki Ne'maat ko yaad rakho aur Zameen mein Fasaad na phailate phiro."_

_"Uski Qaum ke Sardaron ne jo bade bane hue the, kamzor tabqe ke logon se jo Imaan le aaye the, kaha ke kya tumhe is baat ka yaqeen hai ke H. Saleh ko Khuda ki taraf se bheja gaya hai? Unhone jawab diya: Beshak ham uske Paigham par Imaan rakhte hain."_

(Surah A'raf: 74 - 75)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Aaj ki Aayat mein jabke Hazrat Saleh (as) ke halaat ka zikr hai, is mein ek nuqta ye hai ke jo bhi Allah ka Numayinda, Nabi, Khalifa, Imam hota hai woh Allah ka muntakhab shudah hota hai. Jaisa ke doosri Ayaat bhi hai:

*وَإِذۡ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلۡمَلَـٰۤىِٕكَةِ إِنِّی جَاعِلࣱ فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ خَلِیفَةࣰۖ.*

_"Aur jab tumhare Parwardigar ne Farishto'n se kaha ke Mein (Apna) Khalifa Zameen mein banane wala hun.."_ (Baqarah:30)

*وَنُرِیدُ أَن نَّمُنَّ عَلَى ٱلَّذِینَ ٱسۡتُضۡعِفُوا۟ فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَنَجۡعَلَهُمۡ أَىِٕمَّةࣰ وَنَجۡعَلَهُمُ ٱلۡوَ ٰ⁠رِثِینَ*

_"Aur Ham to ye chahte hain ke jo log rue Zameen mein kamzor kar diye gaye hain un par Ehsaan karen aur unhi ko (logon ka) Peshwa (Imams) banayen aur unhi ko is (sarzameen) ka Malik banayen aur unhi ko rue Zameen par poori qudrat ata karen."_ (Qasas: 5)

*یَـٰدَاوُۥدُ إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَـٰكَ خَلِیفَةࣰ فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ.*

(Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya:) _"Aye Dawood! Hamne tumko Zameen mein (Apna) Khalifa qarar diya.."_ (Sad: 26)

In Ayaat se yehi natija nikalta hai ke Khalifa sirf Allah ki taraf se hota hai. Is mein logon ka koi ikhtiyar nahi. Deen e Islam ka Rahbar logon ki jaanib se nahi chuna jaata.

(Aur bhi bahut Ayaten hain jinki yahan gunjayesh nahi)

Lekin Rasool Khuda (saww) ki rehlat ke baad Musalmanon apna Rahbar khud chun liya ye bata kar ke Rasool kisi ko Khalifa bana kar nahi gaye. Jabke Ghadeer mein Rasool (saww) ne pahle hi ailan kar diya tha. Ye bhi kaha tha mere baad '12 Khalifa honge.'

(Ref: Sahih Muslim 1821 a In-book reference  : Book 33, Hadith 5

USC-MSA web (English) reference  : Book 20, Hadith 4477)

Zameen par Khuda ka Numayinda hona zaroori hai. Deen Allah ka, Nabi Allah ka to Janashin bhi Allah ka hoga.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇  🤲🏻

*قال الإمام أمير المؤمنين علي بن أبي طالب ( عليه السَّلام ) : " اللَّهُمَّ بَلَى لَا تَخْلُو الْأَرْضُ مِنْ قَائِمٍ لِلَّهِ بِحُجَّةٍ ، إِمَّا ظَاهِراً مَشْهُوراً ، و إِمَّا خَائِفاً مَغْمُوراً ، لِئَلَّا تَبْطُلَ حُجَجُ اللَّهِ و بَيِّنَاتُهُ "*

Ali (as):

_"Bare Ilaha! Haan, Kyon nahi, ye Zameen Hujjat e Khuda se khali nahi rah sakti, chahe zahir ho, mashoor ho, makhfi ho, ghalib ho, taake Allah ki Hujjat aur Uski khuli Daleel baatil na ho sake."_

(Nahjul Balagha Khutba)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

          *6th Shawwal 1440*

     *10th June 2019, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

    ♦ _*HAZRAT SALEH (as)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1214)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَعَقَرُوا۟ ٱلنَّاقَةَ وَعَتَوۡا۟ عَنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَقَالُوا۟ یَـٰصَـٰلِحُ ٱئۡتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَاۤ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِینَ ۝  فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلرَّجۡفَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُوا۟ فِی دَارِهِمۡ جَـٰثِمِینَ ۝  فَتَوَلَّىٰ عَنۡهُمۡ وَقَالَ یَـٰقَوۡمِ لَقَدۡ أَبۡلَغۡتُكُمۡ رِسَالَةَ رَبِّی وَنَصَحۡتُ لَكُمۡ وَلَـٰكِن لَّا تُحِبُّونَ ٱلنَّـٰصِحِینَ*

_"Phir unhone Naaqa ki koonchen kaat di aur Hukme Khuda se sartabi ki aur kaha ke Saleh: agar tum Rasoolon mein se ho to ham par wo Azaab le aao jiski tum hame dhamkiyan dete rahte ho."_

_"Akhirkar ek dehlane wali aafat ne unhe gher liya aur woh apne Gharon mein aundhe pade ke pade rah gaye."_

_"Aur Saleh ye kahte hue unki Bastiyon se chale ke aye meri Qaum meine tumhe apne Rab ka Paigham pahunchaya aur meine tumhari khair khwahi ki magar tumhe khairkhwahi pasand hi nahi hai."_

(Surah A'raf: 77 - 79)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Baqir (as) & Imam Sadiq (as):

Rasoole Akram (saww) ne farmaya: Jibrael (as):

"Hazrat Saleh (as) ko 16 Baras ki umr mein Nabuwwat ke liye mab'oos kiya gaya tha. Aap apni qaum ki musalsal Tableegh karte rahe yahan tak ke Aapki umr 120 Saal ki ho gayi. Is poore 104 baras ki Tableegh ke bawajood unki Qaum Imaan na layi. Qaum e Samood ke 70 But the jinki woh log Ibaadat karte the.

Hazrat Saleh (as) ne unse ye peshkash ki ke mein tumhare Buton se sawal karonga agar Buton ne jawab de diya to mein tumhara Din qubool kar lunga. Unki Eid ke Din ye program bana aur sab Buton ko Mandir se le kar Jungle mein gaye aur wahan program hua. Khub khaane peene ka intezam hua. Unke Prohit bhi maujood the. Hazrat Saleh ne unke But ke naam se pukarna shuru kiya. Bahut awazen di lekin koi jawab nahi aaya. Phir unhone Hazrat Saleh (as) ko alag kiya aur sar par khaak dal kar khoob gidgidaye lekin koi jawab nahi. Phir dobara Hazrat Saleh (as) ne pukarna shuru kiya akhir kar Din dhal gaya aur Mushrekin ko mayoosi hui. Phir Mushrekin ne Aap (as) se mutaleba kiya ke ham sawal karte hain, Aap apne Khuda se maangye. Unhone ne mutaleba kiya ke is Pahad se ek Oontni nikalye, Oontni ka rang gahra surkh, zyada bal aur Hamela ho. Hazrat ne Khuda se Dua ki aur Dua manzoor hui aur wohi hua. Unke 70 numaindon ye dekha aur Imaan laye lekin wahan se ghar jaate jaate 64 Murtad ho gaye aur kaha ye sab Jadoo tha. Sirf 6 log hi Imaan par rahe. Allah ka hukm hua ke ek Din Qaum e Samood Paani piyenge to doosre Din Naaqa (Oontni). Lekin unhone is Oontni ka qatl kiya aur iska ghosht khaa gaye. Aur Oontni ka bachcha wapas usi Pahad mein ghayab ho gaya. Qaum e Samood ki is sarkashi ki wajah se un par Khuda ka Azaab nazil hua. Hazrat Saleh (as) ne kaha Aye meri Qaum tumhare Chehre kal zard (yellow) honge, parson surkh, teesre din siyah (black) ho jayenge aur us Din Azaab aa jayega. Phir aisa hi hua aadhi Raat ke waqt Jibrael e Ameen ne ek cheekh buland ki jisse unke Dil phat gaye aur halaak ho gaye. Phir Aasmaan se un par Aag nazil hui jisne unhe jala kar khaakstar kar diya."

(Roza e Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Reza (as):

_"Allah par ye Haq hai ke wo hamare dost ko Ambiya, Siddiqeen aur Shohda o Saleheen ka rafiq (saathi) banaye."_

(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v2, p421)

🤲🏻

*رَضِيْتُ بِاللهِ رَبًّا وَبِالْاِسْلَامِ دِيْنًا وَ بِمُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَاٰلِهِ نَبِيًّا وَ بِعَلِىٍّ اِمَامًا وَ بِالْحَسَنِ وَ الْحُسَيْنِ وَ عَلِىٍّ وَ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ جَعْفَرٍ وَ مُوْسٰى وَ عَلِىٍّ وَ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ عَلِىٍّ وَ الْحَسَنِ وَ الْخَلَفِ الصَّالِحِ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّلَامُ اَئِمَّةً وَ سَادَةً وَ قَادَةً بِهِمْ اَتَوَلّىٰ وَ مِنْ اَعْدَاۤئِهِمْ اَتَبَرَّءُ.*

(Taqeebat e Namaz)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *7th Shawwal 1440*

      *11th June 2019, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*LAWAAT - HOMOSEXUALITY*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1215)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦۤ أَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡفَـٰحِشَةَ مَا سَبَقَكُم بِهَا مِنۡ أَحَدࣲ مِّنَ ٱلۡعَـٰلَمِینَ ۝  إِنَّكُمۡ لَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ شَهۡوَةࣰ مِّن دُونِ ٱلنِّسَاۤءِۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمࣱ مُّسۡرِفُونَ ۝  وَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوۡمِهِۦۤ إِلَّاۤ أَن قَالُوۤا۟ أَخۡرِجُوهُم مِّن قَرۡیَتِكُمۡۖ إِنَّهُمۡ أُنَاسࣱ یَتَطَهَّرُونَ ۝  فَأَنجَیۡنَـٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥۤ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ كَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡغَـٰبِرِینَ ۝  وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَیۡهِم مَّطَرࣰاۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَیۡفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِینَ*

_"Aur Lut ko yaad karo jab unhone apni Qaum se kaha ke tum aise behaya ho chuke ho ke wo Fuhush kaam karte ho jo tum se pahle Duniya mein kisi ne nahi kiya. Tum Aurton ko chhod kar Mardon se apni khwahish poori karte ho. Yaqeenan tum log had se guzar jane wale log ho magar unki Qaum ka jawab iske siwa aur kuchh na tha ke un logon ko apni bastiyon se bahar nikal do, ye bade pak baaz bante hain. Hamne unhe aur ke Ghar walon ko nijaat de di siwai unki Biwi ke jo peechhe rah jaane walon mein thi. Hamne unke upar (Pattharon ki) baarish barsai. Dekho Mujremeen ka kya anjaam hua."_

(Surah A'raf: 80 - 84)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Baqir (as):

"Hazrat Lut (as) Sakhi aur Kareem Insaan the. Aap aala darje ke Mehmam Nawaz the. Unki Qaum ne unhe Mehman thehrane se mana kiya aur agar thehraya to ham use be aabru karenge. Unki is dhamki ke baad Aap (as) ke paas Mehman chhup kar aate the ke kahin basti ke badmash unhe zaleel na karen. Akhir yehi burai unki halakat ka sabab sabit hui."

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

💟

Sadeqain (as):

_"Iblees unke paas zanana surat mein gaya aur usne khubsoorat libaas pahna hua tha aur woh ek jawan ke paas gaya aur usse ye taqaza kiya ke tum mere saath bad fe'li (homosexuality) karo. Agar Iblees kisi bad fe'li ka unse mutaleba karta to woh inkaar karte lekin is khabees ne unhe apne saath bad fe'li ki dawat di aur jab ek jawan ne usse ghair fitri kaam kiya to use lazzat mehsoos hui. Iske baad Iblees chala gaya lekin Qaum e Lut ko ghair fitri kaam ka aadi kar gaya. Iske baad ye burai un mein aam ho gayi."_

(Kitab Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)

💟

Imam Ali Reza (as):

_"Mardon ki apas mein Aghlam baazi (Homosexuality) aur Aurton ki ham jins parasti Haraam hai kyonki isse Nasl munqata hoti hai aur Duniya ka nizam o insaram tabah hota hai."_

(Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)

Ye Ayat ye bhi bata rahi hai zaroori nahi Paighambar ki Biwi Nek ho.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Imam Ali (as):

_"Jo shakhs apne milaanaat e jinsi (sexual urge) par control kar le, khwaheshat par qaabu paa le, wo apne sharaf aur izzat ko mehfooz kar leta hai. Jo apni khwaheshat e jinsi (Sex) ka Banda aur gulam ban jaaye, wo gulaamo'n se bhi zyada zaleel o khwaar hai."_

(Haraam Nigaah, p75)

🤲🏻

Bare Ilaha hame aisi behayai se door rakh.

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

          *9th Shawwal 1440*

     *13th June 2019, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

       ♦ _*ASHAABUL AYKAH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1216)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِلَىٰ مَدۡیَنَ أَخَاهُمۡ شُعَیۡبࣰاۚ قَالَ یَـٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَـٰهٍ غَیۡرُهُۥۖ قَدۡ جَاۤءَتۡكُم بَیِّنَةࣱ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡۖ فَأَوۡفُوا۟ ٱلۡكَیۡلَ وَٱلۡمِیزَانَ وَلَا تَبۡخَسُوا۟ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشۡیَاۤءَهُمۡ وَلَا تُفۡسِدُوا۟ فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بَعۡدَ إِصۡلَـٰحِهَاۚ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكُمۡ خَیۡرࣱ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِینَ*

_"Aur Madyan walon ki taraf se Hamne unke bhai Shu'aib ko bheja. Unhone kaha: Ay bradaran e Qaum! Allah ki bandagi karo, Uske siwa tumhara koi Ma'bood nahi hai. Tumhare paas tumhare Rab ki saaf Rahnumai aa gayi hai lehaza Wazn aur Paimane poore karo. Logon ko unki cheezon mein ghata na do aur Zameen mein Fasaad barpa na karo jabke uski islah ho chuki hai. Isi mein tumhari bhalayi hai agar tum waqai Momin ho."_

(Surah A'raf: 85)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Quran Majeed mein Ahle Madyan (Midiianites) ko "Ashaabul Aykah - *اصحاب الایکہ*" (Companions of the Wood) ke naam se yaad kiya gaya hai aur unhe "Ashaabul Aykah" kahne ki wajah ye hai ke woh ek Darakht (tree) ki pooja karte the aur Darakht ko "Aykah" kaha jata hai. Madyan Shaam ka ek Shaher tha.

Ye log ek Tijarati shahra (Business street) par qayam pazeer the, musafiron ko lootte the aur ye log apne daur ke intihai bad mamela (Bad Transaction) the aur Naap Tol mein kami karte the. Allah ne Hazrat Shu'aib (as) ko unke paas mab'oos kiya. Unhone apni Qaum ko Tableegh ki lekin woh apni harkaat se baaz na aaye aur Hazrat Shu'aib (as) ko dhamkiyan dene lage ke aapko aur aap par Imaan lane walon ko apni basti se nikal denge. Agar tumko is basti mein rahna hai to phir khamoshi ikhtiyar karo aur hamare taur tareeqon ko apnao.

(Noorus Saqlain)

Madyan Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ke ek farzand ka naam tha aur Aulad jahan abaad ho gayi us jagah ka naam hi Madyan pad gaya.

(Majmaul Bayan)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Riwayat:

Jab H. Musa (as) H. Shuaib (as) ke paas pahunche to us waqt shaam ka khaana taiyyar tha. H. Shuaib (as) ne H. Musa (as) se farmaya, _"Jawan! Baitho aur Khaana khao."_ Musa (as) ne kaha, _"Khuda ki panah!"_ Shu'aib (as) ne kaha, _"Kyun, kya tum bhooke nahi ho?"_ Musa (as) ne kaha, _"Bhooka to hun! Lekin dar hai ke ye khaana mere rewad (cattle / dhhor) ko Paani pilaane ke badle mein na aa jaye aur hum Ahlebait Akherat Ke Amal ko bechte nahi hain khwah uske badle mein poori Zameen ke barabar hi Sona kyun na mile."_ Shu'aib (as) ne kaha, _"Aye Jawan! Ba-khuda aisi to koi baat nahi, lekin ye meri aur mere aaba o ajdaad ki aadat chali aa rahi hai ke hum Mehman Nawazi karte aur khaana khilaate hain."_ Ye sun-kar H. Musa (as) baith kar khaana khaane lage."

(Meezan ul Hikmah,  v3, p111)

🤲🏻

*اَلسَّلَامُ عَلٰى شُعَيْبِ الَّذِيْ نَصَرَهُ اللهُ عَلٰى اُمَّتِهٖ،*

_"Salam ho Shu'aib (as) par jinhe Allah ne in Ummat par Nusrat de kar sarfraz kiya."_

(Ziyarat e Nahiya)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

https://chat.whatsapp.com/E8d9zk5NSaDA4wOxAwwHA3

**********************************

          *10th Shawwal 1440*

      *14th June 2019, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*HAZRAT SHU'AIB (as) AUR UNKI QAUM*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1217)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَا تَقۡعُدُوا۟ بِكُلِّ صِرَ ٰ⁠طࣲ تُوعِدُونَ وَتَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِیلِ ٱللَّهِ مَنۡ ءَامَنَ بِهِۦ وَتَبۡغُونَهَا عِوَجࣰاۚ وَٱذۡكُرُوۤا۟ إِذۡ كُنتُمۡ قَلِیلࣰا فَكَثَّرَكُمۡۖ وَٱنظُرُوا۟ كَیۡفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِینَ ۝  وَإِن كَانَ طَاۤىِٕفَةࣱ مِّنكُمۡ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱلَّذِیۤ أُرۡسِلۡتُ بِهِۦ وَطَاۤىِٕفَةࣱ لَّمۡ یُؤۡمِنُوا۟ فَٱصۡبِرُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ یَحۡكُمَ ٱللَّهُ بَیۡنَنَاۚ وَهُوَ خَیۡرُ ٱلۡحَـٰكِمِینَ ۝  ۞ قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِینَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوا۟ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦ لَنُخۡرِجَنَّكَ یَـٰشُعَیۡبُ وَٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَعَكَ مِن قَرۡیَتِنَاۤ أَوۡ لَتَعُودُنَّ فِی مِلَّتِنَاۚ قَالَ أَوَلَوۡ كُنَّا كَـٰرِهِینَ ۝  قَدِ ٱفۡتَرَیۡنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا إِنۡ عُدۡنَا فِی مِلَّتِكُم بَعۡدَ إِذۡ نَجَّىٰنَا ٱللَّهُ مِنۡهَاۚ وَمَا یَكُونُ لَنَاۤ أَن نَّعُودَ فِیهَاۤ إِلَّاۤ أَن یَشَاۤءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّنَاۚ وَسِعَ رَبُّنَا كُلَّ شَیۡءٍ عِلۡمًاۚ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوَكَّلۡنَاۚ رَبَّنَا ٱفۡتَحۡ بَیۡنَنَا وَبَیۡنَ قَوۡمِنَا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَأَنتَ خَیۡرُ ٱلۡفَـٰتِحِینَ ۝  وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦ لَىِٕنِ ٱتَّبَعۡتُمۡ شُعَیۡبًا إِنَّكُمۡ إِذࣰا لَّخَـٰسِرُونَ ۝  فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلرَّجۡفَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُوا۟ فِی دَارِهِمۡ جَـٰثِمِینَ ۝  ٱلَّذِینَ كَذَّبُوا۟ شُعَیۡبࣰا كَأَن لَّمۡ یَغۡنَوۡا۟ فِیهَاۚ ٱلَّذِینَ كَذَّبُوا۟ شُعَیۡبࣰا كَانُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلۡخَـٰسِرِینَ ۝  فَتَوَلَّىٰ عَنۡهُمۡ وَقَالَ یَـٰقَوۡمِ لَقَدۡ أَبۡلَغۡتُكُمۡ رِسَـٰلَـٰتِ رَبِّی وَنَصَحۡتُ لَكُمۡۖ فَكَیۡفَ ءَاسَىٰ عَلَىٰ قَوۡمࣲ كَـٰفِرِینَ*

_"Aur (Zindagi ke) har raaste par rahzan ban kar na baith jao ke log khauf zadah karne aur Imaan laane walon ko Khuda ke raaste se rokne lago aur Seedhi Raah ko tedha karne ke darpai ho jao aur woh daur yaad karo jab tum thode the. Phir Allah ne tumhe kasrat ata ki aur achhi tarah se dekho ke Mufsidon ka anjaam kya hua hai?"_

_" Agar tum mein se ek giroh us Taleemat par Imaan laata hai jiske saath mein bheja gaya hun aur doosra giroh Imaan nahi laata to Sabr ke saath dekhte raho yahan tak ke Allah hamare darmiyan Faisla kar de aur Wohi behtar Faisla karne wala hai."_

_"Us Qaum ke Mutakabbir Sardaron ne kaha Aye Shu'aib! Ham tujhe aur un logon ko jo tere saath Imaan laye hain apni basti se nikal denge ya phir tum hamari Millat mein wapas aa jao. H. Shu'aib (as) ne kaha kya hame zabardasti phera jayega khwah ham raazi na hon? Agar ham tumhari Millat mein palat kar aaye to ham Khuda par jhoot tarashne wale qarar payenge jabke Allah hamen isse nijaat de chuka hai. Hamare liye ab iski taraf palatna kisi tarah se mumkin nahi hai magar ye ke hamara Khuda hi aisa chahe. Hamare Rab ka Ilm har cheez par haavi hai, Us par hamne bharosa kiya hai. Aye hamare Parwardigar! Hamare aur hamari Qaum ke darmiyan Haq ka Faisla farma, Tu Behtareen Faisla karne wala hai."_

_"Us Qaum ke Sardaron ne jo uski baat manne se inkaar kar chuke the aapas mein kaha agar tumne Shu'aib ki pairavi kar li to tum khasare mein rahoge. Unhe ek dehlane wali Aafat ne gher liya aur woh apne gharon mein aundhe Munh pade ke pade rah gaye."_

_"Jin logon ne H. Shu'aib (as) ko jhutlaya tha woh aise mite goya apne gharon mein base hi na the. Shu'aib ke jhutlane wale hi akhir kar barbad ho gaye. H. Shu'aib (as) ye kah kar unki bastiyon se nikal gaye: Aye Qaum! Meine apbe Rab ke Ahkamat tumhe pahuncha diye aur meine tumhari khairkhwahi ki thi ab mein us Qaum par kaise afsos karun jo qabul e Haq se inkaar karti hai."_

(Surah A'raf: 86 - 93)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Kuch tazkara picchli qist mein kar chuke hain.

Hazrat Shu'aib (as) ne unhe badi Tableegh ki lekin un logon ki aksariyat apni zid par qaem rahi. Allah Ta'ala ne kuchh dino ke liye un par  habs (safocation) musallat kar di aur Hawa ka chalna rok diya. Jab log habs se tang hue to woh Shahr chhod kar bahar khuli fiza mein aaye taake saans lene mein asaani ho. Itne mein ek Baadal utha aur ye log us Baadal ko apni simt aate dekh kar khush hue aur kahne lage ke ab khub Barish barsegi. Jaise hi badal unke upar pahuncha aur poori Qaum Baadal ke saye tale jama hui to Baadal se Aag barasne lagi aur Zameen par Zalzala aa gaya aur Aasmaan se ek cheekh buland hui jisse woh log tabah o barbad ho gaye. Hazrat Shu'aib (as) aur unke saathi us Azaab e Ilahi se mehfooz rahe the.

(Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Momin Momin ka bhai, uski Aankh aur uska Rehbar hai, na uske saath khayanat karta hai, na Zulm karta hai, na Milawat karta hai aur na Waada-khilaafi karta hai."_

(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen)

🤲🏻

*اَللَّهُمَّ إِنَّا نَشْكُو إِلَيْكَ فَقْدَ نَبِيِّنَا صَلَوَاتُكَ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ وَغَيْبَةَ وَلِيِّنَا وَكَثْرَةَ عَدُوِّنَا وَقِلَّةَ عَدَدِنَاوَشِدَّةَ ٱلْفِتَنِ بِنَا وَتَظَاهُرَ ٱلزَّمَانِ عَلَيْنَا فَصَلِّ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ*

_"Khudaya! Ham Tujhse sawal karte hain ke hamare Nabi (saww) Duniya se rukhsat ho chuke hain. Imam Ghaibat mein hain. Dushmanon ki kasrat hai aur hamari tadaad kam hai (Minority mein hai). Fitnon ka zor hai aur zamane ne hamare khilaf ittehad kar liya hai. Lehaza Muhammad wa Aale Muhammad (as) par Rehmat nazil farma."_

(Dua-e-Iftitah)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

           *11th Shawwal 1440*

      *15th June 2019, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*ZINDAGI KE UTAAR CHADHAO*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1218)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَمَاۤ أَرۡسَلۡنَا فِی قَرۡیَةࣲ مِّن نَّبِیٍّ إِلَّاۤ أَخَذۡنَاۤ أَهۡلَهَا بِٱلۡبَأۡسَاۤءِ وَٱلضَّرَّاۤءِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ یَضَّرَّعُونَ ۝  ثُمَّ بَدَّلۡنَا مَكَانَ ٱلسَّیِّئَةِ ٱلۡحَسَنَةَ حَتَّىٰ عَفَوا۟ وَّقَالُوا۟ قَدۡ مَسَّ ءَابَاۤءَنَا ٱلضَّرَّاۤءُ وَٱلسَّرَّاۤءُ فَأَخَذۡنَـٰهُم بَغۡتَةࣰ وَهُمۡ لَا یَشۡعُرُونَ*

_"Hamne jis bhi Basti mein kisi Nabi ko rawana kiya to us Basti ke logon ko pahle tangi aur sakhti mein mubtila kiya taake woh Aajezi (Humbleness) par utar aayen. Phir Hamne unki bad haali ko khush haali mein badal diya yahan tak ke woh khoob phale phoole aur kahne lage ke hamare Aslaaf (Forefathers) par bhi achhe aur bure din aate rahte the. Aakhirkar Hamne unhe achanak pakad liya aur unhe khabar tak na hui."_

(Surah A'raf: 94 - 95)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

In Ayaat mein Allah ne ek kulli Usool bata diya ke har Nabi ki Qaum ko Allah ne azmaya aur Imtihan liya. Har Insaan ki Zindagi ki mein utar chadhao aate rahte hai, kabhi tangi to kabhi rahat. Allah dono tarah se Imtihan leta hai, tangi mein kitna Sabr karta hai ya shikwe shikayat karta hai, rahat mein takabbur karta hai ya Shukr baja lata hai.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Ali (as):

_" Insaan ka behtareen amal kashaaish (relief / raahat) ka intezaar hai."_

(Hadiyat ush Shia, p604)

☘

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Momin wo hai jo Fitna o Fasaad ke waqt qaabu mein rahe, musibat mein Sabr, khushi mein Shukrguzar, Rizq e Khuda par qaane' (contented) ho, dushmano'n par zulm na kare, uska badan qaabu mein rahe, log oos se raahat mein rahein, Ilm uska dost aur Hilm (forbearance) uska Vazeer ho, Aql ke lashkar ka Ameer ho, narmi uska bhai ho, Neki uska Baap ho."_

(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p191)

🤲🏻

Imam Mahdi (atfs):

_"Aye Ma'bood! Uske (Apne Wali e Amr (atfs) ke) zariye hum bikhro'n ko jamaa kar de, uske zariye hamare jhagde khatm kar, aur hamari pareshani door farma. Uske zariye hamari qillat ko kasrat (laghu-mati ko bahu-mati) aur zillat ko izzat mein badal de. Uske zariye humein naadaar se tawangar farma aur hamare qarz adaa kar de. Uske zariye hamara Faqr (Ghareebi) door farma, hamari haajaten poori kar aur tangi ko aasaani mein badal de. Uske zariye hamare chehre raushan kar aur hamare qaidiyo'n ko rihaai de. Uske zariye hamaari haajat bar la aur hamare waade nibha de. Uske zariye hamari Duaein qubool farma aur hamare sawaal poore kar de. Uske zariye duniya o Akherat mein hamari ummeedein poori farma aur hamen hamari khwaish se zyada ataa kar. Aye sawaal kiye jaane-waalo'n mein sab se behtareen aur aye sab se zyada ataa karne waale!"_

(Dua e Iftitaah)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

          *12th Shawwal 1440*

      *16th June 2019, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*NATIJA-E-TAQWA WAL IMAAN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1219)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*
