*وَلَوۡ أَنَّ أَهۡلَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰۤ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱتَّقَوۡا۟ لَفَتَحۡنَا عَلَیۡهِم بَرَكَـٰتࣲ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَاۤءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَـٰكِن كَذَّبُوا۟ فَأَخَذۡنَـٰهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ یَكۡسِبُونَ ۝  أَفَأَمِنَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡقُرَىٰۤ أَن یَأۡتِیَهُم بَأۡسُنَا بَیَـٰتࣰا وَهُمۡ نَاۤىِٕمُونَ ۝  أَوَأَمِنَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡقُرَىٰۤ أَن یَأۡتِیَهُم بَأۡسُنَا ضُحࣰى وَهُمۡ یَلۡعَبُونَ*

_"Agar Bastiyon ke log Imaan laate aur Taawa apnate to Ham un par Aasmaan o Zameen se Barkaton ke Darwaze khol dete lekin unhone jhutlaya lehaza is buri kamayi ke hisaab mein pakad liya jise woh samet rahe the."_

_"Kya Bastiyon ke rahne wale is baat se be khauf ho chuke hain ke Hamari Giraft un par achanak Raat ke waqt na aa pade jabke woh soye hue hon? Ya unhe itminan ho chuka hai ke Hamara Mazboot Haath kabhi achanak din ke waqt un par na padega jabke woh khel rahe hon?"_

(Surah A'raf: 96 - 98)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Jis Ma'ashere mein Imaan aur Taqwa ke taqazon par amal hota ho to wahan har tarah ka Araam o Sukoon paida ho jata hai aur jis Ma'ashere mein Amn o Sukoon ho to Shahrahe (Roads) mehfooz ho jaati hain aur pur sukoon Ma'ashera har tarah ki Ma'ashi (Financial) aur Zara'ee (Agricultural) taraqqi karta hai aur jis Ma'ashere mein Anarchy ho aur kisi ki jaan o maal mehfooz na ho, raaston par Karwan lootte hon to wahan kisi qism ki Ma'ashi taraqqi na mumkin hai.

Isliye Imam Zainul Abideen (as) farmate hain:

_"Zamana e Raja'at mein Aasmaan o Zameen se Barkaton ke Darwaza khol diye jayenge aur Zameen ki paidawari salahiyyat kai gunah badh jayegi aur phaldar darakht itne zyada phal denge ke log garmiyon ke Meve sardiyon mein khayenge."_

(Al Kharaij wal Jara'eh, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_" Jo Nek kaam karta hai uske ghar ki taraf Barkatein oos se bhi zyada tezi ke saath pahunchti hai jitni tezi se paani ka dhaara apni dhhalaan tak pahunchta hai…."_

(Man La Yahzarahul Faqih, v2, p42)

☘

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jab tum kisi Aalim ko Duniya ka garvida (attracted) dekho to phir apne Deen ke bare mein usse bad-zan (distrustful) ho jaao, kyunki jo shakhs jis cheez ka aashiq hota hai uske dil o dimaag par uska ahaat o galba (dominance / haawi) rehta hai. Allah Ta'ala ne Janabe Dawood (as) ki taraf Wahy farmayi, "Duniya ke farefata (infatuated) Aalim ko apne aur Mere darmiyaan hargiz na aane dena warna wo tum ko Meri Mohabbat ke raaste se rok dega. Kyunki ye log wo raah-zan (highway robbers / raaste ke lootere) hain jo Meri taraf aane waale Mere bando'n ka raasta rok lete hain. Main unke saath sab se kam jo sulook karta hun wo ye ke unke dilon se Apni Munajaat ki mithas aur shireeni nikaal leta hun."_

(Usool e Kaafi, v1, p46, Adaab e Islami, v2, p54

🤲🏻

Bare Ilaha hame Muttaqi wa Momin banne ke Taufeeq ata farma.

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

           *13th Shawwal 1440*

      *17th June 2019, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

         ♦ _*AZAAB-E-KHUDA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1220)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*أَفَأَمِنُوا۟ مَكۡرَ ٱللَّهِۚ فَلَا یَأۡمَنُ مَكۡرَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلۡخَـٰسِرُونَ ۝  أَوَلَمۡ یَهۡدِ لِلَّذِینَ یَرِثُونَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ أَهۡلِهَاۤ أَن لَّوۡ نَشَاۤءُ أَصَبۡنَـٰهُم بِذُنُوبِهِمۡۚ وَنَطۡبَعُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا یَسۡمَعُونَ*

_"Kya ye log Allah ki Tadbeer se be khauf hain halanke Allah ki Tadbeer se wohi qaum be khauf hoti hai jo tabah hone wali ho."_

_"Aur kya un logon ko jo guzishta Ahle Zameen ke waris hue hain, is amr e waqae ne kuchh sabaq nahi diya ke agar Ham chahen to un ke Gunahon ki padash (punishment) mein unhe pakad sakte hain aur Ham unke dilon par Mohr laga dete hain. Phir woh kuchh nahi sunte."_

(Surah A'raf: 99 - 100)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Guzishta Ayaton se pewast, Taqwa wa Khauf e Khuda ka zikr jari hai.

Allah sawal par sawal karke Insaani Fitrat ko jagah rahe ke Insaan Khuda se kyon nahi darta. Agar Insaan mein Khauf e Khuda paida ho jaye to saare masail hal ho jayenge.

"Is Ayat mein *مكرالله* se Azaab murad hai. (Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi)

🍂

Imam Ali (as):

_"Is khair e Ummat ko bhi Allah ke Azaab se mutmain nahi hona chahiye kyonki Allah Ta'ala ne is Ayat mein farmaya (7:99)"_

_"Sachcha aur mukammal Faqih woh hai jo logon ko Allah ki Rehmat se mayoos na ho aur unhe Khuda pakad se be khauf na kare."_

(Nahjul Balagha, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Imam Ali (as):

_"Tajjub hai oos shakhs par jo Azaab ka darr to rakhta hai lekin (jin badkaariyo'n ki wajah se Azaab hoga unse) wo rukta nahi aur Sawaab ki Ummeed to rakhta hai lekin (gunaho'n se) na to rukta hai aur na (Sawaab ke liye) amal karta hai."_

(Meezan ul Hikmah, v3, p337)

🤲🏻

Imam Sadiq (as) ne Namaz ke baad ye Dua ki:

*ٱللَّهُمَّ لا تؤمني مكرك*

_"Khudaya! Mujhe Apne Azaab se be khauf na karna." kyonki Tere Azaab se khasara uthane wale logon ke alawa aur koi Tere Azaab se be Khauf nahi rah sakta."_

(Tafseer e Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

           *14th Shawwal 1440*

      *18th June 2019, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

        ♦ _*AHD TODNEWALE*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1221)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*تِلۡكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ نَقُصُّ عَلَیۡكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَاۤىِٕهَاۚ وَلَقَدۡ جَاۤءَتۡهُمۡ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلۡبَیِّنَـٰتِ فَمَا كَانُوا۟ لِیُؤۡمِنُوا۟ بِمَا كَذَّبُوا۟ مِن قَبۡلُۚ كَذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ یَطۡبَعُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِ ٱلۡكَـٰفِرِینَ ۝  وَمَا وَجَدۡنَا لِأَكۡثَرِهِم مِّنۡ عَهۡدࣲۖ وَإِن وَجَدۡنَاۤ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَفَـٰسِقِینَ*

_"Ye Qaumen jinke qisse Ham tumhe suna rahe hain unke Rasool unke paas khuli Nishaniyan le kar aaye the magar woh jis cheez ko ek bar jhutla chuke phir woh use manne par amada na the. Allah is tarah se Haq ke Munkaron ke dilon par Mohr laga deta hai. Hamne un mein se aksar mein paase Ahd na paya balke Hamne to aksar ko Fasiq hi paya."_

(Surah A'raf: 101 - 102)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Allah ne sab se Alam e Zar mein Ahd liya tha. Lekin Duniya mein aate hi Gunah ke parten chadhte chadhte Insaan ki fitrat dhak gayi. Nabi ka kaam isi soyi hui Fitrat ko jagana tha, lekin jo nahi jaage unko Allah ne Fasiq bataya, jinki aksariyat hai.

🍃

Imam Sadiq (as) ne Abu Baseer se farmaya:

_"Khuda ne tum se hamari Wilayat ka jo iqrar liya tha tumne use poora kiya, tumne hame chhod kar ghairon ki pairavi nahi ki. Agar tum apne Ahd ka paas na karte to Khuda tumhe bhi isi tarah se taana deta jaisa ke Usne aksariyat ko taana dete hue farmaya hai: (7:102)"_

(Rauza e Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🍂

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Khuda ke Misaq (Covenant) par Nabi ke Ahle Bait (as) aur unke thode Shiyon ke alawa koi qaem na raha isiliye Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya hai: (7:102) Yehi wajah hai ke Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya: "Logon ki aksariyat Imaan nahi laayegi. (Hud: 17)"_

(Tafseer e Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Aye logo'n! Ali ibne Abi Taalib (as) se mohabbat karo, kyun ki unka gosht mera gosht hai. Unka khoon mera khoon hai. Allah Ta'ala la'nat kare meri Ummat mein se oon logo'n par jo Ali (as) ke baare mein mere Ahd ko zaaya kar de'n aur uske baare mein meri wasiyyat ko bhool jaayein. Aise logo'n ke liye Khuda ke nazdeek koi Ajr o Sawaab nahi hai."_

Amaali - Shaikh Toosi, v1, p182

🤲🏻

*اَللَّهُمَّ إِنَّا نَشْكُو إِلَيْكَ فَقْدَ نَبِيِّنَا صَلَوَاتُكَ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ وَغَيْبَةَ وَلِيِّنَا وَكَثْرَةَ عَدُوِّنَا وَقِلَّةَ عَدَدِنَاوَشِدَّةَ ٱلْفِتَنِ بِنَا وَتَظَاهُرَ ٱلزَّمَانِ عَلَيْنَا فَصَلِّ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ*

_"Khudaya! Ham Tujhse sawal karte hain ke hamare Nabi (saww) Duniya se rukhsat ho chuke hain. Imam Ghaibat mein hain. Dushmanon ki kasrat hai aur hamari tadaad kam hai (Minority mein hai). Fitnon ka zor hai aur zamane ne hamare khilaf ittehad kar liya hai. Lehaza Muhammad wa Aale Muhammad (as) par Rehmat nazil farma."_

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL COMMEMORATE SHAHADAT OF IMAM JAFAR SADIQ (as)*

**********************************

            *15th Shawwal 1440*

   *19th June 2019, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

     ♦ _*HAZRAT MUSA (as)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1222)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِم مُّوسَىٰ بِـَٔایَـٰتِنَاۤ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِی۟هِۦ فَظَلَمُوا۟ بِهَاۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَیۡفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِینَ ۝  وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ یَـٰفِرۡعَوۡنُ إِنِّی رَسُولࣱ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَـٰلَمِینَ ۝  حَقِیقٌ عَلَىٰۤ أَن لَّاۤ أَقُولَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلۡحَقَّۚ قَدۡ جِئۡتُكُم بِبَیِّنَةࣲ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ فَأَرۡسِلۡ مَعِیَ بَنِیۤ إِسۡرَ ٰ⁠ۤءِیلَ*

_"Phir un mazkoora Qaumon ke baad Hamne Musa (as) ko Apni Nishaniyon ke saath Firaun aur uski Qaum ke Sardaron ke paas bheja magar unhone Hamari Nishaniyon ke saath zulm kiya, dekho un Mufsid (corrupt) logon ka anjaam kiya hua?"_

_"Musa (as) ne kaha: 'Aye Firaun! Mein Aalamin ke Rab ki taraf se bheja hua (Rasool) aaya hun aur mera mabsab ye hai ke Allah ka Naam le kar Haq ke siwa koi baat na kahun."_

(Surah A'raf: 103 - 105)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Silsila Tazkara Anbiya (as) jaari hai.

🍂

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Allah Ta'ala ne Hazrat Yusuf (as) ke baad 12 Asbaat mein se ek ek Hadi bheja. Iske baad Allah Ta'ala ne Hazrat Musa (as) o Haroon (as) ko Firaun aur uski Qaum ke Sardaron ki taraf rawana kiya tha."_

(Kamaluddin, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Firaun ne Musa (as) se mehfooz rahne ke liye 7 Faseelen (Sections) tameer karayen aur is mein Janglat aur us mein Sher chhoda.

Jab Allah ne Hazrat Musa (as) ko Firaun ki taraf mab'oos kiya to woh Faseel mein dakhil hue. Jab Sher ne unhe dekha to unke saamne dum hilane aur paon chatne laga. Faseel ke sab darwaze khud ba khud khulte chale gaye. Aap ne Oon ka phata hua libaas pahna hua tha aur Aap ke haath mein Asaa tha. Qasre Firaun ke Darwaze par pahunche aur danda mara Darwaza khul gaya. Firaun ke Darbar mein ghuse. Firaun ek buland Takht par baitha hua tha jiski bulandi 80 haath thi.

Aap (as) ne farmaya: "Mein Rabbul Aalamin ka Rasool ban kar tumhare paas aaya hun." Firaun ne kaha, kya koi Nishani hai? hai to pesh karo.

Aap (as) ne apna Asaa phenka to Azdaha (Dragon) ban gaya aur jab usne Munh khola to uska nichla Jabda Zameen par tha aur upar wala Firaun ke Takht ke upar chala gaya, uske Munh se Aag ke shole lapak rahe the. Saanp jaise hi Firaun ki taraf badha to uska paishab khata ho gaya aur Musa (as) se cheekh kar kahne laga ke ise pakdo.'

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Ali (as):

_"Na-ummeedi mein ummeed zyada hoti hai. Musa bin Imran (as) apne khandan ke liye Aag lene gaye to Khuda unse ham-Kalaam hua aur Musa (as) Nabuwwat ke saath wapas hue. Malika e Saba apne mulk se bahar gayi aur Islam se musharraf huin aur Suleman (as) ki zaujiyat mein aa gayi aur Firoun ki izzat badhane ki khaatir jaadugar jab Misr gaye to Imaan ki quwwat unhein mil gayi."_

(Amaali - Shaikh Sadooq, p175)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّيْۤ اَسْاَلُكَ بِحَقِّ تِلْكَ الْمُنَاجَاةِ الَّتِيْ كَانَتْ بَيْنَكَ وَ بَيْنَ مُوْسٰى بْنِ عِمْرَانَ فَوْقَ جَبَلِ طُوْرِ سَيْنَاۤءَ...*

(Mafatihul Jinaan Amaal)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

           *16th Shawwal 1440*

     *20th June 2019, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

   ♦ _*MO'JEZA-E-MUSA (as)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1223)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*حَقِیقٌ عَلَىٰۤ أَن لَّاۤ أَقُولَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلۡحَقَّۚ قَدۡ جِئۡتُكُم بِبَیِّنَةࣲ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ فَأَرۡسِلۡ مَعِیَ بَنِیۤ إِسۡرَ ٰ⁠ۤءِیلَ ۝  قَالَ إِن كُنتَ جِئۡتَ بِـَٔایَةࣲ فَأۡتِ بِهَاۤ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِینَ ۝  فَأَلۡقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِیَ ثُعۡبَانࣱ مُّبِینࣱ ۝  وَنَزَعَ یَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِیَ بَیۡضَاۤءُ لِلنَّـٰظِرِینَ ۝  قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَسَـٰحِرٌ عَلِیمࣱ ۝  یُرِیدُ أَن یُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُمۡۖ فَمَاذَا تَأۡمُرُونَ*

_"Musa (as) ne kaha: 'Aye Firaun! Mein Aalamin ke Rab ki taraf se bheja hua (Rasool) aaya hun aur mera mabsab ye hai ke Allah ka Naam le kar Haq ke siwa koi baat na kahun. Mein tum logon ke paas tumhare Rab ki taraf se wazeh Daleel le kar aaya hun lehaza tu Bani Israel ko mere saath bejh de. Usne kaha ke agar tum Mo'ajza laye ho aur apni baat mein sachche ho to Mo'ajza pesh karo. Musa (as) ne apna Asaa phenk diya aur wo achha khasa Sanp ban gaya. Aur phir apne haath ko nikala to wo dekhne walon ke liye intehai roshan aur chamakdar tha. Firaun ki Qaum ke Raosa (Chiefs) ne kaha ke ye to samajhdar Jadugar hai. Jo tum logon ko tumhari sar Zameen se nikalna chahta hai. Ab tum logon ka kya khayal hai?"_

(Surah A'raf: 105 - 110)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Silsila Takzara Anbiya (as) Qur'an mein jaari hai. Hazrat Musa (as) ka waqea jiska Qur'an mein tafseel se zikr ho raha hai qistwar pesh karte rahenge.

🍃

Imam Ali Reza (as) se sawal kiya gaya ke kya wajah hai ke H. Musa (as) ko Yade Baiza diya, H. Esa (as) ko Murde zinde karne ka Mo'jeza diya aur hamare Rasool (saww) ko Qur'an?

Imam (as) ne jawab diya:

_"Anbiya (as) ke Mo'jezaat unke zamane ke taqazon ke ain mutabiq the kyonki Hazrat Musa (as) ke zamaane mein Jadu ka zor tha isiliye unhe Jadu todne ke liye Asaa aur Yade Baiza ka Mo'jeza diya gaya. H. Esa (as) ke zamaane mein Tabeebon (Doctors) ka zor tha, H. Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke zamaane mein Sher o Shayri ka zor tha isiliye Khuda ne unhe Qur'an aur Khitabat ka Mo'jeza ata kiya."_

(Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jab Musa (as) wa Haroon (as) pahli bar Darbar e Firaun mein gaye aur Risalat ka ailaan kiya aur Asaa aur Yade Baiza ka Mo'jeza dikhaya to Firaun ne apne Ahle Darbar se mashawara kiya. Us waqt jitne Darbari the woh sab Halalzade the, un mein koi Haramzada nahi tha. Isi liye unhone Firaun ko mashwara diya ke filhal Sabr se kaam len aur Jadugaron ko bulayen aur unse muqabila karayen. Agar un mein koi Haramzada hota to woh Firaun se kahta ke aap inhe fauran qatl kar den."_

Ye kah kar Aap (as) ne apne Seene par haath rakh kar farmaya:

_*"Hamse bhi burayi mein jaldi wohi karta hai jiski Wiladat Mashkook ho."*_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

❓

 Ek Shaami ne Hazrat Ali (as) se poochha:

_"Wo kaunsi cheez hai jab zinda thi to wo peeti thi aur jab Murda thi to wo khaati thi? Aur wo kaunsa darakht hai jo Zameen par sab se pahle uga?"_

(Noorus Saqlain)

_Jawab agli qist mein._

🤲🏻

*وَاَسْاَلُكَ اللّٰهُمَّ بِمَجْدِكَ الَّذِيْ كَلَّمْتَ بِهِ عَبْدَكَ وَرَسُوْلَكَ مُوْسىٰ بْنَ عِمْرَانَ عَلَيْهِ اَلسَّلَامُ فِى الْمُقَدَّسِيْنَ فَوْقَ اِحْسَاسِ الْكَرُوْبِيْنَ فَوْقَ غَمَاۤئِمِ النُّوْرِ فَوْقَ تَابُوْتِ الشَّهَادَةِ فِيْ عَمُوْدِ النَّارِ وَ فِيْ طُوْرِ سَيْنَاۤءَ وَ فِيْ جَبَلِ حُوْرِيْثَ فِيْ الْوَادِ الْمُقَدَّسِ فِيْ الْبُقْعَةِ الْمُبَارَكَةِ مِنْ جَانِبِ الطُّوْرِ الْاَيْمَنِ مِنَ الشَّجَرَةِ وَ فِيْ اَرْضِ مِصْرَ بِتِسْعِ اٰيَاتٍ بَيِّنَاتٍ..*

(Dua e Simat (Shuboor), Mafatih, Misbah, Biharul Anwar)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

         *17th Shawwal 1440*

      *21st June 2019, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

   ♦ _*MO'JEZA-E-MUSA (as)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1224)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قَالُوۤا۟ أَرۡجِهۡ وَأَخَاهُ وَأَرۡسِلۡ فِی ٱلۡمَدَاۤىِٕنِ حَـٰشِرِینَ ۝  یَأۡتُوكَ بِكُلِّ سَـٰحِرٍ عَلِیمࣲ ۝  وَجَاۤءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ فِرۡعَوۡنَ قَالُوۤا۟ إِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجۡرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحۡنُ ٱلۡغَـٰلِبِینَ ۝  قَالَ نَعَمۡ وَإِنَّكُمۡ لَمِنَ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبِینَ ۝  قَالُوا۟ یَـٰمُوسَىٰۤ إِمَّاۤ أَن تُلۡقِیَ وَإِمَّاۤ أَن نَّكُونَ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُلۡقِینَ ۝  قَالَ أَلۡقُوا۟ۖ فَلَمَّاۤ أَلۡقَوۡا۟ سَحَرُوۤا۟ أَعۡیُنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَٱسۡتَرۡهَبُوهُمۡ وَجَاۤءُو بِسِحۡرٍ عَظِیمࣲ*

_"Logon ne kaha ke unko aur unke bhai ko rok lijiye aur mukhtalif shehron mein jama walon ko bhejiye jo tamam mahir Jadugaron ko bula kar le aayen. Jadugar Firaun ke paas hazir ho gaye aur unhone kaha ke agar ham ghalib aa gaye to kya hame iski ujrat milegi? Firaun ne kaha ke beshak tum mere Darbar mein muqarrab ho jaoge. Un logon ne kaha ke Musa! Aap Asaa phenkenge ya ham apne kaam ka aghaaz karen. Musa (as) ne kaha ke tum ibtida karo. Un logon ne Rassiyan phenki to logon ki Aankhon par Jadu kar diya aur unhe khauf zadah kar diya aur bahut bade Jadu ka muzahera kiya."_

(Surah A'raf: 111 - 116)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Silsila Takzara Anbiya (as) Qur'an mein jaari hai. Hazrat Musa (as) ka waqea jiska Qur'an mein tafseel se zikr ho raha hai qistwar pesh kar rahe hain. .

🏒🍃

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Asaa e Musa (as) dar asl Adam (as) ka Asaa tha. Phir wohi Asaa Miras e Nabuwwat ke taur par Hazrat Shu'aib (as) tak pahuncha. Phir Shu'aib (as) ke zariye se Hazrat Musa (as) tak pahuncha aur is waqt wo hamare paas maujood hai aur meine use abhi dekha hai wo is waqt bhi yun sar sabz hai jaise abhi darakht se juda hua ho. Jab isse bulwaya jaye to wo bolta hai. Wo hamare Qaim (atfs) ke liye rakha hua hai. Woh isse wohi kaam lenge jo Musa (as) isse liya karte the. Woh Dushmanane Deen ko darata bhi hai aur logon ki khud sakhta nazar bandi ke samaan ko khaata bhi hai aur use jo hukm diya jata hai wo use baja lata hai aur jab woh Ahle Baatil ke samaan ko nighalta hai to Saanp ban kata hai aur 40 haath ka Munh kholta hai."_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🏒🍃

Imam Reza (as):

_"Qaim (atfs) wo hoga ke jab wo zaahir hoga to umr uski shuyookh ki (very aged) hogi magar nazar jawaan aayega. Taaqat e jismaani aisi hogi ke wo chaahe to bade se bade darakhto’n ko haath se jadd samet ukhaad phenke aur pahaado’n ko hamwaar (level / sapaatt) kar de. Uske paas H. Musa (as) ka Asaa aur H. Sulaiman (as) ki angoothhi hogi. Wo meri aulaad mein chautha (4th) fard hoga. Allah uspar gaibat ka parda daal dega phir usay zaahir karega to wo zameen ko adl o insaaf se is tarah bhar dega jis tarah wo zulm o jaur se bhar chuki hogi."_

(Falsafa e Gaibat e Mehdi (atfs), , p193)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇❓Jawab

 Ek Shaami ne Hazrat Ali (as) se poochha:

_"Wo kaunsi cheez hai jab zinda thi to wo peeti thi aur jab Murda thi to wo khaati thi? Aur wo kaunsa darakht hai jo Zameen par sab se pahle uga?"_

Hazrat Ali (as) ne farmaya:

_"Wo Hazrat Musa (as) ka Asaa tha. Jab tak wo Darakht ka hissa tha to wo Paani peeta tha aur jab DarKht se alaihda ho kar Hazrat Musa (as) ke haath mein aaya to Jadugaron ki Rassiyon ko khaata tha. Ruye Zameen par sab se pahle ugne wala Darakht "Ausaja - *عوسجه*" hai aur Asaa e Musa (as) usi ka ek tukda tha."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

_"Khudaya! Mein Teri us Buzurgi ka wasta deta hun jiske zariye Tu ne apne Bande aur Rasool Musa bin Imran (as) se baten ki, Muqaddesin ki Manzil mein, Farishton ke ehsaas se balatar Maqam par, Noor ke Badalon ke upar Taboot e Shahadat ke upar Sutoon e Naar mein aur Tur e Sina mein aur Hable Huris par, Wadi e Muqaddas mein Tur ke dahni taraf Buqa e Mubarak mein Darakht ke zariye se aur phir Misr ki Zameen par 9 Roshan Nishaniyon ke saath...."_

(Dua e Simat (Shuboor), Mafatih, Misbah, Biharul Anwar)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

          *18th Shawwal 1440*

     *22nd June 2019, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

   ♦ _*MO'JEZA-E-MUSA (as)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1225)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَأَوۡحَیۡنَاۤ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰۤ أَنۡ أَلۡقِ عَصَاكَۖ فَإِذَا هِیَ تَلۡقَفُ مَا یَأۡفِكُونَ ۝  فَوَقَعَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَبَطَلَ مَا كَانُوا۟ یَعۡمَلُونَ ۝  فَغُلِبُوا۟ هُنَالِكَ وَٱنقَلَبُوا۟ صَـٰغِرِینَ ۝  وَأُلۡقِیَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سَـٰجِدِینَ ۝  قَالُوۤا۟ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ ٱلۡعَـٰلَمِینَ ۝  رَبِّ مُوسَىٰ وَهَـٰرُونَ*

_"Aur Hamne Musa (as) ko ishaara kiya ke ab tum bhi apna Asaa dal do woh unke tamam Jadu ke Saanpon ko nighal jayega. Natija ye hua ke Haq sabit ho gaya aur unka karobar Baatil ho gaya. Woh sab maghloob ho gaye aur zaleel ho kar wapas ho gaye aur Jadugar sab ke sab Sajde mein gir pade. Un logon ne kaha ke ham Aalamin ke Parwardigar par Imaan le aaye. Yani musa (as) aur Haroon (as) ke Rab par."_

(Surah A'raf: 117 - 122)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Silsila Tazkara Hazrat Musa (as) jari hai.

Firaun ke Jadugar jo aaj tak  usko Khuda maante the H. Musa (as) ka ye Ilahi Mo'jeza dekh kar Hazrat Musa (as) par Imaan le aaye. Aisa hi waqea Karbala mein bhi pesh aaya. Janabe Hur (as) ka waqea mashoor hai.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Sadiq (as)

se ek shakhs ne puchha ke, "Janabe Musa (as) Jadugaron ke muqable mein ghabra gaye the, jab ke Janabe Ibrahim (as) to Aag se bhi na ghabraaye?" Imam (as) ne jawaab diya, _"Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ke Sulb mein Muhammad (saww) aur Aal e Muhammad (as) ke anwaar the."_

Tafseer e Anwaar e Najaf, v15, p14

🌿

 Hazrat Ali (as):

_"Khuda ki Ne'maat ki zyada ummeed rakho jo tumhare wahm o guman mein bhi na ho. Kya tum nahi dekhte ke Jadugar chahte the ke unhe Firaun ka taqarrub hasil ho lekin Khuda ne unhe Imaan aur Shahadat ki Daulat de mala mal kar diya."_

(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🍃

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jo shakhs apne mutalliq ye tasawwur kare ke mein doosron se afzal hun to aisa shakhs mutakabbir (Proud) hai."_

Raavi ne sawal kiya ke agar ek shakhs doosre ko Gunah mein alooda dekhe aur khud woh un Gunah se azad ho to kya phir bhi apne aap ko usse afzal na jaane?

Aap (as) ne farmaaya:

_" Phir bhi Insaan ko chahiye ke apne aap ko doosre Gunehgar se afzal na samjhe kyonki ain mumkin hai ke jise woh Gunehgar samajh kar Chashme Hiqarat se dekh raha hai uske Gunah Ma'af ho chuke hon aur ye Hisaab mein mubtila ho. Kya Tu ne Jadugaron ka qissa nahi padha ke woh kitne bade Gunehgar the aur kis tarah se woh achanak Naaji ban gaye."_

(Rauza e Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🍂

Rasule Khuda (saww):

" Koi aisa Musalman nahi jo Khuda se Dua kare magar ye ke uski Dua qubool na ho; chaahe usay Duniya mein miley, ya uski Akherat ka zakhira ban jaaye, ya uske gunaho'n ka kaffara qaraar paaye."

(Kaifar e Gunahaane Kabira , p184)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّيْۤ اَسْاَلُكَ بِحَقِّ تِلْكَ الْمُنَاجَاةِ الَّتِيْ كَانَتْ بَيْنَكَ وَ بَيْنَ مُوْسٰى بْنِ عِمْرَانَ فَوْقَ جَبَلِ طُوْرِ سَيْنَاۤءَ،*

(Dua e Simat, Mafatih, Misbah, Biharul Anwar)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

          *19th Shawwal 1440*

     *23rd June 2019, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

  ♦ _*MUSHARRAF BA IMAAN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1226)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ءَامَنتُم بِهِۦ قَبۡلَ أَنۡ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمۡۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَمَكۡرࣱ مَّكَرۡتُمُوهُ فِی ٱلۡمَدِینَةِ لِتُخۡرِجُوا۟ مِنۡهَاۤ أَهۡلَهَاۖ فَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ ۝  لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَیۡدِیَكُمۡ وَأَرۡجُلَكُم مِّنۡ خِلَـٰفࣲ ثُمَّ لَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِینَ ۝  قَالُوۤا۟ إِنَّاۤ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ ۝  وَمَا تَنقِمُ مِنَّاۤ إِلَّاۤ أَنۡ ءَامَنَّا بِـَٔایَـٰتِ رَبِّنَا لَمَّا جَاۤءَتۡنَاۚ رَبَّنَاۤ أَفۡرِغۡ عَلَیۡنَا صَبۡرࣰا وَتَوَفَّنَا مُسۡلِمِینَ*

_"Firaun ne kaha ke tum meri ijazat se pahle kaise Imaan le aaye. Ye tumhara makr hai jo tum shahr mein phaila rahe ho taake logon ko shahr se bahar nikal sako to anqareeb tumhe iska anjaam maloom ho jayega. Mein tumhare haath aur paon mukhtalif simton se kaat dunga aur iske baad tum sab ko Sooli par latka dunga. Un logon ne jawab diya ke ham log baherhal apne Parwardigar ki Bargah mein palat kar jaane wale hain aur tu hamse is baat par naraaz hai ke hamne apne Parwardigar ki Nishaniyon par Imaan le aaye hain. Khudaya! Ham par par Sabr ki Baarish farma aur hame Musalman Duniya se uthana."_

(Surah A'raf: 123 - 126)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Silsila Tazkirah Hazrat Musa (as) jaari hai.

Jab Jadugaron ne Hazrat Musa (as) ka Mo'jeza dekha to woh Imaan le aaye to Firaun ne unko dhamki di lekin Jadugar Firaun ki dhamki ke aage nahi jhuke. Isi tarah ke waqeat Janabe Abu Zar Ghafari, Miqdaad, Salman Farsi, Mohd Bin Abi Bakr, Hujr bin Adi (ra) ke bhi milte hain, jo ke Sahabi e Rasool the, apne daur ke Zalim hukmuran/Khalifa ke saamne uski dhamki ki parva na karte hue tas se mas nahi hue aur Shahadat ka Jam nosh farmaya.

🍂

Imam Sadiq (as) se puchha gaya ke, "Firon ko Janabe Musa (as) ko qatl karne se kisne roka jaise ke Quran mein hai 'Aur Firon kehne laga mujhe chhor do ke main Musa (as) ka qatl kar daalun' (Surah 40: 26)?" Imam (as) ne jawaab diya, _"Is liye ke Firaun Halaal-zada tha aur sirf woh jo na-jaayaz Aulaad ho (Haraamzada) ya Zaaniya (fornicator) Aurat ki Aulaad hi Paigambaron aur Hujjat e Khuda ko qatl kar sakte hain."_

(Kaamil uz Ziyaraat, p83)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Allah (swt) ne Hazrat Musa (as) ko Wahy farmayi. _"Aye Musa! Kabhi koi Amal khaalesatan (sincerely) Mere liye kiya hai?"_ Hazrat Musa (as) ne arz ki, _"Rabbul Aalameen, ji haan! Maine Tere liye Namaz padhi, Tere Roze rakhe, Tere liye Tasbeeh o Tehleel ki."_ Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya: _"Namaz Pul e Siraat se tumhare guzarne ka zariya hai, Roza tumhen Aag se bachane wali dhaal hai aur Tasbeeh o Tehleel tumhare Jannat ke darajaat ka sabab hai. Ye sab kaam to tumhare apne liye hain. Bataao kabhi koi kaam khaalesatan Mere liye kiya hai?"_ H. Musa (as) rone lage aur puchha, _"Tere liye khaalesatan amal kaun sa hai?"_ Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya, _"Kya mazloom ki madad ki? Kya nange ko libaas pehnaya? Kya pyaase ko paani pilaaya? Kya kisi Aalim ka ehteraam kiya? Musa yaad rakkho! Ye amal khaalesatan Mere liye hain."_

(Hadiyat ush Shia, p127)

🤲🏻

*رَبَّنَاۤ أَفۡرِغۡ عَلَیۡنَا صَبۡرࣰا وَتَوَفَّنَا مُسۡلِمِینَ*

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

           *20th Shawwal 1440*

      *24th June 2019, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

    ♦ _*ZAMEEN KE WAARIS*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1227)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ أَتَذَرُ مُوسَىٰ وَقَوۡمَهُۥ لِیُفۡسِدُوا۟ فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَیَذَرَكَ وَءَالِهَتَكَۚ قَالَ سَنُقَتِّلُ أَبۡنَاۤءَهُمۡ وَنَسۡتَحۡیِۦ نِسَاۤءَهُمۡ وَإِنَّا فَوۡقَهُمۡ قَـٰهِرُونَ ۝  قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِقَوۡمِهِ ٱسۡتَعِینُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱصۡبِرُوۤا۟ۖ *إِنَّ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ لِلَّهِ یُورِثُهَا مَن یَشَاۤءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦۖ وَٱلۡعَـٰقِبَةُ لِلۡمُتَّقِینَ*

_"Aur Firoun ki Qaum ke ek Giroh ne kaha ke kya Musa (as) aur unki Qaum ko yun hi chhod dega ke ye Zameen par Fasaad barpa karen aur tujhe aur tere khudaon ko chhod den. Usne kaha ke ham anqareeb unke ladkon ko qatl kar dalenge aur unki Aurton ko zinda rakhenge. Ham un par quwwat aur ghalba rakhte hain."_

_"Musa (as) ne apni Qaum se kaha ke Allah se madad mango aur Sabr karo. *Zameen Allah ki hai, Woh apne Bando mein jisko chahta hai Waris banata hai aur anjaam baher haal Saheban e Taqwa ke liye hai."*_

(Surah A'raf: 127 - 128)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jo cheez Allah ki ho wo Rasool ki hoti hai aur jo cheez Rasool ki ho Rasool ke baad Imam ki Milkiyat qarar pati hai."_

(Tafseer e Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

🌏

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Hamne Kitab e Ali (as) mein ye jumle padhe: (7:128) Mein aur mere Ahle Bait woh hain jinhe Khuda ne Zameen ka Waris banaya hai aur ham hi Ahle Taqwa hain. Saari Zameen hamari Meeras hai. Jo shakhs kisi banjar Zameen ko abaad kare to woh Zameen uski Milkiyat hai. Use chahiye ke woh Zameen ka Khiraaj mere Ahle Bait (as) ke Imam ko pahunchaye. Baqi paidawar woh khud istemal kare aur agar woh us Zameen ko chhod de aur uski jagah koi doosra Musalman us Zameen ko abaad kare to woh Zameen uski Milkiyat qarar payegi. Woh uska Khiraaj Imam e Ahle Bait (as) tak pahunchaye aur Zameen ki paidawar ko khud istemal kare. Jab meri Aulad mein se Qaem e Aale Muhammad (atfs) ja Zuhoor hoga to woh tamam Zameenon par qabza kar lenge jaisa ke Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne tamam Zameenen apne qabze mein le lin thi albatta jo Zameen hamare Shiyon ke haath mein hogi woh us par qabza nahi karenge aur woh badastoor unke tasarruf mein rahegi."_

(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🌏

Imam Baqir (as): Hisham bin Abdul Malik ke Darbar mein:

_"Logon! Tum kahan jaa rahe ho aur tumhe kis taraf dhakela jaa raha hai. Allah Ta'ala ne hamare zariye tumhare pahle fard ko Hidayat di aur hamare zariye se tumhare Akhiri fard ka khatma karega. Agar aaj ye Hukumat tumhare paas maujood hai to is par maghroor hone ki zaroorat nahi hai. Tumhare baad hamari Hukmat qaem hogi aur hamari Hukmat ke baad kisi doosre ki Hukumat qaem na hogi aur ham hi woh Ahle Aaqebat hain jinke mutalliq Khuda ne farmaya (7:128)"_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

📖

Pas ye rivayaat uska jawab hai jab Janabe Fatema (as) ne pahle Khalifa se Fadak ka taqaza kiya to isse dene se is liye inkar kar diya ke Rasool ki koi wirasat nahi hoti aur jo woh chhod kar jaate hain woh Darul Hukumat ka hota hai. Janabe Zehra (sa) Khalifa se apni Shahadat tak is par naraaz rahi.

(Bukhari, Kitabul Khumus)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 ﻿Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Yaqeenan Ulema Ambiya (as) ke waaris hain."_

(Hadiyat ush Shia, p33)

🤲🏻

*اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا اِمَامَ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ وَ وَارِثَ الْمُرْسَلِيْنَ وَ حُجَّةَ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِيْنَ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْكَ وَ عَلٰى اٰلِ بَيْتِكَ الطَّيِّبِيْنَ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ*

(Ziyarat Imam Hasan Askari (as) on Thursday)

*إِِذْ كَانَتِ ٱلارْضُ لِلَّهِ يُورِثُهَا مَنْ يَشَاءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِ وَٱلْعَاقِبَةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ*

 (Dua e Nudba)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

          *21st Shawwal 1440*

     *25th June 2019, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*HAZRAT MUSA (as) & FIRAUN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1228)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قَالُوۤا۟ أُوذِینَا مِن قَبۡلِ أَن تَأۡتِیَنَا وَمِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جِئۡتَنَاۚ قَالَ عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمۡ أَن یُهۡلِكَ عَدُوَّكُمۡ وَیَسۡتَخۡلِفَكُمۡ فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَیَنظُرَ كَیۡفَ تَعۡمَلُونَ ۝  وَلَقَدۡ أَخَذۡنَاۤ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ بِٱلسِّنِینَ وَنَقۡصࣲ مِّنَ ٱلثَّمَرَ ٰ⁠تِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ یَذَّكَّرُونَ ۝  فَإِذَا جَاۤءَتۡهُمُ ٱلۡحَسَنَةُ قَالُوا۟ لَنَا هَـٰذِهِۦۖ وَإِن تُصِبۡهُمۡ سَیِّئَةࣱ یَطَّیَّرُوا۟ بِمُوسَىٰ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥۤۗ أَلَاۤ إِنَّمَا طَـٰۤىِٕرُهُمۡ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا یَعۡلَمُونَ*

_"Qaum ne (Musa (as) se kaha ke ham tumhare aane se pahle bhi sataye gaye aur tumhare aane ke baad bhi sataye gaye. Musa (as) ne jawab diya ke anqareeb tumhara Parwardigar tumhare Dushman ko halaak kar dega aur tumhe Zameen mein uska Janashin bana dega aur phir dekhega ke tumhara tarz e amal kaisa hota hai. Aur Hamne Ale Firaun ko qahet aur samarat (phalon) ki kami ki giraft mein de duya ke shayad woh isi tarah nasihat hasil kar saken. Iske baad jab unke paas koi Neki aayi to unhone kaha ke ye to hamara Haq hai aur jab burai aayi to kahne lage ke ye Musa (as) aur unke saathiyon ka asar hai. Aagah ho jao ke unki bad shugni ke asbaab Khuda ke yahan maloom hain lekin unki aksariyat is Raaz se be khabar hai."_

(Surah A'raf: 129 - 131)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Silsila e Tazkirah e Hazrat Musa (as) jaari. Poora waqea qistwar pesh kiya jaata rahega.

☘

Musa (as) ki Qaum ne unse faryaad ki Firaun pahle bhi unke beton ko satata tha aur ab unke Ailan e Nabuwwat par Zulm o Sitam mein aur izaafa ho gaya.

Ale Firaun ko sahet o salamti, amn aur wusat e Rizq naseeb hoti to kahte the ke ye hamara hissa hai aur ham iska istehqaq rakhte hain. Jab pareshani, bhook, khauf aur Marz ki wajah se Musibat nazil hoti to woh kahte the ke ye Musa (as) aur uske sathiyon ki Nahoosat hai jiske bure asarat ham par pad rahe hain.

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

🔰

Imam Baqir (as) & Imam Sadiq (as):

"Jab Jadugaron ne Firaun ke Darbar mein Islam qubool kiya to Firaun ko isse shikasht faash (haar) hui magar is wazeh shikasht ke bawajood Firaun aur uski Qaum Kufr o Inkaar par hi qaem rahi."

"Is dauran Hamaan ne Firaun ko mashwara diya ke jo bhi Musa (as) par Imaan laye the usne sab ko Zindaan (Jail) mein daal diya. Iske baad Allah ne Aale Firaun par qahet (Feminine) nazil kiya aur phalon ki kami se un par azmayish (test) nazil ki. Iske baad Allah ne un par Paani ka Toofan bheja jisse unke Ghar barbad ho gaye aur itne tang hue ke unhe shaher chhor kar bahar sehra mein Kheme kagane pade. Unke Gharon mein Paani bhar gaya lekin Toofan ka Paani kisi bhi Israeli ke Ghar mein dakhil na hua. Paani wajah se unke Ghar hi munhadim (demolish) nahi hue the balke woh is saal apni Faslen bhi kaasht na kar sake."

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

(To be Cont'd....)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Imam Ali (as):

_"Tajjub hai oos shakhs par jo Azaab ka darr to rakhta hai lekin (jin badkariyo'n ki wajah se Azaab hoga unse) wo rukta nahi aur Sawaab ki Ummeed to rakhta hai lekin (gunaho'n se) na to rukta hai aur na (Sawaab ke liye) amal karta hai."_

(Meezan ul Hikmah, v3, p337)

🤲🏻

*وَ بِاسْمِكَ الَّذِيْ فَلَقْتَ بِهِ الْبَحْرَ لِمُوْسٰى وَ اَغْرَقْتَ فِرْعَوْنَ وَ قَوْمَهُ وَ اَنْجَيْتَ بِهِ مُوْسَى بْنَ عِمْرَانَ وَ مَنْ مَعَهُ وَ بِاسْمِكَ الَّذِيْ دَعَاكَ بِهِ مُوْسَى بْنُ عِمْرَانَ مِنْ جَانِبِ الطُّوْرِ الْاَيْمَنِ، فَاسْتَجَبْتَ لَهُ وَ اَلْقَيْتَ عَلَيْهِ مَحَبَّةً مِنْكَ*

(Arfe ke Din ki Dua: Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

          *22nd Shawwal 1440*

   *26th June 2019, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*FIRAUN PAR ILAHI AZAAB*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1229)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَقَالُوا۟ مَهۡمَا تَأۡتِنَا بِهِۦ مِنۡ ءَایَةࣲ لِّتَسۡحَرَنَا بِهَا فَمَا نَحۡنُ لَكَ بِمُؤۡمِنِینَ ۝  فَأَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَیۡهِمُ ٱلطُّوفَانَ وَٱلۡجَرَادَ وَٱلۡقُمَّلَ وَٱلضَّفَادِعَ وَٱلدَّمَ ءَایَـٰتࣲ مُّفَصَّلَـٰتࣲ فَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ قَوۡمࣰا مُّجۡرِمِینَ*

_"Aur Qaum e Firaun ne kaha ke Musa tum kitni hi Nishaniyan Jadu karne ke liye lao, ham tum par Imaan laane wale nahi hain. Phir Hamne un par Toofan, Tiddi (Locusts), Jun (Lice), Mendak (Frog) aur Khoon ko mufassal Nishani bana kar bheja lekin un logon ne istekbar (pride) se kaam liya aur ye log waqe'an Mujrim log the."_

(Surah A'raf: 132 - 133)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Silsila e Tazkirah e Hazrat Musa (as) jaari hai:

🔰

Imam Baqir (as) & Imam Sadiq (as): (Cont'd)

"Firaun aur uske muqarrab afraad ne Hazrat Musa (as) se kaha ke Khuda se Dua mange ke Toofan aur Baarish ruk jaye aur ham wada karte hain ke ham aap par Imaan le ayenge aur Bani Israel ko azad kar denge. H. Musa (as) ne Dua ki aur Toofan o Baarish ruk gayi lekin unka Kufr o Enaad ka silsila jaari raha. Us saal khoob Ghaas paida hui aur achhi Fasl paida huin. Jab Firaun ne apne Kheton ko lahlahate dekha to bola ke ye koi Azaab nahi tha balke ye to hamare liye Rahmat thi. Allah ko ye baat pasand nahi aayi aur unki Faslon par Tiddiyon (Locusts) ko bhej diya jis ne ek hafte mein hi unke Khet ujaad diye aur Darakhton ki khal tak chat kar gaye. Tiddiyan kisi bhi Israeli ke Ghar mein dakhil nahi hue. Jab Firaun ne ye barbaadi dekhi to phir Musa (as) se wohi request ki. Hazrat Musa (as) shaher ke bahar gaye aur apne Asaa se ishaara kiya jiske baad Tiddiyan jahan se aayin thi wahin chali gayin. Lekin Firaun phir apni baat se phir gaya. Iske baad H. Musa (as) ne Zameen mein apna Asaa mara to Ju'on (Lice) ka Lashkar baramad hua aur Aale Firaun ke Gharon mein phail gaya aur unke Libaas mein ghus gaya, unhe kaatne aur unka Khoon choosne lage. Phir bhi nahi maane to Mendak (Frog) ka lashkar baramad hua aur unko satane lage jaise kabhi unke khaane mein dubki lagate ya kabhi Roti par baith jaate. Phir bhi nahi maane to agla Azaab ye tha ke Darya e Neel (River Nile) ka Paani Khoon mein tabdeel ho gaya. Karishma ye tha ke ye Paani Aale Firaun ko to Khoon dikhayi deta jabke Bani Israel ko ye Paani hi dikhayi deta aur woh Paani ki tarah peete rahe. Is tarah Aale Firaun Paani se mehroom ho gaye. Ek hafte tak ye chalta raha lekin nijaat milne par phir bhi woh Imaan nahi laye..."

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

(To be Cont'd....)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Imam Ali (as):

_"Tajjub hai oos shakhs par jo Azaab ka darr to rakhta hai lekin (jin badkariyo'n ki wajah se Azaab hoga unse) wo rukta nahi aur Sawaab ki Ummeed to rakhta hai lekin (gunaho'n se) na to rukta hai aur na (Sawaab ke liye) amal karta hai."_

(Meezan ul Hikmah, v3, p337)

🤲🏻

_"Aye apni Gunehgar Makhlooqat par jaldi Azaab na karne wale aur Musa (as) ke muqable mein aanewale Jadugaron ko Azaab se bachane wale jabke unhone bahut dino tak Haqaeq ka inkaar kiya tha aur Rizq e Khuda khaa kar ghair Khuda ki Ibaadat ki thi aur uske Rasoolon ki takzeeb kar ke unse bar sar paikaar rah chuke the."_

(Arfe ke Din ki Dua: Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

          *23rd Shawwal 1440*

     *27th June 2019, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

  ♦ _*FIRAUN PAR ILAHI AZAAB*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1230)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَمَّا وَقَعَ عَلَیۡهِمُ ٱلرِّجۡزُ قَالُوا۟ یَـٰمُوسَى ٱدۡعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ بِمَا عَهِدَ عِندَكَۖ لَىِٕن كَشَفۡتَ عَنَّا ٱلرِّجۡزَ لَنُؤۡمِنَنَّ لَكَ وَلَنُرۡسِلَنَّ مَعَكَ بَنِیۤ إِسۡرَ ٰ⁠ۤءِیلَ ۝  فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ ٱلرِّجۡزَ إِلَىٰۤ أَجَلٍ هُم بَـٰلِغُوهُ إِذَا هُمۡ یَنكُثُونَ ۝  فَٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَـٰهُمۡ فِی ٱلۡیَمِّ بِأَنَّهُمۡ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔایَـٰتِنَا وَكَانُوا۟ عَنۡهَا غَـٰفِلِینَ*

_"Aur jab un par Azaab nazil ho gaya to kahne lage ke Musa (as) apne Rab se Dua karo jis baat ka usne Wada kiya hai agar tumne is Azaab ko door kara diya to ham tum par Imaan bhi layenge aur Bani Israel ko tumhare hawale bhi kar denge. Iske baad jab Hamne ek muddat ke liye Azaab ko bartaraf kar diya to phir apne Ahd ko todne walon mein shamil ho gaye. Phir Hamne unse Inteqaam liya aur Darya mein gharq kar diya ke unhone hamari Ayat ko jhutlaya tha aur unki taraf se ghaflat baratne wale the."_

(Surah A'raf: 134 - 136)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Silsila e Tazkirah e Hazrat Musa (as) jaari hai:

🔰

Firaun par Toofan, Tiddi, Jun, Mendak aur Khoon ke Azaab se azmaya gaya. Firaun ne isko rokne ke liye har bar Musa (as) se wada karta raha aur mukarta raha.

🍂

Imam Sadiq (as):

"Aale Firaun par surkh rang ki Barf bari hui thi aur is tarah ki Barf bari unhone na dekhi thi aur na suni thi. Is Barf bari ki wajah se unka bahut sa Jaani nuqsan hua tha. Iske alawa unka itna nuqsan hua jiski pahle misal maujood nahi thi. Aakhirkar unhone Hazrat Musa (as) se iltija ki ke Aap (as) hame is musibat se nijaat dilayen. Agar Aap (as) ne hame nijaat dila di to ham Aap (as) par Imaan le ayenge aur Bani Israel ko riha kar denge. Hazrat Musa (as) ne Dua ki to Barf bari ka silsila ruk gaya. Firaun ne Bani Israel ko azad kar diya. Jab woh azad ho hue to woh Hazrat Musa (as) ke paas jama hue aur Aap (as) unhe le kar Misr (Egypt) se rawana ho gaye."

"Jab Haman ko maloom hua ke Musa (as) Bani Israel ko saath le kar Misr se chale gaye hain to usne Firaun se kaha: "Mein to tumse pahle hi kahta tha ke inhe riha mat karo. Ab aap ne riha kar diya hai to woh hamara Mulk chhod kar yahan se chale gaye hain. Firaun ne poore Shaher mein apne pyade bheje jinhone logon ko Bani Israel ko follow (taqqub) karne ke liye jama kiya."

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Ali (as):

_"Allah Ta'ala ne Hazrat Musa (as) ko 4 baato'n ki Wasiyyat ki:_

_(1) Jab tere Gunah maaf na ho'n, dusro'n ki Aib-joyi (fault-finding) mein mashgool na hona,_

_(2) Jab tak mere khazaane khatm na ho'n, apni Rozi ki fikr mat karna,_

_(3) Mere Haakimiyat ke hote huwe kisi gair ki haakimiyat ko tasleem na karna,_

_(4) Jab tak Shaitan mar na jaaye, uske makr o fareb se gaafil na rehna."_

(Khisaal, p118)

🤲🏻

*اِنِّيْۤ اَسْاَلُكَ بِحَقِّ تِلْكَ الْمُنَاجَاةِ الَّتِيْ كَانَتْ بَيْنَكَ وَ بَيْنَ مُوْسٰى بْنِ عِمْرَانَ فَوْقَ جَبَلِ طُوْرِ سَيْنَاۤءَ،*

(Arfe ke Din ki Dua: Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *24th Shawwal 1440*

        *28th June 2019, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

      ♦ _*SABR (PATIENCE)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1231)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَأَوۡرَثۡنَا ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِینَ كَانُوا۟ یُسۡتَضۡعَفُونَ مَشَـٰرِقَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَغَـٰرِبَهَا ٱلَّتِی بَـٰرَكۡنَا فِیهَاۖ وَتَمَّتۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ عَلَىٰ بَنِیۤ إِسۡرَ ٰ⁠ۤءِیلَ بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ۖ وَدَمَّرۡنَا مَا كَانَ یَصۡنَعُ فِرۡعَوۡنُ وَقَوۡمُهُۥ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ یَعۡرِشُونَ*

_"Aur Hamne Muztaz'afeen (oppressed) ko Sharq o Gharb (East & West) mein Zameen ka Waris bana diya aur is mein Barkat ata kar di aur is tarah Bani Israel par Allah ki Behtareen Baat tamam ho gayi ke unhone Sabr kiya tha aur jo kuchh Firaun aur uski Qaum wale bana rahe the Hamne sab ko barbad kar diya aur unki unchi unchi imaarton ko mismaar (demolish) kar diya."_

(Surah A'raf: 137)

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Rasoole Khuda (saww):

*اَلصَّبْرُ مِنَ الْاِيْمَانِ كَالرَّاسِ مِنَ الْجَسَدِ*

_"Imaan mein Sabr ko wohi maqam hasil hai jo Badan mein Sar ko hasil hai.' Allah Ta'ala ne Sabr karne walo ki qadardani ki hai aur unke mutalliq farmaya: "Bani Israel par Allah ki behtareen baat tamam ho gayi isliye ke unhone Sabr kiya tha aur jo kuchh Firaun aur uski Qaum wale bana rahe the Hamne sab ko barbad kar diya aur unki unchi imaarton ko mismaar (demolish) kar diya." (7:137)"_

(Noorus Saqlain)

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jo bhi Sabr karta hai use thode hi arse ke liye Sabr karna karna padta hai jabke iska Phal derpa (late) hota hai aur jo be Sabri ka muzahera karta hai woh thode hi waqt ke liye be Sabri dekhata hai lekin abadi Ajr se mehroom ho jata hai. Tum dekho Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ne Sabr kiya tha, Allah ne unhe Ajr e Azeem diya aur unki Aulaad mein Imamat ko rakh diya aur unki Nasl ke Aimma ki ghalib Sifat Sabr ko qarar diya. Jaisa ke Allah Ta'ala farmata hai: "Jab unhone Sabr kiya to hamne unko Imam muqarrar kiya aur woh Hamari Ayat par yaqeen rakhte the.(Sajdah:24)."_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*یَا اِلٰھِیْ وَ سَیِّدِیْ وَ مَوْلَایَ وَ رَبِّیْ صَبَرْتُ عَلٰی عَذَابِكَ فَكَیْفَ اَصْبِرُ عَلٰی فِرَاقِكَ وَ ھَبْنِیْ صَبَرْتُ عَلٰی حَرِّ نَارِكَ فَكَیْفَ اَصْبِرُ عَنِ النَّظَرِ اِلٰی كَرَامَتِكَ*

_"Aye mere Parwardigar, mere Aaqa, mere Sardar, phir bhi ye tai hai ke agar mein Tere Azaab par Sabr bhi kar lun to Tere Firaaq par Sabr nahi kar sakta. Agar Aatish e Jahannum ki garmi bardasht bhi kar lun to Teri Karamat na dekhne ko bardasht nahi kar sakta."_

(Dua-e-Kumail)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

           *25th Shawwal 1440*

      *29th June 2019, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

     ♦ _*EHSAAN FARAMOSHI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1232)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَجَـٰوَزۡنَا بِبَنِیۤ إِسۡرَ ٰ⁠ۤءِیلَ ٱلۡبَحۡرَ فَأَتَوۡا۟ عَلَىٰ قَوۡمࣲ یَعۡكُفُونَ عَلَىٰۤ أَصۡنَامࣲ لَّهُمۡۚ قَالُوا۟ یَـٰمُوسَى ٱجۡعَل لَّنَاۤ إِلَـٰهࣰا كَمَا لَهُمۡ ءَالِهَةࣱۚ قَالَ إِنَّكُمۡ قَوۡمࣱ تَجۡهَلُونَ ۝  إِنَّ هَـٰۤؤُلَاۤءِ مُتَبَّرࣱ مَّا هُمۡ فِیهِ وَبَـٰطِلࣱ مَّا كَانُوا۟ یَعۡمَلُونَ ۝  قَالَ أَغَیۡرَ ٱللَّهِ أَبۡغِیكُمۡ إِلَـٰهࣰا وَهُوَ فَضَّلَكُمۡ عَلَى ٱلۡعَـٰلَمِینَ ۝  وَإِذۡ أَنجَیۡنَـٰكُم مِّنۡ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ یَسُومُونَكُمۡ سُوۤءَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ یُقَتِّلُونَ أَبۡنَاۤءَكُمۡ وَیَسۡتَحۡیُونَ نِسَاۤءَكُمۡۚ وَفِی ذَ ٰ⁠لِكُم بَلَاۤءࣱ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ عَظِیمࣱ*

_"Aur Hamne Bani Israel ko darya paar pahunchaya to woh ek aisi Qaum ke paas pahunche jo apne Buton ke gird majma lagaye baithe thi. In logon ne Musa (as) se kaha ke Musa (as) hamare liye bhi aisa hi khuda bana do ke jaisa inka khuda hai. Unhone ne kaha tum bilkul Jahil ho. In logon ka nizaam barbad hone wala aur inke Aamaal Baatil hain. Kya mein Khuda ke alawa tumhare liye doosra khuda talaash karun jabke Usne tumhe Aalamin par fazilat di hai. Aur jab Hamne tumko Firaun walon se nijaat di jo tumhe badtareen azaab mein mubtila kar rahe the. Tumhare ladko ko qatl kar rahe the aur ladkiyon ko khidmat karne ke liye baqi rakh rahe the aur is mein tumhare liye Parwardigar ki taraf se sakht Imtihan tha."_

(Surah A'raf: 138 - 141)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Silsila e Tazkirah e Hazrat Musa (as) jaari hai:

👉🏻

Hazrat Musa (as) ne Bani Israel ko Firaun ke shar se bachaya jo ke Hazrat Musa (as) par Imaan la chuke the. Darya e Neel bhi paar kar diya. Lekin iske baad bhi is Qaum Hazrat Musa (as) se ek But ka taqaza karke apni Jihalat ka saboot diya. Bajaye shukr baja laate phir se But parasti ki taraf mael hone lage.

🕌

Ek Yahoodi ne Hazrat Ali (as) par etraz kiya:

"Abi tumhare Nabi dafn bhi nahi hone paye ke tum logon ne (Khilafat mein) ikhtelaf kar diya?"

Imam (as) ne farmaaya:

_"Hamne unke Farameen o Aqwaal ke bare mein ikhtelaf kiya hai jo Paighambar (saww) se ham tak pahunche hain, Paighambar ya unki Nabuwwat se mutalliq hamne koi ikhtelaf nahi kiya (chejaike Uloohiyyat ke mutalliq hamne koi baat kahi ho) lekin tum (Yahoodi)  abhi tumhare pair darya ke Paani se khushk nahi hone paye the ke tumne apne Nabi (Musa as) se ye kah diya ke hamare liye ek aisa hi Ma'bood bana do jis tarah ke unke muta'ddid Ma'bood hain, aur us Nabi ne tumhare jawab mein tumse kaha tha ke tum ek aisa giroh ho jo Jehel ke darya mein ghota zan hai."_

(Nahjul Balagha, Noorus Saqlain, Tafseer Namoona)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Imam Ali (as):

_"Dar haqeeqat fitno'n ke darya ki maujen teh-nashee'n ho chuki hain aur bid'aten Sunnato'n ki jagah par aa gayi aur jihaalat mein chhip gayi hain aur logo'n ne ilm se kinara-kashi kar li hai."_

(Gorar ul Hakam, v2, p496)

🤲🏻

Imam Ali (as):

_"Aye mere Sardar!.......  aur meri dayemi kotaahi, meri Jihaalat, meri khwaisho'n ki zyadati, meri ghaflat ki wajah se mujhe saza dene mein jaldi na karna."_

(Dua e Kumail)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *26th Shawwal 1440*

       *30th June 2019, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

 ♦ _*MIQAAT HAZRAT MUSA (as)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1233)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَوَ ٰ⁠عَدۡنَا مُوسَىٰ ثَلَـٰثِینَ لَیۡلَةࣰ وَأَتۡمَمۡنَـٰهَا بِعَشۡرࣲ فَتَمَّ مِیقَـٰتُ رَبِّهِۦۤ أَرۡبَعِینَ لَیۡلَةࣰۚ وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِأَخِیهِ هَـٰرُونَ ٱخۡلُفۡنِی فِی قَوۡمِی وَأَصۡلِحۡ وَلَا تَتَّبِعۡ سَبِیلَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِینَ*

_"Aur Hamne Musa (as) se 30 Raaton ka wada kiya tha baad mein us mein Hamne 10 Din ka izafa kar diya. Is tarah se Uske Rab ke muqarrar kardah muddat poore 40 Din ho gayi aur Musa (as) ne apne bhai Haroon (as) se kaha: 'Mere baad meri Qaum mein tum meri Janashini karna (Khalifa) aur theek kaam karte rahna aur Fasaad karne walon ki rah ki pairavi na karna."_

(Surah A'raf: 142)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Silsila e Tazkirah e Hazrat Musa (as) jaari hai:

🕌 📚

Allah Ta'ala ne is Ayat mein barahe raast (direct) 40 Dino ke wade ka zikr nahi kiya balke farmaya ke wada 30 Raaton ka tha aur is mein 10 Dino ka izafa kar diya gaya yun ye 40 Raaton mein complete hua. Iske kuchh wujuhaat hain jin mein se ek mumkin wajah ye bhi hai ke Hazrat Musa (as) ne apni Qaum se farmaya tha ke mein Taurat lene Tur e Sina par jaa raha hun aur mein tum se 30 Din mulaqat nahi kar sakunga. Aur ab jo Khuda ne is mein 10 Dino ka izafa kiya to isse Musa (as) ke qaul mein koi farq nahi pada kyonki unhone 30 Din to ba har surat bahar basar kiye the.

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

📚

Hazrat Musa (as) 1st Zilqad ko Taurat lene gaye the aur 10 Zilhajj ko wapas aaye the.

(Kitab Ma'anil Akhbar, Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

🚩

Imam Baqir (as) se poochha gaya kya Qaem e Aale Muhammad (atfs) ke Zuhoor ka Waqt bhi muqarrar hai?

Aap (as) ne jawab mein 3 bar farmaya:

*كَذَّبَ الْوَقَّاتُوْن, كَذَّبَ الْوَقَّاتُوْن, كَذَّبَ الْوَقَّاتُوْن*

_"Waqt muqarrar karne walon ne jhoot kaha...."_

_"Hazrat Musa (as) Taurat lene ke liye gaye to unse 30 Raaton ka wada tha. Jab Khuda ne 30 mein 10 Dino ka izafa kiya to Qaum e Musa (as) ne kaha ke Musa (as) ne hamse wada khilafi ki hai. Iske baad unhone wo kaam sar anjam diya jise jahan jaanta hai lehaza jab ham tumse koi baat karen aur wo baat apne waqt par zahoor pazeer ho jaye to tum kaho "Sadaqallah *صدق اللہ*" kaho aur agar wo baat apne waqt par zahir na ho to bhi tum "Sadaqallah" kaho. Khuda tumhe dubara ajr ata karega."_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇  *Raafizi - رافضى*

 Imam Sadiq (as)

ne apne sahabi se kaha,

_"Aye Abu Baseer! Is lafz (Raafizi) se pareshaan hone ki zaroorat nahi hai kyunki ye to Khuda Wande Aalam ki taraf se tumhe mila hai". Bani Israil ke 70 aadmi the jin par jab Firoun aur uske logo'n ki gumraahi waazeh ho gayi to oon logo'n ne unka saath chhor diya aur unse alag ho kar H. Musa (as) ke saath shaamil ho gaye kyunki unke liye H. Musa (as) ka saaheb e Hidayat hona waazeh ho chuka tha. To chunke wo log Firoun ka inkaar kar ke aaye the isliye H. Musa (as) ke lashkar mein unko Raafizi kaha gaya (Raafizi yaani inkaar karne waale). Ye log is poore lashkar mein sab se zyada sakht Ibadat-guzaar the aur H. Musa (as) aur H. Haroon (as) aur unki Aulaad se bahut zyada mohabbat karte the to Khuda Wande Aalam ne H. Musa (as) ke paas Wahy bheji ke 'Taurat' mein un logo'n ka yehi naam rakh do kyunki Hamne unke liye yehi Naam ikhtiyar kiya hai, chunanche H. Musa (as) ne likh liya. Phir ye Naam Khuda Wande Aalam ke paas mehfooz raha aur ab tum logo'n ko milaa hai…."_

(Shiane Ahlebait (as), p44)

🤲🏻

Mahe Zilhajj ke Aamaal mein hai:

2 Rakat Namaz Maghrib o Isha ke darmiyan har Shab ada karna: Har Rakat mein Sura Hamd, Surah Tauheed aur ye Ayat padhe:

*وَ وَاعَدْنَا مُوْسٰى ثَلَاثِيْنَ لَيْلَةً وَ اَتْمَمْنَاهَا بِعَشْرٍ فَتَمَّ مِيْقَاتُ رَبِّهِ اَرْبَعِيْنَ لَيْلَةً وَ قَالَ مُوْسٰى لِاَخِيْهِ هَارُوْنَ اخْلُفْنِيْ فِيْ قَوْمِيْ وَ اَصْلِحْ وَ لَا تَتَّبِعْ سَبِيْلَ الْمُفْسِدِيْنَ*

taake Insaan Hajiyon ke Sawab mein sharik ho jaye.

(Mafateehul Jinaan)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *27th Shawwal 1440*

         *1st July 2019, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*HADIS-E-MANZILAT ALI (as)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1234)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

وَوَ ٰ⁠عَدۡنَا مُوسَىٰ ثَلَـٰثِینَ لَیۡلَةࣰ وَأَتۡمَمۡنَـٰهَا بِعَشۡرࣲ فَتَمَّ مِیقَـٰتُ رَبِّهِۦۤ أَرۡبَعِینَ لَیۡلَةࣰۚ *وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِأَخِیهِ هَـٰرُونَ ٱخۡلُفۡنِی فِی قَوۡمِی وَأَصۡلِحۡ وَلَا تَتَّبِعۡ سَبِیلَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِینَ*

_"Aur Hamne Musa (as) se 30 Raaton ka wada kiya tha baad mein us mein Hamne 10 Din ka izafa kar diya. Is tarah se Uske Rab ke muqarrar kardah muddat poore 40 Din ho gayi aur *Musa (as) ne apne bhai Haroon (as) se kaha: 'Mere baad meri Qaum mein tum meri Janashini karna (Khalifa) aur theek kaam karte rahna aur Fasaad karne walon ki rah ki pairavi na karna."*_

(Surah A'raf: 142)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Silsila e Tazkirah e Hazrat Musa (as) jaari hai:

🕌 🚩

Jab Rasoole Khuda (saww) Ghazwa e Tubuk ke liye Madina se rawana hue to Aap (saww) ne Hazrat Ali (as) ko Madina mein thaihraya aur aur farmaya ke tum mere Ahl mein mere Khalifa ban jao.

Hazrat Ali (as) ne arz kiya: 'Ya Rasoolallah! Ahle Arab taana denge ke Ali (as) ne apne cousin ko chhod diya tha aur ghar mein baith gaya tha.

Aanhazrat (saww) ne farmaya:

*"‏أَمَا تَرْضَى أَنْ تَكُونَ مِنِّي بِمَنْزِلَةِ هَارُونَ مِنْ مُوسَى"*

_"Kya tum is baat par raazi nahi ke tumhe mujhse wohi Manzilat rakhte ho jo Haroon ko Musa (as) ko thi?"_

Hazrat Ali (as) ne farmaya:

_"Kyon nahi!"_

Rasoole Khuda (saww):

_"To tum mere Khalifa ban jao."_

(Amali Toosi, Noorus Saqlain, Sahih Bukhari Sahih al-Bukhari 3706, Book 62, Hadith 57, Sahih Muslim 2404, Book 44, Hadith 48, Tirmizi, Riyazus Salehin, Al Adab Al Mufrad)

🚩

Hazrat Ali (as):

(Hadis-e-Manzilat) 

_"Ahle Danish muslaman Aanhazrat (saww) ke is farman ka maqsad samajh gaye the jab Aanhazrat (saww) ne mujhe Haroon (as) se tashbeeh di aur apni tashbih Musa (as) se di aur Aanhazrat (saww) Maadari Pidari bhai nahi tha jis tarah se ke Haroon (as) Hazrat Musa ke Maadari Pidari bhai the. Nabi Akram (saww) ne mujhe Haroon (as) ki tashbih di the jabke Haroon (as) Nabi the aur mujh tak Nabuwwat ko muntaqil hona hi nahi tha magar iske bawujood Aapne Haroon (as) se tashbih di thi. Is tashbih ki bas ek wajah thi ke jis tarah se Haroon (as) Hazrat Musa (as) ke khalifa the usi tarah mein bhi Aanhazrat (saww) ka Khalifa hun."_

(Khutba e Wasilah, Rauza e Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Salman Farsi (ar) se Rivayat hai, Hazrat Ali (as) ne farmaya:

_"Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke baad sab ke sab Murtad ho jayenge siwai chaar ke."_

"Raoole Khuda (saww) ke rukhsat hone ke baad log Haroon (as) aur unke Pairokar ki manzil par the aur (Mukhalefin) Bachhre (Calf) aur unke pairokar ki manzil par the. Hazrat Ali (as) Haroon (as) ki manzil par the, jabke Ateeq (Abu Bakr la) Bachhre ki manzil par aur Umar (la) Samiri ki manzil par."

(Kitab Sulaim ibne Qays Al Hilali)

🤲🏻

*وَاحَلَّهُ مَحَلَّ هَارُونَ مِنْ مُوسَىٰ فَقَالَ لَهُ: ”انْتَ مِنِّي بِمَنْزِلَةِ هَارُونَ مِنْ مُوسَىٰ إِلاَّ انَّهُ لاََ نَبِيَّ بَعْدِي.“*

(Dua-e-Nudba)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

https://chat.whatsapp.com/E8d9zk5NSaDA4wOxAwwHA3

**********************************

          *28th Shawwal 1440*

     *2nd July 2019, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

      ♦ _*DEEDAR-E-ILAHI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1235)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَمَّا جَاۤءَ مُوسَىٰ لِمِیقَـٰتِنَا وَكَلَّمَهُۥ رَبُّهُۥ قَالَ رَبِّ أَرِنِیۤ أَنظُرۡ إِلَیۡكَۚ قَالَ لَن تَرَىٰنِی وَلَـٰكِنِ ٱنظُرۡ إِلَى ٱلۡجَبَلِ فَإِنِ ٱسۡتَقَرَّ مَكَانَهُۥ فَسَوۡفَ تَرَىٰنِیۚ فَلَمَّا تَجَلَّىٰ رَبُّهُۥ لِلۡجَبَلِ جَعَلَهُۥ دَكࣰّا وَخَرَّ مُوسَىٰ صَعِقࣰاۚ فَلَمَّاۤ أَفَاقَ قَالَ سُبۡحَـٰنَكَ تُبۡتُ إِلَیۡكَ وَأَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ*

_"Aur jab woh Hamare muqarrar kardah waqt (Miqaat) par pahuncha aur uske Rab ne Kalam kiya to usne kaha ke Aye mere Rab! Mujhe Apne Dekhne ki salahiyyat ata karta ke mein Tujhe dekhun. Khuda ne kaha ke Tu Mujhe hargiz nahi dekh sakega. Haan zara Pahad ki taraf dekh agar wo jagah par qaem rah gaya to Tu Mujhe dekh lega. Chunanche jab uske Rab ne Pahad par Tajalli ki aur use reza reza kar diya aur Musa (as) ghas kha kar gir pada. Jab hosh aaya to usne kaha: Teri Zaat Paak hai. Mein Teri Bargaah mein Tauba karta hun aur sab se pahla Imaan laane wala mein hun."_

(Surah A'raf: 143)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadeqain (as):

"Jab Hazrat Musa (as) ne Allah se Deedar ka sawal kiya to us waqt Aasmaan ke Darwaze khul gaye aur Malaika ke giroh nazil hone lage. Har ek ke haath mein ek chhadi thi aur uske Sar par Noor tha aur un Farishto'n ne Musa (as) se kaha: Farzand e Imran! Tu ne bahut bada sawal kiya hai ab sabit qadam rahna."

"Hazrat Musa (as) thahre rahe yahan tak ke Allah ne Pahad par Apna Jalwa giraya jisse Pahad reza reza ho gaya aur Musa (as) behosh ho gaye. Aur jab afaqa hua to unhone kaha: 'Teri Zaat Paak hai. Mein Teri Bargah mein Tauba karta hun aur sab se pahle Imaan laane walon mein hun.'(7:143)"

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

🚫

Hazrat Ali (as) se Zindiq ne Anbiya (as) ki lagzishon ke bare mein sawal kiya.

Aap (as) ne farmaya:

_"Khuda jaanta tha ke Anbiya ki Karamat o Mo'jezat dekh kar bahut se log bhatak jayenge aur woh unhe Khuda kahne lag jayenge, isiliye Allah ne unki lagzishon (shortfalls) ka tazkara kiya hai taake logon ko maloom hua ke woh Khuda nahi the jaisa ke Allah ne Hazrat Musa (as) ki khwahish e Deedar ka tazkara kiya hai aur unki behoshi ka zikr kiya hai to is mein bhi Khuda ki yehi Maslehat hai."_

(Ehtejaaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)

🙏🏻

Nabi Akram (saww):

_"Musa (as) ke is qaul: *أَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ* ka mafhoom ye hai ke mein sab se pahle is baat ki ta'eed o tasdeeq karta hun ke Tu Ghair Marai - *غير مرئى*" hai aur Tera dekhna mahal hai."_

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Aghaaze Takhleeq ke waqt Allah ne "Kurubiyeen - *كروبيين*" ko paida kiya aur woh hamare Shia hain. Allah ne unhe Arsh ke qareeb jagah di. Agar un mein se ek ka Noor tamam Ahle Zameen par taqseem kiya jaye to inhe Kaafi hoga."_

_"Jab Musa (as) ne Khuda se Deedar ki darkhwast ki thi to Allah Ta'ala ne ek" Karobi - *كروبى*" ko Hukm diya tha. Usne Pahad par apna Jalwa giraya tha jisse Pahad reza reza ho gaya tha."_

(Basaerud Darajat, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*سُبۡحَـٰنَكَ تُبۡتُ إِلَیۡكَ وَأَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ*

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

           *30th Shawwal 1440*

      *4th July 2019, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

         ♦ _*DEEDAR-E-ILAHI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1236)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَمَّا جَاۤءَ مُوسَىٰ لِمِیقَـٰتِنَا وَكَلَّمَهُۥ رَبُّهُۥ قَالَ رَبِّ أَرِنِیۤ أَنظُرۡ إِلَیۡكَۚ قَالَ لَن تَرَىٰنِی وَلَـٰكِنِ ٱنظُرۡ إِلَى ٱلۡجَبَلِ فَإِنِ ٱسۡتَقَرَّ مَكَانَهُۥ فَسَوۡفَ تَرَىٰنِیۚ فَلَمَّا تَجَلَّىٰ رَبُّهُۥ لِلۡجَبَلِ جَعَلَهُۥ دَكࣰّا وَخَرَّ مُوسَىٰ صَعِقࣰاۚ فَلَمَّاۤ أَفَاقَ قَالَ سُبۡحَـٰنَكَ تُبۡتُ إِلَیۡكَ وَأَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ*

_"Aur jab woh Hamare muqarrar kardah waqt (Miqaat) par pahuncha aur uske Rab ne Kalam kiya to usne kaha ke Aye mere Rab! Mujhe Apne Dekhne ki salahiyyat ata karta ke mein Tujhe dekhun. Khuda ne kaha ke Tu Mujhe hargiz nahi dekh sakega. Haan zara Pahad ki taraf dekh agar wo jagah par qaem rah gaya to Tu Mujhe dekh lega. Chunanche jab uske Rab ne Pahad par Tajalli ki aur use reza reza kar diya aur Musa (as) ghas kha kar gir pada. Jab hosh aaya to usne kaha: Teri Zaat Paak hai. Mein Teri Bargaah mein Tauba karta hun aur sab se pahla Imaan laane wala mein hun."_

(Surah A'raf: 143)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Silsila e Tazkirah e Hazrat Musa (as) jaari hai:

🔰

Mamoon Rashid ne Imam Reza (as) se sawal kiya ke Hazrat Musa (as) Kaleem the phir bhi Deedar e Ilahi ki khwahish ki, kya ye Ismat ke manafi nahi?

Imam (as) ne farmaya:

_"Hazrat Musa bin Imran (as) jaante the ke Khuda Roiyyat (dekhne) se buland o bala hai. Baat ye hai ke jab Allah ne unse Kalam kiya aur unhe apna Muqarrab aur un se razdarana guftgu ki to Aap (as) ne apni Qaum se is bare mein bataya to unki Qaum ne kaha ke jab tak ham Khuda ka Kalam khud sun na len jab tak tasdeeq nahi karenge. Aap (as) ne apni Qaum ke 7 Lakh mein logon mein se 70 hazar ka intekhab kiya, us mein se 700 ko chuna, us mein se sirf 70 afraad ko Tur e Sina ke Pahad ke daman mein le kar gaye. Khuda ne Kalam ko darakht mein paida kiya aur uski Awaaz har simt se aane lagi. Lekin unhone ne kaha sirf Sunna hi kaafi nahi balke Khuda ko dekhen bhi hai. Jab unhone ye baat kahi aur takabnur o sarkashi ka muzahera kiya to un par Bijli giri jisse woh mar gaye. Hazrat Musa (as) ne Khuda se kalam kiya ke mein apni baqi Qaum ko kya jawab dunga? Woh kahenge ke Musa (as) Kalam e Khuda sunane mein nakam ho gaye to unhe sabko qatl kar diya. Allah Ta'ala ne unhe dobara zinda kar diya. Zinda hone ke baad bhi unhone yehi kaha ke Aap darkhwast karte to Khuda Apna Didaar karata. Hazrat Musa (as) ne farmaaya: 'Logon! Khuda ko Aankh se dekhna na mumkin hai, Allah us Kaifiyyaat se Paak hai, Allah ki pahchan Uski Nishaniyon se hoti hai aur Woh Apni Alamaat se pahchana jata hai.' Lekin phir bhi woh is baat par ba zid rahe. Phir Hazrat Musa (as) ne darkhwast ki aur Khuda ne Apni ek Ayat ka Pahad par Jalwa giraya jiski wajah se Pahad reza reza ho gaya aur Musa (as) behosh ho gaye."_

(Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)

💫⚡

Imam Reza (as):

_"Khuda Jalwa figan hota hai lekin dikhayi nahi deta."_

(Kitabut Tauheed, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 🤲🏻

*اِلٰهِيْ اَتَرَانِيْ مَا اَتَيْتُكَ اِلَّا مِنْ حَيْثُ الْاٰمَالُ اَمْ عَلِقْتُ بِاَطْرَافِ حِبَالِكَ اِلَّا حِيْنَ بَاعَدَتْنِيْ ذُنُوْبِيْ عَنْ دَارِ [صِرْبَةِ] الْوِصَالِ*

_"Khudaya! Tujhe maloom hai ke mein Teri Bargah mein sirf Ummeedon ke sahare aaya hun aur maine Tere Resmane Karam ko us waqt pakda hai jab mujhe Gunahon ne Tere Darul Wesal se door phek diya hai."_

(Dua e Sabah - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL CELEBRATE WILADAT OF MASOOM-E-QUM (sa)*

🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹

**********************************

             *1st Zilqad 1440*

        *5th July 2019, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

        ♦ _*DEEDAR-E-ILAHI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1237)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَمَّا جَاۤءَ مُوسَىٰ لِمِیقَـٰتِنَا وَكَلَّمَهُۥ رَبُّهُۥ قَالَ رَبِّ أَرِنِیۤ أَنظُرۡ إِلَیۡكَۚ قَالَ لَن تَرَىٰنِی وَلَـٰكِنِ ٱنظُرۡ إِلَى ٱلۡجَبَلِ فَإِنِ ٱسۡتَقَرَّ مَكَانَهُۥ فَسَوۡفَ تَرَىٰنِیۚ فَلَمَّا تَجَلَّىٰ رَبُّهُۥ لِلۡجَبَلِ جَعَلَهُۥ دَكࣰّا وَخَرَّ مُوسَىٰ صَعِقࣰاۚ فَلَمَّاۤ أَفَاقَ قَالَ سُبۡحَـٰنَكَ تُبۡتُ إِلَیۡكَ وَأَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ*

_"Aur jab woh Hamare muqarrar kardah waqt (Miqaat) par pahuncha aur uske Rab ne Kalam kiya to usne kaha ke Aye mere Rab! Mujhe Apne Dekhne ki salahiyyat ata karta ke mein Tujhe dekhun. Khuda ne kaha ke Tu Mujhe hargiz nahi dekh sakega. Haan zara Pahad ki taraf dekh agar wo jagah par qaem rah gaya to Tu Mujhe dekh lega. Chunanche jab uske Rab ne Pahad par Tajalli ki aur use reza reza kar diya aur Musa (as) ghas kha kar gir pada. Jab hosh aaya to usne kaha: Teri Zaat Paak hai. Mein Teri Bargaah mein Tauba karta hun aur sab se pahla Imaan laane wala mein hun."_

(Surah A'raf: 143)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Silsila e Tazkirah e Hazrat Musa (as) jaari hai:

👀 👁

Is Ayat mein Allah ne Musa (as) se farmaya ke tum Khuda ko kabhi nahi dekh sakte. Iski bahut se wujuhat hain. Ham Makhlooq hain jabke Woh Khaliq hai. Hamari Ankh Usko dekhne ki salahiyyat nahi rakhti. Hamari Ankh Maddah (Material) ko dekh sakti hai. Lekin hamari Ankh to kitni hi Material ko bhi nahi dekh sakti jaise Hawa, Current waghaira. Ham ye nahi kah sakte ke aaj ham nahi dekh paa rahe hain lekin kal ya phir kabhi dekh payenge. Hawa ko 4000 Saal pahle bhi koi nahi dekh paya na 4000 Saal baad bhi dekh payega. Khuda ko ham nahi samajh sakte, ham Uski utni hi Ma'arefat rakhte hain jitna Usne hame bataya.

Jabke Ahle Sunnat ke Aqeede ke mutabiq Allah ko Qayamat ke Din dekhenge. Iske jawaz mein ye Ayat pesh karte hai:

*وُجُوهࣱ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ نَّاضِرَةٌ*إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةࣱ*

 (Surah Qayamat: 23). Jabke yahan isse murad Khuda ki Qudrat hai na ke usko direct dekhna. Jaise Yadullah (Allah ke Haath), Ainullah waghaira, jabke Allah Haath, Aankh balke koi body nahi rakhta, phir kaise Usko dekh sakte hain. Usko Uski Nishaniyon se samjha ja sakta hai. Jabki Ayat *لن ترانى*  hai yani 'hargiz nahi' to Qur'an tazaad (contradiction) nahi paya jate. Haan ye zaroor hai ke ham Ayaton ka mafhoom nahi samajh pate kyonki hamne Dar e Ahle Bait (as), Babul Ilm ko chhod diya hai. Agar ham Ahle Bait (as) se wabasta rahe to poora Quran sahi ma'ano mein samajh mein ayega.

👀👁

Qur'an Allah Ta'ala farmata hai: (An'am:103)

*لَّا تُدۡرِكُهُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَـٰرُ وَهُوَ یُدۡرِكُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَـٰرَۖ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِیفُ ٱلۡخَبِیرُ*

_"Nigahen Usko nahi paa sakti aur Woh Nigahon ko paa leta hai, Woh Lateef (Subtle) aur  Ba-Khabar hai."_

Imam Reza (as) se is Ayat ke bare mein sawal kiya gaya to farmaya:

"Ye kis Nigahon ki baat hai, Ankhon ki? Nahi.

Ye Dil ke wahm o guman hain. Dil ka guman bhi Usko nahi paa sakte."

(Tauheed e Sudooq)

👀

Imam Sadiq (as):

*لم يكلف الله العباد المعرفة و لم يجعل لهم إليها سبيلا.*

_"Bando ke zimme Allah ki Ma'arefat nahi hai. "_

(Mahasin)

Allah apni Ma'arefat khud karata hai, Bando ka kaam sirf Uski ita'at hai.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 🤲🏻

*اَلحَمدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي لَا يُحَسُّ وَلاَ يُجَسُّ وَلاَ يُمَسُّ وَ لَا يُدرَكُ بِالحَوَاس وَلَا يَقَعُ عَلَيهِ الوَهمُ، وَ لَا تَصِفُهُ الاَلسُنُ.*

_"Saari Taarifen Uske liye hain Jisko na ehsaas kiya ja sakta hai, na Justuju ki ja sakti hai, na chhua ja sakta hai, na Hawas e Khamsa se dark kiya sakta hai, na Us par guman kiya ja sakta hai, na zabanen Uski Tauseef kar sakti hain."_

(Tauheed e Sudooq, P-75, Biharul Anwar Vol 3, P-300)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

https://chat.whatsapp.com/E8d9zk5NSaDA4wOxAwwHA3

**********************************

               *2nd Zilqad 1440*

       *6th July 2019, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

 ♦ _*TAWAZOH - HUMBLENESS*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1228)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قَالَ یَـٰمُوسَىٰۤ إِنِّی ٱصۡطَفَیۡتُكَ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ بِرِسَـٰلَـٰتِی وَبِكَلَـٰمِی فَخُذۡ مَاۤ ءَاتَیۡتُكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّـٰكِرِینَ*

_"Khuda ne kaha: Aye Musa! Meine tamam logon par tujhe tarjeeh (prefer) de kar muntakhab kiya ke tu meri Paighambari kare aur Mujh se ham Kalam ho sake. Pas jo kuchh Mein tujhe dun use le ja aur Shukrguzaron mein se ban ja."_

(Surah A'raf: 144)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Silsila e Tazkirah e Musa (as) jaari hai:

Imam Sadiq (as):

"Allah Ta'ala ne Hazrat Musa (as) ko Wahy farmayi ke jaante ho Meine tamam logon mein se tumhe apne Kalam ke liye kyon muntakhab kiya hai? Hazrat Musa (as) ne arz kiya: Khudaya! Tu khud hi bata. Allah Ta'ala ne unki taraf Wahy karke farmaya:

_"Meine poori rooye Zameen par rahne walon ko ulat palat kar dekha to tum Mujhe sab se *zyada mutawazeh (humble) nazar aaye.* Musa! Mujhe teri ye ada pasand aayi ke jab tu Namaz padhta hai hai to apne Rukhsaar (face) Zameen par rakhta hai."_

(Usoole Kaafi, Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)

🔰

Imam Kazim (as):

_"Aye Hishaam! Zara'at (plant / paudha) narm zameen mein ugti hai, pattharo'n par zara'at nahi ugti. Isi tarah tawaazoh (humility / humbleness) se qalb mein Hikmat (Wisdom) aabad hoti hai, Mutakabbir (takabbur karne wale) aur jabbar (zaalim) ke dil mein Hikmat aabad nahi huwa karti."_

(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen, p173)

🔰

Hadees e Qudsi:

Allah Ta'ala ne Janabe Musa (as) ko Wahi farmayi, "Aye Musa (as)! Maine 6 cheezo'n ko 6 cheezo'n mein rakha, lekin log doosri jagahon par unhe talaash karte phir rahe hain. Isiliye wo unhe haasil karne mein nakaam ho gaye:

(1) Maine raahat ko Jannat mein rakha, log Duniya mein talaash kar rahe hain.

(2) Maine Ilm ko bhook mein rakha, log use seyri (bhar-peyt khaane) mein talaash kar rahe hain.

(3) Maine Izzat ko Namaz e Shab mein rakha, log use Badshaho'n ke darbar mein talaash kar rahe hain.

(4) Maine bulandi ko Tawaazoh (humbleness) mein rakha, log use Takabbur mein talaash kar rahe hain.

(5) Maine Dua ki qubuliyyat ko Rizq e Halaal mein rakha, log usay qeel o qaal (chatting) mein talaash kar rahe hain.

(6) Maine tawangari (amiri) ko Qana'at (contentment) mein rakha, log use kasrat e Maal o Mataa' (excess of wealth) mein talaash kar rahe hain."

(Hadiyat ush Shia, p391)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰھُمَّ اِنِّیْ اَسْئَلُكَ سُؤَالَ خَاضِعٍ مُتَذَلِّلٍ خَاشِعٍ اَنْ تُسَامِحَنِیْ وَ تَرْحَمَنِیْ وَ تَجْعَلَنِیْ بِقِسْمِكَ رَاضِیًا قَانِعًا وَ فِیْ جَمِیْعِ الْاَحْوَالِ مُتَوَاضِعًا..*

_"Khudaya! Mein nihayat darja e Khusoo, Khuzoo aur zillat ke saath ye sawal kar raha hun ke mere saath Meherbani farma. Mujh par Rahem kar aur jo miqdar mein hain mujhe usi par Qaane' bana de. Mujhe har haal mein Tawazoh aur Furotani (Humility) ki Taufeeq ata farma..."_

(Dua-e-Kumail)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *3rd Zilqad 1440*

       *7th July 2019, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*ANBIYA PAR HAZRAT ALI (as) ki FAZILAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1239)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَكَتَبۡنَا لَهُۥ فِی ٱلۡأَلۡوَاحِ مِن كُلِّ شَیۡءࣲ مَّوۡعِظَةࣰ وَتَفۡصِیلࣰا لِّكُلِّ شَیۡءࣲ فَخُذۡهَا بِقُوَّةࣲ وَأۡمُرۡ قَوۡمَكَ یَأۡخُذُوا۟ بِأَحۡسَنِهَاۚ سَأُو۟رِیكُمۡ دَارَ ٱلۡفَـٰسِقِینَ*

_"Iske baad Hamne Musa (as) ko har sho'ba e Zindagi je mutalliq Nasihat aur har pahlu se wazeh Hidayat Takhtiyon (Tablets) par likh kar de di aur usse kaha: 'Ise mazbooti se thaam lo aur apni Qaum ko Hukm do ke woh iske behtar mafhoom ko pairavi karen. Mein anqareeb tumhe Fasiqon ke Ghar dikhaunga."_

(Surah A'raf: 145)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Is Ayat mein:_

*وَكَتَبۡنَا لَهُۥ فِی ٱلۡأَلۡوَاحِ مِن كُلِّ شَیۡءࣲ مَّوۡعِظَةࣰ*

_Allah ne yahan lafz " *من*" istemal kiya hai jiske maani hain kuchh na kuchh Nasihat likh di thi aur Allah ne *كل شئ* ka lafz mutlaq nahi kaha."_

_"Hazrat Esa (as) ke liye bhi yehi kaha "taake mein tumhare liye kuchh aisi cheezen bayan karun.." (Zukhruf: 63). Yahan bhi 'Kuchh' ka lafz aaya hai. Jabke Ameerul Mo'meneen (as) ke mutalliq ye Ayat aayi hai:_

_"Aap kah den ke mere aur tumhare darmiyan Allah bataur Gawah Kaafi hai aur meri Nabuwwat ka Khuda ke baad Gawah woh hai jiske paas poori Kitab ka ilm hai." (Ra'ad:43) Allah ne farmaya 'har Khushk o Tar ka zikr Kitab e Mubeen mein hai.' (Ana'am:59). Aur tamam Kitab ka Ilm Hazrat Ali (as) ke paas maujood hai."_

(Ehtejaaj Tabarsi, Basairud Darajat, Noorus Saqlain)

👆🏻

Isse ye saabit hua ke Hazrat Ali (as) ka Ilm H. Musa (as) aur H. Esa (as) se zyada tha bhale ye Ulool Azm Paighambar the. Inke paas juzwi (partly) Ilm tha jabke Hazrat Ali (as) ke paas Kulli (Total) Ilm tha. Isse ye sabit hua ke Hazrat Ali (as) ko Paighambaron par Fazilat haasil hai.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Khuda Wande Mut'aal ne mere bhai Ali ibne Abu Talib (as) ke beshumar Fazail bayan kiye hain. Jo bhi unke fazail mein se ek Fazilat ko zikr kare aur uska iqraar kare to Khuda Wanda uske pehle aur aainda wale Gunah maaf kar dega chaahe jitne bhi bhari Gunah kyun na hon. Aur jo bhi unke Fazail mein se kisi ek Fazilat ko likhega, jab tak uska likha hua baqi rahega Malaika uske liye Maghferat talab karte rahenge. Aur jo unki kisi ek fazilat ko sunega, Khuda Wanda uske Kaano'n se kiye hue Gunah maaf kar dega. Aur jo bhi unke likhe hue Fazail par nigah karega to Khuda Wanda uske tamam Gunah jo usne Aa'nkho'n se anjaam diye hain maaf karega…"_

(Maula Ali Ki Shaan Mein 1000 Ahadees, p51)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنَّكَ مَنَنْتَ عَلَيَّ بِزِيَارَةِ مَوْلَايَ عَلِيِّ بْنِ اَبِيْ طَالِبٍ وَ وِلَايَتِهِ وَ مَعْرِفَتِهِ فَاجْعَلْنِيْ مِمَّنْ يَنْصُرُهُ وَ يَنْتَصِرُ بِهِ وَ مُنَّ عَلَيَّ بِنَصْرِكَ لِدِيْنِكَ اَللّٰهُمَّ وَ اجْعَلْنِيْ مِنْ شِيْعَتِهِ وَ تَوَفَّنِيْ عَلٰى دِيْنِهِ.*

_"Bare Ilaha, Tu ne mera Maula Ali Ibne Abi Taalib (as) ki Ziyarat, Vilayat aur Ma'arefat ata karke mujh par Ehsaan kiya pas mujhe unke Aawan o Ansaar mein shamil kar aur mujh par Ehsaan kar ke Tere Deen ki Nusrat karun. Mujhe unke Shiayon mein qarar de aur unke Deen par utha..."_

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *4th Zilqad 1440*

       *8th July 2019, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

⚜

      ♦ _*LAUH-E-MUSA (as)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1240)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَكَتَبۡنَا لَهُۥ فِی ٱلۡأَلۡوَاحِ مِن كُلِّ شَیۡءࣲ مَّوۡعِظَةࣰ وَتَفۡصِیلࣰا لِّكُلِّ شَیۡءࣲ فَخُذۡهَا بِقُوَّةࣲ وَأۡمُرۡ قَوۡمَكَ یَأۡخُذُوا۟ بِأَحۡسَنِهَاۚ سَأُو۟رِیكُمۡ دَارَ ٱلۡفَـٰسِقِینَ*

_"Iske baad Hamne Musa (as) ko har sho'ba e Zindagi je mutalliq Nasihat aur har pahlu se wazeh Hidayat Takhtiyon (Tablets) par likh kar de di aur usse kaha: 'Ise mazbooti se thaam lo aur apni Qaum ko Hukm do ke woh iske behtar mafhoom ko pairavi karen. Mein anqareeb tumhe Fasiqon ke Ghar dikhaunga."_

(Surah A'raf: 145)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Silsila e Tazkirah e Musa (as) jaari hai:

*وَكَتَبۡنَا لَهُۥ فِی ٱلۡأَلۡوَاحِ مِن كُلِّ شَیۡءࣲ مَّوۡعِظَةࣰ*

Imam Sadiq (as):

"Allah Ta'ala ne Musa (as) par likhi hui Alwah nazil farmayi thi jin mein bahut si cheezon ki wazahat maujood thi aur Maazi o Mustaqbil (Past & Future) ke halaat is mein marqoom the. Jab Hazrat Musa (as) ki Zindagi ke akhiri ayyam qareeb aaye to Allah Ta'ala ne unhe Wahy ki aur farmaya: _Musa! Tum Jannat ke zabarjad ki ye Alwah "Zeenat" naami Pahad mein bataur amanat rakh do."

"Musa (as) wo Alwah le kar us Pahad par pahunche, Hukm e Khuda se woh Pahad phat gaya. Aap (as) ne us mein wo Takhtiyan rakh di. Baad mein phir dobara mil gaya. Wo Takhtiyan ek arsedaraz tak is Pahad mein mehfooz rahi. Jab Nabi e Akram (as) ne Nabuwwat ka Ailaan kiya is dauran Yemen ke kuchh afraad Rasool (saww) ki Ziyarat ko aa rahe the to ittefaq se us Pahad ke paas se guzar hua. Jab woh Pahad ke qareeb gaye to Pahad ka Munh khula aur wohi Alwah baramad hui. Unhone use padhna chaha lekin un par aisa rob taari hua ke woh Takhtiyan khol nahi paye. Phir jab Yemen wale Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke paas pahunche to Jibrael (as) nazil hue aur ittela di ke inke paas wo Takhtiyan hain. Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne unse wo Takhtiyan le li. Unhone poochha ke Aapko kaise pata. Aap (saww) ne farmaya ke Allah ne khabar di. Ye sun kar woh Imaan le aaye. Woh Ibraani zaban mein likhi hui thi. Aanhazrat (saww) ne wo Takhtiyan Ali (as) ko di ke isko apne paas mehfooz rakho is mein awwalin o aakherin ka Ilm hai. Hazrat Ali (as) ne Raat bhar Rasool (saww) ke kahne par apne Sar ke niche rakha, Subha hui to woh uske Aalim ban chuke the. Hazrat Ali (as) ne in matalib ko Chamde par likha. _Chunanche wo *Ilm-e-Jafr* kahlaya. Woh Ilm hamare paas maujood hai aur Alwah bhi hamare paas hai. Asaa e Musa (as) bhi hamare paas maujood hai, ham Anbiya ke Waaris hain."

(Tafseer e Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 🤲🏻

  *يَا خَالِقَ اللَّوْحِ وَالْقَلَمِ*

(Joshan Kabir)

Imam Sadiq (as) se Lauh aur Qalam ke bare mein sawal kiya gaya to aap (as) ne farmaya, _"Ye dono Farishte hain."_

(Maani Al Akhbaar, part1, p69)

*وَ لَكَ الْحَمْدُ عَدَدَ مَا اَحْصٰى كِتَابُكَ.*

_"Aur Tere liye Hamd hai un tamam cheezon ke barabar jinko Lauh e Mehfooz mein mehfooz kiya gaya hai."_

(Dua e Asharat, Mafatih, Misbah Shaikh Tusi)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

             *5th Zilqad 1440*

       *9th July 2019, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

 ♦ _*AYATULLAH KO JHUTLANA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1241)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*سَأَصۡرِفُ عَنۡ ءَایَـٰتِیَ ٱلَّذِینَ یَتَكَبَّرُونَ فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَیۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَإِن یَرَوۡا۟ كُلَّ ءَایَةࣲ لَّا یُؤۡمِنُوا۟ بِهَا وَإِن یَرَوۡا۟ سَبِیلَ ٱلرُّشۡدِ لَا یَتَّخِذُوهُ سَبِیلࣰا وَإِن یَرَوۡا۟ سَبِیلَ ٱلۡغَیِّ یَتَّخِذُوهُ سَبِیلࣰاۚ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔایَـٰتِنَا وَكَانُوا۟ عَنۡهَا غَـٰفِلِینَ ۝  وَٱلَّذِینَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔایَـٰتِنَا وَلِقَاۤءِ ٱلۡـَٔاخِرَةِ حَبِطَتۡ أَعۡمَـٰلُهُمۡۚ هَلۡ یُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كَانُوا۟ یَعۡمَلُونَ.*

_"Main Apni Nishaniyon se un logon ki Nigahen pher dunga jo kisi Haq ke baghair Zameen mein bade bante hain. Woh agar tamam Nishaniyan bhi dekhen phir bhi un par Imaan nahi layenge aur agar Seedha Raasta dekhen to use nahi apnayenge aur agar woh tedha raasta dekhen to us par chal padenge. *Ye sab kuchh isliye hai ke unhone Hamari Ayaton (Nishaniyon) ko jhutlaya aur un se be parwahi karte rahe."*_

_"Woh log jinhone Hamari Ayaat aur Akherat ki Mulaqat ko Jhutlaya unke saare Aamaal zaaye ho gaye to kya log iske siwa kuchh aur Jaza paa sakte hain ke woh jaisa karen waisa bharen."_

(Surah A'raf: 146 - 147)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Isi tarah ki Qur'an mein ek aur Ayat guzar chuki hai (2:167). (An'aam: 27-28)

Ayatullah yani Allah ki Nishaniyan. Allah ki Nishaniyan sirf Allah ki taraf se hoti hain. Rivayaaton mein Aimma e Masoomeen (as) ko Ayatullah ka khitab diya gaya hai. Jo Allah ki Nishaniyon ki itteba' karega usko Momin kahte hain.

🕌

Rivayat:

Jabir bin Abdullah Ansari  Imam Ali (as) ke saath Masjid e Kufa mein dakhil hue to Imam Ali (as) kisi se farma rahe the jabke koi dikhai nahi de raha tha: _"Khuda ki Qasam mein nahi kar sakta."_ unhone Maula se daryaft kiya to farmaya:

_"Ay Jabir! Mujhe Wadiye Barhoot ka nazara dikhaya gaya, meine dekha mere Dushman ko uske Taboot mein Azaab diya jaa raha hai, aur mujhe pukar raha hai: Ya Abul Hasan, Ya Ameerul Mo'meneen! Mujhe Duniya mein wapas bula lo ham aapki Fazilat o Wilayat ki gawahi denge. Tab meine kaha: _"Khuda ki Qasam mein nahi kar sakta, aisa nahi hoga."_ Phir Imam Ali (as) ne ye Ayat (6:27-28) padhi. Phir farmaya:

_*"Ay Jabir! Jo bhi Nabi (saww) ke Wasi ko jhutlayega woh Qayamat ke Din Andha uthaya jayega aur Qayamat ke Maidan mein munh ke bal ghaseeta jayega."*_

Isiliye jo Ayatullah Aimma e Masoomeen ko jhutlayega aur khud sakhta Ayatullah ko follow karega uska yehi haal hoga.

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Al Burhan, Vol 3, P-23)

🔰

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Imam Ayatullah (Allah ki Ayat) hota hai aur Naskh Ayat ke qanoon ke tehet jab bhi Khuda kisi Imam ko wafat deta hai ya uska zikr faramosh karata hai to isse behtar ya us jaisa Imam uski sulb se paida karta hai. "_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain) (Ayat Nasikh Mansookh ke zel mein)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww)

_"Aye Ali (as)! Roz e Qayamat main, tum aur Jibreel (as) Siraat par baithenge aur koi uspar se nahi guzrega magar woh jiske paas tumhari Wilayat ke sabab se aatish e Dozakh se Nijaat ka parwana hoga."_

(Isbaat e Imamat - Allamah Majlisi, p75, Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v1, p52)

🤲🏻
