اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا وَصِيَّ الْاَوْصِيَاۤءِ اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا عِمَادَ الْاَتْقِيَاۤءِ اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا وَلِيَّ الْاَوْلِيَاۤءِ اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا سَيِّدَ الشُّهَدَاۤءِ *اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا اٰيَةَ اللّٰهِ الْعُظْمٰى اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ* يَا خَامِسَ اَهْلِ الْعَبَاۤءِ اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا قَاۤئِدَ الْغُرِّ الْمُحَجَّلِيْنَ الْاَتْقِيَاۤءِ اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا عِصْمَةَ الْاَوْلِيَاۤءِ اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا زَيْنَ الْمُوَحِّدِيْنَ النُّجَبَاۤءِ اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا خَالِصَ الْاَخِلَّاۤءِ اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا وَالِدَ الْاَئِمَّةِ الْاُمَنَاۤءِ...

_"Salam ho Aap par aye Wasiyon ke Wasi. Salam ho Aap par Aye Shohada ke Sardar. *Salam ho Aap par Aye Allah ki Azeem tareen Nishani (Azeem Ayatullah).* Salam ho Aap par Aye Ahle Eba ki Panchvi Fard....."_

(Ziyarat Roze Wiladat Rasoole Khuda (saww) & Imam Sadiq (as) - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

              *6th Zilqad 1440*

    *10th July 2019, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

     ♦ _*GAUSHALA PARASTI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1242)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَٱتَّخَذَ قَوۡمُ مُوسَىٰ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ مِنۡ حُلِیِّهِمۡ عِجۡلࣰا جَسَدࣰا لَّهُۥ خُوَارٌۚ أَلَمۡ یَرَوۡا۟ أَنَّهُۥ لَا یُكَلِّمُهُمۡ وَلَا یَهۡدِیهِمۡ سَبِیلًاۘ ٱتَّخَذُوهُ وَكَانُوا۟ ظَـٰلِمِینَ*

_"Musa (as) ke baad uski Qaum ne apne Zewaron se ek Bachhde (Calf) ka putla banaya jis mein Bail ki awaz nikalti thi. Kya inhe nazar na aata tha ke wo na to un se bol sakta hai aur na hi unki rahnumai kar sakta hai magar phir bhi unhone use Ma'bood bana liya tha aue woh sakhr zalim the."_

(Surah A'raf: 148)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Silsila e Tazkirah e Musa (as) jaari hai:

🐮

Jab Musa (as) Taurat lene Tur e Sina par gaye aur 30 Raaton se zyada Khuda ne thairaya to Samri ne Bani Israel se Sone ikatthe kiye aur use pighla kar Sona ka Bachhda tayyar kiya jis mein Jibrael (as) ke qadmon ki khaak dali to us Bachhde mein Bail ke dakarne ki awazen paida huin. Samri ne logon se kaha ke ye Hazrat Musa (as) wa Haroon (as) ka Ma'bood hai lehaza tum bhi iski Ibaadat karo. Log gumrah ho gaye aur Bachhde ko poojne lag gaye. Hazrat Haroon (as) ne logon ko bahut Nasihat ki aur unhe Bachhda parasti se mana kiya lekin chand afraad ke alawa kisi doosre ne pairavi na ki.

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

Is waqae ko dhiyan mein rakhen Natija akhir mein batayenge.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jab Allah Ta'ala ne Hazrat Musa (as) ko khabar di ke unki adam majoodgi (absence) mein Samar ne ek Bachhda bana kar unki Qaum ko gumrah kar diya hai to ye khabar sun kar unhe ghussa aaya lekin wo ghussa qabile bardasht tha. Aur jab unhone apni Aankhon se logon ki gumrahi ko dekha to unka ghussa itna badha ke unke haathon se Alwah gir paden. Isse sabit hota hai ke sunne ki ba nisbat dekhne ka asar zyada hota hai."_

🤲🏻

*وَ بِاسْمِكَ الَّذِيْ دَعَاكَ بِهِ مُوْسَى بْنُ عِمْرَانَ مِنْ جَانِبِ الطُّوْرِ الْاَيْمَنِ، فَاسْتَجَبْتَ لَهُ وَ اَلْقَيْتَ عَلَيْهِ مَحَبَّةً مِنْكَ*

(Dua e Arafa - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

               *7th Zilqad 1440*

     *11th July 2019, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

     ♦ _*GAUSHALA PARASTI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1243)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَمَّا سُقِطَ فِیۤ أَیۡدِیهِمۡ وَرَأَوۡا۟ أَنَّهُمۡ قَدۡ ضَلُّوا۟ قَالُوا۟ لَىِٕن لَّمۡ یَرۡحَمۡنَا رَبُّنَا وَیَغۡفِرۡ لَنَا لَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡخَـٰسِرِینَ*

_"Aur jab unki fareb khurdgi ka talisman toot gaya aur unhone dekh liya ke woh gumrah ho chuke hain to kahne lage agar hamare Rab ne ham par Rahem na kiya aur ham se dar guzar na kiya to ham nuqsan uthane walon mein se ho jayenge."_

(Surah A'raf: 149)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Silsila e Tazkirah e Musa (as) jaari hai:

🐮

Hazrat Musa (as) Kohe Tur se wapas aane lage to Khuda ne unhe bataya ke hamne teri Qaum ki Azmayish ki hai. Samri ne ek Gaushala banaya jis mein se Bail ki awaz aati hai. Teri Qaum ki aksariyat us waqt Gaushala Parasti mein mubtila ho chuki hai. Hazrat Musa (as) ne Bargahe Ilahi mein awaz ke bare mein sawal kiya. Allah ne farmaya ke Qaum ki Azmayish ke liye awaz Hamne paida ki. Hazrat Ali (as) ki rivayat ke mutabiq Firaun bhi Gaye ki pooja karta tha isliye Samri ne Bachhda banaya.

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Imam Ali (as) se sawaal huwa ke Bayl (bullock) ki nigahen hamesha zameen ki taraf jhuki kyun rehti hain, aakhir Bayl sar uthha kar aasmaan ki taraf kyun nahi dekhta? Imam (as) ne jawaab diya, _"Jab se Qaum e Musa (as) ne gausala (bachhde) ki pooja ki thi us Din wo sharm ke maare aasmaan ki taraf aa'nkh nahi uthhata aur hamesha sar jhukaaye rehta hai."_

(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v1, p150)

🤲🏻

_"Tere us Naam ke zariye se (Tujhe pukarta hun) jis Naam se Kohe Tur par Mus bin Imran (as) ne Dua ki thi aur Tu ne qubool ki."_

(Dua-e-Arafa - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

              *8th Zilqad 1440*

        *12th July 2019, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

  ♦ _*H. MUSA (as) ki NARAAZGI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1244)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَمَّا رَجَعَ مُوسَىٰۤ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ غَضۡبَـٰنَ أَسِفࣰا قَالَ بِئۡسَمَا خَلَفۡتُمُونِی مِنۢ بَعۡدِیۤۖ أَعَجِلۡتُمۡ أَمۡرَ رَبِّكُمۡۖ وَأَلۡقَى ٱلۡأَلۡوَاحَ وَأَخَذَ بِرَأۡسِ أَخِیهِ یَجُرُّهُۥۤ إِلَیۡهِۚ قَالَ ٱبۡنَ أُمَّ إِنَّ ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱسۡتَضۡعَفُونِی وَكَادُوا۟ یَقۡتُلُونَنِی فَلَا تُشۡمِتۡ بِیَ ٱلۡأَعۡدَاۤءَ وَلَا تَجۡعَلۡنِی مَعَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِینَ*

_"Jab Musa (as) ghusse aur ranj se bhare hua apni Qaum ki taraf palte to unhone aa kar kaha tum ne mere baad bahut buri Janashini ki. Kya tum se itna Sabr na hua ke apne Rab ke Hukm ka intezar kar lete? Aur unhone Takhtiyan (Tablets) phenk di aur apne bhai ke Sar se pakad ke apni jaanib khencha. Haroon (as) ne kaha: Aye meri Maa ke bete! Un logon ne mujhe kamzor bana diya tha aur qareeb tha ke mujhe mar dalte to Dushmanon ko mujh par hansne ka mauqa na den aur is Zalim giroh ke saath mujhe shamil na karen."_

(Surah A'raf: 150)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Silsila e Tazkirah e Musa (as) jaari hai:

🐮

Imam Sadiq (as) se poochha gaya ke Janabe Haroon (as) ne H. Musa (as) ko 'Maa jaye' se kyon khitab kiya?

Aap (as) ne farmaya:

_"Jab bhai mukhtalif Aurton se hon to un mein Adawat (enemity) zyada hoti hai. Aur jab Maa ek ho to un mein nafrat o adawat bahut kam hoti hai. Albatta Shaitan in mein Dushmani paida kar de to phir aur baat hai. Isi Nafsiyati nuqte ko madde nazar rakh kar Hazrat Haroon (as) ne Janabe Musa (as) se kaha ke 'Aye meri Maa ke farzand! Meri dadhi aur mere Sar se mat pakdo."_

Sawal hua:' Lekin H. Moosa (as) ko un par kyon ghussa aaya jabke unka is mein koi haath nahi tha?

Imam (as) ne farmaya:

_"Iski wajah ye thi ke Musa (as) ko un par isliye ghussa aaya ke woh Qaum mein maujood rahe. Woh Qaum ko chhod kar Musa (as) ke paas kyon na chale gaye the, jabke haqeeqat ye thi ke agar Haroon (as) Qaum ko chhod kar chale jaate to us Qaum par Khuda ka Azaab aa jata. Kya tum nahi dekhte ke Musa (as) ne jab yehi sawal kya (Taha:93) to Haroon (as) ne farmaya ke 'mujhe ye andesha hua ke Aap mujh se ye na kahen ke tum ne Bani Israel mein tafreeq (Differences) paida kar di aur mere farman ka intezar na kiya (Taha:94)."_

(Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)

🍂

Hazrat Haroon (as) wa Hazrat Musa (as) dono sage bhai the, dono ke walidain ek the.

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim, Rauza e Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Reza (as):

_"Bada bhai baap ki jagah par hota hai."_

(Nawaadirul Ahadees, v1, p145)

🤲🏻

*وَ بِحَقِّ الْقَلَمِ وَ مَا جَرٰى وَ اللَّوْحِ وَ مَاۤ اَحْصٰى وَ بِحَقِّ الْاِسْمِ الَّذِيْ كَتَبْتَهُ عَلٰى سُرَادِقِ الْعَرْشِ قَبْلَ خَلْقِكَ الْخَلْقَ وَ الدُّنْيَا*

(Dua-e-Arafa, Shabe Juma - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

              *9th Zilqad 1440*

      *13th July 2019, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

    ♦ _*UMMAT KI BEWAFAI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1245)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَمَّا رَجَعَ مُوسَىٰۤ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ غَضۡبَـٰنَ أَسِفࣰا قَالَ بِئۡسَمَا خَلَفۡتُمُونِی مِنۢ بَعۡدِیۤۖ أَعَجِلۡتُمۡ أَمۡرَ رَبِّكُمۡۖ وَأَلۡقَى ٱلۡأَلۡوَاحَ وَأَخَذَ بِرَأۡسِ أَخِیهِ یَجُرُّهُۥۤ إِلَیۡهِۚ قَالَ ٱبۡنَ أُمَّ إِنَّ ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱسۡتَضۡعَفُونِی وَكَادُوا۟ یَقۡتُلُونَنِی فَلَا تُشۡمِتۡ بِیَ ٱلۡأَعۡدَاۤءَ وَلَا تَجۡعَلۡنِی مَعَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِینَ*

_"Jab Musa (as) ghusse aur ranj se bhare hua apni Qaum ki taraf palte to unhone aa kar kaha tum ne mere baad bahut buri Janashini ki. Kya tum se itna Sabr na hua ke apne Rab ke Hukm ka intezar kar lete? Aur unhone Takhtiyan (Tablets) phenk di aur apne bhai ke Sar se pakad ke apni jaanib khencha. Haroon (as) ne kaha: Aye meri Maa ke bete! Un logon ne mujhe kamzor bana diya tha aur qareeb tha ke mujhe mar dalte to Dushmanon ko mujh par hansne ka mauqa na den aur is Zalim giroh ke saath mujhe shamil na karen."_

(Surah A'raf: 150)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Silsila e Tazkirah e Musa (as) jaari hai. Is Story ka Natija pesh Khidmat hai:

🐮

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Hazrat Musa (as) ne 70 Hazaar afraad se apne bhai Haroon ki Khilafat ki Bai'at li thi lekin jab Samri ne Gausala banaya to logon ki bhari aksariyat ne Haroon (as) ko chhod diya tha aur Samri aur uske Gausala ke peechhe lag gaye the. Isi tarah se Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne bhi Hujjatul Wuda (Last Hajj) se wapsi par 70 Hazaar ya isse bhi zyada afraad se Hazrat Ali (as) ki Bai'at li thi lekin jab Aanhazrat (saww) ki wafat hui to Ummat e Islamiya ne bhi Ali (as) ko isi tarah se chhod diya tha jaisa ke Ummat e Musa (as) ne Hazrat Haroon (as) ko chhod diya tha."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

💂🏻‍♀

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) apne Siyaasi Hareef se khitab kiya:

_"Jin 40 afraad ne meri Bai'at ki thi agar woh apni Bai'at par poori tarah se qaim rahte to mein Raahe Khuda mein tum se Jihaad karta aur Jihaad ka Haq ada karta. Yaad rakho! Qayamat tak tumhari Aulad mein se koi bhi ye mansab hasil nahi kar payega."_

Phir Aap (as) ne Qabre Rasool (saww) ki taraf rukh kiya aur ye Ayat padhi (7:150).

(Ehtejaj Tabarsi, Sulaim bin Qais, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ne ek baade se guzarte waqt jis mein 30 Bakriyan maujood thin farmaya:

_"Agar in Bakriyon ki tadaad ke barabar bhi mujhe aise log mil jate jo Khuda aur uske sachche khair khwah hote to mein "apne siyaasi hareef (opposite)" ke iqtedar ka khatma kar deta."_

"Sham hui to 360 afraad ne Maut par aap ki Bai'at ki. Aap ne farmaya ke kal Subah savere Sar munda kar Madine se bahar "Ahjaruz Zait" naami maqam par pahunch jana. Dooari Subah Aap Sar munda kar wahan pahunche aur Aap ke alawa Abu Zar, Miqdad, Huzaifa Yamani, Ammar Yasir, Salman Farsi Sar mundwa kar wahan pahunche. Us waqt Aap (as) ne Aasmaan ki taraf haath buland kiye aur Bargahe Ahdiyat mein arz kiya:

_"Khudaya! Gawah rahna! Qaum ne mujhe isi tarah kamzor kar diya jaisa ke Bani Israel ne Haroon (as) ko kamzor kar diya tha."_

(Khutba e Talooviya - Rauza e Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰہُمَّ الْعَنْ صَنَمَیْ قُرَیْشٍ وَ جِبْتَیْہَا وَ طَاغُوْتَیْہَا وَ اِفْکَیْہَا وَ اِبْنَتَیْہَا الَّذَیْنِ خَالَفَا اَمْرَکَ وَ اَنْکَرَا وَحْیَکَ*

(Dua-e-Sanama e Quraish - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

              *10th Zilqad 1440*

        *14th July 2019, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

    ♦ _*UMMAT KI BEWAFAI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1246)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قَالَ رَبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ لِی وَلِأَخِی وَأَدۡخِلۡنَا فِی رَحۡمَتِكَۖ وَأَنتَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّ ٰ⁠حِمِینَ ۝  إِنَّ ٱلَّذِینَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ ٱلۡعِجۡلَ سَیَنَالُهُمۡ غَضَبࣱ مِّن رَّبِّهِمۡ وَذِلَّةࣱ فِی ٱلۡحَیَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡیَاۚ وَكَذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ نَجۡزِی ٱلۡمُفۡتَرِینَ ۝  وَٱلَّذِینَ عَمِلُوا۟ ٱلسَّیِّـَٔاتِ ثُمَّ تَابُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهَا وَءَامَنُوۤا۟ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهَا لَغَفُورࣱ رَّحِیمࣱ*

_"Tab Musa (as) ne kaha: Aye Rab! Mujhe aur mere bhai ko Ma'af kar de aur hamen apni Rahmat mein dakhil farma. Tu sab se badh kar Meherban hai. Jin logon ne Bachhde ko Ma'bood banaya woh zaroor apne Rab ke Ghazab mein giraftar honge aur Duniya ki Zindagi mein Zaleel honge aur Jhoot tarashne walon ko Ham aisi hi Saza diya karte hain."_

(Surah A'raf: 151 - 153)

📚📖 🔰

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Sawal hota hai aur hua hai ke jabke Hazrat Ali (as) ne badi badi Jange ladin, jabke Moaviya, Talha o Zubair aur Aisha se bhi Jang hui lekin *Imam (as) ne apne Pichhle Hareef Khulafa se Jang kyon nahi ki, kiya woh Haq par the?*

Ye sawal sun kar Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ne Masjid ke mimber se farmaya:

"Suno! Meine apne Mukhalefin se na Jang kar ke 6 Anbiya ki pairavi ki hai. Jabke Anbiya (as) ki Seerat Uswa-e-Hasana ka darja rakhti hai."

1. "Meine sab se pahle Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ki pairavi ki hai. Unhone apni Qaum se kaha _"Mein tum se aur Khuda ke alawa jin ki tum pooja karte ho, unse bhi alaihdgi ikhtiyar karta hun."_ (Maryam: 48) Ab agar tum kaho ke Ibrahim (as) ne kisi wajah ke baghair Qaum se alaihdgi ikhtiyar ki thi to Kafir ban jaoge aur agar tum kaho ke unhe koi takleef pahunchi thi isi liye unhone Qaum se alaihdgi ikhtiyar kar li thi to tumhari ye baat yaqeenan sahih hogi. Jab Ibrahim (as) ne Nabi ho kar Jang nahi ki thi to mein Wasi ho kar kyon Jang karta?"

2. "Maine Jang na karke Hazrat Lut (as) ki pairavi ki. Jab Lut (as) ne kaha: _"Kaash mujhe tumhare muqabile par quwwat hoti ya mein kisi mazboot panahgah ki panah le sakta."_ (Hud: 80) Ab agar tum kaho ke Lut (as) ke paas quwwat maujood thi phir bhi unhone badmash logon se Jang nahi ki thi to tum Kafir ban jaoge. Agar ye kaho ke unke paas quwwat nahi thi isiliye unhone Jang nahi ki thi to tumhari ye baat sach par mabni hogi. Jab Lut (as) ne Nabi ho kar quwwat na hone ko wajah se Jang nahi ki to meine bhi Wasi ho kar Jang nahi ki."....

(Rivayat jari rahegi)

(Kitab Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Ali (as):

_"Akherat ki Ne'mat se wohi shakhs nawaaza jayega, jisne duniya ki balaa par Sabr kiya hai."_

(Gorar ul Hakam, v1, p29)

🤲🏻

*يَاۤ اَمِيْرَ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ وَ يَاۤ اَبَا عَبْدِ اللّٰهِ‏ عَلَيْكَ [عَلَيْكُمَا] مِنِّيْ سَلَامُ اللّٰهِ اَبَدًا مَّا بَقِيْتُ‏ وَ بَقِيَ اللَّيْلُ وَ النَّهَارُ، وَ لَا جَعَلَهُ اللّٰهُ اٰخِرَ الْعَهْدِ مِنْ زِيَارَتِكُمَا وَ لَا فَرَّقَ اللّٰهُ بَيْنِيْ وَ بَيْنَكُمَا اَللّٰهُمَّ اَحْيِنِيْ حَيَاةَ مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ ذُرِّيَّتِهِ وَ اَمِتْنِيْ مَمَاتَهُمْ وَ تَوَفَّنِيْ عَلٰى مِلَّتِهِمْ وَ احْشُرْنِيْ فِيْ زُمْرَتِهِمْ..*

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL CELEBRATES WILADAT OF IMAM REZA (as)*

**********************************

              *11th Zilqad 1440*

        *15th July 2019, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

    ♦ _*UMMAT KI BEWAFAI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1247)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَمَّا سَكَتَ عَن مُّوسَى ٱلۡغَضَبُ أَخَذَ ٱلۡأَلۡوَاحَۖ وَفِی نُسۡخَتِهَا هُدࣰى وَرَحۡمَةࣱ لِّلَّذِینَ هُمۡ لِرَبِّهِمۡ یَرۡهَبُونَ*

_"Aur Jab Musa (as) ka Ghussa thanda hua to usne wo Takhtiyan uthain jinki Tehreer mein Hidayat aur Rehmat thi un logon ke liye jo apne Rab se darte hain."_

(Surah A'raf: 154)

📚📖 🔰

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Silsila e Tazkirah e Musa (as) jaari hai:

Sawal hota hai aur hua hai ke jabke Hazrat Ali (as) ne badi badi Jange ladin, jabke Moaviya, Talha o Zubair aur Aisha se bhi Jang hui lekin *Imam (as) ne apne Pichhle Hareef Khulafa se Jang kyon nahi ki, kiya woh Haq par the?*

Ye sawal sun kar Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ne Masjid ke mimber se farmaya:

"Suno! Meine apne Mukhalefin se na Jang kar ke 6 Anbiya ki pairavi ki hai. Jabke Anbiya (as) ki Seerat Uswa-e-Hasana ka darja rakhti hai."

Rivayaat jaari hai:

3. "Maine Jung na karke hazrat Yusuf (as) ki pairavi ki hai kyonke Hazrat Yusuf (as) ne Misr ki Aurton ke hathon majboor hokar ye dua ki thi: "Khudaya! In Aurton ki Dawat qubool karne se mujhe Zindan (Jail) jana zyada pasand hai." (Yusuf: 33) Agar tum kaho ke Yusuf (a.s) naraaz the isiliye khuda ne unhe Zindaan bheja tha to Kafir ho jaoge. Aur agar ye kaho ke unhone Zindaan jane ki isliye darkhast ki thi ke kahin Khuda unpar Naraaz na ho jaye aur wo Aurton ke chakkar me na ulajh jaye. Jab Yusuf (as) Nabi hokar jung nahi karte to main Wasi hokar jung kyon karta?"

4."Maine jung na karke Musa (as) ki pairavi ki hai. Unhone farmaya tha: "Jab main tumse  khaufzada hua to main tumhare haan se bhaag gaya tha." (Shua'ara: 21) Ab agar tum kaho ke Musa (as) kisi khauf ke bagair bhaag gaye the to Kafir ho jaoge. Aur agar tum ye kaho ke unhe waqai khauf lahaq tha isiliye wo Misr se bhagne par majboor hue the to tumhari ye baat durust hogi. Jab Musa (a.s) Nabi hokar khaufzada ho sakte hain aur wo jung nahi karte to main Wasi hokar jung kyon karta?

(Rivayat jari rahegi)

(Kitab Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

🌸🌸🌸🌸🌸🌸🌸🌸🌸🌸

_*EVENT OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 ⛓

_*HADIS SILSALATUZ ZAHAB (Golden Chain)*_

(Daurane Safar Nishapur mein)

Imam Raza (as):

_"Mere Walid Musa Kazim, unke Walid Imam Jafar Sadiq (as), unke walid Mohd Baqir (as), unke walid Imam Zainul Abidin (as), unke walid Shaheed e Karbala (Imam Hussain) (as), unke Walid  Ali ibn Abu Talib (as), Rasoole Khuda  (saw), Jibrail (as) se marvi hai ke Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya:_

_"Kalima e 'La ilaha illallah' Mera Qila hai, jo bhi is ko dohraiga Mere Qile mein dakhil hoga, aur jo Mere Qile mein dakhil hoga Mere Azaab se bach jayega."_

Phir Imam Reza (as) ne farmaya:

_"Kuchh sharait ke sath."_

_*"Aur mein un sharton mein se ek hun."*_

(Ahsan al-Maqaal by Syed Safdar Hussain Najafi quoted from The official website of grand ayatollah Saafi Gulpaygani, Ibn Sabbagh al-Maleki. Al-Fusool al-Mohimmah. pp. 243–244.)

🤲🏻

Bare Ilaha aaj ke is Mubarak Din par hame hamari kohtayyon ko door farma aur apne nek maqsad mein kamyabi ata farma.

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

           *12th Zilqad 1440*

    *16th July 2018, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

         ♦ _*INTEZARUL FARAJ*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran:

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ نَجَّيْنَاكُمْ مِنْ آلِ فِرْعَوْنَ يَسُومُونَكُمْ سُوءَ الْعَذَابِ يُذَبِّحُونَ أَبْنَاءَكُمْ وَيَسْتَحْيُونَ نِسَاءَكُمْ ۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكُمْ بَلَاءٌ مِنْ رَبِّكُمْ عَظِيمٌ*

_"Aur jab Hamne tumhe Khandane Firaun se nijaat di jo tumhe badtareen dukh de kar satate the. Tumhare ladkon ko zibah karte the aur tumhari betiyon ko zinda rakhte the. Is mein tumhare Parwardigar ki taraf sakht azmaish thi."_

(Surah Baqarah: 49)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Zainul Abedin (as) ne Syedus Shuhada Imam Husain (as) se, unhone apni walid, unhone Rasoole Khuda (saww) se rivayat ki hai:

.........

_Wo Faqih unhe ek sahra me le gaya aur usne kahna shuru kiya ke tumhare masaeb ke din khatm hone ko hain aur hamara Nijaat Dahinda aane hi wala hai aur uske Zuhoor ke lamhat qareeb hain"_

_"Wo chandni Raat thi. Abhi wo Sahra me baithkar in baaton mein masroof the ke Hazrat Moosa (as) unke paas pahunche. Us waqt Aap Naukhez Jawaan the (jab Imam Mahdi (atfs) zahoor karenge to woh bhi jawan honge) aur sair ki garz se Firaun ke Mahel se bahar nikle the. Hazrat Moosa (as) ne Israeliyon ke ijtema ko dekha to woh apne naukaron ke Juloos se nikal kar tano tanha wahan chale gaye. Aap ek khacchar par sawaar the aur Aapne Resham ka Libaas pehena hua tha. Jab Faqih ne Hazrat Moosa (as) ko dekha to usne unki Alamaat se pahchan liya ke Bani Israel ka Nijaat Dahinda (Awaited Saviour) yahi hain. Chunanche wo apni jagah se uthkar unke qadmon mein gir pada aur unhe bose dene lag gaya aur usne kaha, Khuda ka shukr hai ke Usne marne se qabl mujhe Aapki Ziyarat ka sharaf ata kiya. Jab uske doosre sathiyon ne dekha to unhen bhi yaqeen ho gaya Hazrat Moosa (as) hi unke Nijaat Dahinda hain. Chunanche wo Sajda e Shukr baja laye. Us waqt Hazrat Moosa (a.s) ne unse sirf yahi kahan ke mujhe umeed hai ke Allah tumhe jald Nijaat dega. Uske baad Hazrat Moosa (as) wahan se chale gaye . Phir kuchh dino baad unhone Firaun ka Mahel aur shahr chhod diya aur Madayen shahr chale gaye jahan unhone ek arse tak Hazrat shoeb (a.s) paighambar ke haan qayam kiya."_

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Mahdi (atfs):

_"Main hi Mahdi hoo'n, main hi Qaim uz Zamaan hoo'n, main hi zameen ko is tarah adl o insaaf se bhar doonga jis tarah wo zulm o jaur se bhar chuki hogi. Zameen Hujjat e Khuda se khaali nahi rehti."_

(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen, p255)

🤲🏻

*اللهم عجل لولیک فرج*

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

             *13th Zilqad 1440*

   *17th July 2019, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

    ♦ _*UMMAT KI BEWAFAI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1248)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَٱخۡتَارَ مُوسَىٰ قَوۡمَهُۥ سَبۡعِینَ رَجُلࣰا لِّمِیقَـٰتِنَاۖ فَلَمَّاۤ أَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلرَّجۡفَةُ قَالَ رَبِّ لَوۡ شِئۡتَ أَهۡلَكۡتَهُم مِّن قَبۡلُ وَإِیَّـٰیَۖ أَتُهۡلِكُنَا بِمَا فَعَلَ ٱلسُّفَهَاۤءُ مِنَّاۤۖ إِنۡ هِیَ إِلَّا فِتۡنَتُكَ تُضِلُّ بِهَا مَن تَشَاۤءُ وَتَهۡدِی مَن تَشَاۤءُۖ أَنتَ وَلِیُّنَا فَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَا وَٱرۡحَمۡنَاۖ وَأَنتَ خَیۡرُ ٱلۡغَـٰفِرِینَ*

(Surah A'raf: 155)

📚📖 🔰

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Silsila e Tazkirah e Musa (as) jaari hai:

Sawal hota hai aur hua hai ke jabke Hazrat Ali (as) ne badi badi Jange ladin, jabke Moaviya, Talha o Zubair aur Aisha se bhi Jang hui lekin *Imam (as) ne apne Pichhle Hareef Khulafa se Jang kyon nahi ki, kiya woh Haq par the?*

Ye sawal sun kar Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ne Masjid ke mimber se farmaya:

"Suno! Meine apne Mukhalefin se na Jang kar ke 6 Anbiya ki pairavi ki hai. Jabke Anbiya (as) ki Seerat Uswa-e-Hasana ka darja rakhti hai."

Rivayaat jaari hai:

5. "Maine Jung na karke Hazrat Haroon (as) ki pairavi ki hai. Jab Gausala Parasti ki wajah Hazrat Musa (as) un par naraaz hone lage the to unhone Musa (as) se kaha tha:"Meri Maa ke farzand! Qaum ne mujhe kamzor kar diya tha aur qareeb tha ke woh mujhe qatl kar dete." (7:150)  Agar tum kaho ke Qaum ne Haroon (as) ko kamzor nahi kiya th aur unke qatl ke dar pai nahi hui thi to tum Kafir ban jaoge. Aur agar tum kaho ke Qaum ne waqai unhe kamzor kiya tha aur unke qatl ki mansooba bandi ki thi to ye baat sahi hogi. Jab Haroon (as) ne Nabi ho kar Samri aur uske saathiyon se Jung nahi ki to mein Wasi ho kar kaise jung karta?"

(Aap (as) waise bhi mein baqaul Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke Haroon (as) ki  Manzalat par the.)

6. "Meine Jung na kar ke Rasoole Khuda (saww) ki Pairavi ki hai kyonki Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Makkah mein koi jung nahi ki thi. Aap (saww) ne Makkah se Hijrat ki thi aur apne bistar par mujhe sula kar khud ek Ghaar mein ja chhupe the. Ab agar tum ye kaho ke Nabi e Akram (saww) kisi khauf ke baghair Ghaar mein ja chhupe the to Kafir ho jaoge. Aur agar kaho ke Aap (saww) ko waqai khauf lahaq tha isi liye Aap (saww) Ghaar mein ja chhupe the. Agar Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Rasool ho kar Kuffar e Makkah se Jung nahi ki to mein Wasi ho kar kaise Jung kar sakta tha? (Agar ye kaha jaye ke Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Madina pahunch kar to jungen ki thi. Ham bhi yehi kahenge ke Muhammad (saww) ke Wasi ne bhi Kufa pahunch kar jungen ki thi.)

(Rivayat Ends)

(Kitab Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 🤲🏻

_"Musa (as) ne hamare muqarrar kardah waqt ke liye apni Qaum ke 70 afraad ka intikhab kiya. Jab un logon ko sakht zalzale ne aa pakda to Musa (as) ne kaha: Parwardigar! Agar Tu chahta to mujhe aur unko isse pahle bhi halaak kar sakta tha. Kya Tu hamare chand nadano ke fe'l ki wajah se hamara mo'akheza (punish) kar raha hai. Ye to aap ki dali hui ek Azmayish hai jiske zariye Tu jise chahta hai gumrahi mein mubtila dekhta hai aur jise chahta hai Hidayat deta hai. Tu hi hamara Sarparast hai. Hamari Maghferat farma aur ham par Rahem farma aur Tu hi sab se badh kar Ma'af karne wala hai."_

(Surah A'raf: 155)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

             *14th Zilqad 1440*

     *18th July 2019, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

     ♦ _*UMMAT KI BEWAFAI*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1249)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَٱكۡتُبۡ لَنَا فِی هَـٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡیَا حَسَنَةࣰ وَفِی ٱلۡـَٔاخِرَةِ إِنَّا هُدۡنَاۤ إِلَیۡكَۚ قَالَ عَذَابِیۤ أُصِیبُ بِهِۦ مَنۡ أَشَاۤءُۖ وَرَحۡمَتِی وَسِعَتۡ كُلَّ شَیۡءࣲۚ فَسَأَكۡتُبُهَا لِلَّذِینَ یَتَّقُونَ وَیُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَٱلَّذِینَ هُم بِـَٔایَـٰتِنَا یُؤۡمِنُونَ.*

_"Aur Hamare liye is Duniya ki bhalai bhi likh de aur Akherat ki bhalai bhi likh de. Hamne Teri taraf Rujoo' kiya hai."_

_"Khuda ne farmaya: Mein jise chahta hun us par apna Azaab nazil karta hun magar Meri Rehmat har cheez par chhayi hui hai aur ise mein un logon ke liye likhunga jo Nafarmani se parhez karte hain, Zakat dete hain aur Meri Ayaat par Imaan rakhte hain."_

(Surah A'raf: 156)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

*Is Sawal ka Jawab jaari hai ke Hazrat Ali (as) ne 25 Saal khamoshi kyon ikhtiyar ki?*

Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Ali (as) se farmaya:

_"Mere bhai! Mere baad Aap (as) zinda rahege aur Quraish ki taraf se tumhe Zulm o Sitam ka saamna karna padega. Agar tumhe madadgar mil jayen to unse Jung karna aur apne mu'afiq afraad ki madad se Mukhalefin se ladayi karna aur agar tumhe madadgar na mile to Sabr iktiyar karna aur Haath na uthana aur apne aapko halakat mein mat daalna. Tumhe mujhse wohi Manzelat haasil hai jo Haroon (as) ko Musa (as) se thi. Tumhe Haroon (as) ki Seerat par amal karna hoga aur jab Bani Israel ne Haroon (as) ko kamzor kar diya tha aur unke qatl ke dar pay ho gaye the to unhone khamoshi iktiyar ki thi. Lihaza jab dekho ke Quraish Aap ke khilaf ijtema kar chuke hain to tum bhi Haroon (as) ki tarah se khamoshi iktiyar karna."_

(Kamaluddin, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Jo shakhs 40 Dino tak Allah ke liye apne Imaan ko khaalis rakhe ya jo shakhs 40 Dino tak acche andaaz se Allah ka Zikr kare to Khuda use Duniya ka Zuhud ata karega. Use Duniya ki Bimaari aur uski Dawai ki pehchan ata karega aur uske Dil mein Hikmat ko mustehkam karega aur uski Zabaan par Hikmat ko jaari karega."_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

_"Aur Hamare liye is Duniya ki bhalai bhi likh de aur Akherat ki bhalai bhi likh de. Hamne Teri taraf Rujoo' kiya hai."_

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

             *15th Zilqad 1440*

       *19th July 2019, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*IMAM KA INTEKHAB, REHMAT E ILAHI*_ ♦

.

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1250)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

وَٱكۡتُبۡ لَنَا فِی هَـٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡیَا حَسَنَةࣰ وَفِی ٱلۡـَٔاخِرَةِ إِنَّا هُدۡنَاۤ إِلَیۡكَۚ *قَالَ عَذَابِیۤ أُصِیبُ بِهِۦ مَنۡ أَشَاۤءُۖ وَرَحۡمَتِی وَسِعَتۡ كُلَّ شَیۡءࣲۚ فَسَأَكۡتُبُهَا لِلَّذِینَ یَتَّقُونَ وَیُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَٱلَّذِینَ هُم بِـَٔایَـٰتِنَا یُؤۡمِنُونَ.*

_"Aur Hamare liye is Duniya ki bhalai bhi likh de aur Akherat ki bhalai bhi likh de. Hamne Teri taraf Rujoo' kiya hai."_

_"Khuda ne farmaya: Mein jise chahta hun us par apna Azaab nazil karta hun magar Meri Rehmat har cheez par chhayi hui hai aur ise mein un logon ke liye likhunga jo Nafarmani se parhez karte hain, Zakat dete hain aur Meri Ayaat par Imaan rakhte hain."_

(Surah A'raf: 156)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam e Hujjat (as) se Raavi ne poochha *kiya bando ko haq hai ke woh apne liye apna Imam muqarrar karen?*

Imam (as) ne farmaya:

_"Imam do qism ke hote hain: Musleh Imam ya Mufsid Imam?"_

Raavi: Musleh Imam.

Imam (as):

_"Kiya aisa mumkin ke log kisi ko achha samajh kar uska intekhab karen jabke woh shakhs achha na ho? Mein tumhe Haqeeqat samjhane ke liye mazeed wazeh karna chahta hun ke bhala ye batao agar Musa wa Esa (as) jaise azeemul qadr Nabi kisi ka intekhab karen to kya unke chunao mein koi ghalat muntakhab ho sakta hai?"_

Raavi: Nahi, Nabi ka intekhab ghalat nahi ho sakta.

Imam (as):

_'Tum ghalat sochte ho. Hazrat Musa (as) Masoom the, Sahibe Kitab the, unhone 70 afraad ka intikhab kiya tha lekin ajeeb baat yeh hai ke woh sab ke sab Munafiq the. Unhone kaha ke woh jab tak Imaan nahi layenge jab ham Allah ko saamne se dekh na len. (2:55) (7:143) Jab Ulul Azm Nabi ka intekhab ghalat sabit ho sakta hai to afraad e Ummat ke intekhab ki kiya hasiyat hai?"_

(Kamaluddin, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇  _*Rehmat e Ilahi:*_

Ek Araabi ne Nabi (saww) ke saath Namaz padhi  aur Namaz ke dauran ye Dua padhi:

_"Khudaya! Sirf mujh par aur Muhammad (saww) par hi Rehmat farma, hamare saath aur kisi ko Apni Rehmat mein shamil na farma."_

Nabi e Akram (saww) ne Salam baad usse farmaya:

_"Tu ne intehai Wasee cheez ko tang kar diya."_

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain, Sahih Bukhari)

🕌

Rasoole Akram (saww):

_"Allah Ta'ala ne Dawood (as) ko Wahy farmayi: Dawood! Jis tarah se Suraj ki Roshni har baithne wale ke liye Wasee hoti hai usi tarah se Meri Rehmat bhi har dakhil hone wale ke liye Wasee hai."_

(Rauzatul Waezeen, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْألُكَ بِرَحْمَتِكَ الَّتِي وَسِعَتْ كُلَّ شَيٍْء*

_"Khudaya! Mera sawal Us Rehmat ke waaste se hai Jo shaye par Muheet (Encompassing) hai."_

(Dua-e-Kumail)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

             *16th Zilqad 1440*

      *20th July 2019, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

       ♦ _*REHMAT-E-ILAHI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1251)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

وَٱكۡتُبۡ لَنَا فِی هَـٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡیَا حَسَنَةࣰ وَفِی ٱلۡـَٔاخِرَةِ إِنَّا هُدۡنَاۤ إِلَیۡكَۚ *قَالَ عَذَابِیۤ أُصِیبُ بِهِۦ مَنۡ أَشَاۤءُۖ وَرَحۡمَتِی وَسِعَتۡ كُلَّ شَیۡءࣲۚ فَسَأَكۡتُبُهَا لِلَّذِینَ یَتَّقُونَ وَیُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَٱلَّذِینَ هُم بِـَٔایَـٰتِنَا یُؤۡمِنُونَ.*

_"Aur Hamare liye is Duniya ki bhalai bhi likh de aur Akherat ki bhalai bhi likh de. Hamne Teri taraf Rujoo' kiya hai."_

_"Khuda ne farmaya: Mein jise chahta hun us par apna Azaab nazil karta hun *magar Meri Rehmat har cheez par chhayi hui hai* aur ise mein un logon ke liye likhunga jo Nafarmani se parhez karte hain, Zakat dete hain aur Meri Ayaat par Imaan rakhte hain."_

(Surah A'raf: 156)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇  📚 📖

👉🏻 *Tafseer:*

Rehmat e llahi itni wasee aur Jame aur Azeem Alqadar hai ke Hazrat Ali (as) ne Dua e Kumail ke aaghaz mein hi Allah ko Uski Rehmat e Wasee ka waasta diya hai.

Quran Majeed mein Allah ki Rehmat e waasea ke mutadid maqamat par aashkaar kya gaya hai.

📚

Allah ne Apni Rehmat ke bare mein in Ayaat mein bhi zikr farmaya hai: (Baqarah: 105), (Yusuf: 56) (Nisa: 175) (7:56) (Anbiya: 107)

(Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

Haamelin e Arsh ki Dua mein hai:

_"Parwardigar! Tu Ilm o Rehmat ke lehaz se har cheez par chhaaya hua hai."_

🕌

Allah Ta'ala ne Apne Habib se farmaya:

 _"Aap (saww) keh den ke tumahra Rab Wasee Rahmat ka Malik hai."_

🤲🏻

Dua e Sehr mein Imam Mohd Baqar (as):

_"Khudaya! mein Teri Rehmat ki Wasee Tareen Maratib ka Tujhe Waasta de kar Tujhse sawal karta hun ke Teri Rehmat ke tamam Maratib Wasee hain."_

🌍

Poori kayenat ki zahiri o baatini Ne'maat ka source Rehmat e llahi hai maslan Ne'mat o Wujood, Rizq ka phailao, Anbiya ki Aamad, Aasmaani Kitabon ka nuzool aur har daur mein Apni Hujjat ko baqi rakhna algarz Kayenat ki Baqa Rehmat e Khuda se marboot hai. Allah Ta'ala ne afaza e Rehmat ko Apne liye zaroori qarar diya hai, aur farmaya hai:

_"Tumhare Rab ne Apni Zaat par Rehmat ko likh diya hai."_

Yehi wajah hai Duniya Ism e "Rehman" ke Faizan par qaim hai aur Akhirat Ism e "Raheem" ke Faizan par qaim hai aur dono ka Maadan e Ishteqaq e Rehmat hai. Lafz "Rehman" Haq ki Fuyuzaat Takveeni ke saath marboot hain jo tamam maujoodaat ko shaamil hai jabke Ism e "Rahim" ka talluq Hidayat o Sa'adat se hai.

🕌

Imam Mohd Baqir (as) se is Ayat ki ek Taweel yeh bhi manqool hai ke Ilm e Imam har cheez par phaila hua hai albatta Sahiban e Taqwa yani unke shiyon ko hi is tak rasai haasil hoti hai.

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻 Hazrat Ali (as):

*اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْألُكَ بِرَحْمَتِكَ الَّتِي وَسِعَتْ كُلَّ شَيٍْء*

_"Khudaya! Mera sawal Us Rehmat ke waaste se hai Jo shaye par Muheet (Encompassing) hai."_

(Dua-e-Kumail)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *17th Zilqad 1440*

       *21st July 2019, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

         ♦ _*NABI, AL UMMI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1252)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*ٱلَّذِینَ یَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلرَّسُولَ ٱلنَّبِیَّ ٱلۡأُمِّیَّ* ٱلَّذِی یَجِدُونَهُۥ مَكۡتُوبًا عِندَهُمۡ فِی ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةِ وَٱلۡإِنجِیلِ یَأۡمُرُهُم بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَیَنۡهَىٰهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلۡمُنكَرِ وَیُحِلُّ لَهُمُ ٱلطَّیِّبَـٰتِ وَیُحَرِّمُ عَلَیۡهِمُ ٱلۡخَبَـٰۤىِٕثَ وَیَضَعُ عَنۡهُمۡ إِصۡرَهُمۡ وَٱلۡأَغۡلَـٰلَ ٱلَّتِی كَانَتۡ عَلَیۡهِمۡۚ فَٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِهِۦ وَعَزَّرُوهُ وَنَصَرُوهُ وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ ٱلنُّورَ ٱلَّذِیۤ أُنزِلَ مَعَهُۥۤ أُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ.

_*"Woh log jo is Paighambar, Nabi, Ummi ki pairavi karte hain* jiska zikr apne haan Taurat aur Injeel mein paate hain, woh unhe Neki ka Hukm deta hai aur burai se mana karta hai aur unke liye Paak cheezen Halaal karta hai aur un par Na-Paak cheezon ko Haraam karta hai aur unse woh bojh utarta hai jo un par par lade hue the aur woh un bandishon ko kholta hai jin mein woh jakde hue the. Woh log jo us par Imaan laye aur uski himayat o nusrat karen aur us Noor ki pairavi karen jo uske saath nazil kiya gaya hai woh log falah paane wale hain."_

(Surah A'raf: 157)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Is Ayat mein kai Topic hain, jisko rafta rafta zikr karenge.

*UMMI - امى:* ✒🏠

Imam Baqir (as) se Raavi ne arz kiya ke hamare Nabi ka Laqab 'Ummi' kyon hai?

Log kahte hain. 'Ummi' 'Anpadh' ko kahte hain aur Rasoole Akram (saww) likhna padhna nahi jaante the.

Imam (as) ne farmaya:

_"Unhone jhoot bola, un par Khuda ki Narazgi ho. Agar Nabi e Akram (saww) kore anpadh the to Allah Ta'ala ne ye kyon farmaya: "Wohi to Khuda hai Jisne "Ummiyeen" mein ek Rasool bheja jo un mein se hai.." (Surah Juma) Agar Rasoole Khuda (saww) khud hi unpadh the to wo Muallime (Teacher) Kitab o Hikmat kaise ban sakte the? Rasoole Khuda (saww) 72 ya 73 zabane likh sakte the aur un mein Kalam kar sakte the albatta unhe "Ummi" Makkah ki wajah se kaha gaya hai kyonki Makkah ke rehaishi (Resident) the aur Makkah ko "Ummul Qura - *ام القرى*" kaha jata tha jaisa ke Allah ne farmaya: "Taake Aap Ummul Qura aur iske aas paas rahne walon ko Tableegh karen." (An'aam: 92) Lehaza Mecca Ummul Qura hai aur Aanhazrat (saww) Makki the isliye Aapko "Ummi" kaha gaya hai."_

(Kitab Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)

✒

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Hamare Nabi e Kareem (saww) par Allah ka Ehsaan tha ke Aap padh lete the lekin Aap (maslahet e Nabuwwat ki wajah se) likhte nahi the. Jis zamane mein Abu Sufyan be Jang e Uhud ka iraada kiya tha to Aap (saww) ke chacha Abbas ne ek likh kar Aapko uske mansoobe ki ittela di thi. Jab Aapko Khat mila to us waqt Aap (saww) Medina ke ek Baugh mein tashreef farma the. Aap (saww) ne wo Khat padha. Sahaba ko iske mazmoon se aagah na kiya aur Aap (saww) ne Hukm diya ke Medina chalo. Jab sab log Medina pahunch gaye to us waqt Aap (saww) ne bataya ke Abu Sufyan Jung ke liye rawana ho raha hai."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Ali (as):

_"Nabi e Ummi (saww) ne mujh se waada farmaya ke Momin ke alawa mujh se koi mohabbat nahi karega aur Munafiq ke alawa mujh se koi dushmani nahi rakkhega."_

(Uyoon Akhbaar ar Reza, v2, p142)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ النَّبِيِّ الْأُمِّيِّ وَ اٰلِهِ۔*

(A part of Dua after Namaz e Mahe Rajab)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *18th Zilqad 1440*

       *22nd July 2019, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*AASMANI KITABON mein ANHAZRAT (saww) ka ZIKR:*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1253)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

ٱلَّذِینَ یَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلرَّسُولَ ٱلنَّبِیَّ ٱلۡأُمِّیَّ *ٱلَّذِی یَجِدُونَهُۥ مَكۡتُوبًا عِندَهُمۡ فِی ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةِ وَٱلۡإِنجِیلِ* یَأۡمُرُهُم بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَیَنۡهَىٰهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلۡمُنكَرِ وَیُحِلُّ لَهُمُ ٱلطَّیِّبَـٰتِ وَیُحَرِّمُ عَلَیۡهِمُ ٱلۡخَبَـٰۤىِٕثَ وَیَضَعُ عَنۡهُمۡ إِصۡرَهُمۡ وَٱلۡأَغۡلَـٰلَ ٱلَّتِی كَانَتۡ عَلَیۡهِمۡۚ فَٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِهِۦ وَعَزَّرُوهُ وَنَصَرُوهُ وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ ٱلنُّورَ ٱلَّذِیۤ أُنزِلَ مَعَهُۥۤ أُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ.

_"Woh log jo is Paighambar, Nabi, Ummi ki pairavi karte hain *jiska zikr apne haan Taurat aur Injeel mein paate hain,* woh unhe Neki ka Hukm deta hai aur burai se mana karta hai aur unke liye Paak cheezen Halaal karta hai aur un par Na-Paak cheezon ko Haraam karta hai aur unse woh bojh utarta hai jo un par par lade hue the aur woh un bandishon ko kholta hai jin mein woh jakde hue the. Woh log jo us par Imaan laye aur uski himayat o nusrat karen aur us Noor ki pairavi karen jo uske saath nazil kiya gaya hai woh log falah paane wale hain."_

(Surah A'raf: 157)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadiq (as):

 _"Ek Yahoodi Anhazrat (saww) se arz kiya:_ 

_"Meine Taurat mein Aapke Ausaaf padhe hain. Wahan likha hua hai ke Muhammad bin Abdullah (saww) Makkah mein paida honge aur "Tayyabah" ki tarah Hijrat karenge. Aur Sanjeeda honge aur Sakht Mijaz nahi honge aur chilla chilla kar baten nahi karenge aur woh Fuhush go (Evil talking) nahi honge. Mazkoora tamam Sifat Aap (saww) mein maujood hain lehaza mein Dil o Jaan se kahta hun 'Ashhado an La Ilaha Illallah wa Innaka Rasoolullah.' Mera tamam tarka Aapki milkiyyat mein hai. Aap Hukm e Khuda ke tahet jahan chahen ise kharch karen._

(Amaali e Sudooq, Noorus Saqlain)

📚

Imam Reza (as) ne ek Jasaleeq (Christian Priest) se kaha tha ke _"tum apne aap ko Khuda aur uske Paighambar ki zer e hifazat samjho. Hamari taraf se koi narawa sulook nahi kiya jayega. Ab tum hame batao kya tumhari Kitab mein hamare Nabi ka zikr maujood hai?"_

Jasaleeq ne kaha:

 _"Hamari Kitab mein Muhammad (saww) naami Nabi ka zikr maujood hai aur uske zikr mein ye likha hua hai ke uske Wasi ka naam Ali (as) aur uski beti ka naam Fatema (sa) hoga aur uske Nawase Hasan (as) o Husain (as) honge. Chunanche Taurat, Zaboor aur Injeel mein ye Zikr maujood hai."_

(Al Kharaej wal Jaraeh, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Mohd Baqir (as):

_"Maine us Lauh ko padha tha jisko Khuda ne apne Habib ki taraf ba taur rawana kiya tha. Isi me Nabi Akram (saww) aur unki Zurriyat ke Aimmah ke naam likhe hue the. Us mein Imam Ali Naqi (as) ke zikr ke baad likha tha ke Mein usko ek farzand ata karunga jo mere raaste ka Dayee hoga aur mere Ilm ka Khazanedar hoga, uska naam Hasan Askari (as) hoga. Phir Silsila e Imamat ki takmeel uske bete "Meem Ha Meem Dal *م ح م د"* * se karunga. Woh tamam Jahanon ke liye Rehmat hoga. Us mein Musa (as) ka Kamal aur Esa (as) ki Khubiyan aur Ayyub (as) ka Sabr hoga. Uske Zamana e Ghaibat mein mere chahne walon ko Zaleel kiya jayega aur unke sar kaat kar tark o weelam ke saron ki tarah bataur tohfe diye jayenge. Uske manne walon ko qatl kiya jayega. Unke gharon ko nazr e aatish kiya jayega aur woh sakht khayef honge. Unke Khoon se Zameen ko rangeen kiya jayega aur unki faryade buland hongi. (Jise koyi sunne ko amada nahi hoga) wohi mere sachhe dost honge. Unhi ke sabab se mein har taarik Fitne ko door karuga aur unhi ki wajah se mein zalzale rokunga aur bojh utarunga aur logon ko zanjeeron se azad karunga. Unpar unke Parwardigar ki jaanib se Salwat aur Rehmat hogi aur wohi Hidayat yaafta honge."_

(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا وَارِثَ التَّوْرَاةِ وَ الْاِنْجِيْلِ وَ الزَّبُوْرِ*

(A part of Ziyarat - Mafatih)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *19th Zilqad 1440*

       *23rd July 2019, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*AASMANI KITABON mein ANHAZRAT (saww) ka ZIKR:*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1254)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

ٱلَّذِینَ یَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلرَّسُولَ ٱلنَّبِیَّ ٱلۡأُمِّیَّ *ٱلَّذِی یَجِدُونَهُۥ مَكۡتُوبًا عِندَهُمۡ فِی ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةِ وَٱلۡإِنجِیلِ* یَأۡمُرُهُم بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَیَنۡهَىٰهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلۡمُنكَرِ وَیُحِلُّ لَهُمُ ٱلطَّیِّبَـٰتِ وَیُحَرِّمُ عَلَیۡهِمُ ٱلۡخَبَـٰۤىِٕثَ وَیَضَعُ عَنۡهُمۡ إِصۡرَهُمۡ وَٱلۡأَغۡلَـٰلَ ٱلَّتِی كَانَتۡ عَلَیۡهِمۡۚ فَٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِهِۦ وَعَزَّرُوهُ وَنَصَرُوهُ *وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ ٱلنُّورَ ٱلَّذِیۤ أُنزِلَ مَعَهُۥۤ أُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ.*

_"Woh log jo is Paighambar, Nabi, Ummi ki pairavi karte hain *jiska zikr apne haan Taurat aur Injeel mein paate hain,* woh unhe Neki ka Hukm deta hai aur burai se mana karta hai aur unke liye Paak cheezen Halaal karta hai aur un par Na-Paak cheezon ko Haraam karta hai aur unse woh bojh utarta hai jo un par par lade hue the aur woh un bandishon ko kholta hai jin mein woh jakde hue the. Woh log jo us par Imaan laye aur uski himayat o nusrat karen *aur us Noor ki pairavi karen jo uske saath nazil kiya gaya hai woh log falah paane wale hain."*_

(Surah A'raf: 157)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Allah Ta'ala ne Hazrat Musa (as) se farmaya:

_"Musa! Mein Tera Shafeeq aur Meherban Khuda ho kar tujhe Butool ke Farzand Esa bin Maryam (as) ki Wasiyyat karta hun. Is ke baad tumhe Tayyab, Tahir aur Mutahhir ki Wasiyyat karta hun jo Surkh Oont par sawar hoga. Uski Kitab tanam Kitabon ki Nigehban hogi. Woh Ruku karnewala, Sajdah karnewala, Targheeb o Tarheeb denewala hoga. Uske bhai Masakeen honge aur uske madadgar doosri Qaum se talluq rakhte honge."_

(Rauza e Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

📚

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Yahood o Nasaara Rasoole Khuda (saww) ko achhi tarah se pahchante the kyonki Aapke Ausaaf ka tazkara unki Kitabon maujood tha. Jab Aap (saww) Duniya mein tashreef laye to unhone Aapko pahchan liya tha lekin Dunyavi mafadat ki wajah se Aapki Nabuwwat par Imaan nahi laye the. Un logon ki kaifiyyat ko Allah Ta'ala ne is Ayat mein bayan kiya hai: (2:146) Iski wajah ye thi ke Allah ne Taurat, Injeel aur Zuboor mein Aanhazrat (saww) ke maqame paidaish aur Maqam e Hijrat ka tazkara kiya tha. Allah Ta'ala ne sirf Aanhazrat (saww) ke tazkare par iktefa nahi ki thi balke Aapke Madadgar Saathiyon ka bhi Aasmaani Kutub mein tazkara kiya tha jaisa ke is Ayat mein hai: (Fath: 29)"_

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

🌟

Imam Mohd Baqir (as):

_"Ayat *وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ ٱلنُّورَ ٱلَّذِیۤ أُنزِلَ مَعَهُۥۤ أُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ* mein jis Noor ki Pairavi ka Hukm diya gaya hai usse Ali (as) murad hain."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Khuda ne Behisht ko Noor e Arsh se paida kiya. Phir usko phailaya to ek hissa mujhe, dusra hissa Janabe Fatima (sa) aur teesra hissa Hazrat Ali (as) ko mila. Jis par oos Noor ki chhi'ntt (drop) paddi, usne Wilayat e Aal e Muhammad (as) ko paa liya aur jis par na paddi wo gumraah ho gaya."_

(Khisaal, p104)

🤲🏻

*اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا وَارِثَ التَّوْرَاةِ وَ الْاِنْجِيْلِ وَ الزَّبُوْرِ*

(A part of Ziyarat - Mafatih)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

              *20th Zilqad 1440*

    *24th July 2019, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

        ♦ _*AHLE ADL O HAQ*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1255)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قُلۡ یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنِّی رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ إِلَیۡكُمۡ جَمِیعًا ٱلَّذِی لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ لَاۤ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ یُحۡیِۦ وَیُمِیتُۖ فَـَٔامِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ ٱلنَّبِیِّ ٱلۡأُمِّیِّ ٱلَّذِی یُؤۡمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ وَكَلِمَـٰتِهِۦ وَٱتَّبِعُوهُ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَدُونَ ۝  وَمِن قَوۡمِ مُوسَىٰۤ أُمَّةࣱ یَهۡدُونَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ یَعۡدِلُون. .*

_"Aap kah den ke Aye Bani Nau Insaan! Mein tum sab ki taraf Us Khuda ka Paighambar hun jo Aasmaanon aur Zameen ki Badshahi ka Malik hai. Uske siwa koi Ma'bood nahi hai, Wohi Zindagi bakhashta hai aur Maut deta hai. Pas tum Imaan lao Allah par aur Uske bheje hue Nabi, Ummi par jo Allah aur Uske Farameen par Imaan rakhta hai aur tum uski pairavi karo taake tum Raahe Raast paa sako."_

_*"Musa (as) ki Qaum mein ek Giroh aisa bhi tha jo Haq ke mutabiq Hidayat karta aur Haq ke mutabiq Insaaf karta tha"*_

(Surah A'raf: 158 - 159)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Qaum e Musa (as) se Ahle Islam murad hain."_

_"Jab Qaem e Aale Muhammad (atfs) ka Zahoor hoga to pusht e Ka'aba se 27 Mardan e Haq baramad honge jin mein se 15 afraad ka talluq Qaum e Musa (as) ke us giroh se hoga jo Haq ke mutabiq Hidayat karta tha aur Haq kw mutabiq insaaf karta tha. 7 Ashaab e Kahaf honge aur Hazrat Musa (as) ke Wasi Yusha aur Momin e Aale Firaun, Salman Farsi, Abu Dujana Ansari aur Malik e Ashtar bhi dobara tashrif layenge."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ne Raasul Jaloot aur Asqaf Nasaara se farmaya:

_"Raasul Jaloot! Tujhe us Zaat ka waasta Jisne Musa (as) par Taurat nazil farmayi aur Jisne tumhare khaane ke liye Manna wa Salwa utara aur Jisne tumhe Samandar mein khushk raasta diya aur Jisne Patthar se tumhare liye 12 Chashme jaari kiye aur Bani Israel ke har giroh ke liye alaihda alaihda ghat muqarrar kiya. Mujhe ye batao ke Hazrat Musa (as) ke baad Bani Israel ke kitne giroh hue the?"_

Usne kaha: "Unke koi Firqe nahi bane the."

Aap (as) ne farmaya:

_"Us Zaat ki Qasam Jiske alawa koi Ma'bood nahi hai, tu ne jhoot kaha. Bani Israel ke 71 Giroh hue the jin mein se 70 Dozakhi aur ek Naaji (Jannati) tha aur us Naaji Giroh ke mutalliq Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya: "Aur Musa (as) ki Qaum mein ek Giroh aisa bhi tha jo Haq ke mutabiq Hidayat karta aur Haq ke mutabiq Insaaf karta tha" (7:158)_

(Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasoole Khuda (saww):

"Yahoodi Aur Nasara (Jews & Christians) 71 Aur 72 Firqon mein bate hain. Meri Ummat 73 Firqon mein bat jayegi. Lekin ek Firqe ke siwa Baqi tamam (72) Firqe Jahannum mein Jayenge.’

Sahaba-E-Kiraam ne arz ki: “Ya Rasoolullah! Ye Kaunsa ek Firqa hoga?”

Aap (saww):

*والذی﻿ نفسی بیده ان هذا و شیعته لهم الفائزون یوم القیامه*

_"Khuda ki Qasam, ye (Ali as) aur unke Shia hain jo Qayamat ke Din Faez honge."_

(Suyuti-al-Durr al-Manthur, vol. 6 zel e Tafseer Surah al-Bayyina)

(Tirmizi, H-2641, Sunan Ibn Majah, H-3992, Sunan Abu Dawud, H-4596, Imam Ahmad Ibn Hambal Al Musnad, Vol 04, Pg : 127)

🤲🏻

*وَائْتَلَفَتِ الْفُرْقَةُ وَ بِمُوَالَاتِكُمْ تُقْبَلُ الطَّاعَةُ الْمُفْتَرَضَةُ وَ لَكُمُ الْمَوَدَّةُ الْوَاجِبَةُ وَ الدَّرَجَاتُ الرَّفِيْعَةُ.*

(Mafateehul Jinaan)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

https://chat.whatsapp.com/E8d9zk5NSaDA4wOxAwwHA3

**********************************

            *21st Zilqad 1440*

     *25th July 2019, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

              ♦ _*SHAJRAH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1256)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَقَطَّعۡنَـٰهُمُ ٱثۡنَتَیۡ عَشۡرَةَ أَسۡبَاطًا أُمَمࣰاۚ وَأَوۡحَیۡنَاۤ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰۤ إِذِ ٱسۡتَسۡقَىٰهُ قَوۡمُهُۥۤ أَنِ ٱضۡرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلۡحَجَرَۖ فَٱنۢبَجَسَتۡ مِنۡهُ ٱثۡنَتَا عَشۡرَةَ عَیۡنࣰاۖ قَدۡ عَلِمَ كُلُّ أُنَاسࣲ مَّشۡرَبَهُمۡۚ وَظَلَّلۡنَا عَلَیۡهِمُ ٱلۡغَمَـٰمَ وَأَنزَلۡنَا عَلَیۡهِمُ ٱلۡمَنَّ وَٱلسَّلۡوَىٰۖ كُلُوا۟ مِن طَیِّبَـٰتِ مَا رَزَقۡنَـٰكُمۡۚ وَمَا ظَلَمُونَا وَلَـٰكِن كَانُوۤا۟ أَنفُسَهُمۡ یَظۡلِمُونَ.*

_"Hamne is Qaum ko 12 Gharano mein taqseem karke unhe mustaqil Girohon ki shakl de di thi aur jab Musa (as) se uski Qaum ne Paani manga to us waqt Hamne Musa (as) ko Wahy ki ke tum apna Asaa ek Patthar par maaro. Chunanche usse achanak 12 Chashme phoot pade. Har Giroh ne apne liye ek Ghat mutayyan kar liya. Hamne un par Badal ka saya kiya aur Hamne un par Manna o Salwa utara. Hamari ata kardah Pakeeza cheezen khao. Iske baad unhone jo kuchh kiya to wo Ham par Zulm nahi kiya balke woh apne aap par Zulm karte rahe."_

(Surah A'raf: 160)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Surah Baqarah:57 & 60 mein bhi similar Ayat a chuki hai.

Raavi ne Imam Reza (as) se "Bani Aftash - *بنى افطس*" ke mutalliq sawal kiya.

Aap (as) ne farmaya:

_"Allah Ta'ala ne Hazrat Yaqoob (as) ko 12 Bete diye the. Phir har Bete se Allah ne Nasl jaari ki aur yun 12 Qabile wujood mein aaye. In Qabayel ke Mooris e Aala ye the:_

(1) Zailoon (2) Sham'oon (3) Yahood (4) Tashakhar (5) Rekoon (6) Yusuf (7) Benjamin (8) Tafashal (9) Wudan (3 naam Raavi bhool gaye)"

Phir Aap (as) ne farmaya:

_"Allah Ta'ala ne Ali (as) ko Janabe Fatema Zehra (sa) ke Batn se do Farzand (Imam Hasan o Imam Husain as) ata kiye. Phir Imam Hasan (as) se 6 Qabile wujood mein aaye aur Nasl e Imam Husain (as) se 6 Qabayel tashkeel paye. Aulad e Imam Hasan (as) ke Qabayel ke Mooris e Aala ye hain:_

(1) Hasan bin Zaid bin Hasan (2) Abdullah bin Hasan bin Hasan (3) Ibrahim bin Hasan bin Hasan (4) Hasan bin Hasan (5) Dawood bin Hasan bin Hasan (6) Jafar bin Hasan bin Hasan."

"Imam Husain (as) ki Aulad ke bhi 6 Qabayel tashkeel paye:"

(1) Imam Mohd Baqir (as) (2) Abdullah Al Baqir bin Ali Zainul Abedin (as) (3) Zaid bin Ali Zainul Abedin (as) (4) Husain bin Ali Zainul Abidin (as) (5) Umar Al Ashraf bin Ali Zainul Abedin (as) (6) Ali bin Al Husain bin Ali (as). Algharz in 6 afraad se Imam Husain (as) ka Shajrah e Nasab aage badha."

(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Surah Baqarah: 60 ke zel ki Tafseer repeat:

Jaisa ke pahle bhi rivayat bayan kar chuke hain, ek Yahoodi ne kuchh sawal Hazrat Ali (as) se kiye. Sawal tha ke kya hamare Nabi (saww) ko bhi Nabi Moosa (as)  ki tarah Mo'ajze ata kiye?

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ne farmaya:

"Allah ne Hazrat Muhammad (saww) ko isse behtar Mo'ajza ata kiya. Hudaibiya mein jab Ashaab ko pyas ki shikayat hui, Aap (saww) ne Yemeni Kuze mein apna haath dala to unki ungaliyon se Paani ke Chashme phoote aur sab seraab hue. Aap (saww) ne ek Teer Bra bin Aazib ko diya. Teer ko Kuen mein nasb kiya to 12 Chashme jaari hue. Aap (saww) ne us Kuen mein apna haath dala to Kuen ka Paani itna buland hua ke sab usse seraab ho gaye." (Khulasa)

(Ehtejaaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

_"Parwardigar! Teri taraf aanewalon ke raaste hamwar hain aur Teri Ata ke Chashme labrez hain."_

(Dua Hamza Sumali)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

             *22nd Zilqad 1440*

        *26th July 2019, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

      ♦ _*MANNA WA SALWA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1257)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَقَطَّعۡنَـٰهُمُ ٱثۡنَتَیۡ عَشۡرَةَ أَسۡبَاطًا أُمَمࣰاۚ وَأَوۡحَیۡنَاۤ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰۤ إِذِ ٱسۡتَسۡقَىٰهُ قَوۡمُهُۥۤ أَنِ ٱضۡرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلۡحَجَرَۖ فَٱنۢبَجَسَتۡ مِنۡهُ ٱثۡنَتَا عَشۡرَةَ عَیۡنࣰاۖ قَدۡ عَلِمَ كُلُّ أُنَاسࣲ مَّشۡرَبَهُمۡۚ وَظَلَّلۡنَا عَلَیۡهِمُ ٱلۡغَمَـٰمَ وَأَنزَلۡنَا عَلَیۡهِمُ ٱلۡمَنَّ وَٱلسَّلۡوَىٰۖ كُلُوا۟ مِن طَیِّبَـٰتِ مَا رَزَقۡنَـٰكُمۡۚ وَمَا ظَلَمُونَا وَلَـٰكِن كَانُوۤا۟ أَنفُسَهُمۡ یَظۡلِمُونَ.*

(Surah A'raf: 160)

Repeat Message 2/10/2018

**********************************

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

 *وَظَلَّلْنَا عَلَيْكُمُ الْغَمَامَ وَأَنْزَلْنَا عَلَيْكُمُ الْمَنَّ وَالسَّلْوَىٰ ۖ كُلُوا مِنْ طَيِّبَاتِ مَا رَزَقْنَاكُمْ ۖ وَمَا ظَلَمُونَا وَلَٰكِنْ كَانُوا أَنْفُسَهُمْ يَظْلِمُونَ.*

_"Aur Hamne tum par Badlon ka saya kiya aur tumne tum par  *Manna wa Salwa* utara, Hamara Pakeeza Rizq khao aur un logon ne Hamara kuchh nahi bigada balke woh apni Jaano par hi Zulm karte rahe."_

(Surah Baqarah: 57)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_ 🍄

Rasoole Khuda (saww):

_"Mashroom (Khambi) ka talluq "Manna" se hai aur uska Paani Aankhon ke liye shifa hai."_

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

🍲🍪☁

Imam Zainul Abedin (as):

Hazrat Ali (as) se ek Yahoodi Alim ne poochha ke Allah Ta'ala ne Moosa bin Imran (as) par Manna wa Salwa nazil kiya, kiya tumhare Nabi (saww) par bhi aisa kuchh ata hua?

Hazrat Ali (as) ne farmaya:

_"Ye sach hai Hazrat Moosa (as) par Manna wa Salwa utara gaya lekin Qudrat ki taraf se hamare Nabi (saww) ko isse bhi behtar cheez ata ki gayi jo kisi aur Nabi ko nahi mili. Hamare Nabi aur unki Ummat ke liye Maal e Ganimat ko Halal kiya hai jo ke Manna o Salwa se kahin behtar hai."_

Yahoodi: "Allah ne Moosa (as) par Badlon ka saaya kiya?"

Hazrat Ali (as):

_"Ji haan, lekin ye saaya sirf "Sahra e Tayya" tak mehdood tha jab ke Allah ne hamare Nabi (saww) ko isse badh kar sharaf ata kiya. Muhammad Mustafa (saww) ki Wiladat se le kar unki wafat tak Allah ne Badal ka ek tukda unke liye muqarrar kiya tha jo har waqt unke Sar par saaya figan rahta tha aur hamare Nabi (saww) ki ye Karamat Hazrat Moosa (as) se kahin behtar thi."_

(Ehtejaaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)

🌥☀ 😴

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Bani Israel par Namaz e Fajr ke baad se lekar Tulu' e Aftaab (Sunrise) tak "Manna" utra karta tha aur us waqt jo Neend mein hota to uska hissa nahi utarta tha. Yehi wajah hai ke Namaz e Fajr ke baad se Tulu' e Aftaab tak ke darmiyan Sona Makrooh hai."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🍄

For some extra information about Manna refer below link:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Manna

🤲🏻

Bare Ilaha hame Halaal Rizq ata farma.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 🌥☀😴

Imam Ali (as)

_"Tulu' e Fajr (dawn) aur Tulu' e Shams (sunrise) ke darmiyaani waqt mein Rizq talaash karo kyun ki yehi to wo sa'at (lamha) hai jisme Allah Apne Bando'n mein Rizq taqseem karta hai."_

(Hadiyat ush Shia, p595)

🤲🏻

Imam Ali (as):

_"Aasmaan ke darwaaze 5 waqt khulte hain:_

_1) Tez baarish ke waqt,_

_2) Ghamaasaan ki jung ke waqt,_

_3) Tamaam Namazo'n ki azaan ke waqt,_

_4) Quran padhte waqt,_

_*5) Zawaal e Aftaab aur Tulu' e Fajr ke waqt.* (Matlab ye hai ke ye awqaat qubooliyat e Dua ke hain)"_

(Khisaal, p157)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

               *23rd Zilqad 1440*

       *27th July 2019, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

               ♦ _*HITTAH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1258)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذۡ قِیلَ لَهُمُ ٱسۡكُنُوا۟ هَـٰذِهِ ٱلۡقَرۡیَةَ وَكُلُوا۟ مِنۡهَا حَیۡثُ شِئۡتُمۡ وَقُولُوا۟ حِطَّةࣱ وَٱدۡخُلُوا۟ ٱلۡبَابَ سُجَّدࣰا نَّغۡفِرۡ لَكُمۡ خَطِیۤـَٔـٰتِكُمۡۚ سَنَزِیدُ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِینَ.*

_"Aur us waqt ko yaad karo jab un se kaha gaya tha ke us Basti mein rihaish (reside) ikhtiyar karo aur uski paidawar se apne hasbe mansha Rozi hasil karo aur Hitta Hitta - *حِطَّةࣱ* kahte jao aur shaher ke Darwaze mein Sajdah rez ho kar dakhil ho jao. Ham tumhari Khatayen Ma'af karenge aur Nekokar afraad ki Nekiyon mein izaafa karenge."_

(Surah A'raf: 161)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Similar Ayat Surah Baqarah mein bhi hai jiska zikr ham kar chuke hai, phir se repeat kar rahe hain:

**********************************

Repeat message of 3rd Oct 2018.

**********************************

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ قُلْنَا ادْخُلُوا هَٰذِهِ الْقَرْيَةَ فَكُلُوا مِنْهَا حَيْثُ شِئْتُمْ رَغَدًا وَادْخُلُوا الْبَابَ سُجَّدًا وَقُولُوا حِطَّةٌ نَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ خَطَايَاكُمْ ۚ وَسَنَزِيدُ الْمُحْسِنِينَ*

_"Aur jab Hamne kaha ke tum is Qarye mein dakhil ho jao aur is mein dakhil ho kar jahan chaho itminan se khao aur Darwaze mein Sajdah karte hue dakhil ho jao aur " *حِطَّةٌ*" (Hittah - Bakhshish) kahte hue aao to Ham tumhari khatayen tumhe Ma'af kar denge aur Neki karne walon ki Nekiyon mein izaafa karenge."_

(Surah Baqarah: 58)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

📚📖 🚪

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Kalma "Hitta" jo Baitul Muqaddas pahunchne ke waqt Bani Israel ke logon ka Nara tha *مسئلتنا حطة* ka short form tha jiske maani hain: "Ham apne Gunahon ke jhadne ka sawal karte hain". Hitta means kisi cheez ka upar se neeche ki taraf aana.

🕌

Rasoole Khuda (saww):

_"Har Ummat mein Siddiq wa Farooq hua karta hai aur Ummat ka Siddiq wa Farooq Ali ibne Abi Talib (as) hain. Ali (as) Ummat ki Nijaat ka Safina (Kashti) aur *Ummat ke liye "Bab e Hittah" hain.*"_

(Uyoonul Akhbar Al Reza (as), Noorus Saqlain)

🚪

Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Ali (as) se farmaya:

*مثلك فى امتى مثل باب حطة فى بنى اسرائيل فمن دخل فى ولايتك فقد دخل الباب كما أمره الله عزوجل.*

 _"Meri Ummat mein tumhari misal wohi hai jo Bani Israel mein *Bab e Hittah* ki thi jo tumhari Vilayat mein dakhil hua to woh Allah ke farman ke mutabiq Darwaze mein dakhil hua."_

(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)

🚪

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):

_"Logon! Aagaah ho jao! Mujhe tumhare andar wohi maqam hasil hai jo Ale Firaun mein Haroon (as) ko hasil tha aur *tum mein mera maqam wohi hai jo Bani Israel mein 'Bab e Hittah' ka tha."*_

(Roza e Kafi: Khutba e Wasila, Noorus Saqlain)

🚪

Ali (as):

 _*"Mein Ummat ka Bab e Hittah' hun."*_

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Ham tumhare liye 'Bab e Hittah' hain."_

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا بَابَ حِطَّةٍ ۟اِلَّذِيْ مَنْ دَخَلَهُ كَانَ مِنَ الْاٰمِنِينَ‏۔.......*

(Ziyarat Mahe Rajab - Mafatih)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

             *24th Zilqad 1440*

     *28th July 2019, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

              ♦ _*SABBATH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1259)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَبَدَّلَ ٱلَّذِینَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مِنۡهُمۡ قَوۡلًا غَیۡرَ ٱلَّذِی قِیلَ لَهُمۡ فَأَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَیۡهِمۡ رِجۡزࣰا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَاۤءِ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ یَظۡلِمُونَ *  وَسۡـَٔلۡهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلۡقَرۡیَةِ ٱلَّتِی كَانَتۡ حَاضِرَةَ ٱلۡبَحۡرِ إِذۡ یَعۡدُونَ فِی ٱلسَّبۡتِ إِذۡ تَأۡتِیهِمۡ حِیتَانُهُمۡ یَوۡمَ سَبۡتِهِمۡ شُرَّعࣰا وَیَوۡمَ لَا یَسۡبِتُونَ لَا تَأۡتِیهِمۡۚ كَذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ نَبۡلُوهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ یَفۡسُقُونَ*

_"Magar jo log un mein Zalim the unhone is baat ko jo un se kahi thi badal dala, Hamne unke Zulm ki padash (punishment) mein un par Aasmaan se Azaab bhej diya. Aur Aap unse is Basti ka haal daryaft karen jo Samandar ke kinare waaqe thi. Unhe wo waqea yaad dilao jab woh log "Sabt" (Saturday) ke Din Ahkam e Ilahi ki khilaf warzi karte the aur Sabt ke Din Machhliyan ubha ubhar kar unke saamne aati thin aur Sabt ke siwa baqi Dino mein nahi aati thin. Ye isliye hota tha ke Ham unki Nafarmaniyon ki wajah se unko aazmayish dal rahe the."_

(Surah A'raf: 162 - 163)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Baqi (as) & Imam Sajjad (as):

"Bani Israel mein se ek Qaum jo dariya ke kinare par rehti thi, unke sheher ka naam Eila tha. Khuda Wande Kareem ne unko Ambiya (as) ke zariye 'Sabt' Sanichar (Saturday) ke Din Machhli ke shikaar se manaa farmaya tha. Pus, unhone Allah ke Haraam ko Halaal banane ke liye ek hila (chaalbaazi) talaash kiya aur wo ye ke dariya ke kinaare unhone hauz (pond) bana liye aur dariya se chhoti naaliyo'n ke zariye unko mila diya taaki Machhliyan un naaliyo'n ke zariye se un hauzo'n mein daakhil ho sakein aur wahan se nikal kar wapas dariya ki taraf na jaa saken. Pus, Machhliyan Sanichar ke roz Allah ki amaan (safety) samajh kar aa jaati thi aur un naaliyo'n se phir phir kar hauzo'n mein daakhil ho jaati thi. Lekin jab ba-waqt e Shaam wapas dariya ki taraaf jaana chahti thi taaki kal ke shikaar se bach jaye to wapas na ja sakti thi aur Raat ko wahan band reh jaati thi. Pus, Itwaar (Sunday) ki subah wo log unko aasaani se pakad liya karte the aur kehte the ke hum ne Sanichar ko to ye shikaar nahi kiya balki Itwaar ko ye shikaar kiya hai (lihaaza ye hum par Haraam nahi). Halaanki, wo Dushmanaan e Khuda jhoote the, kyunki dar-haqeeqat wo Machhliyan Sanichar ke din hi pakdi jaa chuki thi. Pus, is hile (fareb) aur bahane se wo log bade maaldar aur daulat-mand ho gaye aur aish o ishrat ki zindagi guzaarne lage. Aur is sheher ki abaadi (population) 80000 (eighty thousand) se zyada thi jisme se 70000 aadmi is jurm mein mubtela the aur 10000 se kuchh upar (slightly more than ten thousand) is fe'l e Haraam se mehfooz the. Pus, ye log unko Azaab e Khuda se daraate the aur unko is Haraam kaam se baaz aane ki daawat dete the, lekin kuchh asar na hota tha. Pus, wo kehte the ke hum ne apna fariza adaa kar diya hai kyunki hum ko Amr Bil Maroof aur Nahi Anil Munkar ka hukm tha. Pus, Allah ke saamne hamara uzr maaqool (valid excuse) hai ke hum ne Nahi Anil Munkar ka fariza adaa kar diya hai aur hum dil se is fe'l ko bura jaante hain. Shaayad koi hamari nasihat se Azaab e Khuda se bachne par kamyab ho jaye. Jab unhone dekha ke un logon par hamara waaz o nasihat kuchh asar nahi karta to unhone us sheher se Hijrat kar ke ek alaihda Basti basa li aur wahan abaad ho gaye taaki Khuda ka Azaab naazil ho to hamen apni lapet mein na le le. Pus, ek Raat ko woh soye aur jab uthe to sab Aurat o Mard Bandar (monkey) ki shakl mein Maskh (transform) ho chuke the. Sheher ke darwaaze waise ke waise band reh gaye, na koi wahan se bahar aata tha aur na koi andar dakhil ho sakta tha. Jab bahar ki Basti waalon ne suna to unhone sheher ka qasd kiya aur deewaron par chadh kar jhanka to sab Aurton aur Mardon ko Bandaron ki shaklon mein Maskh dekha. Jab ye dekhne wale unme se apne kisi qareebi ya taalluqdar ko kisi alaamat (nishaani) se pehchante to poochhte ke tu fulaa'n mard ya fulaa'n aurat hai? To wo sar hilaa kar haa'n ka jawaab dete the aur unki Aa'nkho'n se Aa'nsu tapak padte the. Pus, 3 roz tak isi Haalat mein rahe, phir Khuda Wande Kareem ne Baarish aur Aandhi bhej kar unko khatm kar diya aur dariya mein daal diya aur koi Maskh-shuda Jaanwar 3 din se zyada nahi rehta. Haan, jinko tum Bandar dekhte ho, ye wo Maskh-shuda nahi hai balki unki shaklon ke mushabeh (similar) hain aur ye Janwar unki nasl se nahi hai."

🚩

Hazrat Ali (as):

_"Is Ummat mein bhi unke Kirdar ke haamil afraad maujood hain. Albatta ye alaihdah baat hai ke woh zahiri taur par unki tarah se Masakh (transform) nahi honge albatta woh Tafarraqa Bazi (Communalism - Sampradayekta) mein mubtila honge. Allah Ta'ala ne Zalim Qaum ke liye apne Qanoon ka Ailan karte hue farmaya: "Zalim Qaum ke liye doori ho." (23:41) Nijaat sirf un logon ko naseeb hui jo Burayi se mana kiya karte the jaisa ke Khuda ne farmaya (7:163)"_

(Tafseer e Anwaar e Najaf, v2, p119, Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*وَ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ بَدِّلْ سَيِّئَاتِنَا حَسَنَاتٍ وَ اجْعَلْ حَسَنَاتِنَا دَرَجَاتٍ.*

(Najaf e Ashraf ki Ziyarat ke waqt ki Dua.)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

*Wiladat Hazrat Ibrahim (as) & Hazrat Esa (as) Mubarak*

          *Yaum-e-Dahwul Arz*

🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁

**********************************

            *25th Zilqad 1440*

       *29th July 2019, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

  ♦ _*BANI ISRAEL PAR AZAAB*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1260)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذۡ قَالَتۡ أُمَّةࣱ مِّنۡهُمۡ لِمَ تَعِظُونَ قَوۡمًا ٱللَّهُ مُهۡلِكُهُمۡ أَوۡ مُعَذِّبُهُمۡ عَذَابࣰا شَدِیدࣰاۖ قَالُوا۟ مَعۡذِرَةً إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ وَلَعَلَّهُمۡ یَتَّقُونَ *  فَلَمَّا نَسُوا۟ مَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ بِهِۦۤ أَنجَیۡنَا ٱلَّذِینَ یَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنِ ٱلسُّوۤءِ وَأَخَذۡنَا ٱلَّذِینَ ظَلَمُوا۟ بِعَذَابِۭ بَـِٔیسِۭ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ یَفۡسُقُونَ.*

_"Aur unhe ye bhi yaad dilao ke jab un mein se ek Giroh ne doosre Giroh se kaha tha ke aakhir tumhe kiya padi hai ke tum aise Giroh ko Nasihat karte ho jinhe Allah Halaak karnewala ya Sakht Azaab denewala hai? Unho ne jawab mein kaha ke ham ye sab kuchh tumhare Rab ke Huzoor apni mazerat  pesh karne ke liye karte hain aur is umeed par karte hain ke shayad ye log Khuda ki Nafarmani se parhez karne lagen."_

_"Jab woh in Hidayaat ko bilkul bhool gaye jo inhe yaad karai gayi thi to Hamne un logon ko bacha liya jo Burai se rokte the, unke alawa baqi logon ko jo Zalim the unki Nafarmaniyon ki bena par Sakht Azaab mein pakad liya."_

(Surah A'raf: 164 - 165)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Zikr e Hazrat Musa (as) aur unki Qaum jaari hai. Is Ayat ki Tafseer bayan kar chuke hain.

🐠🐟🦈 🐍

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ki khidmat mein kuchh Kufa ke log hazir hue aur arz kiya ke Bazar mein ek Sanp Machhli (Snakehead Fish) furokht ho rahi hai, ye kya bala hai?

Ye sawal sun kar Aap muskurai aur farmaya mere saath chalo. Aap Darya kinare gaye aur Aap (as) ne Darya mein Luab e Dahen (Saliva) dala aur chand Kalemat dohrai. Iske baad bahut badi Sanp Machhli ne Sahil par Munh khola.

Ameerul Mo'meneen (as) be farmaya:

_"Tujh par aur Teri Qaum par halakat ho tu kaun hai?"_

Sanp Machhli ne kaha:

_"Ameerul Mo'meneen! Hamara talluq us Qaum se hai jo Samandar ke kinare abaad thi. Hamare paas Saturday ke Din Machhliyan aati thin aur Saturday ke alawa aur Dino mein Machhliyan hamare Haath na lagti thin. *Allah ne ham par Aapki Vilayat ko pesh kiya, hamne qubool nahi kiya jiski wajah se Khuda ne hame Maskh (Transform) kar diya.* Ham mein se kuchh afraad ko khushki mein rakha gaya aur kuchh afraad ko Paani mein rakha. Paani mein ham Sanp Machhliyan rehti hain aur khushki par Somsar aur Yarbo' (Gerbil: Choohe ke jaisa Janwar) ka talluq bhi hamari Qaum se hai."_

Iske baad Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ne farmaya:

_"Us Zaat ki Qasam Jisne Muhammad Mustufa (saww) ko Nabuwwat ke saath Mab'oos farmaya. Inhe bhi tumhari Aurton ki tarah se Mahwari ka Khoon (Menstruation) aata hai."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*يَا مُقِيْلَ الْعَثَرَاتِ اَقِلْنِيْ عَثْرَتِيْ يَا مُجِيْبَ الدَّعَوَاتِ اَجِبْ دَعْوَتِيْ يَا سَامِعَ الْاَصْوَاتِ اسْمَعْ صَوْتِيْ وَ ارْحَمْنِيْ وَ تَجَاوَزْ عَنْ سَيِّئَاتِيْ وَ مَا عِنْدِيْ يَا ذَا الْجَلَالِ وَ الْاِكْرَامِ۔*

(Dua e Yaum e Dahwul Arz)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *26th Zilqad 1440*

       *30th July 2019, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

  ♦ _*BANI ISRAEL PAR AZAAB*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1261)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَلَمَّا عَتَوۡا۟ عَن مَّا نُهُوا۟ عَنۡهُ قُلۡنَا لَهُمۡ كُونُوا۟ قِرَدَةً خَـٰسِـِٔینَ*

_"Jab woh poori sarkashi (Rebellious) ke saath wohi kaam karte gaye jisse unhe roka gaya to Hamne kaha ke tum Zaleel Khwar Bandar ban jao."_

(Surah A'raf: 166)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Zikr e Hazrat Musa (as) aur unki Qaum jaari hai. Is Ayat ki Tafseer bayan kar chuke hain.

👥

Imam Baqir (as) & Imam Sadiq (as):

"Is Qaum ke 3 Giroh ban gaye the. Ek Giroh tha jisne logon ko isse mana kiya. Jab log baaz na aaye yo woh Shaher chhod kar bahar chale gaye the. Doosra Giroh woh tha jo Sabbath ka Taqaddus pamaal karne mein sharik tha albatta woh inhe burai se mana nahi karta tha. Aur Teesra Giroh Sabbath ke Taqaddus ko pamaal karne walon par mushtamil tha. Jab Khuda ka Azaab aaya to sirf un logon ko Nijaat mili jo burai se rokte the. Baqi Giroh Maskh kar diye gaye."

(Kitabul Khisaal, Rauza e Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

Imam Husain (as):

_"(Mere Allah!) Usne kya paaya jisne Tujhe khoya aur usne kuchh na khoya, jisne Tujh ko paa liya. Wo yaqeenan na-kaam huwa jo Tere bajaaye kisi aur ko pasand karne laga aur wo ghaate mein padaa jo sarkashi ke saath Tujh se phir gaya. Kyun kar Tere gair se ummeed rakhte hain jab ke Tera ehsaan o karam rukta hi nahi aur kyun kar Tere gair se maangte hain, jab ke Tere fazl o ehsaan karne ki aadat mein tabdili nahi aati."_

(Dua e Arafa)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

https://chat.whatsapp.com/E8d9zk5NSaDA4wOxAwwHA3

*(Read and Forward to other groups)*

**********************************

               *27th Zilqad 1440*

    *31st July 2019, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

  ♦ _*BANI ISRAEL PAR AZAAB*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1262)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذۡ تَأَذَّنَ رَبُّكَ لَیَبۡعَثَنَّ عَلَیۡهِمۡ إِلَىٰ یَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِیَـٰمَةِ مَن یَسُومُهُمۡ سُوۤءَ ٱلۡعَذَابِۗ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَسَرِیعُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَغَفُورࣱ رَّحِیمࣱ*

_"Aur jab tumhare Rab ne Ailan kar diya ke Woh Qayamat tak barabar aise log un par musallat karta rahega jo unko Badtareen Azaab denge. Yaqeenan tumhara Rab Saza dene mein bahut tez hai aur Yaqeenan Woh Bakhshne wala, Meherban hai."_

(Surah A'raf: 167)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Ye Waeed Yahoodiyon ke liye hai. Allah har daur mein unhe ruswa rakhega aur un par aise afraad musallat karta rahega jo unhe sakht Azaab dete rahenge aur unhe qatl karenge aur un se Jizya wusool karenge. Imam Baqir (as) ki riwayat ke mutabiq Ummat e Muslema ke zariye se Allah Yahoodiyon ko hamesha Saza dega.

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Musa Kazim (as) & Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Allah Ta'ala ne apne Bando ko do khusoosi Hukm diye hain. Pahla Hukm ye diya ke unhe jis baat ka Ilm na ho woh uski takzeeb (deny) na karen kyonki Allah ka farman hai: "Unhone us cheez ki takzeeb ki jo unke Ilmi ahate se bahar thi." (Yunus: 39). Allah Ta'ala ne doosra Hukm ye diya ke jo cheez unhe maloom na ho woh use bayan na karen jaisa ke irshad e Qudrat hai: "Kya inse Kitab ka ye Ahd nahi liya gaya ke Haq baat ke alawa Khuda ke mutalliq aur kuchh na kahen."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*و لا تسلط على من لا يرحمني.*

_"(Parwardigar!) Kisi Be Rehem ko hamare upar musallat na farma."_

(Dua e Hamza Sumali)

---------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

*(Read and Forward to other groups)*

**********************************

            *28th Zilqad 1440*

   *1st August 2019, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

          ♦ _*BALAA - TEST*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1263)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَقَطَّعۡنَـٰهُمۡ فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أُمَمࣰاۖ مِّنۡهُمُ ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ وَمِنۡهُمۡ دُونَ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَۖ وَبَلَوۡنَـٰهُم بِٱلۡحَسَنَـٰتِ وَٱلسَّیِّـَٔاتِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ یَرۡجِعُونَ*

_"Aur Hamne unhe Zameen mein tukde tukde karke bahut si Qaumon mein taqseem kar diya. Un mein kuchh log Nek the aur kuchh un se mukhtalif the. Aur Hamne unko achhe aur bure halaat se azmaish mein mubtila karte rahe ke shayad ye palat aayen."_

(Surah A'raf: 168)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Jabke Ayat Yahoodiyon ke bare mein hai lekin iski Nasihat sab ke liye hai.

Har Insaan is Duniya mein zer o zabar hota rahta hai. Kabhi kisi ke achhe Din aate hain to kisi ke bure Dinon se jujhna padta hai. Is tarah se Duniya mein do giroh hain. Ye sab Allah ki taraf Azmaish hain. Balaa means Test. Aadmi tokhar kha kar hi sanbhalta hai. Jab tak tokhar nahi lagti woh akad kar hi chalta hai.

Is Zel mein Ahadees mulaheza farmayen:

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Ali (as):

_"Balaa ke zariye Momin ka isi tarah Imtihaan hota hai jis tarah Aag ke zariye Sone ko parkha jaata hai."_

(Gorar ul Hakam, v1, p131)

🍂

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Mal'oon hai wo shakhs jis par 40 din baad koi Musibat na pahunche."_

(Meezan ul Hikmah, v1, h1945)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰھُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِیَ الذُّنُوْبَ الَّتِیْ تُغَیِّرُ النِّعَمَ*... *اَللّٰھُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِیَ الذُّنُوْبَ الَّتِیْ تُنْزِلُ الْبَلَاۤءَاَللّٰھُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِیْ كُلَّ ذَنْبٍ اَذْنَبْتُہٗ وَ كُلُّ خَطِۤیْئَۃٍ اَخْطَاْتھَا*.. *وَ كَمْ مِنْ فَادِحٍ مِنَ الْبَلَاۤءِ اَقَلْتَہٗ.*

_"Un Gunahon ko bakhsh de jo Ne'mato'n ko mutaghayyar kar dete hain. Un Gunahon ko bakhsh de jo nuzool e Bala ka sabab hote hain...Aur kitni Azeem Balayen hain jinse Tu ne bachaya hai. Kitni thokren hain jinse Tu ne sanbhala hai, aur kitni Buraiyyan hai jinhe Tu ne taala hai, "_

(Dua-e-Kumail)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL COMMEMORATE SHAHADAT OF IMAM MOHD TAQI AL JAWAD (as)*

**********************************

             *29th Zilqad 1440*

     *2nd August 2019, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

    ♦ _*UMMAT KI BEWAFAI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1223)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَخَلَفَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ خَلۡفࣱ وَرِثُوا۟ ٱلۡكِتَـٰبَ یَأۡخُذُونَ عَرَضَ هَـٰذَا ٱلۡأَدۡنَىٰ وَیَقُولُونَ سَیُغۡفَرُ لَنَا وَإِن یَأۡتِهِمۡ عَرَضࣱ مِّثۡلُهُۥ یَأۡخُذُوهُۚ أَلَمۡ یُؤۡخَذۡ عَلَیۡهِم مِّیثَـٰقُ ٱلۡكِتَـٰبِ أَن لَّا یَقُولُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلۡحَقَّ وَدَرَسُوا۟ مَا فِیهِۗ وَٱلدَّارُ ٱلۡـَٔاخِرَةُ خَیۡرࣱ لِّلَّذِینَ یَتَّقُونَۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ.*

_"Phir agli Naslon ke baad aise Na-Khalf unke Janashin hue jo Kitab e Ilahi ke Waaris ho kar isi Duniya Dani ke fayde samette hain aur kah dete hain ke hamari ghaltiyan Ma'af kar di jayengi aur wohi Mata e Duniya saamne aati hai to phir lapak kar use le lete hain. Kya in se Kitab ka Ahd nahi liya gaya ke Allah ke Naam par bas wohi baat kaho jo Haq ho? Aur ye khud padh chuke hain jo Kitab mein likha hai. Akherat ka Ghar to Khuda Tars (God fearing) Afraad ke liye hi behtar hai kya tum itni se baat bhi nahi samajhte?"_

(Surah A'raf: 169)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Guzishta Ayat Qaum e Musa (as) ke bare mein thi to ye Ayat unki agli Naslon ke bare mein hai. Ayat bilkul wazeh hai.

Lekin yehi baat Musalmano par bhi muntabiq hoti hai.

Baad e Shahadat e Rasool (saww) Musalmano ke aise Na-Khalf Janashin hue jinko na Allah ne na uske Rasool (saww) ne muntakhib kiya tha, jo Kitab e Ilahi ke Waaris hone ka dawa kar rahe the. Woh Deen ke liye nahi balke Duniyavi Iqtedar paa kar fayda samet rahe the. Chahe unhone kitni ghaltiya ki, Gunah kiye, Ahle Bait (as) ko Shaheed kiya, phir Musalman kahta hai ke unki ghaltiyan Ma'af kar di jayengi. Karbala mein lakhon ki fauj Mata e Duniya ki taraf lapak rahi thi.

Kiya Ghadeer ke Maidan mein Rasoole Akram (saww) ne Musalmano se Ahd nahi liya tha. Kiya Haq ki Dawat nahi di gayi thi. Kya Rasool (saww) ne Ali (as) ko sawa Lakh ke majme nahi kaha tha: 'Jiska mein Maula uske ye Ali (as) Maula hain. Kaho to Haq ki baat kaho. Isse pahle Alam e Zar mein to sabhi se Ahd liya gaya tha. Jab ke Kitab e Ilahi Quran mein bhi Ahle Bait (as) ki Fazilat padh chuke hain.

Ye sab isliye ke inhe Khuda ka Khauf nahin tha, agar Khuda se darte to aisa na karte. Beshak Akherat Khuda Tars afraad ke liye hai. Itni wazeh baat samajh mein nahi aa rahi, tajjub hai!!!!

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Ali (as):

_"Momin ka chiraag hamare Haq ki Ma'arefat hai aur badtareen Andhapan hamare fazl se Aa'nkhen band kar lena hai."_

(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p167)

🤲🏻

*وَاَشْهَدُ اَنَّ الْاَئِمَّةَ الْاَبْرَارَ وَالْخُلَفَاۤءَ الْاَخْيَارَ بَعْدَ الرَّسُوْلِ الْمُخْتَارِ، عَلِىٌّ قَامِعُ الْكُفَّارِ وَمِنْ بَعْدِهِ سَيِّدُ اَوْلَادِهِ الْحَسَنُ بْنُ عَلِىٍّ (ع) ......*

(Dua e Adeela)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

🎂💐 *HAPPY BIRTHDAY Marja' Taqleed AYATULLAH SISTANI (DZ) (89)*🎂💐

*(Read & forward to other groups)*

**********************************

              *2nd Zilhajj 1440*

       *4th August 2019, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

         ♦ _*HAJJ & UMRAH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1266)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَأَتِمُّوا الْحَجَّ وَالْعُمْرَةَ لِلَّهِ ۚ فَإِنْ أُحْصِرْتُمْ فَمَا اسْتَيْسَرَ مِنَ الْهَدْيِ ۖ وَلَا تَحْلِقُوا رُءُوسَكُمْ حَتَّىٰ يَبْلُغَ الْهَدْيُ مَحِلَّهُ ۚ فَمَنْ كَانَ مِنْكُمْ مَرِيضًا أَوْ بِهِ أَذًى مِنْ رَأْسِهِ فَفِدْيَةٌ مِنْ صِيَامٍ أَوْ صَدَقَةٍ أَوْ نُسُكٍ ۚ فَإِذَا أَمِنْتُمْ فَمَنْ تَمَتَّعَ بِالْعُمْرَةِ إِلَى الْحَجِّ فَمَا اسْتَيْسَرَ مِنَ الْهَدْيِ ۚ فَمَنْ لَمْ يَجِدْ فَصِيَامُ ثَلَاثَةِ أَيَّامٍ فِي الْحَجِّ وَسَبْعَةٍ إِذَا رَجَعْتُمْ ۗ تِلْكَ عَشَرَةٌ كَامِلَةٌ ۗ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ لَمْ يَكُنْ أَهْلُهُ حَاضِرِي الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ شَدِيدُ الْعِقَابِ*

_"Hajj aur Umrah ko Allah (ki Reza) ke liye poora karo, pass agar tum (bimari waghaira ki wajah se) majboor ho jao to jo Qurbani mumkin ho wo de do, us waqt tak Sar na mundwao jab tak Qurbani apni Manzil tak na pahunch jaye. Phir jab itminan ho jaye to jisne Umrah se Hajj e Tamatto ka iraada kiya hai wo mumkina Qurbani de do aur jisko Qurbani mayassar na ho to Teen Roze Hajj ke dauran aur Saat Roze wapsi par rakhe, is tarah poore 10 Din ho jayen. Ye Hajj e Tamatto aur Qurbani unke liye hai jinke Ahle Masjidul Haram ke hazir shumar nahi hote aur Allah se darte raho aur jaan lo ke Khuda ka Azaab Sakht hai."_

(Surah Baqarah: 196)

📚📖 🕋

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Makhlooq par Hajj ki tarah Umrah bhi Wajib hai albatta iske liye isteta'at ka hona buniyadi shart hai kyonki Allah Ta'ala farma raha hai (2:196). Umrah Madina mein nazil hua tha aur Umrah Mahe Rajab ka Umrah hai."_

(Kitab Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)

🕋

Hajj ko "Hajj kyon kaha jata hai?

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Arabi Zaban ka ek Mauhavra hai:" *حج فلان* - Hajja Fulan." Yani 'falan shakhs ne Nijaat paye.' Chunke Hajj Nijaat ka zariya hai, isiliye isko Hajj kaha jata hai."_

(Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)

🕋

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Mahsoor - *محصور*" aur hai aur "Masdood - *مصدود*"  aur hai aur har ek Shara'ii Hukm juda juda hai. Mahsoor woh jo Bimaari ki wajah se raaste mein ruk jaye aur Masdood woh hai jise Mushrik raaste mein rok den. Jaisa ke Mushrekin e Makkah ne Rasoole Khuda (saww) aur unke Ashaab ko Hudaibiya se wapas jaane par majboor kar diya tha aur Masdood Mareez nahi hota.
