Chunanche Masdood ke liye Biwiyon se Maqarebat jayez hai jabke Mahsoor ke liye Biwi se Maqarebat jayez nahi hai."_

_"Woh jin saathiyon ke haath Qurbani kare unke saath Qurbani karne ka Din muqarrar kare aur agar Hajj ke liye Qurbani rawana kar raha hai to uska muqarrarah Din 10 Zilhajj hai aur jab 10 Zilhajj ka Din ho jaye to woh Taqseer kare (Sar Mudana) aur jab tak Manasik ada kare us waqt tak us par Tahleeq (Sar Mundwana) Wajib nahi hogi. Aur Umrah ho to woh apne saathiyon ke Makkah mein dakhil hone aur usne saathiyon se jo waqt muqarrar kiya tha uska intezar kare aur jab waqt aa jaye to Sar ke Baal katwai aur Ehram se azad ho jaye. Aur agar woh Ghar se nikal kar raaste mein Bimar hua ho aur wapas Ghar jaane kar iraada kiya ho to woh ek Oont neher kare aur apni jagah qayam kare yahan tak ke shifayab ho jaye. Aur jab Tandrust ho jaye to us par Umrah karna Wajib hoga. Aur agar woh Hajj ka iraada rakhta ho aur laut aaye aur apne Ghar qayam kare yahan tak ke Hajj ke ayyam guzar jayen to woh ainda saal Hajj kare."_

_"Chunanche Imam Husain (as) Umrah mein bimar hue to aisa hi kiya."_

(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🕋

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Jab Rasoole Khuda (saww) ko Hudaibiya ke maqam par Umrah karne se roka gaya to Aap (saww) ne Baalon ki thodi se miqdar katwai aur Aap (saww) Ehram ki pabandi se azad ho gaye. Phir Aap (saww) ne Qurbani zabah farmayi aur Hudaibiya se hi Madina wapas laut aaye. Aap (saww) par Sar mundwana Wajib nahi tha kyonki Aap (saww) ne Manasik e Hajj ada nahi kiye. Mahsoor (Majboor) shakhs ke liye "Taqseer" yani thoda sa Baalon ko katwana Wajib hai."_

(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 🕋

 Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Hajj ki Takmeel (completion) Mulaqat e Imam (as) se hoti hai."_

(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَاٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَارْزُقْنِي الْحَجَّ وَالْعُمْرَةَ*

(Dua e Ramazan - Mafatih)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

              *3rd Zilhajj 1440*

      *5th August 2019, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

         ♦ _*HAJJ & UMRAH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1267)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*ٱلۡحَجُّ أَشۡهُرࣱ مَّعۡلُومَـٰتࣱۚ فَمَن فَرَضَ فِیهِنَّ ٱلۡحَجَّ فَلَا رَفَثَ وَلَا فُسُوقَ وَلَا جِدَالَ فِی ٱلۡحَجِّۗ وَمَا تَفۡعَلُوا۟ مِنۡ خَیۡرࣲ یَعۡلَمۡهُ ٱللَّهُۗ وَتَزَوَّدُوا۟ فَإِنَّ خَیۡرَ ٱلزَّادِ ٱلتَّقۡوَىٰۖ وَٱتَّقُونِ یَـٰۤأُو۟لِی ٱلۡأَلۡبَـٰبِ*

[Surat Al-Baqarah 197]

_"Hajj ka Amal chand muqarrar Mahino mein hota hai aur jo shakhs bhi us Zamane mein apne upar lazim kare to use Aurton se Mubasherat (sex) aur Gunah aur Jhagde ki ijazat nahi hai aur tum jo bhi achhayi karoge Khuda use jaanta hai. Apne liye Zade Rah faraham karo. Beshak Behtareen Zade Rah Taqwa hai aur Aye Aqalmando! Mujh se Darte raho."_

(Surah Baqarah: 197)

📚📖 🕋

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jab Ehram baandho to Taqwa malhooze khatir rakho aur kasrat se Allah ka Zikr karo aur behtar baat ke alawa zaban se aur kuchh na kaho, kyonki Hajj o Umrah ki Takmeel ki ek shart hai ke Insaan achhi baat ke alawa Zaban se aur kuchh na nikale jaisa ke Allah Ta'ala farmata hai: (2:197)"_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🕋

Imam Reza (as):

_'Agar ye sawal kiya jaye ke Islam mein sirf ek Hajj ka Hukm kyon diya gaya hai jabke zyada ka Hukm bhi diya ja sakta tha? Iske jawab mein kaha jayega: 'Allah Ta'ala ne Faraez sab se kamzor fard ki hasiyat ko dekh kar muqarrar kiye hain jaisa ke Allah ne farmaya hai:_

*فَمَا ٱسۡتَیۡسَرَ مِنَ ٱلۡهَدۡیِۖ*

_'Yani jo Qurbani mumkin ho wo kare.' aur is Ayat ke tahet ek Bakri ki Qurbani zaroori hai kyonki Bakri ki Qurbani Ameer o Ghareeb dono ke liye asaan hai. Isi tarah se doosre faraez mein bhi Allah Ta'ala ne Bando ki sahulat ko madde nazar rakha hai."_

(Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Ali (as):

_"Duniya mein reh kar Akherat ke liye Zaad e Raah jama karo aur behtareen Zaad e Raah Taqwa hai."_

(Hadiyat ush Shia, p620)

🤲🏻

*صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَاٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، وَارْزُقْنِيْ حَجَّ بَيْتِكَ الْحَرَامِ فِيْ عَامِيْ هٰذَا وَفِيْ كُلِّ عَامٍ...*

(Dua e Ramazan - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

(Today: Rasoole Khuda (saww) Aaj ke Din Makkah Mukarramah mein apne Akheri Hajj ke liye dakhil hue.)

----------------------------------------------

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

              *4th Zilhajj 1440*

     *6th August 2019, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

          ♦ _*HAJJ & UMRAH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1268)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*لَیۡسَ عَلَیۡكُمۡ جُنَاحٌ أَن تَبۡتَغُوا۟ فَضۡلࣰا مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡۚ فَإِذَاۤ أَفَضۡتُم مِّنۡ عَرَفَـٰتࣲ فَٱذۡكُرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ عِندَ ٱلۡمَشۡعَرِ ٱلۡحَرَامِۖ وَٱذۡكُرُوهُ كَمَا هَدَىٰكُمۡ وَإِن كُنتُم مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦ لَمِنَ ٱلضَّاۤلِّینَ*

_"Tum par apne Parwardigar ka Fazl o Karam talash karne mein koi harj nahi hai. Pas jab tum Arafaat se kooch karo to Masha'arul Haraam ke paas Zikr e Khuda karo aur Khuda ko is tarah yaad karo jaisa ke Usne tumhe Hidayat di hai. Agarche tum isse qabl gumrah logon mein se the."_

(Surah Baqarah: 198)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Baqir (as):

"Is Ayat mein Fazl - *فضل* se murad Tijarat hai. Zamana e Jahiliyyat mein Azmeen e Hajj ke liye Tijarat ko Gunah tasawwur kiya jata tha. Allah ne is khayal ki tardeed ki."

Iske alawa Fazl se murad 'Maghferat' bhi hai.

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

🕋

Hazrat Ali (as):

"Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ne Allah se is Waadi ke Ausaf sune the. Jab wahan pahunche to unhone Ausaf se hi us Waadi ko pahchan liya tha. Chunanche is pahchan o Ma'arefat ki wajah se Waadi ka naam "Arafaat - *عرفات*" rakha gaya."

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

🕋

Ek qaul ye bhi hai ke Adam wa Hawwa (as) ki mulaqat hui thi aur unhone ek doosre ko pahchan liya tha. Isiliye is Waadi ko "Arafaat" kaha gaya.

(Noorus Saqlain)

🕋

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Ahle Haram Masha'arul Haraam mein wuqoof (stop) kiya karte the. Jabke doosre log Arafa mein wuqoof karte the aur woh us waqt tak kooch nahi karte the jab tak Ahle Arafa kooch karke unhe aate hue dikhayi nahi dete. Chunanche ek shakhs jiska naam "Abu Sayyar" tha aur uske paas ek Gadha tha jo bada tez raftar tha aur jab baqi log Arafa se kooch karte to wo Gadha daud kar unse pahle Quraish ke saamne numudar hota tha aur woh use dekh kar kahte the ke ab "Abu Sayyar" aa gaya hai. Phir woh wahan se kooch kiya karte the. Allah Ta'ala ne Ahle Haram ko Nasihat ki ke woh apna khusoosi imriyaz khatm kar den aur woh bhi baqi logon ke saath Arafa mein wuqoof karen aur logon ke saath kooch karen."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Sadiq (as):

_" Arafaat mein thaherne wale kisi bhi gaon (village) ke ek Momin ke badle mein Allah oos gaon ke tamaam Momin ko baksh dega aur kisi bhi Momin khandaan ke Arafaat mein thaherne wale ek shakhs ke badle mein Allah oos khandaan ke tamaam Momeneen ko maaf kar dega."_

(Hajj - The Islamic Pilgrimage)

🤲🏻

Riwayat:

"Parwardigar un Zaireen e Imam Husain (as) par Maidan e Arafaat mein hazir hone walon se zyada Nigah e Rahmat rakhta hai."

(Mafateehul Jinaan)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

               *5th Zilhajj 1440*

     *7th August 2019, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

         ♦ _*HAJJ & UMRAH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1269)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*ثُمَّ أَفِیضُوا۟ مِنۡ حَیۡثُ أَفَاضَ ٱلنَّاسُ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورࣱ رَّحِیمࣱ*

_"Phir bhi baqi logon ki tarah wahan se kooch karo aur Khuda se Maghferat talab karo. Yaqeenan Allah Bakhshne wala, Meherban hai."_

(Surah Baqarah: 199)

📚📖 🕋

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Is Ayat se Ahle Yemen murad hain. Yani jahan se Ahle Yemen kooch karen tum bhi unke saath kooch karo."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🕋

Mufasserin ne do qaul pesh kiye hain:

(Imam Baqir (as):)

(1) Ifaaza e Arafat se kooch karne se murad hai aur 'An-Naas' se doosre Arab murad hain. Allah Ta'ala ne is Ayat se Quraish ke ghuroor o imtiyaz ka khatma kiya hai. Ye Ghuroor sirf Quraish tak hi mahdood nahi tha balke 5 Qabayel aur bhi the. Chunanche Quraish apne opposite ke saath na to Arafa mein wuqoof karte the aur na hi logon ke saath kooch karte the. Woh kaha karte the ke ham Haram e Parwardigar ke rihaishi hain. Hame Haram se bahar jaane ki zaroorat nahi hai. Woh sirf Muzdalfa mein hi wuqoof kiya karte the aur wahan se hi kooch kiya karte the. Allah ne unke Ghuroor ko pash pash kiya aur Hukm diya ke woh koi judagana Makhlooq thodi hi hain lehaza woh bhi baqi logon ke saath Wuqoof e Arafaat mein shamil hon aur doosre Arabon ke dosh ba dosh wahan se kooch karen."

(2) Ek qaul ye hai ke is Ayat se Eid-e-Qurban ke Din Muzdalfa se Mina ka kooch murad hai jiske baad Shaitan ko Patthar maare jate hain aur Qurbani ki jati hai."

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule khuda (saww):

_"Jise Allah Ta'la koi Ne'mat ataa karta hai usay Allah ki Hamd karni chahiye aur jise Rozi milne mein der hone lage usay Allah se Istegfaar karna chahiye."_

(Rizq)

🔺

Imam Ali (as):

_"Mujhe us shakhs ke haal par ta'jjub hota hai jo Istegfaar ki taaqat rakhta hai aur phir bhi Rehmat e Khuda se maayoos ho jaata hai."_

(Nahjul Balagah)

🤲🏻

Bare Ilaha ham sab ko Hajj o Umrah ada karne ki Taufeeq ata farma.

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

               *6th Zilhajj 1440*

     *8th August 2019, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

         ♦ _*HAJJ & UMRAH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1267)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَإِذَا قَضَیۡتُم مَّنَـٰسِكَكُمۡ فَٱذۡكُرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ كَذِكۡرِكُمۡ ءَابَاۤءَكُمۡ أَوۡ أَشَدَّ ذِكۡرࣰاۗ فَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن یَقُولُ رَبَّنَاۤ ءَاتِنَا فِی ٱلدُّنۡیَا وَمَا لَهُۥ فِی ٱلۡـَٔاخِرَةِ مِنۡ خَلَـٰقࣲ.*

_"Aur jab tum apne Manasik ada kar lo to Khuda ko is tarah yaad karo jis tarah se tum apne Baap Dada ko yaad karte ho balke isse zyada yaad karo. Kuchh log aise bhi hain jo kahte hain: 'Hamara Parwardigar! Hame Duniya hi mein bhalai de de aur unka Akherat mein koi hissa nahi hai."_

(Surah Baqarah: 200)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Ahle Arab ka dastoor tha ke jab woh Manasik e Hajj se farigh hote the to apne Aaba o Ajdad ke fazail aur unke karname aur unke ehsanaat ka zikr kiya karte the. Allah Ta'ala ne unki islah ki aur unhe Hukm diya ke woh apne Aaba o Ajdad ke zikr ke bajaye Allah ka Zikr karen aur Khuda ke Azeem Ehsanaat ka tazkara karen, kyonki Allah ki Ne'maat Aaba o Ajdad (forefathers) ke ehsanaat se beher no' zyada hain."_

(Tafseer Majmaul Bayan, Tafseer Ayyashi, Ali Ibne Ibrahim, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Reza (as):

_"Hajj Khuda ke Huzoor Mehmaan banne aur pichhle Gunahon ki Maghferat talab karne aur mustaqbil (Future) ke liye Taufiqaat e Ilaahi talab karne aur apne jism ko thakane aur khandan aur Ahl o Ayaal (family) se juda hone aur apne aap ko lazzat se kinara-kash (door) karne aur Khuzoo o Khushoo (humbleness) ke saath Manasik (rituals) baja laane ka naam hai…"_

(Uyoon Akhbar ar Reza, v2, p252)

🤲🏻

Imam Sadiq (as) ne is Ayat ke mutalliq farmaya:

*وَٱذۡكُرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ فِیۤ أَیَّامࣲ مَّعۡدُودَ ٰ⁠تࣲۚ*

(Aur chand muayyan Dino mein Khuda ko yaad karo.)

_"Ayyam e Maloomaat' se Ayyam e Tashreeq yani 11, 12, 13 Zilhajj ke Din murad hain aur Zamana Jahiliyyat ka Riwaj tha ke jab log Qurbani kar lete the to woh apne Aaba o Ajdad ke karnamo par fakhr karte the aur kahte the ke mera Walid aisa aisa tha aur mere Baap ne Falan Falan karname sar anjam diye the. Allah Ta'ala ne unhe Rehnumai karte hue farmaya (2:200). Chunanche 'Ayyam e Tashreeq' ki Takbeerat ye hain:"_

*اَللّٰهُ اَكْبَرُ اَللّٰهُ اَكْبَرُ لَاۤ اِلٰهَ اِلَّا اللّٰهُ وَ اللّٰهُ اَكْبَرُ اَللّٰهُ اَكْبَرُ وَ لِلّٰهِ الْحَمْدُ وَاللّٰهُ اَكْبَرُ عَلٰى مَا هَدَانَا اَللّٰهُ اَكْبَرُ عَلٰى مَا رَزَقَنَا مِنْ بَهِيْمَةِ الْاَنْعَامِ وَ الْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ عَلٰى مَاۤ اَبْلَانَا۔*

(Noorus Saqlain, Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL COMMEMORATE SHAHADAT OF IMAM BAQIR (as) TODAY*

**********************************

               *7th Zilhajj 1440*

        *9th August 2019, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*DUNIYA WA AKHERAT KI NEKI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1268)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَمِنۡهُم مَّن یَقُولُ رَبَّنَاۤ ءَاتِنَا فِی ٱلدُّنۡیَا حَسَنَةࣰ وَفِی ٱلۡـَٔاخِرَةِ حَسَنَةࣰ وَقِنَا عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ ۝  أُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ لَهُمۡ نَصِیبࣱ مِّمَّا كَسَبُوا۟ۚ وَٱللَّهُ سَرِیعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ*

_"Aur un mein se kuchh log kahte hain ke: 'Aye hamare Parwardigar! Hamen Duniya mein bhi Neki ata farma aur Akherat mein bhi Neki ata farma aur hame Dozakh ke Azaab se bacha le. Yehi woh log hain jinke liye unki kamayi ka hissa hai aur Khuda bahut jald hisab lene wala hai."_

(Surah Baqarah: 201 - 202)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadiq (as) ne is Ayat ke zel mein farmaya:

_"Duniyavi bhalayi Rizq o Ma'ash ki Wus'at aur Husn e Khalq hai aur Akherat ki bhalayi Khuda ki Razamandi aur Jannat hai."_

_"Mere Walid ( *Imam Baqir as*) ne farmaya: 'Moqif mein jo bhi qayam karega to khwah woh Momin ho ya Kafir ho Allah uski Maghferat karega aur Maghferat ke 3 darajat hain. Momin ke agle pichhle Gunah Ma'af kar diye jate hain aur Khuda usko Dozakh se azadi ata karta hai aur is mafhoom ko Allah Ta'ala ne in Ayaat mein bayan kiya hai (2:201-202)"_

(Kitab Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Riwayat:

_"Allah Ta'ala itni hi der se tamam Makhlooq ka Hisaab le lega jitni der mein ek Bakri doohi jati hai. "_

📝

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):

_" Allah jis tarah se beyak waqt Makhlooq ko Rizq deta hai usi tarah se beyak waqt unse Hisaab lega."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Baitullah ke gird 7 chakkar lagao aur Tawaf mein ye Duayen padho aur jab Rukn e Yamani aur Hajr e Aswad ke darmiyan pahuncho to ye Dua padho:_

*رَبَّنَاۤ ءَاتِنَا فِی ٱلدُّنۡیَا حَسَنَةࣰ وَفِی ٱلۡـَٔاخِرَةِ حَسَنَةࣰ وَقِنَا عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ*

_"Aur jab koi Momin ye Dua mangta hai to wahan ek Farishta muqarrar hai jo Ameen kahta hai."_

(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

                *8th Zilhajj 1440*

      *10th August 2019, Saturday*

💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐

*وَالسَّلَامُ عَلَيَّ يَوْمَ وُلِدْتُ وَيَوْمَ أَمُوتُ وَيَوْمَ أُبْعَثُ حَيًّا*

_*"Salam ho us Din par jis Din MEIN PAIDA HUA, jis Din mein marunga aur jis Din mein uthaya jaonga."*_

(Maryam: 33)

🎂🎂🎂🎂🎂🎂🎂🎂🎂🎂

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

     ♦ _*AYYAM-E-TASHREEQ'*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1269)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَٱذۡكُرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ فِیۤ أَیَّامࣲ مَّعۡدُودَ ٰ⁠تࣲۚ فَمَن تَعَجَّلَ فِی یَوۡمَیۡنِ فَلَاۤ إِثۡمَ عَلَیۡهِ وَمَن تَأَخَّرَ فَلَاۤ إِثۡمَ عَلَیۡهِۖ لِمَنِ ٱتَّقَىٰۗ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱعۡلَمُوۤا۟ أَنَّكُمۡ إِلَیۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ*

[Surat Al-Baqarah 203]

_"Aur chand muayyan Dino mein Khuda ka Zikr karo. Jo koi do Dino mein jaldi kare to us par koi Gunah nahi hai aur jo takheer (delay) kare to us par bhi koi Gunah nahi hai basharteke woh Parhezgar raha ho aur Allah se darte raho aur jaan lo ke tum Uski taraf mehshoor kiye jaoge."_

(Surah Baqarah: 203)

📚📖 🕋

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"(Ayyam e Madoodaat) se murad 'Ayyam e Tashreeq, 11, 12, 13 Zilhajj ki Takbiraat hain aur inka aghaaz Qurbani ke Din Namaz e Zuhr se kiya jayega aur Teesre Din ki Fajr Namaz tak Takbiraat kahi jayengi aur Mina ke alawa doosre Shehron mein 10 Namazon tak ye Takbiraat kahi jayengi aur jab Mina se pahla giroh kooch kare to baqi Shehron wale Takbiraat rok den aur jo Mina mein qayam kare aur wahan Zuhr o Asr padhe to ye Takbiraat bhi kahe."_

(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🕋

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jab kisi Ahram bandhne wale ne Shikar se parhez na kiya ho to woh pahle giroh ke saamne Mina se kooch na kare aur jis shakhs ne pahle giroh ke saath kooch kiya ho to woh us waqt tak shikar nahi kar sakta jab tak baqi log Mina se kooch na karen aur isi cheez ko Allah Ta'ala ne Qur'an Majeed mein in Alfaaz mein bayan kiya (2:203)"_

(Tehzeebul Ahkam, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 🕋

 Imam Baqir (as):

_"Jab koi Musalman poori tarah se Hajj kar leta hai to woh apne Gunahon se yun Azaad ho jata hai jaise woh Paidaish ke Din gunahon se Azaad tha. Aur jo shakhs Khuda se kiya hua Ahd poora karta hai ti Allah bhi usse kiya hua apna Ahd poora karta hai."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ ارْزُقْنيْ حَجَّ بَيْتِكَ الْحَرَامِ فِي عَامِيْ هٰذَا وَفِيْ كُلِّ عَامٍ مَا اَبْقَيْتَنِيْ فِيْ يُسْرٍ مِنْكَ*

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

               *11th Zilhajj 1440*

     *13th August 2019, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

       ♦ _*KITAB SE TAMASSUK*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1270)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَٱلَّذِینَ یُمَسِّكُونَ بِٱلۡكِتَـٰبِ وَأَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ إِنَّا لَا نُضِیعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُصۡلِحِینَ*

_"Woh log jo Kitab se wabastagi (attachment) rakhte hain aur jo Namaz qayem karte hain yaqeenan aise Nek Kirdaron ka Ajr Ham zaye' nahi karenge."_

(Surah A'raf: 170)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

(Guzishta series ko jaare rakhte hue:)

Imam Mohd Baqir (as):

_"Is Ayat ke mukammal misdaq Aale Mohammad (as) aur unke Shia hain."_

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya ke woh do wazni chhod kar jaa rahe hain: Kitab wa Itrat e Ahle Bait (as), jo inse mutamassik rahega woh kabhi gumrah na hoga. Quran baghair Ahle Qur'an ke nahi samjha ja sakta. Isiliye Aap (saww) ne dono se jude rahne ki hidayat di. Jo log in do se jude hain Allah unka Ajr zaye' nahi karta.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):

_"Jan lo tum Hidayat ko us waqt tak ba pahchan sakoge jab tak uske chhodne walon ko na pahchan lo aur tum Qur'an ke Ahd o Paiman ke paband na rah sakoge jab tak uske todne wale ko na jaan lo aur usse wabasta nahi rah sakte jab tak use phenkne walon ki shanakht na kar lo. Jo Hidayat wale hain unhi se Hidayat talab karo. Wohi Ilm ki Zindagi aur Jihalat ki Maut hain. Woh aise log hain ke unke Ilm ka aur unki khamoshi unki goyayi ka pata degi aur unka Zaahir unke Baatin ka Aayinadar hai. Woh na Deen ki mukhalifat karte hain aur na uske bare mein baaham ikhtilaf rakhte hain. Deen unke saamne ek sachcha gawah hai aur ek aisa be Zaban hai jo bol raha hai."_

(Nahjul Balagha, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ خَاتَمِ النَّبِيِّيْنَ وَ عَلٰى عَلِيٍّ سَيِّدِ الْوَصِيِّيْنَ وَ اٰلِهِ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ وَ اجْعَلْنَا بِهِمْ مُتَمَسِّكِيْنَ وَ بِوِلَايَتِهِمْ مِنَ الْفَاۤئِزِيْنَ الْاٰمِنِيْنَ الَّذِيْنَ لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَ َلا هُمْ يَحْزَنُوْنَ۔*

(Ziyarat Roz e Ghadeer - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

               *12th Zilhajj 1440*

   *14th August 2019, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*BANI ISRAEL & KOHE TOOR*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1271)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذۡ نَتَقۡنَا ٱلۡجَبَلَ فَوۡقَهُمۡ كَأَنَّهُۥ ظُلَّةࣱ وَظَنُّوۤا۟ أَنَّهُۥ وَاقِعُۢ بِهِمۡ خُذُوا۟ مَاۤ ءَاتَیۡنَـٰكُم بِقُوَّةࣲ وَٱذۡكُرُوا۟ مَا فِیهِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَتَّقُونَ*

_"Aur woh waqt bhi unhe yaad dilao jab Hamne Pahad ko hila kar un par chhatri ki tarah se chhupa diya tha aur ye guman kar rahe the ke wo un par aa padega. Hamne tumhe jo Kitab di hai use mazbooti ke saath thamo aur jo kuchh is mein likha hua hai use yaad karo, tawaqqo hai ke tum ghalat rawi se bache rahoge."_

(Surah A'raf: 171)

📚📖 ⛰

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jab Allah Ta'ala ne Taurat nazil farmayi to Bani Israel ne ise manne par amadgi ka izhar nahi kiya tha. Allah Ta'ala ne un par Kohe Toor ko buland kar diya. Hazrat Musa (as) ne un se farmaya: 'Agar tum Imaan na laate to ye Pahad upar aa kar girega.' Akhirkar Bani Israel ne ise qubool kiya."_

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

⛰

Taoos e Yamani Imam Baqir (as) se poochha ke wo udne wala kaunsa Parinda hai jo sirf ek martaba uda, na isse pahle uda aur na iske baad uda?

Imam (as) ne farmaya:

_"Wo Toor e Sina hai jise Bani Israel ke upar buland kiya gaya tha. Jaisa ke Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya (7:171)"_

(Ehtejaaj Tabarsi, Manaqib Ibne Shahr e Ashoob, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Logo'n ne Kitabullah ki mohtaram-tareen Ayat 'Bismillah Hir Rahmanir Rahim' ki chori ki hai."_

(Yaani logo'n ne Namaz mein Bismillah chhor kar is Ayat ki chori ki hai)

(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v1, p30)

🤲🏻

*اللّٰهُمَّ بِمَجْدِكَ الَّذِيْ كَلَّمْتَ بِهِ عَبْدَكَ وَرَسُوْلَكَ مُوْسىٰ بْنَ عِمْرَانَ عَلَيْهِ اَلسَّلَامُ فِى الْمُقَدَّسِيْنَ فَوْقَ اِحْسَاسِ الْكَرُوْبِيْنَ فَوْقَ غَمَاۤئِمِ النُّوْرِ فَوْقَ تَابُوْتِ الشَّهَادَةِ فِيْ عَمُوْدِ النَّارِ وَ فِيْ طُوْرِ سَيْنَاۤءَ وَ فِيْ جَبَلِ حُوْرِيْثَ فِيْ الْوَادِ الْمُقَدَّسِ فِيْ الْبُقْعَةِ الْمُبَارَكَةِ مِنْ جَانِبِ الطُّوْرِ الْاَيْمَنِ مِنَ الشَّجَرَةِ وَ فِيْ اَرْضِ مِصْرَ بِتِسْعِ اٰيَاتٍ بَيِّنَاتٍ وَ يَوْمَ فَرَقْتَ لِبَنِىْ اِسْرَاۤئِيْلَ الْبَحْرَ وَ فِيْ الْمُنْبَجِسَاتِ الَّتِىْ صَنَعْتَ بِهَا الْعَجَاۤئِبَ فِيْ بَحْرِ سُوْفِ وَ عَقَدْتَ مَاۤءَ الْبَحْرِ فِيْ قَلْبِ الْغَمْرِ كَالْحِجَارَةِ وَ جَاوَزْتَ بِبَنِىْ اِسْرَاۤئِيْلَ الْبَحْرَ..*

(Dua e Simat - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

🇮🇳 🇮🇳 🇮🇳 🇮🇳 🇮🇳 🇮🇳 🇮🇳 🇮🇳🇮🇳

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

             *13th Zilhajj 1440*

     *15th August 2019, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

          ♦ _*AALAM-E-ZAR*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1272)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذۡ أَخَذَ رَبُّكَ مِنۢ بَنِیۤ ءَادَمَ مِن ظُهُورِهِمۡ ذُرِّیَّتَهُمۡ وَأَشۡهَدَهُمۡ عَلَىٰۤ أَنفُسِهِمۡ أَلَسۡتُ بِرَبِّكُمۡۖ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ شَهِدۡنَاۤۚ أَن تَقُولُوا۟ یَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِیَـٰمَةِ إِنَّا كُنَّا عَنۡ هَـٰذَا غَـٰفِلِینَ*

_"Aur Aye Nabi! Logon ko wo waqt yaad dilao jab tumhare Rab ne Nabi Adam ki pushton se unki Nasl ko nikala tha aur unhe khud unke upar gawah banate hue poochha tha ke kya Mein tumhara Rab nahi hun? Unhone kaha: Zaroor Aap hi hamare Rab hain, ham is par gawahi dete hain. Ye Hamne isliye kiya ke kahin tum Qayamat ke Roz ye na kah do ke ham tum isse be khabar the."_

(Surah A'raf: 172)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Ghadeer us Ahd ki yaad dahani hai jo Ahd Allah ne logon se Aalam e Zar mein liya tha.

Aalam e Zar se ye saabit hai ke Aqeeda e Tauheed Insaan ki Fitrat mein paya jata hai.

Imam Baqar (as) se manqool hai ke "Allah ne Razo 'Alasto' Apni Ruboobiyat aur Habib e Khuda (saww) ki Risalat aur Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ki Wilayat k iqrar liya tha."

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jab Allah ne Makhlooq ko *Haalat e Zar* mein paida kiya to unhe apne saamne phailaya aur unse kaha: 'Tumhara Rab kaun hai? Us waqt tamam Bani Adam mein se sab se pahle Rasoole Khuda (saww), Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) aur Aimma (as) ne jawab dete hue kaha tha ke Tu hi hamara Rab hai. Allah ne unhe apne Ilm aur Deen ka haamil banaya. Phir Allah ne Farishton se kaha ke ye mere Deen o Ilm ke Haamil (Carrier) hain aur meri Makhlooq mein mere Ameen hain aur ye Mas'ool (Zimmedar) honge. Phir Allah Ta'ala ne Bani Adam se farmaya: "Tum Allah ki Ruboobiyat aur in afraad ki Wilayat aur Ita'at ka iqraar karo."_

_"Us waqt unhone jawab diya tha: 'Parwardigar! Ham iqraar karte hain.' Allah Ta'ala ne Malaika se farmaya ke tum inke iqrar ke Gawah ban jao. Malaika ne kaha: 'Ham Gawah hain."_

_"Us waqt Ali (as) ne kaha tha ke khabardar kal ye na kahna ke ham to is Misaaq (Covenant) se ghaafil the aur ye bhi na kahna ke hamare Abaa o Ajdad ne Shirk kiya tha. Hamne to Shirk ka Aqeeda ijaad nahi kiya tha to kya Tu Baatil Paraston ke Aamaal ki wajah se hame halaak karega."_

Phir Imam Sadiq (as) ne farmaya:

 _*"Dawood! Roz e Misaaq hamari Wilayat ki takeed hai."*_

(Raavi: Dawood Reqi. Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

Silsila e Rivayaat is Topic par jaari rahega.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Ya Ali! Jo tumhe dost rakhega aur tumhari Wilayat ko qubool karega to Khuda Wanda Behisht (Jannat) mein usko hamare saath jagah dega. Iske baad is Ayat ki tilawat farmayi, "Beshak Parhezgaar log Jannat ke baago'n mein aur Nehro'n ke kinaare par rahenge"_ (Qamar: 54)

(Maula Ali Ki Shaan Mein 1000 Ahadees, h871, p506)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ الْعَنْ قَتَلَةَ اَنْبِيَاۤئِكَ وَ اَوْصِيَاۤءِ اَنْبِيَاۤئِكَ بِجَمِيْعِ لَعَنَاتِكَ، وَ اَصْلِهِمْ حَرَّ نَارِكَ وَ الْعَنْ مَنْ غَصَبَ وَلِيَّكَ حَقَّهُ وَ اَنْكَرَ عَهْدَهُ وَ جَحَدَهُ بَعْدَ الْيَقِيْنِ وَ الْاِقْرَارِ بِالْوِلَايَةِ لَهُ يَوْمَ اَكْمَلْتَ لَهُ الدِّيْنَ*

(Ziyarat e Aminullah - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

              *14th Zilhajj 1440*

     *16th August 2019, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

         ♦ _*AALAM-E-ZARR*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1273)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*أَوۡ تَقُولُوۤا۟ إِنَّمَاۤ أَشۡرَكَ ءَابَاۤؤُنَا مِن قَبۡلُ وَكُنَّا ذُرِّیَّةࣰ مِّنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡۖ أَفَتُهۡلِكُنَا بِمَا فَعَلَ ٱلۡمُبۡطِلُونَ ۝  وَكَذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡـَٔایَـٰتِ وَلَعَلَّهُمۡ یَرۡجِعُونَ*

_"Ya tum ye na kahne lago ke Shirk ki ibteda to hamare Baap Dada ne ham se pahle ki thi. Ham baad mein unki Nasl se paida hote to kya Aap hame is qusoor mein pakadte hain jo ghalatkaron ne kiya tha? Dekho! Is tarah Ham apni Nishaniyan wazeh taur par pesh karte hain taake ye log Haq ki jaanib palat aayen."_

(Surah A'raf: 173 - 174)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Aalam e Zarr aur Ghadeer ke talluq se bayan jaari hai.

🤝🏻

Imam Mohd Baqir (as):

_"Mujh se mere Walid e Majid ne baya kiya ke Allah Ta'ala ne wo Mitti uthayi jis se Adam (as) ki takhkeeq ki thi, us par thanda aur meetha Paani chhidka. Wo Khaak 40 Din tak padi rahi. Phir Allah ne us par kadwa aur khaara Paani chhidka, phir use 40 Din tak rahne diya yahan tak ke meetha aur kadwa Paani aapas mein mil gaya phir Allah ne us Khaak ko zor se dabaya to Chiutiyon ke hajam (volume) ke barabar dayen bayen iske qatre gire. Allah ne in sab se kaha ke tum Dozakh mein chale jao. Khuda ka ye Hukm sun kar dayen haath wale be khatar ho kar chale gaye jahan Aag unke liye thandak aur salamti ban gayi aur bayen haath walon ne Aag mein jaane se inkaar kar diya."_

_"Allah ne hamare Shiyon se *Aalam e Zarr mein hamari Wilayat ka Misaaq (Ahd - Covenant) liya tha,* aur ye Misaaq us waqt liya gaya tha jab un se Khuda ki Wahdaniyat aur Rasoole Akram (saww) ki Risalat ka iqraar liya gaya tha. Allah Ta'ala ne Muhammad Mustafa (saww) ke saamne unki Ummat ko pesh kiya tha jab woh Mitti ki surat mein maujood the aur Khuda ne unhe Teenat e Adam (as) se hi paida kiya. Allah Ta'ala ne hamare Shiyon ki Arwaah (Souls) ko unke ajsaam (bodies) ki takhleeq se 2000 Baras qabl paida kiya tha aur Khuda ne unhe Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke saamne pesh kiya aur unhe Rasoole Maqbool (saww) aur Ali Murtaza (as) ki Ma'arefat karayi thi. Ham bhi unke lahjon se unhe pahchan lete hain."_

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤝🏻

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Allah Ta'ala ne Ajsaam ki paidaish se pahle Bandon se Meesaq liya tha aur woh us waqt Saaya (Shadows) ki shakl mein the. Jin Roohon ka us waqt milap hua woh yahan bhi aa kar ek doosre se Muhabbat karti hain aur jo ek doosre ke liye ajnabi ban rahi thi woh yahan aa kar bhi ek doosre se ikhtelaaf karti hain."_

_"Arwaah lashkar hain jinhone Aalam e Arwaah mein ek doosre se Ta'aruf haasil kiya. Unke darmiyan yahan aa kar ulfat qayem hui aur jo Aalam e Arwah mein ek doosre se ajnabi rahin yahan aa kar un mein ikhtelaf paida hua. (7:172)"_

(Kitab Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 *"Juma - جمعہ ko Juma kyon kahte hain?*

Imam Mohd Baqir (as):

_"Is Din Allah Ta'ala ne *apni Makhlooq ko Muhammad (saww) aur uske Wasi ki Wilayat ke liye Jama kiya tha* isliye Ijtema ke Din ka Naam "Juma" rakha gaya."_

(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِيْ اَكْرَمَنَا بِهٰذَا الْيَوْمِ وَ جَعَلَنَا مِنَ الْمُوْفِيْنَ بِعَهْدِهِ اِلَيْنَا وَ مِيْثَاقِهِ الَّذِيْ وَاثَقَنَا بِهِ مِنْ وِلَايَةِ وُلَاةِ اَمْرِهِ وَ الْقُوَّامِ بِقِسْطِهِ وَ لَمْ يَجْعَلْنَا مِنَ الْجَاحِدِيْنَ وَ الْمُكَذِّبِيْنَ بِيَوْمِ الدِّيْنِ.*

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

 🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

             *16th Zilhajj 1440*

     *18th August 2019, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

         ♦ _*AALAM-E-ZAR*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1274)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذۡ أَخَذَ رَبُّكَ مِنۢ بَنِیۤ ءَادَمَ مِن ظُهُورِهِمۡ ذُرِّیَّتَهُمۡ وَأَشۡهَدَهُمۡ عَلَىٰۤ أَنفُسِهِمۡ أَلَسۡتُ بِرَبِّكُمۡۖ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ شَهِدۡنَاۤۚ أَن تَقُولُوا۟ یَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِیَـٰمَةِ إِنَّا كُنَّا عَنۡ هَـٰذَا غَـٰفِلِینَ*

_"Aur Aye Nabi! Logon ko wo waqt yaad dilao jab tumhare Rab ne Nabi Adam ki pushton se unki Nasl ko nikala tha aur unhe khud unke upar gawah banate hue poochha tha ke kya Mein tumhara Rab nahi hun? Unhone kaha: Zaroor Aap hi hamare Rab hain, ham is par gawahi dete hain. Ye Hamne isliye kiya ke kahin tum Qayamat ke Roz ye na kah do ke ham tum isse be khabar the."_

(Surah A'raf: 172)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadiq (as) se Raavi ne is Ayat ke bare mein poochha to farmaya:

_"Ji haan, isse Ma'arefat ka isbaat hua. Log Maqam e Misaaq (Covenant) ko bhool chuke hain aur unhe woh maqam bhi anqareeb yaad aa jayega. Agar aisa na hota to kisi ko apne Khaliq o Razzaq ki Ma'arefat haasil na hoti. Aalam-e-Zarr mein kuchh aise bhi the jinhone Zaban se iqrar kiya tha aur Dil se iqrar nahi kiya tha. Chunanche aise logon ke mutalliq Khuda ne farmaya: "Woh jise pahle jhutla chuke hain, ab woh us par Imaan nahi layenge." (7:101)"_

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

🕋 🤝🏻

'Alasto' ka Meesaq Wadi e Arafa mein liya gaya tha. Allah ne tamam Nasle Adam (as) ko Zarrat ki surat mein pushte Adam (as) se nikal kar un se Apni Ruboobiyat ka iqraar liya tha.

(Ghawaliyal La'ali, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Wilayat e Ali (as) ka itteba (follow / paalan) karna aur unki Wilayat ko tasleem karna tumhare umoor (affairs) ko pareshan na hone dega, Adl o Insaaf ko tumse qayem rakhega aur aakhir tumko Jannat mein pahu'ncha dega."_

(Irshadaat e Masumeen (as), p81)

🤲🏻

*اَشْهَدُ اَنَّكُمْ حُجَجُ اللّٰهِ اُكْتُبْ لِيْ عِنْدَكَ مِيْثَاقًا وَ عَهْدًا اِنِّيۤ اَتَيْتُكَ مُجَدِّدًا الْمِيْثَاقَ فَاشْهَدْ لِيْ عِنْدَ رَبِّكَ اِنَّكَ اَنْتَ الشَّاهِدُ۔*

(Ziyarat Imam Husain (as) - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

             *17th Zilhajj 1440*

     *19th August 2019, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

         ♦ _*AALAM-E-ZAR*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1275)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذۡ أَخَذَ رَبُّكَ مِنۢ بَنِیۤ ءَادَمَ مِن ظُهُورِهِمۡ ذُرِّیَّتَهُمۡ وَأَشۡهَدَهُمۡ عَلَىٰۤ أَنفُسِهِمۡ أَلَسۡتُ بِرَبِّكُمۡۖ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ شَهِدۡنَاۤۚ أَن تَقُولُوا۟ یَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِیَـٰمَةِ إِنَّا كُنَّا عَنۡ هَـٰذَا غَـٰفِلِینَ*

_"Aur Aye Nabi! Logon ko wo waqt yaad dilao jab tumhare Rab ne Nabi Adam ki pushton se unki Nasl ko nikala tha aur unhe khud unke upar gawah banate hue poochha tha ke kya Mein tumhara Rab nahi hun? Unhone kaha: Zaroor Aap hi hamare Rab hain, ham is par gawahi dete hain. Ye Hamne isliye kiya ke kahin tum Qayamat ke Roz ye na kah do ke ham tum isse be khabar the."_

(Surah A'raf: 172)

📚📖 🤝🏻

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Is Ayat ka Ghadeer se kya talluq hai, iska bayan jaari hai:

Ibne Al Kawwa ne Ali (as) se sawal kiya ke H. Musa (as) se pahle Allah ne kisi se direct guftugu ki?

Imam (as) ne farmaya:

_"Ji haan! Tamam Bani Adam se jus mein tamam Nek o bad shamil hain."_

Ye Ayat padhi (7:172) aur farmaya:

_"Us waqt sab ne Allah ki Awaaz suni thi aur sab ne haan mein jawab diya tha...."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🕋

Imam Mohd Baqir (as):

_"Jabir! Agar in Jahilon ko maloom ho jata ke Ali (as) ko kab se 'Ameerul Mo'meneen' ka Laqab mila hai to woh unke Haq ka inkar na karte."_

Aap (as) ne farmaya:

_"Unhe ye Laqab us Din mila tha jis Din Khuda ki Ruboobiyat aur Mohammad Mustafa (saww) ki Risalat ka Misaaq (Covenant) liya gaya tha. Iske saath Hazrat Ali (as) ke 'Ameerul Mo'meneen' hone ka bhi iqraar karaya gaya."_

_"Khuda ki Qasam Muhammad Mustafa (saww) ne aisa hi bayan kiya hai."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

🕋 🤝🏻

Imam Baqir (as): Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya:

_"Misaaq ke waqt meri Ummat ko mere saamne pesh kiya gaya. Sab se pahle Ali (as) mujh par Imaan laye the aur jab meine Duniya mein aa kar Nabuwwat ka Ailaan kiya to yahan bhi Ali (as) ne hi sab se pahle meri tasdeeq ki hai lehaza Ali (as) hi Siddiq e Akbar hain aur Ali (as) woh Farooq hain jo Haq o Baatil mein farq paida karte hain."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 🤲🏻

Imam Jafar Sadiq (as) se Eid-e-Ghadeer ke Din ek Mustahab Namaz manqool hai aur iske baad ek Dua padhna manqool hai. Is Dua mein ye Alfaaz hain:

*ومننت علينا بشهادة الاخلاص لك بموالاة أوليائك الهداة من بعد النذير المنذر والسراج المنير واكملت الدين بموالاتهم والبراء‌ة من عدوهم و أتممت علينا النعمة التي جددت لنا عهدك وذكرتنا ميثاقك المأخوذ منا في مبتدأ خلقك ايانا وجعلتنا من اهل الاجابة وذكرتنا العهد والميثاق ولم تنسنا ذكرك، فانك قلت واذ أخذ ربك من بنى آدم من ظهورهم ذريتهم واشهد هم على انفسهم الست بربكم قالوا بلى، اللهم بلى شهدنا بمنك ولطفك بانك انت الله لا اله إلا أنت ربنا ومحمد عبدك ورسولك نبينا وعلي امير المؤمنين والحجة العظمى وآيتك الكبرى والنبأ العظيم الذي هم فيه مختلفون*

_"Parwardigar Tu ne ham par Apne Auliya ki Mukhlesana Gawahi dene ka Ehsaan kiya hai aur Tu ne ham se ye Gawahi dilayi hai ke ye Hastiyan Siraj e Muneer aur Nazir o Munzir yani Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke baad unke Janashin hain aur Tu ne unki Wila aur unke Dushmanon se Bezaari ke zariye se Deen ki Takmeel ki hai aur Tu ne apne Tajdeed e Ahd ke saath ham par Apni Ne'mat tamam ki hai aur Tu ne ham se ibteda e takhleeq mein jo Misaaq (Covenant) liya tha uski hame yaad dahani karayi hai. Aur Tera Ehsaan hai ke Tu ne hame qubool karne walon mein se banaya hai aur Tu ne hame Ahd e Misaaq ki yaad dahani karayi hai aur Tu ne hame Apna Zikr faramosh karne se bachaya hai  Tu ne irshaad farmaya hai (7:172). Chunanche Tere hi Ehsaan o Karam ki wajah se hamne Gawahi di ke Tere alawa koi Ma'bood nahi hai aur Tu hi hamara Rab hai aur Muhammad Mustafa (saww) Tere Abd aur Rasool hain aur woh hamare Nabi hai aur Hazrat Ali (as) Mo'meneen ke Amir aur Hujjate Uzma aur Ayatul Kubra hain aur Ali (as) hi woh Azeem Khabar hain jinke mutalliq logon ka ikhtelaf hai."_

(Tehzeebul Ahkam, Noorus Saqlain)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

✨✨✨✨✨✨✨✨✨✨

     🍁 *AYYAM-E-WILAYAT* 🍁

**********************************

             *19th Zilhajj 1440*

  *21st August 2019, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

         ♦ _*HAJR-E-ASWAD*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1275)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذۡ أَخَذَ رَبُّكَ مِنۢ بَنِیۤ ءَادَمَ مِن ظُهُورِهِمۡ ذُرِّیَّتَهُمۡ وَأَشۡهَدَهُمۡ عَلَىٰۤ أَنفُسِهِمۡ أَلَسۡتُ بِرَبِّكُمۡۖ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ شَهِدۡنَاۤۚ أَن تَقُولُوا۟ یَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِیَـٰمَةِ إِنَّا كُنَّا عَنۡ هَـٰذَا غَـٰفِلِینَ*

_"Aur Aye Nabi! Logon ko wo waqt yaad dilao jab tumhare Rab ne Nabi Adam ki pushton se unki Nasl ko nikala tha aur unhe khud unke upar gawah banate hue poochha tha ke kya Mein tumhara Rab nahi hun? Unhone kaha: Zaroor Aap hi hamare Rab hain, ham is par gawahi dete hain. Ye Hamne isliye kiya ke kahin tum Qayamat ke Roz ye na kah do ke ham tum isse be khabar the."_

(Surah A'raf: 172)

📚📖 🕋

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

*Aalam-e-Zarr, Wilayat aur Hajr e Aswad*

Imam Sadiq (as) ne Hajre Aswad ke bare mein sawal ka Jawab diya:

_"Baat ye hai ke Hajr e Aswad ko chamakdar jauhar ki surat mein Jannat se Adam (as) ke paas Zameen par bheja gaya tha aur Misaaq ki wajah se ise Rukn mein nasb kiya gaya hai. Kyonki Allah Ta'ala ne Bani Adam se isi Rukn ke paas apni Ruboobiyat ka Misaaq liya tha aur isi maqam par Qayem e Ale Muhammad (atfs) par ek parinda nazil hoga aur wo parinda sab se pahle Aap (as) ki Bait karega. Woh parinda Jibrael (as) hoga. Qayem e Ale Muhammad (atfs) isi Rukn se pusht laga kar baithenge. Yehi Rukn Qayem e Ale Muhammad (atfs) ki Hujjat aur Daleel hoga aur jo apne Ahd ko poora karega. Uske Ahd ke poora karne ka ye Patthar gawah hoga. Aur jahan tak is Patthar ko bosa dene ka talluq hai to ye tajdeed e Ahd ke liye hai aur is Ahd ko yaad karne ke liye Baitullah ka Hajj farz kiya taake log har saal aayen aur apne Ahd o Misaaq ko yaad karen aur apni Amanat ada karen. Yehi wajah hai ke Hajr e Aswad ke saamne ye Dua padhte hain:_

*اماتنى اديتها و ميثاقى تعاهدته لتشهد لى بالموافاة*

 _("Mein ne Apni Amanat ko ada kiya hai aur meine jo iqrar kiya tha use meine poora kiya hai aur tum meri is Wada Wafayi ki Gawahi dena.")_

(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

(Riwayat To be Cont'd..)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Ali (as) se ek Yahudi ne puchha ke zameen ka pehla Patthar kaunsa hai? Imam (as) ne farmaya: _"Yahudi gumaan karte hain ke wo Baitul Muqaddas ki chattan hai, jabke wo jhoote hain. Pahla Patthar 'Hajr e Aswad' hai jise Adam (as) Jannat se apne saath le kar aaye the. Ru e zameen ke pehle darakht ke mutalliq Yahudiyo'n ka aqeeda hai ke wo Zaitoon ka darakht hai jabke ye jhoot hai. Pahla darakht Ajwa Khajoor ka wo darakht hai jiski Ghuthli Adam (as) Jannat se le kar aaye the."_

(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v1, p123)

🤲🏻

*اماتنى اديتها و ميثاقى تعاهدته لتشهد لى بالموافاة*

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

✨✨✨✨✨✨✨✨✨✨

     🍁 *AYYAM-E-WILAYAT* 🍁

**********************************

             *20th Zilhajj 1440*

    *22nd August 2019, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

         ♦ _*HAJR-E-ASWAD*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1276)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذۡ أَخَذَ رَبُّكَ مِنۢ بَنِیۤ ءَادَمَ مِن ظُهُورِهِمۡ ذُرِّیَّتَهُمۡ وَأَشۡهَدَهُمۡ عَلَىٰۤ أَنفُسِهِمۡ أَلَسۡتُ بِرَبِّكُمۡۖ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ شَهِدۡنَاۤۚ أَن تَقُولُوا۟ یَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِیَـٰمَةِ إِنَّا كُنَّا عَنۡ هَـٰذَا غَـٰفِلِینَ*

_"Aur Aye Nabi! Logon ko wo waqt yaad dilao jab tumhare Rab ne Nabi Adam ki pushton se unki Nasl ko nikala tha aur unhe khud unke upar gawah banate hue poochha tha ke kya Mein tumhara Rab nahi hun? Unhone kaha: Zaroor Aap hi hamare Rab hain, ham is par gawahi dete hain. Ye Hamne isliye kiya ke kahin tum Qayamat ke Roz ye na kah do ke ham tum isse be khabar the."_

(Surah A'raf: 172)

📚📖 🕋

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

*Aalam-e-Zarr, Wilayat aur Hajr e Aswad*

Imam Sadiq (as) ne Hajre Aswad ke bare mein kuchh sawalon ka Jawab diya:

(Riwayat Cont'd...)

_"Khuda ki Qasam! Hamare Shiyon ke alawa is Ahd ko kisi ne poora nahi kiya aur ye Ahd o Misaaq (Covenant) hamare Shiyon ke alawa kisi ko yaad nahi hai. Jab hamare Shia Hajar e Aswad ke paas jaate hain to woh unhe pahchan leta hai aur doosre wahan jate hain to woh unhe nahi pahchanta. Iski wajah ye hai ke Khudayi Misaaq ko tumhare alawa kisi ne yaad nahi rakha. Lehaza Hajr e Aswad sirf tumhare Haq mein Gawahi dega aur doosron ke khilaf gawahi dega aur kahega ke ghairon ne Misaaq ko bhula diya hai aur is Misaaq ki takzeeb ki hai. Ye Pathhar Qayamat ke Din Khuda ki taraf se bahut bada Gawah ban kar pesh hoga aur jab ye Pathhar Arsa e Mehshar mein pesh hoga to uske paas bolne wali zaban hogi aur uski do Aankhen hongi aur wo us waqt apni asli surat mein hoga jisne Wada Wafai ki hogi woh uske Haq mein Gawahi dega aur jisne Misaaq faramosh kiya hoga woh uske khilaf gawahi dega."_

(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

(Riwayat To be Cont'd..)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Aye Ali (as)! Roz e Qayamat main, tum aur Jibreel (as) Siraat par baithenge, magar koi uspar se nahi guzrega magar wo jiske paas tumhari Wilayat ke sabab se aatish e Dozakh se najaat ka parwana hoga."_

(Isbaat e Imamat - Allamah Majlisi, p75, Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v1, p52)

🤲🏻

*يَا رَبِّ بِحَجَرِكَ الدَّامِغِ،* (مفاتيح)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

✨✨✨✨✨✨✨✨✨✨

     🍁 *AYYAM-E-WILAYAT* 🍁

**********************************

             *21st Zilhajj 1440*

      *23rd August 2019, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

         ♦ _*HAJR-E-ASWAD*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1277)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذۡ أَخَذَ رَبُّكَ مِنۢ بَنِیۤ ءَادَمَ مِن ظُهُورِهِمۡ ذُرِّیَّتَهُمۡ وَأَشۡهَدَهُمۡ عَلَىٰۤ أَنفُسِهِمۡ أَلَسۡتُ بِرَبِّكُمۡۖ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ شَهِدۡنَاۤۚ أَن تَقُولُوا۟ یَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِیَـٰمَةِ إِنَّا كُنَّا عَنۡ هَـٰذَا غَـٰفِلِینَ*

_"Aur Aye Nabi! Logon ko wo waqt yaad dilao jab tumhare Rab ne Nabi Adam ki pushton se unki Nasl ko nikala tha aur unhe khud unke upar gawah banate hue poochha tha ke kya Mein tumhara Rab nahi hun? Unhone kaha: Zaroor Aap hi hamare Rab hain, ham is par gawahi dete hain. Ye Hamne isliye kiya ke kahin tum Qayamat ke Roz ye na kah do ke ham tum isse be khabar the."_

(Surah A'raf: 172)

📚📖 🕋

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

*Aalam-e-Zarr, Wilayat aur Hajr e Aswad*

Imam Sadiq (as) ne Hajre Aswad ke bare mein kuchh sawalon ka Jawab diya:

(Riwayat Cont'd...)

Phir Imam Sadiq (as) ne Farmaya:

_"Kya tum jaante ho ke is Patthar ko Jannat se Zameen par kyon utara gaya? Ye dar asl Khuda ka Azeem Farishta tha jab Allah ne Malaika se Misaaq liya to usne tamam Farishton se pahle iqraar kiya tha. Phir Allah Ta'ala ne use tamam Makhlooq par Ameen banaya aur us mein Misaaq ko rakh diya aur Makhlooq ko Hukm diya ke woh har Saal iske paas jaa kar apne Misaaq ka iqraar karen. Allah Ta'ala ne Jannat mein use Adam (as) ka Rafeeq banaya. Woh Adam (as) ko yaad dahani karata tha. Phir jab Adam (as) se khata sarzad hui aur unhe Jannat se nikala gaya to unhe wo Misaaq faramosh ho gaya jo unse Muhammad Mustafa (saww) aur unke Wasi ke liye gaya tha. Adam (as) hairan wa sargushta ho kar Zameen par phirte rahe. Phir jab Allah ne Adam (as) ki Tauba qubool ki to us Farishte ko safed Moti ki shakl mein tabdeel kar diya gaya aur use Jannat se sar Zameen 'Surandeep' par Adam (as) ke paas bheja gaya. Jab Adam (as) ne khoobsurat Patthar ko dekha to woh usse bade manoos hue. Unhe uski asliyyat ka koi Ilm nahi tha. Woh ise khoobsurat Patthar samajhte the. Allah Ta'ala ne is Patthar mein bolne ki quwwat ata farmayi. Usne Hazrat Adam (as) se kaha: 'Kya aap mujhe jaante hain? Hazrat Adam (as) kaha: 'Nahi.' Patthar ne kaha: 'Tum bhala mujhe kaise pahchanoge kyonki Iblees ne tum par ghalba paa liya tha aur tumhe Rab ka Zikr faramosh kara diya tha. Iske baad woh Patthar apni us haalat mein aaya jis haalat mein woh Jannat mein Adam (as) ke saath rahta tha aur usne Adam (as) se kaha: 'Woh Ahd o Misaaq kahan hai?....."_

(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

(Riwayat To be Cont'd..)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Jo shakhs mujh par Imaan rakhe aur Ali (as) se Mohabbat kare aur unki Wilayat ka bhi qaayil ho, uspar Jahannum Haraam hai. Khuda La'anat kare uspar jo Ali (as) ka munkir aur unka Dushman hai…"_

(Amaali - Shaikh Toosi, v2, p365)

🤲🏻

*يَا رَبِّ بِحَجَرِكَ الدَّامِغِ،* (مفاتيح)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

✨✨✨✨✨✨✨✨✨✨

     🍁 *AYYAM-E-WILAYAT* 🍁

**********************************

             *22nd Zilhajj 1440*

    *24th August 2019, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

         ♦ _*HAJR-E-ASWAD*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1278)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذۡ أَخَذَ رَبُّكَ مِنۢ بَنِیۤ ءَادَمَ مِن ظُهُورِهِمۡ ذُرِّیَّتَهُمۡ وَأَشۡهَدَهُمۡ عَلَىٰۤ أَنفُسِهِمۡ أَلَسۡتُ بِرَبِّكُمۡۖ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ شَهِدۡنَاۤۚ أَن تَقُولُوا۟ یَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِیَـٰمَةِ إِنَّا كُنَّا عَنۡ هَـٰذَا غَـٰفِلِینَ*

_"Aur Aye Nabi! Logon ko wo waqt yaad dilao jab tumhare Rab ne Nabi Adam ki pushton se unki Nasl ko nikala tha aur unhe khud unke upar gawah banate hue poochha tha ke kya Mein tumhara Rab nahi hun? Unhone kaha: Zaroor Aap hi hamare Rab hain, ham is par gawahi dete hain. Ye Hamne isliye kiya ke kahin tum Qayamat ke Roz ye na kah do ke ham tum isse be khabar the."_

(Surah A'raf: 172)

📚📖 🕋

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

*Aalam-e-Zarr, Wilayat aur Hajr e Aswad*

Imam Sadiq (as) ne Hajre Aswad ke bare mein kuchh sawalon ka Jawab diya:

(Riwayat Cont'd...)

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Adam (as) ye sun kar chaunk pade aur unhone ne Misaaq ko yaad kiya aur rone lage aur unhone iska bosa liya aur unhone apne Ahd o Misaaq ki tajdeed ki. Isje baad Allah ne usko dobara safed aur chamakdar Durr ki shakl mein tabdeel kar diya. Jiski roshni door door tak jaati thi. Adam (as) ne iski tazeem o takreem ke liye ise apne Kandhe par uthaya aur Makkah ki taraf chal pade. Jab kabhi Aap thak jate to Jibrael Amin (as) use uthate the. Akhirkar Aap Makkah pahunch gaye aur Makkah pahunch kar Adam (as) usse manoos rahe aur rozana Din Raat uske saamne Tajdeed e Ahd (Renewal of Covenant) karte the. Iske baad Allah ne Malaika ko Ka'aba banane ka Hukm diya to Hajr e Aswad ko usi Rukn mein rakhwaya jahan Khuda ne Roz e Alast logon se Misaaq liya tha aur usi jagah Allah ne is Misaaq ko Hajr e Aswad mein rakha. Adam (as) Baitullah se Safa par gaye aur Hazrat Hawwa Marwa par gayin. Adam (as) ki nazar padi to unhe wo Patthar Rukn mein nasb dikhayi diya to unhone Takbeer o Tahleel o Tamjeed ki. Isiliye ye Amal Sunnat ban gaya ke Safa par khade ho kar jab Hajr e Aswad ke saamne aaye to us waqt Takbeer kahni chahiye. Allah ne us Patthar mein Bani Adam ke alawa Malaika ke Misaaq ko bhi rakh diya."_

_"Wazeh rahe jab Allah ne Malaika se apni Ruboobiyat aur Muhammad Mustafa (saww) ki Risalat aur Ali (as) ki Wasiyyat ka iqraar liya to Malaika ke shaane kanpne lag gaye. Sab se pahle usi Farishte ne iqraar kiya aur tamam Malaika ki ba nisbat ise Muhammad o Aale Muhammad (as) se be tahasha Muhabbat thi. Isiliye Allah ne tamam Malaika mein se iske intekhab kiya aur use Misaaq ka Ameen banaya. Jab woh Qayamat ke Din aayega to uske paas bolne wali Zabaan aur dekhne wali Aankh hogi aur woh un logon ki Gawahi dega jinhone uske saamne apne Ahd ki tajdeed ki hogi aur apne Misaaq ko yaad rakha hoga."_

(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

(End of Riwayat)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Reza (as):

_"Agar koi shakhs aise shakhs se dosti ikhtiyar kare jo humse Qata-ta'lluq ho chuka hai, ya aise shakhs se Qata-ta'lluq ho jo hamari Mawaddat ke jaam e Wilayat peeta ho, ya koi aise shakhs ki madah-saraayi (taarif) kare jo hamare oyoob nikalta ho, ya aise shakhs ko izzat-daar samjhe jo hamara dushman ho…aisa shakhs hum mein se nahi hai ya hamara usse koi ta'lluk nahi hai."_

(Ausaaf ush Shia - Shaikh Sadooq, p32)

🤲🏻

Imam Ali Naqi (as) ne Ghadeer ki Roz ye Dua padhi:

*اَللّٰهُمَّ الْعَنْ قَتَلَةَ اَنْبِيَاۤئِكَ وَ اَوْصِيَاۤءِ اَنْبِيَاۤئِكَ بِجَمِيْعِ لَعَنَاتِكَ، وَ اَصْلِهِمْ حَرَّ نَارِكَ وَ الْعَنْ، مَنْ غَصَبَ وَلِيَّكَ حَقَّهُ وَ اَنْكَرَ عَهْدَهُ وَ جَحَدَهُ بَعْدَ الْيَقِيْنِ وَ الْاِقْرَارِ بِالْوِلَايَةِ لَهُ يَوْمَ اَكْمَلْتَ لَهُ الدِّيْنَ.*

(Mafateehul Jinaan)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

              *23rd Zilhajj 1440*

     *25th August 2019, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

      ♦ _*BAL'AM BIN BA'OOR*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1279)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَٱتۡلُ عَلَیۡهِمۡ نَبَأَ ٱلَّذِیۤ ءَاتَیۡنَـٰهُ ءَایَـٰتِنَا فَٱنسَلَخَ مِنۡهَا فَأَتۡبَعَهُ ٱلشَّیۡطَـٰنُ فَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡغَاوِینَ.*

_"Aye Nabi! Aap unke saamne us shakhs ka haal bayan karen jisko Hamne Apni Ayaat ka Ilm diya tha lekin woh unki pabandi se nikal bhaga. Akhirkar Shaitan uske peechhe lag gaya yahan tak ke woh gumrahon ki jamat mein shamil hi gaya."_

(Surah A'raf: 175)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Ye Ayat Bal'am bin Ba'oor ( *بلعم بن باعور*) ke mutalliq nazil hui lekin unka intebaq har us Ahle Qibla par hai jo Khuda ki Hidayat par apni khwahishat ko tarjeeh de."_

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

✨

Imam Reza (as):

_"Bal'am bin Ba'oor ko Ism e Aazam ka Ilm ata kiya gaya tha. Woh jab bhi Ism e Aazam ke saath Khuda ko pukar kar koi Dua maangta to uski Dua qubool hoti thi. Usne Firaun ki taraf mailan paida kiya. Jab Hazrat Musa (as) Bani Israel ko saath le kar Misr se rawana hue to Firaun ne Bal'am bin Ba'oor se kaha ke tum Musa (as) aur uske saathiyon ke khilaf Bad Dua karo taake yahan se bahar na nikal payen aur woh hamare haathon mein aa jayen."_

_"Bal'am bin Ba'oor Gadhi par sawar ho kar Musa (as) par Bad Dua ke liye jaane laga. Gadhi ne chalne se inkar kar diya. Usne Gadhi ko maara peeta to Khuda ne us Jaanwar ko quwwat e goyayi ata ki aur usne Bal'am se kaha: Tu mujhe kyon maar raha hai, kya tu ye chahta hai ke mein tujhe utha kar le jaon aur tu ja kar Musa (as) aur uske Ahle Imaan saathiyon ko Bad Dua de."_

_"Gadhi ki ye guftugu sun kar bhi woh mutassir na hua aur musalsal use maarta raha yahan tak ke wo mar gayi. Uski Zabaan se Ism e Azam salb ho gaya aur is Ayat (7:175) mein is waqae ki taraf ishara kiya hai aur use Kutte se tashbeeh di hai."_

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasoole Khuda (saww):

_"Jiske Ilm mein izaafa ho aur uski hidayat mein izaafa na ho to aise shakhs ki Khuda se doori mein izaafa ho jata hai."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا مَوْلَايَ سَلَامَ مُخْلِصٍ لَكَ فِيْ الْوِلَايَةِ.*

(Isteghasa Imam e Zaman (atfs) - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

              *25th Zilhajj 1440*

    *27th August 2019, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

      ♦ _*BAL'AM BIN BA'OOR*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1280)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَرَفَعۡنَـٰهُ بِهَا وَلَـٰكِنَّهُۥۤ أَخۡلَدَ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُۚ فَمَثَلُهُۥ كَمَثَلِ ٱلۡكَلۡبِ إِن تَحۡمِلۡ عَلَیۡهِ یَلۡهَثۡ أَوۡ تَتۡرُكۡهُ یَلۡهَثۚ ذَّ ٰ⁠لِكَ مَثَلُ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلَّذِینَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔایَـٰتِنَاۚ فَٱقۡصُصِ ٱلۡقَصَصَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ یَتَفَكَّرُونَ *  سَاۤءَ مَثَلًا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلَّذِینَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔایَـٰتِنَا وَأَنفُسَهُمۡ كَانُوا۟ یَظۡلِمُونَ *  مَن یَهۡدِ ٱللَّهُ فَهُوَ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدِیۖ وَمَن یُضۡلِلۡ فَأُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَـٰسِرُونَ*

_"Agar Ham chahte to use in Ayaat se bulandi ata kar sakte the magar woh to Zameen ki taraf jhuk gaya aur usne khwahishaat ki pairavi ikhtiyar kar li. Uski haalat us Kutte ki si ho gayi ke tum us par hamla karo tab bhi Zabaan nikale rahe aur agar chhod do to bhi Zabaan nikale rahe. Ye un logon ki misaal hai jinhone hamari Ayaat ko jhutlaya. Aap ye waqeat logon ko sunate rahen shayad ye ghaur o fikr karen. Hamari Ayat ko Jhutlane walon ki badi buri misaal hai. Woh apne aap par hi Zulm karte the. Jis ko Allah Hidayat ata kar de wohi Hidayat yafta hai aur jis ko Gumrahi mein chhod de wohi khasaara paane walon mein se hai."_

(Surah A'raf: 176 - 178)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Mohd Baqir (as) ne Sulaiman Laban se farmaya:

_"Jaante ho ke Mughaira bin Sho'ba ki misaal kiya hai?"_

Usne kaha nahi.

Aap (as) ne farmaya:

_"Uski misaal Bal'am bin Ba'oor ki si hai jise Khuda ne apni Ayaat ka Ilm diya tha lekin usne unki pabandi nahi ki thi aur Shaitan uske peechhe lag gaya aur woh gumrahon ki jamat mein shamil ho gaya."_

(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

🦄

Imam Sadiq (as):

_" Jaanwar Jannat mein daakhil na honge siwaye 3 ke: Balam e Ba'oor ka gadha, H. Yusuf (as) ka bhediya aur As'haab e Kahaf ka kutta."_

(Noorus Saqlain, Irshadaat e Masumeen (as), p94)

🤲🏻

*اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا مَوْلَايَ سَلَامَ مُخْلِصٍ لَكَ فِيْ الْوِلَايَةِ.*

(Isteghasa Imam e Zaman (atfs) - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

                *26th Zilhajj 1440*

 *28th August 2019, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

    ♦ _*INSAAN - ASHRAF E MAKHLOOQAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1281)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَقَدۡ ذَرَأۡنَا لِجَهَنَّمَ كَثِیرࣰا مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِۖ لَهُمۡ قُلُوبࣱ لَّا یَفۡقَهُونَ بِهَا وَلَهُمۡ أَعۡیُنࣱ لَّا یُبۡصِرُونَ بِهَا وَلَهُمۡ ءَاذَانࣱ لَّا یَسۡمَعُونَ بِهَاۤۚ أُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ كَٱلۡأَنۡعَـٰمِ بَلۡ هُمۡ أَضَلُّۚ أُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ هُمُ ٱلۡغَـٰفِلُونَ*

_"Aur Yaqeenan Hamne Insaano aur Jinnat ki ek kaseer tadaad ko Dozakh ke liye paida kiya hai. Unke paas Dil hain magar woh unse sochte nahi. Unke paas Aankhen hain magar woh unse dekhte nahi. Unke paas Kaan hain magar woh unse sunte nahi. Woh Janwaron ki tarah hain balke woh unse bhi zyada gumrah hain. Ye woh log hain jo ghaflat mein pade hue hain."_

(Surah A'raf: 179)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚📖 👥🐂

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Dozakh ke mustaheq afraad ke paas Dil to hain lekin un par Mohr lag chuki hai lehaza ghaur o fikr par amada nahi hote aur unke paas Aankhen hain lekin un par gumrahi ke parde pad chuke hain lehaza woh Haq dekhne se qasir hain aur unke paas Kaan hain lekin musalsal gumrahi ki wajah se woh Haq sunne bahre ho chuke hain aur woh Kalam e Hidayat ko sunne par amada nahi hain. Ye log Chaupayon (Cattles) jaise hain balke ye unse bhi zyada gumrah hain."_

(Tafseer e Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

👥

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Ameerul Mo'menin (as) ka farman hai ke Allah Ta'ala ne Farishton mein Aql rakhi hai aur un mein Shehwat nahi rakhi. Aur Haiwanat mein sirf Khwahish rakhi hai, Aql nahi rakhi aur Bani Adam ko dono cheezen yani Khwahish aur Aql dono ata ki hain. Lehaza jiski Aql khwahishat par ghalib aa jaye to woh Farishton se behtar hai aur jiski Khwahishat uski Aql par ghalib aa jayen to woh Janwaron se badtar hai."_

(KItab Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*وَ تَفَضَّلْ عَلَيَّ بِشَهْوَتِيْ [بِسُؤْلِيْ‏] وَ رَغْبَتِيْ وَ اقْضِ لِيْ حَوَاۤئِجِيْ وَ لَا تَرُدَّنِيْ خَاۤئِبًا، وَ لَا تَقْطَعْ رَجَاۤئِيْ وَ لَا تُخَيِّبْ دُعَاۤئِيْ وَ عَرِّفْنِي الْاِجَابَةَ فِيْ جَمِيْعِ مَا دَعَوْتُكَ*

(Ziyarat Haram e Imam Husain (as) - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

              *27th Zilhajj 1440*

   *29th August 2019, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

      ♦ _*ASMAA'UL HUSNA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1282)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡأَسۡمَاۤءُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ فَٱدۡعُوهُ بِهَاۖ وَذَرُوا۟ ٱلَّذِینَ یُلۡحِدُونَ فِیۤ أَسۡمَـٰۤىِٕهِۦۚ سَیُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كَانُوا۟ یَعۡمَلُونَ.*

_"Aur Allah hi ke liye Behtareen Naam hain. Usko unhi Naamo se pukaro aur un logon ko chhod do jo Uske Naamo mein kaj ravi karte hain. Jo kuchh woh kar rahe hain woh iska badla pa kar rahenge."_

(Surah A'raf: 180)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Jafar Sadiq (as):

_*"Khuda ki Qasam! Ham hi Khuda ke 'Asma e Husna' hain, Allah hamari Ma'arefat ke baghair Bando ke kisi Amal ko qubool nahi karta."*_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

Iski Tauzeeh mein bayan kiya gaya hai ke 'Ism' ka itlaaq har us cheez par kiya gaya hai jo kisi cheez par dalalat kare khwa wo Lafz ho ya Lafz ke alawa ho. Anbiya Karam aur Ausiya Karam (as) bhi Asma-e-Ilahi hain kyonki woh Khuda ki pahchan ka zariya hain aur woh Fuyooz e Ilahi ke liye Khaliq o Makhlooq ke darmiyan wasta hain aur woh Khuda ke Asma o Sifaat je Mazhar hain.

(Tafseer Ayyashi)

🕌

Imam Musa Kazim (as):

_"Khuda ki Wasf (Attributes) un Alfaaz se bayan karni chahiye jin se Usne apni Sifat bayan ki hai warna Us Zaat ki Tauseef Insaan kare to kaise kare kyonki Hawaas (Senses) Uske Idraak se qasir hain aur Auhaam (Imaginations) Uske Ahaate se aajiz hain aur Khayalaat Usko Mehdood karne ki salahiyyat se khali hain aur Aankhen Uske Ahaate se aajiz hain. Woh Sifat bayan karne walon ki Tauseef se kahi Buland o Bala hai."_

(Tafseer Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّي اَسْاَلُكَ بِكِتَابِكَ الْمُنْزَلِ وَمَا فِيْهِ وَفِيْهِ اسْمُكَ الْاَكْبَرُ وَاَسْمَآؤُكَ الْحُسْنٰى، وَمَا يُخَافُ وَيُرْجٰى اَنْ تَجْعَلَنِيْ مِنْ عُتَقَآئِكَ مِنَ النَّارِ.*

(Aamaal e Shabe Qadr - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

              *28th Zilhajj 1440*

      *30th August 2019, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

      ♦ _*ASMAA'UL HUSNA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1283)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡأَسۡمَاۤءُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ فَٱدۡعُوهُ بِهَاۖ وَذَرُوا۟ ٱلَّذِینَ یُلۡحِدُونَ فِیۤ أَسۡمَـٰۤىِٕهِۦۚ سَیُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كَانُوا۟ یَعۡمَلُونَ.*

_"Aur Allah hi ke liye Behtareen Naam hain. Usko unhi Naamo se pukaro aur un logon ko chhod do jo Uske Naamo mein kaj ravi karte hain. Jo kuchh woh kar rahe hain woh iska badla pa kar rahenge."_

(Surah A'raf: 180)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Jafar Sadiq (as):

_"Asma e Husna se wo Naam murad hain jo sirf Usi ke liye makhsoos hain Uske alawa kisi par unka itlaaq nahi hota aur inhi Asma ke mutalliq Khuda ne farmaya ke in Naamo ke saath Use pukaro aur ye bhi farmaya "Aur un logon ko chhod do jo Uske Naamo mein Haq se munharif ho jate hain." Aur woh apni Ilmi ki wajah se Shirk o Kufr mein mubtila ho jate hain aur woh ye samajhte hain ke woh achha kaam anjam de rahe hain. Chunanche is tarah ke logon ke mutalliq Khuda ne farmaya:_

_"Unki aksariyat Khuda par Imaan laati bhi hai to bhi woh Mushrik hi hote hain" (Yusuf:106) aur ye woh log hain jo Ilm ke baghair Asma e Khuda wandi mein inhiraaf karte hain aur woh ghalti karte hain."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Jafar Sadiq (as):

_"Allah Ghayatul Ghayaat hai sur Ghayat ka maqsood Ghayat se juda hai. Woh Ruboobiyat mein Yakta hai aur Usne Apni Tauseef Mehdoodiyyat ke baghair ki hai aur jo Allah Allah kar raha hai woh bhi Uske Ism ko pukar raha hao jabke Ism aur hai aur Musamma aur hai aur jis cheez par bhi koi Naam mukammal tarah se muntabiq ho to wo Makhlooq hai. Kya tum nahi dekhte ke Allah ne farmaya hai: *العزة لله، العظمة لله* aur ye bhi farmaya hai:_

*و لله الأسماء الحسنى فادعوه بها.*

_("Allah ke achhe Naam hain, Use in Naamo ke saath pukaro.")_

_Allah ne ye bhi farmaya:_

*قُلِ ٱدۡعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ أَوِ ٱدۡعُوا۟ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنَۖ أَیࣰّا مَّا تَدۡعُوا۟ فَلَهُ ٱلۡأَسۡمَاۤءُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۚ*

(Bani Israel:110)

 _"Asma Uski taraf izafat rakhte hain aur yehi khalis Tauheed hai."_

(Kitabut Tauheed, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Jafar Sadiq (as):

Hazrat Ali (as), Rasoole Khuda (saww):

_"Allah Ta'ala ke 99 Naam hain, jo inhe yaad karega woh Jannat mein jayega."_

Total Asma: Surah Fateh (5), Baqarah (33), Ale Imran (5), Nisa (7), An'aam (4), A'raf (2), Anfaal (2), Hud (4), Ra'ad (2), Ibrahim (2), Hijr (1), Maryam (1), Taha (1), Noor (2), Furqan (1), Saba (1), Zumar (1), Ghafir (4), Zariyat (3), Tur (1), Qamar (2), Rehman (5), Hadeed (4), Hashr (11), Burooj (2), Fajr (1), Ikhlaas (2)."

(Kitabut Tauheed, Noorus Saqlain)

(Tafseel ki gunjaish nahi hai)

Asma e Husna ko sirf 99 mein mehsoor nahi kiya ja sakta kyonki Ahle Bait Taherin (as) ki Duaon mein isse kahin zyada Asma mazkoor hain aur jise Asma e Ilahi ki khwahish ho use Dua e Joshan e Kabeer ka mutale'a karna chahiye.

(Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Jafar Sadiq (as):

_*"Khuda ki Qasam! Ham hi Khuda ke 'Asma e Husna' hain, Allah hamari Ma'arefat ke baghair Bando ke kisi Amal ko qubool nahi karta."*_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*يَااَللهُ يَااَللهُ يَااَللهُ لَكَ الْاَسَّمَاۤءُ الْحُسْنٰى، وَالْاَمْثَالُ الْعُلْيَا، وَالْكِبْرِيَاۤءُ وَالْاٰلَاۤءُ اَسْاَلُكَ اَنْ تُصَلِّيَ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَاٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَاَنْ تَجْعَلَ اسْمِيْ فِي هٰذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ فِي السُّعَدَاۤءِ،*

(Dua e Shabe Qadr - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

              *29th Zilhajj 1440*

     *31st August 2019, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

       ♦ _*GIROH-E-HIDAYAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1284)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَمِمَّنۡ خَلَقۡنَاۤ أُمَّةࣱ یَهۡدُونَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ یَعۡدِلُونَ*

_"Hamari Makhlooq mein ek Giroh aisa bhi hai jo thik thik Haq ke mutabiq Hidayat karta hai aur Haq ke mutabiq Insaaf karta hai."_

(Surah A'raf: 181)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Jafar Sadiq (as) se is Ayat ke mutalliq poochha ke woh Giroh kaunsa hai?

Aap (as) ne farmaya:

_*"Woh Aimma (as) ka Giroh hai."*_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Doosri riwayat ye bhi hai:

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):

_"Us Zaat ki Qasam jiske Qabza e Ikhtiyar mein meri Jaan hai. Is Ummat ke 73 Giroh honge. Ek Firqe ke alawa baqi sab Dozakh mein jayenge. (7:181)"_

_"Is Ayat se murad Ummat e Muhammadi hai."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Rasoole Khuda (saww):

_"Musa (as) ki Ummat ke 71 Firqe bane the jin mein 70 Dozakhi aur ek Jannati tha aur Ummat e Esa (as) ke 72 Firqe bane jin mein se 71 Dozakhi aur ek Jannati tha. Meri Ummat ka isse ek Firqa zyada hoga un mein 72 Dozakhi aur ek Jannati hoga."_

Hazrat Ali (as) jab ye Hadis bayan karte the to in Ayaat ki tilawat karte (Maeda:65-66), (7:181) to farmaye the _"Haq ki Hidayat aur Haq ke saath Insaaf karne wali Ummat, Muhammad Mustafa (saww) ki Ummat hai."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🚩

Rasoole Khuda (saww):

_"Meri Ummat ka ek Giroh hamesha Haq par Qaem rahega yahan tak ke Esa bin Maryam (as) nazil honge."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Imam Ali (as):

_"Momin ka chiraag hamare Haq ki maarefat hai aur badtareen andhaapan hamare fazl se aa'nkhein band kar lena hai."_

(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p167)

🤲🏻

Imam Ali (as):

_"Pus, Aye Parwardigaar! Is subah ko mere liye Noor e Hidayat aur Deen o Duniya ki salaamati ki haamil bana kar naazil farma. Aur is raat ko dushmano'n ki makkaari se meri dhhaal aur halaak kar dene waali hawas ki sipar bana de."_

(Dua e Sabaah)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *12th Muharram 1441*

     *12th September 2019, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

         ♦ _*ETAAB-E-ILAHI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1285)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَٱلَّذِینَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔایَـٰتِنَا سَنَسۡتَدۡرِجُهُم مِّنۡ حَیۡثُ لَا یَعۡلَمُونَ *  وَأُمۡلِی لَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ كَیۡدِی مَتِینٌ*

_"Woh log jinhone Hamari Ayaat ki takzeeb ki hai, Ham inhe ba-tadreej (gradually) aise tareeqe se tabahi ki taraf le jayenge ke unhe khabar tak na hogi. Aur Mein unhe dheel de raha hun. Meri Tadbeer badi Mazboot hoti hai."_

(Surah A'raf: 182 - 183)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Allah ko jab kisi Bande ki bhalai matloob hoti hai to jab woh Gunah karta hai to uske fauran baad Khuda use kisi na kisi takleef mein mubtila kar deta hai aur use Isteghfar ki yaad dahani karata hai aur jab Khuda kisi ki tabahi ka iraada karta hai to jab woh shakhs Gunah karta hai to Khuda uski Ne'maat mein izaafa kar deta hai taake woh Isteghfar se ghafil rahe aur Gunah mein masroof rahe jaisa ke Khuda ne is Ayat mein farmaya (7:182) Maqsad ye hai ke jitna Gunah karte jayenge Ham un par Ne'maat ka izaafa karte jayege. Akhirkar unhe Ghaflaten ke Aalam mein tabah o barbad kar denge."_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

Jaisa ke pahle Riwayat pesh kar chuke hain Hadiyaane Bar Haq, Anbiya wa Aimma (as) Ayaat e Ilahi hain. Ayaat e Ilahi jhutlane walo ko Allah is tarah ka etaab deta hai.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Riwayat

Janabe Jaabir ibne Abullah Ansari Madine ki galiyo’n mein gasht lagaate aur kaha karte ke Ali (as) behtareen bashar hain. Jo unse inkaar kare wo Kafir hai. Aye giroh e Ansaar! Tum apni Aulaad ko Ali (as) ki Mohabbat sikhao, jo unse inkaar kare to to uski Maa ke haal par nazar daalo.

(Man La Yahzarahul Faqih, v3, p307)

🤲🏻

_"(Bare Ilaha) ....Aur mujhe door daraz Ummeedon ne fawaid se rok diya hai. Duniya ne dhoke mein mubtila rakha hai aur Nafs ne khayanat aur taal matol mein mubtila rakha hai..."_

(Dua-e-Kumail)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

             *13th Muharram 1441*

     *13th September 2019, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

         ♦ _*ETAAB-E-ILAHI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1286)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَٱلَّذِینَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔایَـٰتِنَا سَنَسۡتَدۡرِجُهُم مِّنۡ حَیۡثُ لَا یَعۡلَمُونَ *  وَأُمۡلِی لَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ كَیۡدِی مَتِینٌ*

_"Woh log jinhone Hamari Ayaat ki takzeeb ki hai, Ham inhe ba-tadreej (gradually) aise tareeqe se tabahi ki taraf le jayenge ke unhe khabar tak na hogi. Aur Mein unhe dheel de raha hun. Meri Tadbeer badi Mazboot hoti hai."_

(Surah A'raf: 182 - 183)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Zyadatar log sawal karte hain ke Momin, Muttaqi log zyada pareshan, muflisi ki zindagi guzarte hain jabke Kuffar aur be Deen log Aish ki Zindagi jeete hain. Aisa kyun? Iska jawab is Ayat mein hai.

👥

Imam Sadiq (as) ne *'استدراج'* (Gradually) ke maani ki is tarah wazahat ki:

_"Bahut se log Khuda ki Ne'maat pa kar dhoka kha gaye hain. Bahut se logon ko Khuda ki taraf se parda poshi ki wajah se dhoka hua hai aur bahut se afraad ko logon ki zabani tareef sun kar dhoka hua hai."_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

👥

Hazrat Ali (as):

_"Mere Jaane ke baad tum par aisa zamana aayega ke us zamane mein Haq se zyada aur koi cheez poshida na hogi aur Baatil se badh kar aur koi cheez zahir na hogi aur us zamane mein Khuda o Rasool par be tahasha jhoot bola jayega. Us zamane mein haalat ye hogi ke ek dakhil hone wala dakhil hoga aur jaise hi Qur'an ka Hukm sunega to woh itminan se nahi baithega yahan tak ke woh Deen se nikal jayega aur ek Badshah ke Deen ko chhod kar doosre Badshah ka Deen ikhtiyar karega aur ek Badshah ki hudoode mamlakat se nikal kar doosre Badshah ki hudood e mamlakat mein dakhil hoga aur ek Badshah ki ita'at chhod kar doosre Badshah ki ita'at karega aur ek Badshah ke Ahd o Paiman se nikal kar doosre ke Ahd o Paiman ko qubool karega. Allah Ta'ala unki La Ilmi mein unhe chhoot deta rahega aur woh Ummeed o Raja' mein zindagi basar karenge jabke ye sab kuchh unke liye Azaab ki Tamheed hoga."_

_"Beshak jise Farakh Dasti hasil ho aur woh use kam kam Azaab ki taraf badhne ka sabab na samjhe to Usne khaufnak cheez se apne aap ko mutma'in samajh liya."_

(Roza e Kaafi, Nahjul Balagha, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Sadiq (as)

se Abu Baseer ne puchha ke jab Ameerul Mo'meneen (as) Khalifa hue to unhone Fadak kyun nahi liya, use kyun chhod diya?

Aap ne farmaya:

_"Is liye ke zaalim aur mazloom dono jab Allah ki bargaah mein pahunchenge to Allah Ta'ala mazloom ko Sawaab dega aur zaalim par Etaab (azaab) karega to aap ne isko pasand Na kiya ke jis par mazloom ko Sawab hai aur zaalim ko Etaab, usko waapas le lein."_

(Ilalush Sharaye, p116)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ الْعَنْ قَتَلَةَ اَمِيْرِ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ اَللّٰهُمَّ الْعَنْ قَتَلَةَ الْحَسَنِ وَ الْحُسَيْنِ اَللّٰهُمَّ الْعَنْ قَتَلَةَ الْاَئِمَّةِ وَ عَذِّبْهُمْ عَذَابًا اَلِيْمًا لَا تُعَذِّبُهُ اَحَدًا مِنَ الْعَالَمِيْنَ عَذَابًا كَثِيْرًا لَا انْقِطَاعَ لَهُ وَ لَا اَجَلَ وَ لَا اَمَدَ بِمَا شَآقُّوْا وُلَاةَ اَمْرِكَ وَ اَعِدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا لَمْ تُحِلَّهُ بِاَحَدٍ مِنْ خَلْقِكَ۔*

(A part of Ziyarat e Amirul Mo'meneen - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *14th Muharram 1441*

*14th September 2019, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*RASOOL-E-AKRAM (saww) PAR TOHMAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1287)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*أَوَلَمۡ یَتَفَكَّرُوا۟ۗ مَا بِصَاحِبِهِم مِّن جِنَّةٍۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا نَذِیرࣱ مُّبِینٌ *  أَوَلَمۡ یَنظُرُوا۟ فِی مَلَكُوتِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَیۡءࣲ وَأَنۡ عَسَىٰۤ أَن یَكُونَ قَدِ ٱقۡتَرَبَ أَجَلُهُمۡۖ فَبِأَیِّ حَدِیثِۭ بَعۡدَهُۥ یُؤۡمِنُونَ *  مَن یُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَا هَادِیَ لَهُۥۚ وَیَذَرُهُمۡ فِی طُغۡیَـٰنِهِمۡ یَعۡمَهُونَ*

_"Aur kya un logon ne kabhi is baat par ghaur nahi kiya ke unke Paighambar par Junoon ka koi asar nahi? Woh to wazeh taur par Azaab e Ilahi se Daranewala hai."_

_"Aur kiya un logon ne Zameen o Aasmaan ke intezam par kabhi ghaur nahi kiya aur Khuda ki Paida kardah kisi cheez par ghaur o fikr nahi kiya?"_

_"Aur kya unhone ye bhi nahi socha ke shayad unki Mohlat e Zindagi poori hone ka waqt qareeb aa laga ho? Phir us tanbih ke baad bhala ye kis baat par Imaan layenge."_

_"Jise Khuda gumrahi mein chhod de uske liye koi Rehnuma nahi hota. Allah inhe inki sarkashi mein chhod deta hai ke bhatakte aur thokren khaate phiren."_

(Surah A'raf: 184 - 186)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Allah Kuffar o Mushrekin ko jhanjhodkar sawal kar raha hai ke kab unhone Paighambar e Islam ko Majnoon paya jabke woh to unhi ke darmiyan rahte the. Kuffar e Quraish ne is tarah ki Rasool (saww) par Tohmaten lagayin, jabke Hamare Rasool Nazeer e Mubeen the. Yehi nahi khud Musalmanon ke khud sakhta Khalifa ne bhi Rasool (saww) ke Akheri waqt mein unko Hizyaan ki Tohmat lagayi. In logon ko Allah bhatakne aur thokre khaane ke liye chhod diya hai. Lekin Allah ki ye dheel wa mohlat kabhi to khatm hogi aur unhe Etaab e Ilahi ka saamna karna hoga.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Paigambar e Islam (saww) ke saamne aap ke kuchh as'haab kisi shakhs ke baare mein guftagu kar rahe the. Unhone kaha, _"Fulaa'n shakhs kitna aajiz aur majboor hai."_ Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya, _"Tum ne uski geebat ki hai."_ Unhone arz ki, _"Jo uske andar hai, hum ne wohi bayaan kiya hai."_ Aap (saww) ne farmaya, _"Jo kuchh uske andar nahi hai agar tum wo bayaan karte to ye uspar Tohmat hoti."_

(Adaab e Islami, v1, p267)

🗣

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jo shakhs apne biradar e Momin par koi Tohmat lagaye to uske Dil se Imaan is tarah pighal jata hai jis tarah Paani mein Namak."_

(Tehzeeb ul Islam, p303)

😢

Abu Huraira Raawi hai ke Aal e Muhammad mein kisi shakhs ka inteqal ho gaya to Aurato'n ne Rona shuru kiya. Umar ne badh kar unhe jhidak diya to Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya, "Aye Umar! Unhe chhor do. Aankhen Ashk-baar rahengi is liye ke Dil Gham-zada hai aur musibat bhi taaza hai".

(Hamari Azadari, p32)

🤲🏻

Bare Ilaha! Hame Taufeeq ata farma ke ham Tohmat o Chugal khori se door rahe.

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

          *15th Muharram 1441*

*15th September 2019, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

   ♦ _*QAYAMAT KAB AYEGI?*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1288)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*یَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِ أَیَّانَ مُرۡسَىٰهَاۖ قُلۡ إِنَّمَا عِلۡمُهَا عِندَ رَبِّیۖ لَا یُجَلِّیهَا لِوَقۡتِهَاۤ إِلَّا هُوَۚ ثَقُلَتۡ فِی ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ لَا تَأۡتِیكُمۡ إِلَّا بَغۡتَةࣰۗ یَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ كَأَنَّكَ حَفِیٌّ عَنۡهَاۖ قُلۡ إِنَّمَا عِلۡمُهَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا یَعۡلَمُونَ*

_"Ye log Aapse Qayamat ki ghadi ke mutalliq sawal karte hain. Aap kah den ke iska Ilm mere Rab ke hi paas hai. Woh Khud ise uske waqt par zahir karega. Aasmano aur Zameen mein wo bada sakht Waqt hoga. Wo tum par achanak aa jayega aur ye log Aapse is tarah sawal karte hain ke goya tum iski khoj mein lage hue ho. Aap kah den iska Ilm bas Khuda ke paas hai lekin aksar logon ko iska Ilm nahi hai."_

(Surah A'raf: 187)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Quraish ne Aasim bin Wail Sahmi, Nazar Bin Haris aur Aqba bin Abi Mo'eet ko Ulama e Yahood ke paas Najran rawana kiya aur unse kaha ke tum Yahoodi Ulama se aise Masael maloom kar ke aao jin se Muhammad (saww) ko shikast (defeat) di ja sake. Yahoodi Ulama ne Mushrekin e Makkah ke un afraad se kaha tum Muhammad (saww) se sawal karo ke Qayamat kab qayem hogi. Agar Muhammad (saww) iska waqt muqarrar karen to samajh lena ke woh jhoote hain kyonki Qayamat ka Ilm sirf Khuda ke paas hai. Khuda ne kisi Nabi o Rasool ko iska waqt nahi bataya aur na hi kisi Malak e Muqarrab (Angel) ko iska koi Ilm hai. Chunanche woh Ulama e Yahood se ye sawal seekh kar aaye aur unhone Aap (saww) se yehi sawal kiya ke Qayamat kab qayem hogi?

Iske jawab mein Allah Ta'ala ne ye Ayat nazil farmayi (7:187)

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

🚩

Imam Ali Reza (as):

_"Rasoole Khuda (saww) se poochha gaya ke Aapke farzand Qaem (atfs) ka Zahoor kab hoga?"_

"Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya:

_"Iski misal Qayamat ki si hai jis tarah se Qayamat ki ghadi ka Ilm Khuda ke paas hai usi tarah se Qayem (atfs) ke Zahoor ka Ilm bhi Khuda ke paas hai."_

(Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Rasule Khuda (saww):

_"Aye Fatima (sa), roz e Qayamat har aa'nkh royegi siwa uske jo Husain (as) ke gham mein royi ho. Yaqeenan, wo aa'nkh muskurayegi aur usay Jannat ki ne'mato'n ki basharat di jayegi."_

(Azadari 40-Hadith)

🤲🏻

*وَ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَّاجْعَلْ تَوَسُّلِىْ بِهٖ شَافِعًا يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ نَافِعًا اِنَّكَ اَنْتَ اَرْحَمُ الرَّاحِمِيْنَ۔*

(Thursday Dua - Mafateeh)

-------------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *16th Muharram 1441*

     *16th September 2019, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

           ♦ _*ILM-E-GHAIB*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1289)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قُل لَّاۤ أَمۡلِكُ لِنَفۡسِی نَفۡعࣰا وَلَا ضَرًّا إِلَّا مَا شَاۤءَ ٱللَّهُۚ وَلَوۡ كُنتُ أَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡغَیۡبَ لَٱسۡتَكۡثَرۡتُ مِنَ ٱلۡخَیۡرِ وَمَا مَسَّنِیَ ٱلسُّوۤءُۚ إِنۡ أَنَا۠ إِلَّا نَذِیرࣱ وَبَشِیرࣱ لِّقَوۡمࣲ یُؤۡمِنُونَ*

_"Aap kah dijiye ke mein khud apne liye nafa nuqsan ka ikhtiyar nahi rakhta magar jo Khuda chahe. Agar mein Ghaib se ba-khabar hota to mein bahut se fayde apne liye hasil kar leta aur mujhe kabhi koi nuqsan na pahunchata. Mein to mehez ek Khabardar karne wala aur Ahle Imaan ko Basharat denewala hun."_

(Surah A'raf: 188)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Ayat *وَمَا مَسَّنِیَ ٱلسُّوۤءُۚ* ka mafhoom ye hai ke agar mere paas Ilm e Ghaib hota to mein kabhi muflis na hota."_

(Kitab Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)

Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim mein hai ke agar mere paas Ilm e Ghaib hota to mein apne liye hamesha Sehet o Salamti ka intekhab karta.

*Tauzeeh:*

Is Ayat se baaz afraad ne istidlal karte hue kaha hai ke Rasool (saww) bilkul be bas aur ek aam bashar jaisa hota hai ke use na to Ghaib ka Ilm hota hai na hi nafa o nuqsan ka ikhtiyar hota hai???

Ji haan ye durust hai ke Nabi o Rasool bhi ek Insaan hota hai aur woh tamam Fuyuzaat (Bounties) ke liye Khuda ka mohtaj hota hai aur jo Khuda use Nabuwwat o Risalat ka Mansab ata karta hai Woh usko Ilm o Ikhtiyar bhi enayat karta hai aur use poori Duniya se Mumtaz bana deta hai. Nabi Zaati taur par Aalimul Ghaib nahi hota, Khuda ki ata se woh muttela alal Ghaib (Knowing Unseen) hota hai aur Khuda ke karam se tamam Kamalat ka Malik hota hai.

Anbiya wa Aimma (as) har tarah se Khuda ka ata kardah Ilm e Ghaib rakhte hain. Jaise ke is Ayat se sabit hai.

*تِلۡكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَاۤءِ ٱلۡغَیۡبِ نُوحِیهَاۤ إِلَیۡكَۖ مَا كُنتَ تَعۡلَمُهَاۤ أَنتَ وَلَا قَوۡمُكَ مِن قَبۡلِ هَـٰذَاۖ فَٱصۡبِرۡۖ إِنَّ ٱلۡعَـٰقِبَةَ لِلۡمُتَّقِینَ*

_"Ay Muhammad! Ye Ghaib ki khabren hain jo ham tumhari taraf Wahy kar rahe hain, isse pahle na tum inko jante the aur na tumhari Qaum..."_

(Surat Hud 49)

Isse is sawal ka jawab mil jata hai ke jab Imam Husain (as) ko ilm tha to kyon itni Musibaten uthayin? Nabi ya Imam marziye Parwardigar ka hamil hota hai, wo wohi karta hai jo unse Allah chahta hai.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Imam Baqir (as):

_"Allah Ta'ala ka Ism e Aazam 73 harfo'n mein hai. Hamare Ahlebait (as) ke paas uske 72 huroof hain aur ek harf Allah Ta'ala ke paas hai jiski bina par Ilm e Gaib ko Usne Apni zaat ke liye pasand farmaya aur Apne hi paas rakha hai. Pus, har qism ki quwwat o taaqat bus Usi ke paas hai."_

(Meezan ul Hikmah, v4, p916)

🤲🏻

*اَسْئَلُكَ بِكُلِّ اسْمٍ سَمَّیْتَ بِهٖ نَفْسَكَ اَوْ اَنْزَلْتَهٗ فِیْ شَیْئٍ مِنْ كُتُبِكَ اَوِاسْتَاْثَرْتَ بِهٖ فِیْ عِلْمِ الْغَیْبِ عِنْدَكَ وَ بِمَعَاقَدِ الْعِزِّ مِنْ عَرْشِكَ وَ بِمُنْتَهَی الرَّحْمَۃِ مِنْ كِتَابِكَ..*

(Dua e Mashlool - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *17th Muharram 1441*

 *17th September 2019, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

 ♦ _*CHILD BIRTH - PAIDAYESH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1290)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*
