*هُوَ ٱلَّذِی خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفۡسࣲ وَ ٰ⁠حِدَةࣲ وَجَعَلَ مِنۡهَا زَوۡجَهَا لِیَسۡكُنَ إِلَیۡهَاۖ فَلَمَّا تَغَشَّىٰهَا حَمَلَتۡ حَمۡلًا خَفِیفࣰا فَمَرَّتۡ بِهِۦۖ فَلَمَّاۤ أَثۡقَلَت دَّعَوَا ٱللَّهَ رَبَّهُمَا لَىِٕنۡ ءَاتَیۡتَنَا صَـٰلِحࣰا لَّنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلشَّـٰكِرِینَ * فَلَمَّاۤ ءَاتَىٰهُمَا صَـٰلِحࣰا جَعَلَا لَهُۥ شُرَكَاۤءَ فِیمَاۤ ءَاتَىٰهُمَاۚ فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَّا یُشۡرِكُونَ*

_"Wohi Khuda hai Jisne tumko ek Nafs se paida kiya aur usi ki Jins se ek joda banaya taake uske paas sukoon mehsoos kare. Jab Mard ne Aurat se maqarebat ki to halka sa Hamal paida hua jise woh liye phirti rahi. Phir jab Hamal bhari hua to dono ne milkar Allah apne Rab se Dua ki agar Tu ne hamko achha sa Bachcha diya to ham Tere Shukrguzaron mein se honge. Phir jab Khuda ne unhe be Aib Farzand ata kiya to woh uski enayat mein doosron ko Uska sharik thahrane lage. Allah in Mushrekana baaton se kahin Buland o Bartar hai jo woh karte hain. "_

(Surah A'raf: 189 - 190)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Is Ayat ke zel mein bahut Kahaniya ghadi gayi hain Hazrat Adam aur Janabe Hawwa ki Aulad ke bare mein.

👉🏻 --------------------------------------

Ye ke ye Ayat Hazrat Adam o Hawwa ke mutalliq hai aur likha gaya ke Hazrat Hawwa ko 500 Aulad paida huin. Ye ke Shaitan ne Hazrat Hawwa ko daraya ke tum iska naam Abdul Haris na rakha to ye kisi Janwar ki shakl o surat mein paida hoga. Chunanche jab bachcha paida hua to iska naam Abdul Haris rakh diya.

-------------------------------------------👆🏻

Jabke haqeeqat ye hai ke Khuda ke Nabi aur Khalifatullah aur Masjood Malaika ke ki Shakhsiyat ke liye ye tasweer intihai lagu aur mohmil hai.

Ye aam Insaanon ki Dastaan hai aur har Insaan apne Bachche ki Wiladat se pahle tarah tarah ki Duayen karta hai aur Khuda se Ahd o Paiman karta hai ke woh Bachche ki Wiladat par Khuda ka Shukr ada kare. Lekin jab kaam nikal jata hai to Enayat e Khuda Wandi ko mukhtalif afraad o ashkhas ki taraf mansoob karne lag jata hai aur Khuda ke Ehsaan se ghaflat baratne lag jata hai.

Tafseer Kabir ne isko rad kiya aur ye daleel pesh ki:

1. Iske akhir mein Allah Ta'ala ne Jama ka Seegha istemal kiya hai isliye ye waqea H. Adam o Hawwa se mutalliq nahi hai balke aam bani no Insaan ka yehi haal hai.

2. Doosri Ayat mein Shirk ka zikr hai, us mein ye nahi ke Shaitan ne bahkaya.

(To be Cont'd...)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Allah ne (Surah Kahf, Ayat 46) mein farmaya "Maal aur Aulaad is Hayaat e Duniya ki Zeenat hai". Magar bande ki shab ki aakhir mein padhi gayi 8 rakaat Namaz, Akherat ki zeenat hai."_

(Salaatul Layl)

🤲🏻

Bare Ilaha hame Nek Aulad ata kar.

*اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ انْفَعْنِيْ بِزِيَارَتِهَا وَ ثَبِّتْنِيْ عَلٰى مَحَبَّتِهَا وَ لَا تَحْرِمْنِيْ شَفَاعَتَهَا وَ شَفَاعَةَ الْاَئِمَّةِ مِنْ ذُرِّيَّتِهَا، وَ ارْزُقْنِيْ مُرَافَقَتَهَا وَ احْشُرْنِيْ مَعَهَا وَ مَعَ اَوْلَادِهَا الطَّاهِرِيْنَ*

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *18th Muharram 1441*

 *18th September 2019, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

                  ♦ _*SHIRK*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1291)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَلَمَّاۤ ءَاتَىٰهُمَا صَـٰلِحࣰا جَعَلَا لَهُۥ شُرَكَاۤءَ فِیمَاۤ ءَاتَىٰهُمَاۚ فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَّا یُشۡرِكُونَ *  أَیُشۡرِكُونَ مَا لَا یَخۡلُقُ شَیۡـࣰٔا وَهُمۡ یُخۡلَقُونَ *  وَلَا یَسۡتَطِیعُونَ لَهُمۡ نَصۡرࣰا وَلَاۤ أَنفُسَهُمۡ یَنصُرُونَ*

_"Phir jab Khuda ne unhe be Aib Farzand ata kiya to woh Uski Enayat mein doosron ko Uska sharik thahrane lage. Allah in Mushrikana Baaton se kahin Buland o Bartar hai jo woh karte hain. "_

_" Kya ye log unhe Sharik banate hain jo koi shaye khalq nahi kar sakte balke khud paida kiye jate hain. Inke ikhtiyar mein unki madad nahi hai aur woh apni madad bhi nahi kar sakte."_

(Surah A'raf: 190 - 192])

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Guzishta se pewast:-

Is Ayat ke zel mein Mufasserin mein kaafi ikhtekaf hai.

In Ayaat ki bahut sahi Taveelat maujood hain jaisa ke Qaffal ne kaha:

"Allah Ta'ala ne is waqae ko aam zarbul masal (Proverb) ke andaz mein bayan kiya hai aur in Ayaat mein Kuffar o Mushrekin ke tarz e Amal par tanqeed ki hai aur farmaya hai ke Khuda Woh hai jis ne tamam Insaano ko Nafs e Wahida se paida kiya aur uski jins se uski Biwi paida ki hai jo ke har lehaz se uski ham jins aur ham no' hai aur woh bhi usi tarah se Insaan hai jab Shauhar Biwi se maqarebat (sex) karta hai aur Biwi hamela hoti hai to Miya Biwi dono Khuda se Duayen mangte hain ke hamen be aib farzand ata farma aur agar Tu hamen be aib farzand ata kiya to ham Tera Shukr ada karenge. Phir jab Khuda un par enayat karta hai aur unhe be aib farzand ata kar deta hai to woh Khuda ke Shukr ke bajaye us Ne'mat ki nisbat doosron ki taraf karne lag jate hain. Kuchh log iski nisbat tabae (nature) ki taraf karte hain aur Munajjim (Astrologer) qism ke log ise Sitaron ka khel qarar dete hain aur But Parast ise Buton ki karamat batlate hain.

Isliye Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya:

_"Allah inke Shirk se kahin Buland o Bala hai."_

Darje Bala be sarapa Afsaane, man ghadat baten Sunni Kitabon se tajawuz karke baaz Shia anasir Tafaseer mein bhi mazkoor hain aur ye Afsaane Uyoonul Akhbar, Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim aur Tafseer Ayyashi meim bhi marqoom hain. In Kitabon ke Mu'allif (writter) chunke aala darje ke Akhbari the isi liye unhone is Afsaane ko naql karne mein koi diqqat nahi aayi.

(✍🏻.. Allama Mohd Hasan Jafari, Translator of Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Rasoolallah (saww) har Roz 6 cheezo'n se Allah ki panaah talab karte the:_

_1) Shar (buraayi), *2) Shirk,* 3) Bejaa tassub (undue bias), 4) Gazab, 5) Sitam, 6) Hasad."_

(Khisaal, p171)

🤲🏻

*..الْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِي اسْتَنْقَذَنَا بِكَ مِنَ الشِّرْكِ وَ الضَّلَالِ اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِهِ..*

(Ziyarat Rasoole Khuda (saww) - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

             *19th Muharram 1441*

 *19th September 2019, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

         ♦ _*BUT PARASTI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1292)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِن تَدۡعُوهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰ لَا یَتَّبِعُوكُمۡۚ سَوَاۤءٌ عَلَیۡكُمۡ أَدَعَوۡتُمُوهُمۡ أَمۡ أَنتُمۡ صَـٰمِتُونَ *  إِنَّ ٱلَّذِینَ تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ عِبَادٌ أَمۡثَالُكُمۡۖ فَٱدۡعُوهُمۡ فَلۡیَسۡتَجِیبُوا۟ لَكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَـٰدِقِینَ*

_"Agar tum inhe Seedhi Rah par aane ki Dawat do to woh tumhari pairavi nahi karenge. Tum khwah inhe Dawat do ya tum khamosh raho donon surten tumhare liye yaksan hain. Tum Mushrik log Khuda ko chhod kar jinhe pukarte ho woh bhi tumhari tarah ke Bande hain lehaza tum inhe pukaro aur agar tum apne khayal mein sachche ho to inhe bhi tumhari Duaon ka jawab dena chahiye."_

(Surah A'raf: 193 - 194)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Is Ayat mein Allah Ta'ala ne Mushrekin ke nature ko bayan kar raha kyonki But Parasti un mein kot kot kar bhari hui hai. But Parasti kai tarah ki hoti hai. Allah ke alawa koi shakhs kisi ki bhi pairavi kare ya apni haajat talab kare wo bhi uski parastish hogi.

Riwayat:

Jab Shaitan ne sone aur chaandi se banaye gaye Sikke (gold aur silver coins) is duniya mein pehli baar dekhe to unhe uthha kar seene se lagaaya aur kaha, "Tum dono mere noor e nazar ho, mere dil ka mewa ho" aur phir oon sikko'n se kaha ke, "Main iske alawa koi aur garaz nahi rakhta ke Bani Adam (Adam (as) ki aulaad) ek buut bana kar uski parastish karein aur usay dost rakhein aur doosra ye ke wo tumhe dost aur azeez rakhein."

(Amaali - Shaikh Sadooq, p197)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Imam Baqir (as):

_"Jis tarah Khuda ne farmaya: "Allah ne unki Roshni khatm kar di aur unhe tarikiyon mein chhod diya jahan kuchh bhi sujhai nahi deta. (2:17)" Jab se Hazrat Rasoole Khuda (saww) ki Shahadat hui Ummat ki aksariyat ki bhi yehi haalat ho gayi. Noor e Nabuwwat ke gul hone ke baad charon taraf tareeki ka raj hai. Is tareeki mein logon ko Ahle Bait (as) ki Fazilat dikhayi nahi deti."_

(Roza e Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

Imam Sadiq (as):

(But-Parast Kalma padh kar Musalman ban sakta hai lekin Imam nahi ban sakta) _"Ibrahim (as) pehle Nabi the lekin Imam na the aur jab Allah ne unhe Imam banaya to unse farmaya, "Main tujhe logo'n ka Imam muqarrar karta hoo'n". Unhone Imamat ke ohde ke liye apni aulaad ki darkhwast pesh karte huwe kaha, "Khudaya! Meri nasl mein bhi Imamat ka silsila jaari rakhna". Khuda ne farmaya, "Mera Ahad zaalimo'n ko nahi milega". (Teeno jumle Surah Baqarah, Ayat 124). Lihaza, jisne bhi zindagi mein kabhi butt-parasti ki hogi wo Imam nahi ban sakega."_

(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v1, p238)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّيْۤ اَدْعُوْكَ كَمَاۤ اَمَرْتَنِيْ فَاسْتَجِبْ لِيْ كَمَا وَعَدْتَنِيْ اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ*

(Dua-e-Mubahela - Mafateeh)

-------------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

           *21st Muharram 1441*

  *21st September 2019, Saturday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

           ♦ _*BUT-PARASTI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1293)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*أَلَهُمۡ أَرۡجُلࣱ یَمۡشُونَ بِهَاۤۖ أَمۡ لَهُمۡ أَیۡدࣲ یَبۡطِشُونَ بِهَاۤۖ أَمۡ لَهُمۡ أَعۡیُنࣱ یُبۡصِرُونَ بِهَاۤۖ أَمۡ لَهُمۡ ءَاذَانࣱ یَسۡمَعُونَ بِهَاۗ قُلِ ٱدۡعُوا۟ شُرَكَاۤءَكُمۡ ثُمَّ كِیدُونِ فَلَا تُنظِرُونِ *  إِنَّ وَلِـِّۧیَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِی نَزَّلَ ٱلۡكِتَـٰبَۖ وَهُوَ یَتَوَلَّى ٱلصَّـٰلِحِینَ*

_"Kya unke (Buton ke) paas Paon hain jinse woh chal saken? Kya ye haath rakhte hain ke unse pakden? Kya unke paas Aankhen hain ke unse dekhen? Kya woh Kaan rakhte hain ke unse sunen? Aap kah den ke tum apne sharikon ko bula lo. Phir tum mil kar mere khilaf tadbeeren karo aur mujhe hargiz mohlat na do. Beshak mera Haami o Nasir Woh Khuda hai jisne Kitab nazil ki hai aur Woh Nek logon ki Himayat o Nusrat karta hai aur use chhod kar tum jinko pukarte ho woh na tumhari madad kar sakte hain aur na hi woh apni madad karne ke qabil hain."_

(Surah A'raf: 195 - 196)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

But-Parasti ka tazkara jari hai. Dua-e-Sanam e Quraish mein Quraish ke Do Buton par La'anat ki gayi hai. Asl ko chhod kar naql ki pairavi karna bhi But Parasti hi hai. Kisi Ghasib ki pairavi bhi But Parasti hi hai. Isliye But Parasti ke kaafi wasee mafhoom hain. Tafseel ki yahan gunjayesh nahi.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Amr ibn Ubaid Basrah ki ek Masjid mein baitha logon ke sawal ke jawab de raha tha. Ahle Bait (as) ki Imamat ka inkar karta tha. Wahin Hisham bin Hakam (Imam Sadiq (as) ke sahabi) bhi pahunch gaye aur unhone bhi usse sawal kiye.

Hisham: Kya aapke Aankhen hain?

Amr: Ye kaise behooda sawal kar rahe hain?

Hisham: Mere sabhi sawal aise hi hain.

Amr: Thik hai. Aankhen hain.

Hisham: Isse kiya karte hain?

Amr: Dekhta hun.

Hisham: Naak hai? Amr: Hai.

Hisham: Isse kiya karte hain?

Amr: Soongta hun.

Hisham: Munh hai? Amr: Hai.

Hisham: Isse kiya karte hain?

Amr: Khaata hun, chabata hun.

Hisham: Zabaan hai? Amr: Hai.

Hisham: Isse kiya karte hain?

Amr: Zabaan se bolta hun.

Hisham: Kaan hain? Amr: Hai.

Hisham: Isse kiya karte hain?

Amr: Isse sunta hun.

Hisham: Haath hain? Amr: Hai.

Hisham: Isse kiya karte hain?

Amr: Usse Kaam karta hun. Narm aur sakht ki sanakht karta hun.....

Hisham: Paon hain? Amr: Hai.

Amr: Inke zariye chalta hun, ghumta hun..

Hisham: Dil hai? Amr: Hai.

Hisham: Isse kiya karte hain?

Amr: Dil sare parts ke amal o asaraat ko judge karta hai.

Hisham: Ye sare parts ko Dil ki kya zaroorat jabke sabhi parts good condition mein hain?

Amr: Nahi, Insaan baghair Dil ke nahi rah sakta. Dil saare parts ko control karta hai.

Hisham: Jab ek Insaan ke parts ko control mein rakhne ke liye Allah ne Dil ko rakha hai jabke saare parts sahi o saalim hain.

Wohi Khuda is saare Kainaat ko baghair Rahbar ke kaise chhod sakta hai. Kya is Kainat ke parts ko ek Dil ki zaroorat nahi.

Imam ka wujood hi is Kainat ka Dil hai. (Khulasa Riwayat)

(Al Kaafi, Vol 1, P-169, Ali Ibne Ibrahim, Rijaal e Kashi)

🤲🏻

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):

"Us Zaat ki Qasam Jisne Muhammad Musatafa (saww) ko Haq ke saath mab'oos farmaya aur unke Ahle Bait (as) ko izzat ata farmayi. Quran Majeed mein jalne, gharq hone, chori, kisi chaupaye ke chale jane, kisi gumshada ki waapsi ke liye Ayaat maujood hain aur tum mein se kisi ko agar kisi baat ke maaloom karne ki khwahish ho to woh mujh se poochh le."

Majme mein se ek ne sawal kiya Jalne aur Doobne se mehfooz rahne ke liye kaunsi Ayat hai?

Imam (as) ne farmaya:

_"Ye Ayat padho (7:196). Jo ye Ayat padhega woh jalne aur doobne se mehfooz rahega. Iske baad Ayat (Zumar:67) padhe."_

Hazrat (as) ke farman ke mutabiq woh shakhs in Ayaat ko rozana padhta tha. Ek martaba uske pados mein Aag lagi. Uske charo taraf ghar jal gaye lekin iska ghar mehfooz raha.

Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne bhi yehi farmaya hai.

(Usoole Kaafi, Man La Yahzarahul Faqih, Noorus Saqlain)

*اللهم العن صنمي قريش وجبتيها وطاغوتيها وإفكيها وابنتيها*

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *22nd Muharram 1441*

   *22nd September 2019, Sunday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

       ♦ _*QURAISH KE DO BUT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1294)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَٱلَّذِینَ تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ لَا یَسۡتَطِیعُونَ نَصۡرَكُمۡ وَلَاۤ أَنفُسَهُمۡ یَنصُرُونَ *  وَإِن تَدۡعُوهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰ لَا یَسۡمَعُوا۟ۖ وَتَرَىٰهُمۡ یَنظُرُونَ إِلَیۡكَ وَهُمۡ لَا یُبۡصِرُونَ*

_"Aur Use chhod kar tum jinko pukarte ho woh na to tumhari madad kar sakte hain aur na hi woh apni madad karne ke qabil hain. Aur agar tum unhe Hidayat ki janib Dawat do to woh Dawat sunna pasand nahi karenge aur bazahir tum ko dikhayi deta hai ke woh tumhari taraf dekh rahe hain magar woh Haqeeqat mein kuchh kuchh bhi nahi dekhte."_

(Surah A'raf: 197 - 198)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Hamne Dua e Saname Quraish ke hawale se Do Buton ka zikr kiya tha. Zamana e Jahiliyyat mein to 360 ya aur zyada hi But the magar, Islam mein bhi do bade But aise the jin par La'anat ki gayi hai. Inko Jibt o Taghoot ka naam diya gaya. Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) is Dua ko Namaz ki Dua e Qunoot mein padhte the.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Imam Reza (as)

se logo'n ne puchha, "Jo shakhs mar jaaye aur apne Imam ko na pehchaanta ho, kya jaahiliyyat ki maut mara hai?"

Hazrat ne farmaya,

_"Jo shakhs Imam ki Imamat mein shak kare ya tawaqquf kare wo kaafir hai aur jo shakhs Imam ki Imamat se inkaar kare ya Imam se izhaar e adaawat kare, wo mushrik hai yaani buut-parast ke maanind hai."_

(Isbaat e Imamat - Allamah Majlisi, p56)

🤲🏻

*Dua-e-Sanama-e-Quraish:*

Imam Ali (as):

_"Khuda Wanda! Tu Quraish ke dono (Zalim) Baatil Ma'boodon aur dono Shaitaano aur dono sharikon aur un dono ki Betiyon par La'anat kar jinhone Tere Hukm ki khilaf warzi ki, Teri Wahy ko peeth dikhayi, Tere Ne'mato'n ke munkir hue, Tere Rasool (saww) ki baat nahi maani, Tere Deen ko palat kar rakh diya, Teri Kitab ke taqazon ko poora na hone diya, Tere Dushmanon se dosti ki, Teri Ne'mato'n ko thukraya, aur Tere Ahkam ko mu'attal kiya aur Tere Faraez ko Baatil kiya aur Teri Ayaton ka inkaar kiya aur Tere doston se Adawat ki aur Tere Dushmano se muhabbat ki aur Tere Shehron ko kharab kiya aur Tere Bando mein fasaad phaila. Khuda Wand! Tu in dono aur inke pairokar aur inke doston aur inke followers aur inke madadgaron par La'anat kar kyonki unhone Khana e Nabuwwat ko tabah kiya aur uska Darwaza band kiya aur uski Chhat ko tod dala aur uske Aasmaan ko iski Zameen se aur uski balandi ko iski pasti se aur uske zahir ko uske Baatil se mila diya aur us Ghar ke makino ko mita diya aur uske madadgaron ko halaak kiya aur uske Bachchon ko qatl kiya aur uske Mimbar ko uske Wasi aur uske Ilm ke Waris se khaali kiya aur uski Imamat se inkar kiya aur un dono ne apne Parwardigar ka sharik banaya. Lehaza Tu unke Azaab ko sakht kar aur un dono ko hamesha Dozakh mein rakh aur Tu khoob Jaanta hai ke Dozakh kiya hai. Woh kisi ko baqi nahi rakhta aur na chhodta hai....."_

(Dua ka ek hissa, baqi Dua ki Kitabon mein padhen)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *23rd Muharram 1441*

   *23rd September 2019, Monday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

         ♦ _*3 AHM AHKAM*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1295)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*خُذِ ٱلۡعَفۡوَ وَأۡمُرۡ بِٱلۡعُرۡفِ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ ٱلۡجَـٰهِلِینَ.*

_"Aap darguzar (forgiveness) ka Raasta ikhtiyar karen aur Neki ka Hukm den aur Jahilon se kinara kashi karen."_

(Surah A'raf: 199)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Allah Ta'ala ne is Ayat mein 3 Hukm diye hain:

1. Bakhshish, forgiveness.

2. Amr Bil Maroof.

3. Jahilon se kinara kashi.

🛣

Imam Sadiq (as):

"Darmiyani Raasta apnayen yani hamesha hadde etedal (Moderate) ko madde nazar rakhen aur Ifraat o Tafreez se kinara kashi karen. Urf se murad tamam Umoor hain jinhen Insaani mashera behtar Tasleem karta ho aur Amr Bil Maroof ka pahla fayda khud Amr karne wale ko hi pahunchta hai kyonki jab koi shakhs doosron ko Neki aur bhalai ka hukm dega to sab se pahle woh khud us par amal karega. Teesra Hukm hai Jahilon se kinara kashi karo kyonki Jahil naturally ziddi hote hain aur unse doori ikhtiyar karne mein hi nijaat ka raaz hai. Jahilon se Mubahisa karna aur ulajhna bekar hai."

(Noorus Saqlain)

🗣

Imam Ali (as):

_"Woh jo Jismaani, Zabaani aur Ruhaani tariqe se Amr bil Maroof aur Nahi Anil Munkar karna chhor deta hai, wo ek zinda laash ki tarah hai."_

(Miskhat ul Anwaar)

😮

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jaahil ki ek aadat ye hai ke woh (baat) sunne se pehle hi jawab dena shuru kar deta hai, baat samajhne se pehle jhagadna shuru kar deta hai.."_

(Meezan ul Hikmah, v2)

🤲🏻

Imam Sajjad (as)

_"(Aye mere Sardaar!).... Aur mujhe sab gunaho'n se paak saaf kar de. Apni darguzar ke saath mujhe Jahannum se panaah de. Apni Rehmat se mujhe Jannat mein daakhil kar de..."_

(Dua e Abu Hamza Shimaali)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *24th Muharram 1441*

    *24th September 2019, Tuesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

    ♦ _*WASWASA-E-SHAITAN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1296)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِمَّا یَنزَغَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلشَّیۡطَـٰنِ نَزۡغࣱ فَٱسۡتَعِذۡ بِٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّهُۥ سَمِیعٌ عَلِیمٌ * إِنَّ ٱلَّذِینَ ٱتَّقَوۡا۟ إِذَا مَسَّهُمۡ طَـٰۤىِٕفࣱ مِّنَ ٱلشَّیۡطَـٰنِ تَذَكَّرُوا۟ فَإِذَا هُم مُّبۡصِرُونَ * وَإِخۡوَ ٰ⁠نُهُمۡ یَمُدُّونَهُمۡ فِی ٱلۡغَیِّ ثُمَّ لَا یُقۡصِرُونَ.*

_"Aur agar kabhi Shaitan tumhe uksai to Allah ki panah maango. Woh sab kuchh Sunnewala aur sab kuchh Jannewala hai. Aur jo log Ahle Taqwa hain jab kabhi Shaitan ke asar se unhe koi bura khayal chhu bhi jata hai to fauran chaukanne ho jate hain aur Haqaeq ko dekhne lag jate hain. Aur rahe Shayateen ke bhai band to woh unhe unki kaj rawi mein khinche chale jate hain aur unki Gumrahi mein koi kami nahi karte."_

(Surah A'raf: 200 - 202)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Agar kabhi tumhare Dil mein Shaitani Waswasa paida ho to Khuda se panah talab karo kyonki Woh Sunnewala, Jannewala hai aur Allah Ta'ala ne apne Khalis Bando ki ye sifat bayan ki hai. Jab kabhi Shaitan Ahle Taqwa ko Nafarmani ke liye uksata hai to woh fauran Khuda ko yaad karte hain aur unhe Imaan ki Roshni mil jati hai aur woh Gunahon se bach jate hain.

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlai

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇

 Hazrat Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):

_"Jab tum mein se kisi ke Dil mein Shaitan Waswasa paida kare to use Khuda se panah talab karni chahiye aur ye kahna chahiye:_

*آمنت بالله و برسوله مخلصا له الدين.*

_"Khuda ne chaha to Shaitan ke Waswase se mehfooz rahega."_

(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Sajjad (as):

_"Logo! Gunahon aur Nafarmani se darte raho, Khuda ne tumhe unse mana kiya hai aur apne Natiq Bayan ke wasile se apni sachchi Kitab mein tumhe unse khabardar kiya hai. Jab Shaitan La'een tumhe Duniyavi Lazzat o Khwahishat ki Dawat de to us waqt Khuda ki Tadbeer aur Giraft ko hamesha zehen mein rakho. Lehaza khauf e Khuda ko apne Dilo ko shu'ar banao aur Khuda ke behtareen sawab aur uske sakht tareen Azaab par hamesha nigah rakho. Allah farman hai: (7:201)"_

(Rauza e Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Mohd Baqir (as):

_"Teen kaam bahut hi mushkil hain: (1) Momin ka apne Nafs se Insaaf karna (2) Bhaichare ki laaj rakhna. (3) Har haal mein Khuda ko yaad karna. Iska mafhoom ye hai ke jab kisi Gunah ka iraada kare to Khuda ko yaad kare aur Zikre Khuda ki wajah se Gunah ko chhod de jaisa ke Allah Ta'ala ka farman hai (7:201)"_

(Kitabul Khisaal, Tafseer e Ayyashi, Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّىْ اَسْئَلُكَ بِحَقِّ وَلِيِّكَ عَلِىِّ بْنِ الْحُسَيْنِ عَلَيْهِ السَّلَامُ اِلَّا كَفَيْتَنِىْ بِهِ مَؤُنَةَ كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ مَرِيْدٍ وَسُلْطَانٍ عَنِيْدٍ يَتَقَوّٰى عَلَىَّ بِبَطْشِهِ وَيَنْتَصِرُ عَلَىَّ بِجُنْدِهِ اِنَّكَ جَوَادٌ كَرِيْمٌ*

(Mafateehul Jinaan)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

🏴 *SHIA CHANNEL COMMEMORATE SHAHADAT OF IMAM SAJJAD (as)* 🏴

**********************************

          *25th Muharram 1441*

 *25th September 2019, Wednesday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

       ♦ _*SAM'AT E QURAN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1297) 📚

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذَا لَمۡ تَأۡتِهِم بِـَٔایَةࣲ قَالُوا۟ لَوۡلَا ٱجۡتَبَیۡتَهَاۚ قُلۡ إِنَّمَاۤ أَتَّبِعُ مَا یُوحَىٰۤ إِلَیَّ مِن رَّبِّیۚ هَـٰذَا بَصَاۤىِٕرُ مِن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَهُدࣰى وَرَحۡمَةࣱ لِّقَوۡمࣲ یُؤۡمِنُونَ *  وَإِذَا قُرِئَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ فَٱسۡتَمِعُوا۟ لَهُۥ وَأَنصِتُوا۟ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ.*

_"Aur jab Aap unke saamne koi Nishani pesh nahi karte to kahte hain ke tumne apne liye Mo'jeza ka intekhab kyon nahi kiya. Aap kah den mein to bas us Wahy ki pairavi karta hun jo mere Rab ki taraf se meri taraf bheji jati hai. Ye Qur'an tumhare Rab ki taraf se Baseerat ki Roshniya liye hue hai aur Imaan lane walon ke liye Hidayat aur Rehmat hai. Aur jab Qur'an padha jaye to use tawajjo se suno aur khamosh raho ke shayad tum par rahem kiya jaye."_

(Surah Al-A'raf: 203 - 204)

📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Jab bhi Qur'an ki ayaten padhi jayen uske ehtram mein hame khamoshi se sunna chahiye taake usse ham kuchh Hidayat hasil kar saken. Qirat ke waqt complete silent hona chahiye. Namaz mein bhi jis waqt Sura Al Hamd aur doosra sura Pesh Imam padhta hai to Mamoon khamoshi se sunte hain.

Lekin agar Mamoon agar koi aur doosra sura padhne lage to Pesh Imam khamosh ho jata hai.

Hazrat Ali (as) subha ki Namaz padha rahe the ke ek munafiq Ibne Kawwa ne doosri ayat padhi jis ka mafhoom ye tha ke Jange Siffin mein use unke hakamiyyat qubool karne par e'teraz tha. 3 bar yehi ayat padhi aur Hazrat Ali (as) khamosh rahe. Phir H. Ali (as) ne woh ayat padhi ke munafeqeen ke liye dardnak azaab anewala hai.

(Noorus Saqlain)

Means Qur'an ko sunna itni ahmiyat rakhta hai. Ye ek Mustahab amal hai. Imam Mohd Baqir (as) ke Jume ke Khutbe mein bhi ye Ayat shamil hai. (Al Kaafi)

🤲🏻

Bare Ilaha hame Qur'an padhne aur sunne ki taufeeq ata farma.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇 📚

Imam Sadiq (as):

*يجب الانصات للقرآن فى الصلوة و اذا قرء عندك القرآن وجب الانصات و الاستماع.*

_"Tum par wajib hai ke Namaz aur Namaz ke alawa bhi jab Qirat e Qur'an ho rahi ho khamoshi ikhtiyar kare aur jab tumhare samne Qur'an padha jaye to zaroori hai ke khamoshi ikhtiyar ki jaye aur kaan dhar ke use suna jaye."_

📖

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Namaz aur Namaz ke alawa Qur'an ko khamoshi se sunna Wajib hai aur jab tere paas Qur'an padha jaye to tujhe khamosh ho kar use tawajjo se sunna chahiye."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

📚

Imam Baqir (as):

*و اذا قرء القرآن فى الفريضة خلف الامام فاستمعوا له و انصتوا لعلكم ترحمون.*

_"Aur jab Qur'an Namaz e Wajib mein padha ja raha ho aur tum Peshnamaz ke peechhe ho to kaan dhar kar suno aur khamosh raho, shayad Rehmat e Khuda tumhare shamil e haal ho."_

(Tafseer e Burhan, Vol 2, P-57)

📚

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Jab tum kisi aise Imam ki iqteda mein Namaz padh rahe ho jisse tumhe Muhabbat ho aur jis par tumhe bharosa ho to uski Qiraat tumhare liye kafi hai. Agar tumhe Qur'an padhna hi ho to jin Raka'at mein woh ikhfat (silence) se qirat kare, tum un Raka'at mein Qur'an padh sakte ho aur jab Imam buland awaz se qirat mein masroof ho to tum khamosh raho, kiyonki Allah ka farman hai: (7:204)"_

(Tehzeebul Ahkam, Noorus Saqlain)

📚

Imam Sadiq (as):

_"Namaz aur Namaz ke alawa Qur'an ko khamoshi se sunna Wajib hai aur jab tumhare paas Qur'an padha jaye to tumhe khamosh ho kar use tawajjo se sunna chahiye."_

(Tafseer e Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*يَا مَنْ قُرْاٰنَهُ مَجِيْدٌ، يَا مَنْ مُلْكُهُ قَدِيْمٌ، يَا مَنْ فَضْلُهُ عَمِيْمٌ،*

(Dua-e-Joshane Kabeer)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

            *26th Muharram 1441*

 *26th September 2019, Thursday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

         ♦ _*ZIKR-E-ILAHI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1298)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَٱذۡكُر رَّبَّكَ فِی نَفۡسِكَ تَضَرُّعࣰا وَخِیفَةࣰ وَدُونَ ٱلۡجَهۡرِ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ بِٱلۡغُدُوِّ وَٱلۡـَٔاصَالِ وَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡغَـٰفِلِینَ.*

_"Aur Aap apne Rab ko Subah o Shaam yaad karen. Dil hi Dil mein Tazarro aur Khauf ke saath aur Zabaan se bhi halki awaaz ke saath. Tum un logon mein se na bano jo ghaflat mein mubtila hain."_

(Surah A'raf: 205)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Rasoole Khuda (saww):

Allah Ta'ala ne Hazrat Esa (as) se farmaya:

_"Esa! Tu mujhe chupke chupke yaad kar mein bhi chupke chupke tujhe yaad karunga, tu mujhe apni mehfil mein yaad kar, Mein Insaano ki mehfil se behtar mehfil mein tera zikr karunga."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):

_"Jisne chhup kar Allah ka zikr kiya to usne dar haqeeqat Zikr e Kaseer kiya. Munafiq logon ke saamne Zikr karte the lekin tanhai mein Allah ka Zikr nahi karte the isiliye Allah ne unke mutalliq farmaya: "Woh logon ke liye dikhawa karte hain, woh Allah ko bahut hi kam yaad karte hain."_

(Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

Imam Sajjad (as):

_"Aye Ma'bood! Mujhe Apne zikr ke saath khaas farma aur raat ke waqto'n mein aur din ke gosho'n mein, jis amal se Teri nazdeeki chahta hoo'n usme meri taraf se dikhaawa, taarif ki khwaish, khud ki taarif aur badaai ka ehsaan na aane de aur mujhe unme qaraar de jo Tujh se darte hain."_

(Dua e Abu Hamza Shimali)

🤲🏻

Imam Sadiq (as):

*لا إله إلا الله وحده لا شريك له له الملك وله الحمد يحيي و يميت و يميت و يحي و هو على كل شيء قدير*

_"Uske saath mein khair hai lekin Dua ko aise padh jaisa ke meine tujhse bayan ki hai aur is Dua ko 10 martaba padhna chahiye."_

(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*

**********************************

          *27th Muharram 1441*

   *27th September 2019, Friday*

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

       ♦ _*GHAAFIL INSAAN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1299)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَٱذۡكُر رَّبَّكَ فِی نَفۡسِكَ تَضَرُّعࣰا وَخِیفَةࣰ وَدُونَ ٱلۡجَهۡرِ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ بِٱلۡغُدُوِّ وَٱلۡـَٔاصَالِ وَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡغَـٰفِلِینَ *  إِنَّ ٱلَّذِینَ عِندَ رَبِّكَ لَا یَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ عَنۡ عِبَادَتِهِۦ وَیُسَبِّحُونَهُۥ وَلَهُۥ یَسۡجُدُونَ.*

_"Aur Aap apne Rab ko Subah o Shaam yaad karen. Dil hi Dil mein Tazarro aur Khauf ke saath aur Zabaan se bhi halki awaaz ke saath. *Tum un logon mein se na bano jo ghaflat mein mubtila hain.* Jo log Khuda ke haan muqarrar hain woh kabhi Uski Ibaadat se Takabbur nahi karte aur woh Uski Tasbeeh karte hain aur woh Uske liye Sajdah karte hain."_

(Surah A'raf: 205 - 206)

(End of Surah, Tamam)

----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_

🙇📚📖

👉 _*Tafseer:*_

 *وَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡغَـٰفِلِینَ*

Imam Sadiq (as) ne ek shakhs se Nasihat farmayi:

_"Jab Shaitan tera Dushman hai to phir ghaflat kis liye?.."_

(Kitabut Tauheed, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Baqir (as):

_"Jo Momin Fariza e Namazon ka khayal rakhe aur unhe unke waqt par ada kare to woh ghaflat karne walon mein se nahi hai."_

(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Imam Sadiq (as):

"Hazrat Luqman (as) ne apne Farzandon se farmaya:"

_"Pyare Farzand! Har cheez apni alamat mein pahchani jati hai aur Ghafil ki Teen alamaten hain: (1) Lahv (2) Sahv (3) Nisyaan."_

(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Rasoole Khuda (saww):

_"Ghafilon ke andar baith kar Allah ka zikr karne wale ka wohi maqam hai jo Gumrah afraad se Jang karne wale ka hai aur Gumrah afraad se Jang karne wale ke liye Jannat hai."_

(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

🕌

Rasoole Khuda (saww):

_"Jo shakhs Raat ke waqt 10 Ayaat padhega to woh Ghaflat karne walon mein shumar nahi kiya jayega."_

(Sawabul Amal, Noorus Saqlain)

Ayat (7:206) mein Allah Ta'ala ne Anbiya o Rusul aur Aimma ke mutalliq Gawahi di hai.

(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

🤲🏻

*وَ لَا تَجْعَلْنِي مِنَ الْغَافِلِيْنَ الْمُبْعَدِيْنَ وَ اغْفِرْ لِيْ يَوْمَ الدِّينِ۔*

(Dua e Mahe Rajab - Mafateeh)

----------------------------------------------

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

----------------------------------------------
THE END

(Plz go back and click for another Surah
